55 #define NULL_AURA_SLOT 0xFF

259  &Aura::HandleNULL, //196 SPELL_AURA_MOD_COOLDOWN (single spell 24818 in 3.2.2a)
260  &Aura::HandleNoImmediateEffect, //197 SPELL_AURA_MOD_ATTACKER_SPELL_AND_WEAPON_CRIT_CHANCE implemented in Unit::SpellCriticalBonus Unit::GetUnitCriticalChance
261  &Aura::HandleUnused, //198 unused (3.0.8a-3.2.2a) old SPELL_AURA_MOD_ALL_WEAPON_SKILLS
262  &Aura::HandleNoImmediateEffect, //199 SPELL_AURA_MOD_INCREASES_SPELL_PCT_TO_HIT implemented in Unit::MagicSpellHitResult
263  &Aura::HandleNoImmediateEffect, //200 SPELL_AURA_MOD_KILL_XP_PCT implemented in Player::GiveXP
264  &Aura::HandleAuraAllowFlight, //201 SPELL_AURA_FLY this aura enable flight mode...
265  &Aura::HandleNoImmediateEffect, //202 SPELL_AURA_IGNORE_COMBAT_RESULT implemented in Unit::MeleeSpellHitResult
266  &Aura::HandleNoImmediateEffect, //203 SPELL_AURA_MOD_ATTACKER_MELEE_CRIT_DAMAGE implemented in Unit::CalculateMeleeDamage and Unit::SpellCriticalDamageBonus
267  &Aura::HandleNoImmediateEffect, //204 SPELL_AURA_MOD_ATTACKER_RANGED_CRIT_DAMAGE implemented in Unit::CalculateMeleeDamage and Unit::SpellCriticalDamageBonus
268  &Aura::HandleNoImmediateEffect, //205 SPELL_AURA_MOD_ATTACKER_SPELL_CRIT_DAMAGE implemented in Unit::SpellCriticalDamageBonus
269  &Aura::HandleAuraModIncreaseFlightSpeed, //206 SPELL_AURA_MOD_FLIGHT_SPEED
270  &Aura::HandleAuraModIncreaseFlightSpeed, //207 SPELL_AURA_MOD_FLIGHT_SPEED_MOUNTED
271  &Aura::HandleAuraModIncreaseFlightSpeed, //208 SPELL_AURA_MOD_FLIGHT_SPEED_STACKING
272  &Aura::HandleAuraModIncreaseFlightSpeed, //209 SPELL_AURA_MOD_FLIGHT_SPEED_MOUNTED_STACKING
273  &Aura::HandleAuraModIncreaseFlightSpeed, //210 SPELL_AURA_MOD_FLIGHT_SPEED_NOT_STACKING
274  &Aura::HandleAuraModIncreaseFlightSpeed, //211 SPELL_AURA_MOD_FLIGHT_SPEED_MOUNTED_NOT_STACKING
275  &Aura::HandleAuraModRangedAttackPowerOfStatPercent, //212 SPELL_AURA_MOD_RANGED_ATTACK_POWER_OF_STAT_PERCENT
276  &Aura::HandleNoImmediateEffect, //213 SPELL_AURA_MOD_RAGE_FROM_DAMAGE_DEALT implemented in Player::RewardRage
277  &Aura::HandleUnused, //214 Tamed Pet Passive (single test like spell 20782, also single for 157 aura)
278  &Aura::HandleArenaPreparation, //215 SPELL_AURA_ARENA_PREPARATION
279  &Aura::HandleModCastingSpeed, //216 SPELL_AURA_HASTE_SPELLS
280  &Aura::HandleModMeleeSpeedPct, //217 SPELL_AURA_MOD_MELEE_HASTE_2
281  &Aura::HandleAuraModRangedHaste, //218 SPELL_AURA_HASTE_RANGED
282  &Aura::HandleModManaRegen, //219 SPELL_AURA_MOD_MANA_REGEN_FROM_STAT
283  &Aura::HandleModRatingFromStat, //220 SPELL_AURA_MOD_RATING_FROM_STAT
284  &Aura::HandleAuraDetaunt, //221 SPELL_AURA_DETAUNT
285  &Aura::HandleUnused, //222 unused (3.0.8a-3.2.2a) only for spell 44586 that not used in real spell cast
286  &Aura::HandleNULL, //223 SPELL_AURA_RAID_PROC_FROM_CHARGE
287  &Aura::HandleUnused, //224 unused (3.0.8a-3.2.2a)
288  &Aura::HandlePrayerOfMending, //225 SPELL_AURA_RAID_PROC_FROM_CHARGE_WITH_VALUE
289  &Aura::HandleAuraPeriodicDummy, //226 SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_DUMMY
290  &Aura::HandlePeriodicTriggerSpellWithValue, //227 SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_TRIGGER_SPELL_WITH_VALUE
291  &Aura::HandleNoImmediateEffect, //228 SPELL_AURA_DETECT_STEALTH
292  &Aura::HandleNoImmediateEffect, //229 SPELL_AURA_MOD_AOE_DAMAGE_AVOIDANCE implemented in Unit::SpellDamageBonusTaken
293  &Aura::HandleAuraModIncreaseMaxHealth, //230 Commanding Shout
294  &Aura::HandleNoImmediateEffect, //231 SPELL_AURA_PROC_TRIGGER_SPELL_WITH_VALUE
295  &Aura::HandleNoImmediateEffect, //232 SPELL_AURA_MECHANIC_DURATION_MOD implement in Unit::CalculateAuraDuration
296  &Aura::HandleNULL, //233 set model id to the one of the creature with id m_modifier.m_miscvalue
297  &Aura::HandleNoImmediateEffect, //234 SPELL_AURA_MECHANIC_DURATION_MOD_NOT_STACK implement in Unit::CalculateAuraDuration
298  &Aura::HandleAuraModDispelResist, //235 SPELL_AURA_MOD_DISPEL_RESIST implement in Unit::MagicSpellHitResult
299  &Aura::HandleAuraControlVehicle, //236 SPELL_AURA_CONTROL_VEHICLE
300  &Aura::HandleModSpellDamagePercentFromAttackPower, //237 SPELL_AURA_MOD_SPELL_DAMAGE_OF_ATTACK_POWER implemented in Unit::SpellBaseDamageBonusDone
301  &Aura::HandleModSpellHealingPercentFromAttackPower, //238 SPELL_AURA_MOD_SPELL_HEALING_OF_ATTACK_POWER implemented in Unit::SpellBaseHealingBonusDone
302  &Aura::HandleAuraModScale, //239 SPELL_AURA_MOD_SCALE_2 only in Noggenfogger Elixir (16595) before 2.3.0 aura 61
303  &Aura::HandleAuraModExpertise, //240 SPELL_AURA_MOD_EXPERTISE
304  &Aura::HandleForceMoveForward, //241 SPELL_AURA_FORCE_MOVE_FORWARD Forces the caster to move forward
305  &Aura::HandleUnused, //242 SPELL_AURA_MOD_SPELL_DAMAGE_FROM_HEALING (only 2 test spels in 3.2.2a)
306  &Aura::HandleFactionOverride, //243 SPELL_AURA_FACTION_OVERRIDE
307  &Aura::HandleComprehendLanguage, //244 SPELL_AURA_COMPREHEND_LANGUAGE
308  &Aura::HandleNoImmediateEffect, //245 SPELL_AURA_MOD_DURATION_OF_MAGIC_EFFECTS implemented in Unit::CalculateAuraDuration
309  &Aura::HandleNoImmediateEffect, //246 SPELL_AURA_MOD_DURATION_OF_EFFECTS_BY_DISPEL implemented in Unit::CalculateAuraDuration
310  &Aura::HandleAuraMirrorImage, //247 SPELL_AURA_MIRROR_IMAGE target to become a clone of the caster
311  &Aura::HandleNoImmediateEffect, //248 SPELL_AURA_MOD_COMBAT_RESULT_CHANCE implemented in Unit::CalculateEffectiveDodgeChance, Unit::CalculateEffectiveParryChance, Unit::CalculateEffectiveBlockChance
312  &Aura::HandleAuraConvertRune, //249 SPELL_AURA_CONVERT_RUNE
313  &Aura::HandleAuraModIncreaseHealth, //250 SPELL_AURA_MOD_INCREASE_HEALTH_2
314  &Aura::HandleNULL, //251 SPELL_AURA_MOD_ENEMY_DODGE
315  &Aura::HandleModCombatSpeedPct, //252 SPELL_AURA_SLOW_ALL
316  &Aura::HandleNoImmediateEffect, //253 SPELL_AURA_MOD_BLOCK_CRIT_CHANCE implemented in Unit::CalculateMeleeDamage
317  &Aura::HandleAuraModDisarm, //254 SPELL_AURA_MOD_DISARM_OFFHAND also disarm shield
318  &Aura::HandleNoImmediateEffect, //255 SPELL_AURA_MOD_MECHANIC_DAMAGE_TAKEN_PERCENT implemented in Unit::SpellDamageBonusTaken
319  &Aura::HandleNoReagentUseAura, //256 SPELL_AURA_NO_REAGENT_USE Use SpellClassMask for spell select
320  &Aura::HandleNULL, //257 SPELL_AURA_MOD_TARGET_RESIST_BY_SPELL_CLASS Use SpellClassMask for spell select
321  &Aura::HandleNULL, //258 SPELL_AURA_MOD_SPELL_VISUAL
322  &Aura::HandleNoImmediateEffect, //259 SPELL_AURA_MOD_PERIODIC_HEAL implemented in Unit::SpellHealingBonus
323  &Aura::HandleNoImmediateEffect, //260 SPELL_AURA_SCREEN_EFFECT (miscvalue = id in ScreenEffect.dbc) not required any code
324  &Aura::HandlePhase, //261 SPELL_AURA_PHASE undetectable invisibility? implemented in Unit::IsVisibleForOrDetect
325  &Aura::HandleNoImmediateEffect, //262 SPELL_AURA_IGNORE_UNIT_STATE implemented in Unit::isIgnoreUnitState & Spell::CheckCast
326  &Aura::HandleAuraAllowOnlyAbility, //263 SPELL_AURA_ALLOW_ONLY_ABILITY
327  &Aura::HandleUnused, //264 unused (3.0.8a-3.2.2a)
328  &Aura::HandleUnused, //265 unused (3.0.8a-3.2.2a)
329  &Aura::HandleUnused, //266 unused (3.0.8a-3.2.2a)
330  &Aura::HandleNoImmediateEffect, //267 SPELL_AURA_MOD_IMMUNE_AURA_APPLY_SCHOOL implemented in Unit::IsImmuneToSpellEffect
331  &Aura::HandleAuraModAttackPowerOfStatPercent, //268 SPELL_AURA_MOD_ATTACK_POWER_OF_STAT_PERCENT
332  &Aura::HandleNoImmediateEffect, //269 SPELL_AURA_MOD_IGNORE_DAMAGE_REDUCTION_SCHOOL implemented in Unit::CalcNotIgnoreDamageReduction
333  &Aura::HandleUnused, //270 SPELL_AURA_MOD_IGNORE_TARGET_RESIST (unused in 3.2.2a)
334  &Aura::HandleNoImmediateEffect, //271 SPELL_AURA_MOD_DAMAGE_FROM_CASTER implemented in Unit::SpellDamageBonusTaken
335  &Aura::HandleNoImmediateEffect, //272 SPELL_AURA_MAELSTROM_WEAPON (unclear use for aura, it used in (3.2.2a...3.3.0) in single spell 53817 that spellmode stacked and charged spell expected to be drop as stack
336  &Aura::HandleNoImmediateEffect, //273 SPELL_AURA_X_RAY (client side implementation)
337  &Aura::HandleNULL, //274 proc free shot?
338  &Aura::HandleNoImmediateEffect, //275 SPELL_AURA_MOD_IGNORE_SHAPESHIFT Use SpellClassMask for spell select
339  &Aura::HandleNULL, //276 mod damage % mechanic?
340  &Aura::HandleNoImmediateEffect, //277 SPELL_AURA_MOD_MAX_AFFECTED_TARGETS Use SpellClassMask for spell select
341  &Aura::HandleAuraModDisarm, //278 SPELL_AURA_MOD_DISARM_RANGED disarm ranged weapon
342  &Aura::HandleMirrorName, //279 SPELL_AURA_MIRROR_NAME target receives the casters name
343  &Aura::HandleModTargetArmorPct, //280 SPELL_AURA_MOD_TARGET_ARMOR_PCT
344  &Aura::HandleNoImmediateEffect, //281 SPELL_AURA_MOD_HONOR_GAIN implemented in Player::RewardHonor
345  &Aura::HandleAuraIncreaseBaseHealthPercent, //282 SPELL_AURA_INCREASE_BASE_HEALTH_PERCENT
346  &Aura::HandleNoImmediateEffect, //283 SPELL_AURA_MOD_HEALING_RECEIVED implemented in Unit::SpellHealingBonusTaken
347  &Aura::HandleTriggerLinkedAura, //284 SPELL_AURA_TRIGGER_LINKED_AURA
348  &Aura::HandleAuraModAttackPowerOfArmor, //285 SPELL_AURA_MOD_ATTACK_POWER_OF_ARMOR implemented in Player::UpdateAttackPowerAndDamage
349  &Aura::HandleNoImmediateEffect, //286 SPELL_AURA_ABILITY_PERIODIC_CRIT implemented in Aura::IsCritFromAbilityAura called from Aura::PeriodicTick
350  &Aura::HandleNoImmediateEffect, //287 SPELL_AURA_DEFLECT_SPELLS implemented in Unit::MagicSpellHitResult and Unit::MeleeSpellHitResult
351  &Aura::HandleNoImmediateEffect, //288 SPELL_AURA_MOD_PARRY_FROM_BEHIND_PERCENT percent from normal parry/deflect applied to from behind attack case (single spell used 67801, also look 4.1.0 spell 97574)
352  &Aura::HandleNoImmediateEffect, //289 SPELL_AURA_PREVENT_DURABILITY_LOSS
353  &Aura::HandleAuraModAllCritChance, //290 SPELL_AURA_MOD_ALL_CRIT_CHANCE
354  &Aura::HandleNoImmediateEffect, //291 SPELL_AURA_MOD_QUEST_XP_PCT implemented in Player::GiveXP
355  &Aura::HandleAuraOpenStable, //292 SPELL_AURA_OPEN_STABLE
356  &Aura::HandleAuraAddMechanicAbilities, //293 SPELL_AURA_ADD_MECHANIC_ABILITIES replaces target's action bars with a predefined spellset
357  &Aura::HandleAuraStopNaturalManaRegen, //294 SPELL_AURA_STOP_NATURAL_MANA_REGEN implemented in Player:Regenerate
358  &Aura::HandleUnused, //295 unused (3.2.2a)
359  &Aura::HandleAuraSetVehicleId, //296 SPELL_AURA_SET_VEHICLE_ID
360  &Aura::HandleNULL, //297 SPELL_AURA_BLOCK_SPELL_FAMILY
361  &Aura::HandleUnused, //298 SPELL_AURA_STRANGULATE
362  &Aura::HandleUnused, //299 unused (3.2.2a)
363  &Aura::HandleNoImmediateEffect, //300 SPELL_AURA_SHARE_DAMAGE_PCT 9 spells
364  &Aura::HandleNULL, //301 SPELL_AURA_HEAL_ABSORB 5 spells
365  &Aura::HandleUnused, //302 unused (3.2.2a)
366  &Aura::HandleNoImmediateEffect, //303 SPELL_AURA_DAMAGE_DONE_VERSUS_AURA_STATE_PCT - 17 spells implemented in Unit::*DamageBonus
367  &Aura::HandleAuraFakeInebriation, //304 SPELL_AURA_FAKE_INEBRIATE
368  &Aura::HandleAuraModIncreaseSpeed, //305 SPELL_AURA_MOD_MINIMUM_SPEED
369  &Aura::HandleNULL, //306 1 spell
370  &Aura::HandleNULL, //307 absorb healing?
371  &Aura::HandleNULL, //308 SPELL_AURA_MOD_CRIT_CHANCE_FOR_CASTER
372  &Aura::HandleNULL, //309 absorb healing?
373  &Aura::HandleNoImmediateEffect, //310 SPELL_AURA_MOD_CREATURE_AOE_DAMAGE_AVOIDANCE implemented in Unit::SpellDamageBonusTaken
374  &Aura::HandleNULL, //311 0 spells in 3.3
375  &Aura::HandleNULL, //312 0 spells in 3.3
376  &Aura::HandleNULL, //313 0 spells in 3.3
377  &Aura::HandlePreventResurrection, //314 SPELL_AURA_PREVENT_RESURRECTION
378  &Aura::HandleNULL, //315 SPELL_AURA_UNDERWATER_WALKING
379  &Aura::HandleNULL //316 SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_HASTE
380 };
381 
382 static AuraType const frozenAuraTypes[] = { SPELL_AURA_MOD_ROOT, SPELL_AURA_MOD_STUN, SPELL_AURA_NONE };
383 
384 Aura::Aura(SpellEntry const* spellproto, SpellEffectIndex eff, int32 const* currentDamage, int32 const* currentBasePoints, SpellAuraHolder* holder, Unit* target, Unit* caster, Item* castItem) :
385  m_spellmod(nullptr), m_periodicTimer(0), m_periodicTick(0), m_removeMode(AURA_REMOVE_BY_DEFAULT),
386  m_effIndex(eff), m_positive(false), m_isPeriodic(false), m_isAreaAura(false),
387  m_isPersistent(false), m_magnetUsed(false), m_spellAuraHolder(holder),
388  m_scriptValue(0), m_storage(nullptr)
389 {
390  MANGOS_ASSERT(target);
391  MANGOS_ASSERT(spellproto && spellproto == sSpellTemplate.LookupEntry<SpellEntry>(spellproto->Id) && "`info` must be pointer to sSpellTemplate element");
392 
393  m_currentBasePoints = currentBasePoints ? *currentBasePoints : spellproto->CalculateSimpleValue(eff);
394 
395  m_positive = IsPositiveAuraEffect(spellproto, m_effIndex, caster, target);
396 
397  m_applyTime = time(nullptr);
398 
399  int32 damage = currentDamage ? *currentDamage : m_currentBasePoints;
400  if (caster)
401  {
402  if (!damage && castItem && castItem->GetItemSuffixFactor())
403  {
404  ItemRandomSuffixEntry const* item_rand_suffix = sItemRandomSuffixStore.LookupEntry(abs(castItem->GetItemRandomPropertyId()));
405  if (item_rand_suffix)
406  {
407  for (int k = 0; k < 3; ++k)
408  {
409  SpellItemEnchantmentEntry const* pEnchant = sSpellItemEnchantmentStore.LookupEntry(item_rand_suffix->enchant_id[k]);
410  if (pEnchant)
411  {
412  for (unsigned int t : pEnchant->spellid)
413  {
414  if (t != spellproto->Id)
415  continue;
416 
417  damage = uint32((item_rand_suffix->prefix[k] * castItem->GetItemSuffixFactor()) / 10000);
418  break;
419  }
420  }
421 
422  if (damage)
423  break;
424  }
425  }
426  }
427 
428  damage = CalculateAuraEffectValue(caster, target, spellproto, eff, damage);
429 
430  damage = OnAuraValueCalculate(caster, damage);
431  }
432 
433  damage *= holder->GetStackAmount();
434 
435  DEBUG_FILTER_LOG(LOG_FILTER_SPELL_CAST, "Aura: construct Spellid : %u, Aura : %u Target : %d Damage : %d", spellproto->Id, spellproto->EffectApplyAuraName[eff], spellproto->EffectImplicitTargetA[eff], damage);
436 
437  SetModifier(AuraType(spellproto->EffectApplyAuraName[eff]), damage, spellproto->EffectAmplitude[eff], spellproto->EffectMiscValue[eff]);
438 
439  Player* modOwner = caster ? caster->GetSpellModOwner() : nullptr;
440 
441  // Apply periodic time mod
442  if (modOwner && m_modifier.periodictime)
443  modOwner->ApplySpellMod(spellproto->Id, SPELLMOD_ACTIVATION_TIME, m_modifier.periodictime);
444 
445  if (caster && (spellproto->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX5_SPELL_HASTE_AFFECTS_PERIODIC) || caster->HasAffectedAura(SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_HASTE, spellproto)))
446  m_modifier.periodictime = int32(m_modifier.periodictime * caster->GetFloatValue(UNIT_MOD_CAST_SPEED));
447 
448  // Start periodic on next tick or at aura apply
449  if (!spellproto->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX5_EXTRA_INITIAL_PERIOD))
450  m_periodicTimer = m_modifier.periodictime;
451 }
452 
453 Aura::~Aura()
454 {
455  delete m_storage;
456  delete m_spellmod;
457 }
458 
459 AreaAura::AreaAura(SpellEntry const* spellproto, SpellEffectIndex eff, int32 const* currentDamage, int32 const* currentBasePoints, SpellAuraHolder* holder, Unit* target,
460  Unit* caster, Item* castItem, uint32 originalRankSpellId)
461  : Aura(spellproto, eff, currentDamage, currentBasePoints, holder, target, caster, castItem), m_originalRankSpellId(originalRankSpellId)
462 {
463  m_isAreaAura = true;
464 
465  // caster==nullptr in constructor args if target==caster in fact
466  Unit* caster_ptr = caster ? caster : target;
467 
468  m_radius = GetSpellRadius(sSpellRadiusStore.LookupEntry(spellproto->EffectRadiusIndex[m_effIndex]));
469  if (Player* modOwner = caster_ptr->GetSpellModOwner())
470  modOwner->ApplySpellMod(spellproto->Id, SPELLMOD_RADIUS, m_radius);
471 
472  switch (spellproto->Effect[eff])
473  {
474  case SPELL_EFFECT_APPLY_AREA_AURA_PARTY:
475  m_areaAuraType = AREA_AURA_PARTY;
476  break;
477  case SPELL_EFFECT_APPLY_AREA_AURA_RAID:
478  m_areaAuraType = AREA_AURA_RAID;
479  // Light's Beacon not applied to caster itself (TODO: more generic check for another similar spell if any?)
480  if (target == caster_ptr && spellproto->Id == 53651)
481  m_modifier.m_auraname = SPELL_AURA_NONE;
482  break;
483  case SPELL_EFFECT_APPLY_AREA_AURA_FRIEND:
484  m_areaAuraType = AREA_AURA_FRIEND;
485  break;
486  case SPELL_EFFECT_APPLY_AREA_AURA_ENEMY:
487  m_areaAuraType = AREA_AURA_ENEMY;
488  if (target == caster_ptr)
489  m_modifier.m_auraname = SPELL_AURA_NONE; // Do not do any effect on self
490  break;
491  case SPELL_EFFECT_APPLY_AREA_AURA_PET:
492  m_areaAuraType = AREA_AURA_PET;
493  break;
494  case SPELL_EFFECT_APPLY_AREA_AURA_OWNER:
495  m_areaAuraType = AREA_AURA_OWNER;
496  if (target == caster_ptr)
497  m_modifier.m_auraname = SPELL_AURA_NONE;
498  break;
499  default:
500  sLog.outError("Wrong spell effect in AreaAura constructor");
501  MANGOS_ASSERT(false);
502  break;
503  }
504 
505  // totems are immune to any kind of area auras
506  if (target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT && ((Creature*)target)->IsTotem())
507  m_modifier.m_auraname = SPELL_AURA_NONE;
508 }
509 
510 AreaAura::~AreaAura()
511 {
512 }
513 
514 PersistentAreaAura::PersistentAreaAura(SpellEntry const* spellproto, SpellEffectIndex eff, int32 const* currentDamage, int32 const* currentBasePoints, SpellAuraHolder* holder, Unit* target,
515  Unit* caster, Item* castItem) : Aura(spellproto, eff, currentDamage, currentBasePoints, holder, target, caster, castItem)
516 {
517  m_isPersistent = true;
518 }
519 
520 PersistentAreaAura::~PersistentAreaAura()
521 {
522 }
523 
524 Aura* CreateAura(SpellEntry const* spellproto, SpellEffectIndex eff, int32 const* currentDamage, int32 const* currentBasePoints, SpellAuraHolder* holder, Unit* target, Unit* caster, Item* castItem, uint64 scriptValue)
525 {
526  Aura* aura = nullptr;
527  if (IsAreaAuraEffect(spellproto->Effect[eff]))
528  aura = new AreaAura(spellproto, eff, currentDamage, currentBasePoints, holder, target, caster, castItem);
529 
530  if (!aura)
531  aura = new Aura(spellproto, eff, currentDamage, currentBasePoints, holder, target, caster, castItem);
532 
533  aura->SetScriptValue(scriptValue); // must be done before OnAuraInit
534  aura->OnAuraInit();
535  return aura;
536 }
537 
538 SpellAuraHolder* CreateSpellAuraHolder(SpellEntry const* spellproto, Unit* target, WorldObject* caster, Item* castItem /*= nullptr*/, SpellEntry const* triggeredBy /*= nullptr*/)
539 {
540  return new SpellAuraHolder(spellproto, target, caster, castItem, triggeredBy);
541 }
542 
543 void Aura::SetModifier(AuraType type, int32 amount, uint32 periodicTime, int32 miscValue)
544 {
545  m_modifier.m_auraname = type;
546  m_modifier.m_amount = amount * GetStackAmount();
547  m_modifier.m_baseAmount = amount;
548  m_modifier.m_miscvalue = miscValue;
549  m_modifier.periodictime = periodicTime;
550 }
551 
552 void Aura::Update(uint32 diff)
553 {
554  if (m_isPeriodic)
555  {
556  m_periodicTimer -= diff;
557  if (m_periodicTimer <= 0) // tick also at m_periodicTimer==0 to prevent lost last tick in case max m_duration == (max m_periodicTimer)*N
558  {
559  // update before applying (aura can be removed in TriggerSpell or PeriodicTick calls)
560  m_periodicTimer += m_modifier.periodictime;
561  ++m_periodicTick; // for some infinity auras in some cases can overflow and reset
562  PeriodicTick();
563  }
564  }
565 }
566 
567 void AreaAura::Update(uint32 diff)
568 {
569  // update for the caster of the aura
570  if (GetCasterGuid() == GetTarget()->GetObjectGuid())
571  {
572  Unit* caster = GetTarget();
573 
574  if (!caster->hasUnitState(UNIT_STAT_ISOLATED))
575  {
576  Unit* owner = caster->GetMaster();
577  if (!owner)
578  owner = caster;
579  UnitList targets;
580 
581  switch (m_areaAuraType) // TODO: Unify with SetTargetMap
582  {
583  case AREA_AURA_PARTY:
584  {
585  Group* pGroup = nullptr;
586 
587  // Handle aura party for players
588  if (owner->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
589  {
590  pGroup = ((Player*)owner)->GetGroup();
591 
592  if (pGroup)
593  {
594  uint8 subgroup = ((Player*)owner)->GetSubGroup();
595  for (GroupReference* itr = pGroup->GetFirstMember(); itr != nullptr; itr = itr->next())
596  {
597  Player* Target = itr->getSource();
598  if (Target && Target->IsAlive() && Target->GetSubGroup() == subgroup && caster->CanAssistSpell(Target, GetSpellProto()))
599  {
600  if (caster->IsWithinDistInMap(Target, m_radius, true, GetSpellProto()->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX6_IGNORE_PHASE_SHIFT)))
601  targets.push_back(Target);
602  Pet* pet = Target->GetPet();
603  if (pet && pet->IsAlive() && caster->IsWithinDistInMap(pet, m_radius, true, GetSpellProto()->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX6_IGNORE_PHASE_SHIFT)))
604  targets.push_back(pet);
605  }
606  }
607  break;
608  }
609  }
610  else // handle aura party for creatures
611  {
612  // Get all creatures in spell radius
613  std::list<Creature*> nearbyTargets;
614  MaNGOS::AnyUnitInObjectRangeCheck u_check(owner, m_radius);
615  MaNGOS::CreatureListSearcher<MaNGOS::AnyUnitInObjectRangeCheck> searcher(nearbyTargets, u_check);
616  Cell::VisitGridObjects(owner, searcher, m_radius);
617 
618  for (auto target : nearbyTargets)
619  {
620  // Due to the lack of support for NPC groups or formations, are considered of the same party NPCs with same faction than caster
621  if (target != owner && target->IsAlive() && target->GetFaction() == ((Creature*)owner)->GetFaction())
622  targets.push_back(target);
623  }
624  }
625 
626  // add owner
627  if (owner != caster && caster->IsWithinDistInMap(owner, m_radius, true, GetSpellProto()->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX6_IGNORE_PHASE_SHIFT)))
628  targets.push_back(owner);
629  // add caster's pet
630  Unit* pet = caster->GetPet();
631  if (pet && caster->IsWithinDistInMap(pet, m_radius, true, GetSpellProto()->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX6_IGNORE_PHASE_SHIFT)))
632  targets.push_back(pet);
633 
634  break;
635  }
636  case AREA_AURA_RAID:
637  {
638  Group* pGroup = nullptr;
639 
640  if (owner->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
641  pGroup = ((Player*)owner)->GetGroup();
642 
643  if (pGroup)
644  {
645  for (GroupReference* itr = pGroup->GetFirstMember(); itr != nullptr; itr = itr->next())
646  {
647  Player* Target = itr->getSource();
648  if (Target && Target->IsAlive() && caster->CanAssistSpell(Target, GetSpellProto()))
649  {
650  if (caster->IsWithinDistInMap(Target, m_radius))
651  targets.push_back(Target);
652  Pet* pet = Target->GetPet();
653  if (pet && pet->IsAlive() && caster->IsWithinDistInMap(pet, m_radius))
654  targets.push_back(pet);
655  }
656  }
657  }
658  else
659  {
660  // add owner
661  if (owner != caster && caster->IsWithinDistInMap(owner, m_radius))
662  targets.push_back(owner);
663  // add caster's pet
664  Unit* pet = caster->GetPet();
665  if (pet && caster->IsWithinDistInMap(pet, m_radius))
666  targets.push_back(pet);
667  }
668  break;
669  }
670  case AREA_AURA_FRIEND:
671  {
672  MaNGOS::AnySpellAssistableUnitInObjectRangeCheck u_check(caster, nullptr, m_radius, GetSpellProto()->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX6_IGNORE_PHASE_SHIFT));
673  MaNGOS::UnitListSearcher<MaNGOS::AnySpellAssistableUnitInObjectRangeCheck> searcher(targets, u_check);
674  Cell::VisitAllObjects(caster, searcher, m_radius);
675  break;
676  }
677  case AREA_AURA_ENEMY:
678  {
679  MaNGOS::AnyAoETargetUnitInObjectRangeCheck u_check(caster, nullptr, m_radius, GetSpellProto()->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX6_IGNORE_PHASE_SHIFT)); // No GetCharmer in searcher
680  MaNGOS::UnitListSearcher<MaNGOS::AnyAoETargetUnitInObjectRangeCheck> searcher(targets, u_check);
681  Cell::VisitAllObjects(caster, searcher, m_radius);
682  break;
683  }
684  case AREA_AURA_OWNER:
685  case AREA_AURA_PET:
686  {
687  if (owner != caster && caster->IsWithinDistInMap(owner, m_radius, true, GetSpellProto()->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX6_IGNORE_PHASE_SHIFT))
688  && caster->CanAssistSpell(owner, GetSpellProto()))
689  targets.push_back(owner);
690  break;
691  }
692  }
693 
694  for (auto& target : targets)
695  {
696  // flag for selection is need apply aura to current iteration target
697  bool apply = true;
698 
699  SpellEntry const* actualSpellInfo;
700  if (GetCasterGuid() == target->GetObjectGuid()) // if caster is same as target then no need to change rank of the spell
701  actualSpellInfo = GetSpellProto();
702  else
703  actualSpellInfo = sSpellMgr.SelectAuraRankForLevel(GetSpellProto(), target->GetLevel()); // use spell id according level of the target
704  if (!actualSpellInfo)
705  continue;
706 
707  Unit::SpellAuraHolderBounds spair = target->GetSpellAuraHolderBounds(actualSpellInfo->Id);
708  // we need ignore present caster self applied are auras sometime
709  // in cases if this only auras applied for spell effect
710  for (Unit::SpellAuraHolderMap::const_iterator i = spair.first; i != spair.second; ++i)
711  {
712  if (i->second->IsDeleted())
713  continue;
714 
715  Aura* aur = i->second->GetAuraByEffectIndex(m_effIndex);
716 
717  if (!aur)
718  continue;
719 
720  switch (m_areaAuraType)
721  {
722  case AREA_AURA_ENEMY:
723  // non caster self-casted auras (non stacked)
724  if (aur->GetModifier()->m_auraname != SPELL_AURA_NONE)
725  apply = false;
726  break;
727  case AREA_AURA_PARTY:
728  case AREA_AURA_RAID:
729  // non caster self-casted auras (stacked from diff. casters)
730  if (aur->GetModifier()->m_auraname != SPELL_AURA_NONE && i->second->GetCasterGuid() != GetCasterGuid())
731  {
732  apply = IsStackableSpell(actualSpellInfo, i->second->GetSpellProto(), target);
733  break;
734  }
735  if (aur->GetModifier()->m_auraname != SPELL_AURA_NONE || i->second->GetCasterGuid() == GetCasterGuid())
736  apply = false;
737  break;
738  default:
739  // in generic case not allow stacking area auras
740  apply = false;
741  break;
742  }
743 
744  if (!apply)
745  break;
746  }
747 
748  if (!apply)
749  continue;
750 
751  // Skip some targets (TODO: Might require better checks, also unclear how the actual caster must/can be handled)
752  if (actualSpellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX3_ONLY_ON_PLAYER) && target->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
753  continue;
754 
755  if (actualSpellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX5_NOT_ON_PLAYER) && target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
756  continue;
757 
758  if (actualSpellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX5_NOT_ON_PLAYER_CONTROLLED_NPC) && target->IsPlayerControlled() && target->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
759  continue;
760 
761  int32 actualBasePoints = m_currentBasePoints;
762  int32 actualDamage = m_modifier.m_baseAmount;
763  // recalculate basepoints for lower rank (all AreaAura spell not use custom basepoints?)
764  if (actualSpellInfo != GetSpellProto())
765  {
766  actualBasePoints = actualSpellInfo->CalculateSimpleValue(m_effIndex);
767  actualDamage = caster->CalculateSpellEffectValue(target, actualSpellInfo, m_effIndex, &actualBasePoints);
768  }
769 
770  SpellAuraHolder* holder = target->GetSpellAuraHolder(actualSpellInfo->Id, GetCasterGuid());
771 
772  bool addedToExisting = true;
773  if (!holder)
774  {
775  holder = CreateSpellAuraHolder(actualSpellInfo, target, caster);
776  addedToExisting = false;
777  }
778 
779  holder->SetAuraDuration(GetAuraDuration());
780 
781  AreaAura* aur = new AreaAura(actualSpellInfo, m_effIndex, &actualDamage, &actualBasePoints, holder, target, caster, nullptr, GetSpellProto()->Id);
782  holder->AddAura(aur, m_effIndex);
783 
784  if (addedToExisting)
785  {
786  target->AddAuraToModList(aur);
787  aur->ApplyModifier(true, true);
788  }
789  else
790  {
791  if (target->AddSpellAuraHolder(holder))
792  holder->SetState(SPELLAURAHOLDER_STATE_READY);
793  else
794  delete holder;
795  }
796  }
797  }
798  Aura::Update(diff);
799  }
800  else // aura at non-caster
801  {
802  Unit* caster = GetCaster();
803  Unit* target = GetTarget();
804  uint32 originalRankSpellId = m_originalRankSpellId ? m_originalRankSpellId : GetId(); // caster may have different spell id if target has lower level
805 
806  Aura::Update(diff);
807 
808  // remove aura if out-of-range from caster (after teleport for example)
809  // or caster is isolated or caster no longer has the aura
810  // or caster is (no longer) friendly
811  bool needFriendly = (m_areaAuraType != AREA_AURA_ENEMY);
812  if (!caster ||
813  caster->hasUnitState(UNIT_STAT_ISOLATED) ||
814  !caster->HasAura(originalRankSpellId, GetEffIndex()) ||
815  !caster->IsWithinDistInMap(target, m_radius) ||
816  caster->CanAssistSpell(target, GetSpellProto()) != needFriendly
817  )
818  {
819  target->RemoveSingleAuraFromSpellAuraHolder(GetId(), GetEffIndex(), GetCasterGuid());
820  }
821  else if (m_areaAuraType == AREA_AURA_PARTY) // check if in same sub group
822  {
823  // Do not check group if target == owner or target == pet
824  // or if caster is a not player (as NPCs do not support group so aura is only removed by moving out of range)
825  if (caster->GetMasterGuid() != target->GetObjectGuid() &&
826  caster->GetObjectGuid() != target->GetMasterGuid() &&
827  caster->IsPlayerControlled())
828  {
829  Player* check = caster->GetBeneficiaryPlayer();
830 
831  Group* pGroup = check ? check->GetGroup() : nullptr;
832  if (pGroup)
833  {
834  Player* checkTarget = target->GetBeneficiaryPlayer();
835  if (!checkTarget || !pGroup->SameSubGroup(check, checkTarget))
836  target->RemoveSingleAuraFromSpellAuraHolder(GetId(), GetEffIndex(), GetCasterGuid());
837  }
838  else
839  target->RemoveSingleAuraFromSpellAuraHolder(GetId(), GetEffIndex(), GetCasterGuid());
840  }
841  }
842  else if (m_areaAuraType == AREA_AURA_RAID) // Check if on same raid group
843  {
844  // not check group if target == owner or target == pet
845  if (caster->GetMasterGuid() != target->GetObjectGuid() && caster->GetObjectGuid() != target->GetMasterGuid())
846  {
847  Player* check = caster->GetBeneficiaryPlayer();
848 
849  Group* pGroup = check ? check->GetGroup() : nullptr;
850  if (pGroup)
851  {
852  Player* checkTarget = target->GetBeneficiaryPlayer();
853  if (!checkTarget || !checkTarget->GetGroup() || checkTarget->GetGroup()->GetId() != pGroup->GetId())
854  target->RemoveSingleAuraFromSpellAuraHolder(GetId(), GetEffIndex(), GetCasterGuid());
855  }
856  else
857  target->RemoveSingleAuraFromSpellAuraHolder(GetId(), GetEffIndex(), GetCasterGuid());
858  }
859  }
860  else if (m_areaAuraType == AREA_AURA_PET || m_areaAuraType == AREA_AURA_OWNER)
861  {
862  if (target->GetObjectGuid() != caster->GetMasterGuid())
863  target->RemoveSingleAuraFromSpellAuraHolder(GetId(), GetEffIndex(), GetCasterGuid());
864  }
865  }
866 }
867 
868 void PersistentAreaAura::Update(uint32 diff)
869 {
870  bool remove = true;
871  AuraRemoveMode removeMode = AURA_REMOVE_BY_EXPIRE;
872 
873  // remove the aura if its caster or the dynamic object causing it was removed
874  // or if the target moves too far from the dynamic object
875  if (Unit* caster = GetCaster())
876  {
877  if (DynamicObject* dynObj = caster->GetDynObject(GetId(), GetEffIndex(), GetTarget()))
878  {
879  if (GetTarget()->GetDistance(dynObj, true, DIST_CALC_COMBAT_REACH) > dynObj->GetRadius())
880  {
881  removeMode = AURA_REMOVE_BY_DEFAULT;
882  dynObj->RemoveAffected(GetTarget()); // let later reapply if target return to range
883  }
884  else
885  remove = false;
886  }
887  }
888 
889  if (remove)
890  {
891  GetTarget()->RemoveSingleAuraFromSpellAuraHolder(GetHolder(), GetEffIndex(), removeMode);
892  return;
893  }
894 
895  Aura::Update(diff);
896 }
897 
898 bool Aura::IsSaveToDbAura() const
899 {
900  if (IsAreaAura() && GetHolder()->GetCasterGuid() != GetTarget()->GetObjectGuid())
901  return false;
902 
903  if (IsPersistent())
904  return false;
905 
906  return true;
907 }
908 
909 void Aura::ApplyModifier(bool apply, bool Real)
910 {
911  AuraType aura = m_modifier.m_auraname;
912 
913  if (apply)
914  OnApply(apply);
915  if (!apply)
916  OnAfterApply(apply);
917  if (aura < TOTAL_AURAS)
918  (*this.*AuraHandler [aura])(apply, Real);
919  if (apply)
920  OnAfterApply(apply);
921  if (!apply)
922  OnApply(apply);
923 
924  if (GetSpellProto()->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX4_OWNER_POWER_SCALING) && m_removeMode != AURA_REMOVE_BY_GAINED_STACK)
925  GetTarget()->RegisterScalingAura(this, apply);
926 }
927 
928 void Aura::UpdateAuraScaling()
929 {
930  if (Unit* caster = GetCaster())
931  {
932  int32 amount = 0;
933  amount = OnAuraValueCalculate(caster, amount);
934  // Reapply if amount change
935  if (amount != GetModifier()->m_amount)
936  {
937  SetRemoveMode(AURA_REMOVE_BY_GAINED_STACK);
938  if (IsAuraRemoveOnStacking(this->GetSpellProto(), GetEffIndex()))
939  ApplyModifier(false, true);
940  GetModifier()->m_recentAmount = amount - GetModifier()->m_amount;
941  GetModifier()->m_amount = amount;
942  ApplyModifier(true, true);
943  }
944  }
945 }
946 
947 bool Aura::isAffectedOnSpell(SpellEntry const* spell) const
948 {
949  return spell->IsFitToFamily(SpellFamily(GetSpellProto()->SpellFamilyName), GetAuraSpellClassMask());
950 }
951 
952 bool Aura::CanProcFrom(SpellEntry const* spell, uint32 /*procFlag*/, uint32 EventProcEx, uint32 procEx, bool active, bool useClassMask) const
953 {
954  // Check EffectClassMask
955  ClassFamilyMask const& mask = GetAuraSpellClassMask();
956 
957  // allow proc for modifier auras with charges
958  if (IsCastEndProcModifierAura(GetSpellProto(), GetEffIndex(), spell))
959  {
960  if (GetHolder()->GetAuraCharges() > 0)
961  {
962  if (procEx != PROC_EX_CAST_END && EventProcEx == PROC_EX_NONE)
963  return false;
964  }
965  }
966  else if (EventProcEx == PROC_EX_NONE && procEx == PROC_EX_CAST_END)
967  return false;
968 
969  // if no class mask defined, or spell_proc_event has SpellFamilyName=0 - allow proc
970  if (!useClassMask || !mask)
971  {
972  if (!(EventProcEx & PROC_EX_EX_TRIGGER_ALWAYS))
973  {
974  // Check for extra req (if none) and hit/crit
975  if (EventProcEx == PROC_EX_NONE)
976  {
977  // No extra req, so can trigger only for active (damage/healing present) and hit/crit
978  return ((procEx & (PROC_EX_NORMAL_HIT | PROC_EX_CRITICAL_HIT)) && active) || procEx == PROC_EX_CAST_END;
979  }
980  // Passive spells hits here only if resist/reflect/immune/evade
981  // Passive spells can`t trigger if need hit (exclude cases when procExtra include non-active flags)
982  if ((EventProcEx & (PROC_EX_NORMAL_HIT | PROC_EX_CRITICAL_HIT) & procEx) && !active)
983  return false;
984  }
985  return true;
986  }
987  // SpellFamilyName check is performed in SpellMgr::IsSpellProcEventCanTriggeredBy and it is done once for whole holder
988  // note: SpellFamilyName is not checked if no spell_proc_event is defined
989  return mask.IsFitToFamilyMask(spell->SpellFamilyFlags);
990 }
991 
992 void Aura::ReapplyAffectedPassiveAuras(Unit* target, bool owner_mode)
993 {
994  // we need store cast item guids for self casted spells
995  // expected that not exist permanent auras from stackable auras from different items
996  std::map<uint32, ObjectGuid> affectedSelf;
997 
998  std::set<uint32> affectedAuraCaster;
999 
1000  for (Unit::SpellAuraHolderMap::const_iterator itr = target->GetSpellAuraHolderMap().begin(); itr != target->GetSpellAuraHolderMap().end(); ++itr)
1001  {
1002  // permanent passive or permanent area aura
1003  // passive spells can be affected only by own or owner spell mods)
1004  if ((itr->second->IsPermanent() && ((owner_mode && itr->second->IsPassive()) || itr->second->IsAreaAura())) &&
1005  // non deleted and not same aura (any with same spell id)
1006  !itr->second->IsDeleted() && itr->second->GetId() != GetId() &&
1007  // and affected by aura
1008  isAffectedOnSpell(itr->second->GetSpellProto()))
1009  {
1010  // only applied by self or aura caster
1011  if (itr->second->GetCasterGuid() == target->GetObjectGuid())
1012  affectedSelf[itr->second->GetId()] = itr->second->GetCastItemGuid();
1013  else if (itr->second->GetCasterGuid() == GetCasterGuid())
1014  affectedAuraCaster.insert(itr->second->GetId());
1015  }
1016  }
1017 
1018  if (!affectedSelf.empty())
1019  {
1020  Player* pTarget = target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER ? (Player*)target : nullptr;
1021 
1022  for (std::map<uint32, ObjectGuid>::const_iterator map_itr = affectedSelf.begin(); map_itr != affectedSelf.end(); ++map_itr)
1023  {
1024  Item* item = pTarget && map_itr->second ? pTarget->GetItemByGuid(map_itr->second) : nullptr;
1025  target->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(map_itr->first);
1026  target->CastSpell(target, map_itr->first, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, item);
1027  }
1028  }
1029 
1030  if (!affectedAuraCaster.empty())
1031  {
1032  Unit* caster = GetCaster();
1033  for (uint32 set_itr : affectedAuraCaster)
1034  {
1035  target->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(set_itr);
1036  if (caster)
1037  caster->CastSpell(GetTarget(), set_itr, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
1038  }
1039  }
1040 }
1041 
1042 struct ReapplyAffectedPassiveAurasHelper
1043 {
1044  explicit ReapplyAffectedPassiveAurasHelper(Aura* _aura) : aura(_aura) {}
1045  void operator()(Unit* unit) const { aura->ReapplyAffectedPassiveAuras(unit, true); }
1046  Aura* aura;
1047 };
1048 
1049 void Aura::ReapplyAffectedPassiveAuras()
1050 {
1051  // not reapply spell mods with charges (use original value because processed and at remove)
1052  if (GetSpellProto()->procCharges)
1053  return;
1054 
1055  // not reapply some spell mods ops (mostly speedup case)
1056  switch (m_modifier.m_miscvalue)
1057  {
1058  case SPELLMOD_DURATION:
1059  case SPELLMOD_CHARGES:
1060  case SPELLMOD_NOT_LOSE_CASTING_TIME:
1061  case SPELLMOD_CASTING_TIME:
1062  case SPELLMOD_COOLDOWN:
1063  case SPELLMOD_COST:
1064  case SPELLMOD_ACTIVATION_TIME:
1065  case SPELLMOD_GLOBAL_COOLDOWN:
1066  return;
1067  }
1068 
1069  // reapply talents to own passive persistent auras
1070  ReapplyAffectedPassiveAuras(GetTarget(), true);
1071 
1072  // re-apply talents/passives/area auras applied to pet/totems (it affected by player spellmods)
1073  GetTarget()->CallForAllControlledUnits(ReapplyAffectedPassiveAurasHelper(this), CONTROLLED_PET | CONTROLLED_TOTEMS);
1074 
1075  // re-apply talents/passives/area auras applied to group members (it affected by player spellmods)
1076  if (Group* group = ((Player*)GetTarget())->GetGroup())
1077  for (GroupReference* itr = group->GetFirstMember(); itr != nullptr; itr = itr->next())
1078  if (Player* member = itr->getSource())
1079  if (member != GetTarget() && member->IsInMap(GetTarget()))
1080  ReapplyAffectedPassiveAuras(member, false);
1081 }
1082 
1083 void Aura::PickTargetsForSpellTrigger(Unit*& triggerCaster, Unit*& triggerTarget, WorldObject*& triggerTargetObject, SpellEntry const* spellInfo)
1084 {
1085  // automatic caster - target resolution
1086  switch (spellInfo->EffectImplicitTargetA[0])
1087  {
1088  case TARGET_LOCATION_UNIT_RANDOM_SIDE: // fireball barrage
1089  case TARGET_UNIT_ENEMY:
1090  case TARGET_UNIT:
1091  triggerCaster = GetCaster();
1092  if (!triggerCaster)
1093  triggerCaster = triggerTarget;
1094  triggerTarget = triggerCaster->GetTarget(); // This will default to channel target for channels
1095  break;
1096  case TARGET_UNIT_FRIEND: // Abolish Disease / Poison confirms this
1097  case TARGET_UNIT_CASTER:
1098  triggerCaster = GetTarget();
1099  triggerTarget = GetTarget();
1100  break;
1101  case TARGET_UNIT_CHANNEL_TARGET: // Electrified net
1102  triggerCaster = GetCaster();
1103  triggerTarget = dynamic_cast<Unit*>(triggerCaster->GetChannelObject());
1104  break;
1105  case TARGET_LOCATION_CHANNEL_TARGET_DEST:
1106  triggerCaster = GetCaster();
1107  if (triggerCaster)
1108  triggerTargetObject = GetCaster()->GetChannelObject();
1109  case TARGET_LOCATION_CASTER_SRC: // TODO: this needs to be done whenever target isnt important, doing it per case for safety
1110  //[[fallthrough]]
1111  case TARGET_LOCATION_CASTER_DEST:
1112  case TARGET_UNIT_SCRIPT_NEAR_CASTER:
1113  default:
1114  triggerTarget = nullptr;
1115  break;
1116  }
1117 }
1118 
1119 void Aura::CastTriggeredSpell(PeriodicTriggerData& data)
1120 {
1121  Spell* spell = new Spell(data.caster, data.spellInfo, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, data.caster->GetObjectGuid(), GetSpellProto());
1122  if (data.spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX2_RETAIN_ITEM_CAST)) // forward guid to at least spell go
1123  spell->SetForwardedCastItem(GetCastItemGuid());
1124  SpellCastTargets targets;
1125  if (data.spellInfo->Targets & TARGET_FLAG_DEST_LOCATION)
1126  {
1127  if (data.targetObject)
1128  targets.setDestination(data.targetObject->GetPositionX(), data.targetObject->GetPositionY(), data.targetObject->GetPositionZ());
1129  else if (data.target)
1130  targets.setDestination(data.target->GetPositionX(), data.target->GetPositionY(), data.target->GetPositionZ());
1131  else
1132  targets.setDestination(data.caster->GetPositionX(), data.caster->GetPositionY(), data.caster->GetPositionZ());
1133  }
1134  if (data.spellInfo->Targets & TARGET_FLAG_SOURCE_LOCATION)
1135  {
1136  if (data.targetObject)
1137  targets.setSource(data.targetObject->GetPositionX(), data.targetObject->GetPositionY(), data.targetObject->GetPositionZ());
1138  else if (data.target)
1139  targets.setSource(data.target->GetPositionX(), data.target->GetPositionY(), data.target->GetPositionZ());
1140  else
1141  targets.setSource(data.caster->GetPositionX(), data.caster->GetPositionY(), data.caster->GetPositionZ());
1142  }
1143  if (data.target)
1144  targets.setUnitTarget(data.target);
1145  if (data.basePoints[0])
1146  spell->m_currentBasePoints[EFFECT_INDEX_0] = data.basePoints[0];
1147  if (data.basePoints[1])
1148  spell->m_currentBasePoints[EFFECT_INDEX_1] = data.basePoints[1];
1149  if (data.basePoints[2])
1150  spell->m_currentBasePoints[EFFECT_INDEX_2] = data.basePoints[2];
1151  spell->SpellStart(&targets, this);
1152 }
1153 
1154 /*********************************************************/
1155 /*** BASIC AURA FUNCTION ***/
1156 /*********************************************************/
1157 void Aura::HandleAddModifier(bool apply, bool Real)
1158 {
1159  if (GetTarget()->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER || !Real)
1160  return;
1161 
1162  if (m_modifier.m_miscvalue >= MAX_SPELLMOD)
1163  return;
1164 
1165  if (apply)
1166  {
1167  SpellEntry const* spellProto = GetSpellProto();
1168  uint32 priority = spellProto->spellPriority;
1169 
1170  // Add custom charges for some mod aura
1171  switch (spellProto->Id)
1172  {
1173  case 17941: // Shadow Trance
1174  case 22008: // Netherwind Focus
1175  case 31834: // Light's Grace
1176  case 34754: // Clearcasting
1177  case 34936: // Backlash
1178  case 44401: // Missile Barrage
1179  case 48108: // Hot Streak
1180  case 51124: // Killing Machine
1181  case 54741: // Firestarter
1182  case 57761: // Fireball!
1183  case 64823: // Elune's Wrath (Balance druid t8 set
1184  GetHolder()->SetAuraCharges(1);
1185  break;
1186  case 16246: // Clearcasting - Shaman - need to be applied before elemental mastery
1187  priority = 100;
1188  break;
1189  }
1190 
1191  m_spellmod = new SpellModifier(
1192  SpellModOp(m_modifier.m_miscvalue),
1193  SpellModType(m_modifier.m_auraname), // SpellModType value == spell aura types
1194  m_modifier.m_amount,
1195  this,
1196  priority,
1197  // prevent expire spell mods with (charges > 0 && m_stackAmount > 1)
1198  // all this spell expected expire not at use but at spell proc event check
1199  spellProto->StackAmount > 1 ? 0 : GetHolder()->GetAuraCharges());
1200  }
1201 
1202  static_cast<Player*>(GetTarget())->AddSpellMod(m_spellmod, apply);
1203  if (!apply)
1204  m_spellmod = nullptr;
1205 
1206  ReapplyAffectedPassiveAuras();
1207 }
1208 
1209 void Aura::TriggerSpell()
1210 {
1211  ObjectGuid casterGUID = GetCasterGuid();
1212  Unit* triggerTarget = GetTriggerTarget();
1213 
1214  if (!casterGUID || !triggerTarget)
1215  return;
1216 
1217  // generic casting code with custom spells and target/caster customs
1218  uint32 trigger_spell_id = GetSpellProto()->EffectTriggerSpell[m_effIndex];
1219 
1220  SpellEntry const* triggeredSpellInfo = sSpellTemplate.LookupEntry<SpellEntry>(trigger_spell_id);
1221  SpellEntry const* auraSpellInfo = GetSpellProto();
1222  uint32 auraId = auraSpellInfo->Id;
1223  Unit* target = GetTarget();
1224  Unit* triggerCaster = triggerTarget;
1225  WorldObject* triggerTargetObject = nullptr;
1226 
1227  // specific code for cases with no trigger spell provided in field
1228  if (triggeredSpellInfo == nullptr)
1229  {
1230  switch (auraSpellInfo->SpellFamilyName)
1231  {
1232  case SPELLFAMILY_GENERIC:
1233  {
1234  switch (auraId)
1235  {
1236  case 812: // Periodic Mana Burn
1237  {
1238  trigger_spell_id = 25779; // Mana Burn
1239 
1240  if (GetTarget()->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_UNIT)
1241  return;
1242 
1243  triggerTarget = ((Creature*)GetTarget())->SelectAttackingTarget(ATTACKING_TARGET_TOPAGGRO, 0, trigger_spell_id, SELECT_FLAG_POWER_MANA);
1244  if (!triggerTarget)
1245  return;
1246 
1247  break;
1248  }
1249 // // Polymorphic Ray
1250 // case 6965: break;
1251  case 9712: // Thaumaturgy Channel
1252  if (Unit* caster = GetCaster())
1253  caster->CastSpell(caster, 21029, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
1254  return;
1255 // // Egan's Blaster
1256 // case 17368: break;
1257 // // Haunted
1258 // case 18347: break;
1259 // // Ranshalla Waiting
1260 // case 18953: break;
1261 // // Frostwolf Muzzle DND
1262 // case 21794: break;
1263 // // Alterac Ram Collar DND
1264 // case 21866: break;
1265 // // Celebras Waiting
1266 // case 21916: break;
1267  case 23170: // Brood Affliction: Bronze
1268  {
1269  // Only 10% chance of triggering spell, return for the remaining 90%
1270  if (urand(0, 9) >= 1)
1271  return;
1272  target->CastSpell(target, 23171, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, nullptr, this);
1273  return;
1274  }
1275  case 23493: // Restoration
1276  {
1277  // sniff confirmed to send no packets
1278  uint32 heal = triggerTarget->GetMaxHealth() / 10;
1279  uint32 absorb = 0;
1280  triggerTarget->CalculateHealAbsorb(heal, &absorb);
1281  triggerTarget->ModifyHealth(int32(heal - absorb));
1282  if (int32 mana = triggerTarget->GetMaxPower(POWER_MANA))
1283  {
1284  mana /= 10;
1285  triggerTarget->ModifyPower(POWER_MANA, mana);
1286  }
1287  return;
1288  }
1289 // // Stoneclaw Totem Passive TEST
1290 // case 23792: break;
1291 // // Axe Flurry
1292 // case 24018: break;
1293 // // Restoration
1294 // case 24379: break;
1295 // // Happy Pet
1296 // case 24716: break;
1297  case 24743: // Cannon Prep
1298  case 24832: // Cannon Prep
1299  case 42825: // Cannon Prep
1300  trigger_spell_id = auraId == 42825 ? 42868 : 24731;
1301  break;
1302  case 24780: // Dream Fog
1303  {
1304  // Note: In 1.12 triggered spell 24781 still exists, need to script dummy effect for this spell then
1305  // Select an unfriendly enemy in 100y range and attack it
1306  if (target->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_UNIT)
1307  return;
1308 
1309  ThreatList const& tList = target->getThreatManager().getThreatList();
1310  for (auto itr : tList)
1311  {
1312  Unit* pUnit = target->GetMap()->GetUnit(itr->getUnitGuid());
1313 
1314  if (pUnit && target->getThreatManager().getThreat(pUnit))
1315  target->getThreatManager().modifyThreatPercent(pUnit, -100);
1316  }
1317 
1318  if (Unit* pEnemy = target->SelectRandomUnfriendlyTarget(target->GetVictim(), 100.0f))
1319  ((Creature*)target)->AI()->AttackStart(pEnemy);
1320 
1321  return;
1322  }
1323 // // Cannon Prep
1324 // case 24832: break;
1325  case 24834: // Shadow Bolt Whirl
1326  {
1327  uint32 spellForTick[8] = { 24820, 24821, 24822, 24823, 24835, 24836, 24837, 24838 };
1328  uint32 tick = (GetAuraTicks() + 7/*-1*/) % 8;
1329 
1330  // casted in left/right (but triggered spell have wide forward cone)
1331  float forward = target->GetOrientation();
1332  if (tick <= 3)
1333  target->SetOrientation(forward + 0.75f * M_PI_F - tick * M_PI_F / 8); // Left
1334  else
1335  target->SetOrientation(forward - 0.75f * M_PI_F + (8 - tick) * M_PI_F / 8); // Right
1336 
1337  triggerTarget->CastSpell(triggerTarget, spellForTick[tick], TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, nullptr, this, casterGUID);
1338  target->SetOrientation(forward);
1339  return;
1340  }
1341 // // Stink Trap
1342 // case 24918: break;
1343 // // Agro Drones
1344 // case 25152: break;
1345  case 25371: // Consume
1346  {
1347  int32 bpDamage = triggerTarget->GetMaxHealth() * 10 / 100;
1348  triggerTarget->CastCustomSpell(triggerTarget, 25373, &bpDamage, nullptr, nullptr, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, nullptr, this, casterGUID);
1349  return;
1350  }
1351 // // Pain Spike
1352 // case 25572: break;
1353 // // Consume
1354 // case 26196: break;
1355 // // Berserk
1356 // case 26615: break;
1357 // // Defile
1358 // case 27177: break;
1359 // // Teleport: IF/UC
1360 // case 27601: break;
1361 // // Five Fat Finger Exploding Heart Technique
1362 // case 27673: break;
1363  case 27746: // Nitrous Boost
1364  {
1365  if (triggerTarget->GetPower(POWER_MANA) >= 10)
1366  {
1367  triggerTarget->ModifyPower(POWER_MANA, -10);
1368  triggerTarget->SendEnergizeSpellLog(triggerTarget, 27746, -10, POWER_MANA);
1369  }
1370  else
1371  {
1372  triggerTarget->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(27746);
1373  }
1374  return;
1375  }
1376  case 27747: // Steam Tank Passive
1377  {
1378  if (triggerTarget->GetPower(POWER_MANA) <= 90)
1379  {
1380  triggerTarget->ModifyPower(POWER_MANA, 10);
1381  triggerTarget->SendEnergizeSpellLog(triggerTarget, 27747, 10, POWER_MANA);
1382  }
1383  return;
1384  }
1385  case 27808: // Frost Blast
1386  {
1387  int32 bpDamage = triggerTarget->GetMaxHealth() * 26 / 100;
1388  triggerTarget->CastCustomSpell(triggerTarget, 29879, &bpDamage, nullptr, nullptr, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, nullptr, this, casterGUID);
1389  return;
1390  }
1391  // Detonate Mana
1392  case 27819:
1393  {
1394  // 33% Mana Burn on normal mode, 50% on heroic mode
1395  int32 bpDamage = (int32)triggerTarget->GetPower(POWER_MANA) / (triggerTarget->GetMap()->GetDifficulty() ? 2 : 3);
1396  triggerTarget->ModifyPower(POWER_MANA, -bpDamage);
1397  triggerTarget->CastCustomSpell(triggerTarget, 27820, &bpDamage, nullptr, nullptr, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, nullptr, this, triggerTarget->GetObjectGuid());
1398  return;
1399  }
1400 // // Controller Timer
1401 // case 28095: break;
1402  // Stalagg Chain and Feugen Chain
1403  case 28096:
1404  case 28111:
1405  {
1406  // X-Chain is casted by Tesla to X, so: caster == Tesla, target = X
1407  Unit* pCaster = GetCaster();
1408  if (pCaster && pCaster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT && !pCaster->IsWithinDistInMap(target, 60.0f))
1409  {
1410  pCaster->InterruptNonMeleeSpells(true);
1411  ((Creature*)pCaster)->SetInCombatWithZone();
1412  // Stalagg Tesla Passive or Feugen Tesla Passive
1413  pCaster->CastSpell(pCaster, auraId == 28096 ? 28097 : 28109, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, nullptr, nullptr, target->GetObjectGuid());
1414  }
1415  return;
1416  }
1417  // Stalagg Tesla Passive and Feugen Tesla Passive
1418  case 28097:
1419  case 28109:
1420  {
1421  // X-Tesla-Passive is casted by Tesla on Tesla with original caster X, so: caster = X, target = Tesla
1422  Unit* pCaster = GetCaster();
1423  if (pCaster && pCaster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT)
1424  {
1425  if (pCaster->GetVictim() && !pCaster->IsWithinDistInMap(target, 60.0f))
1426  {
1427  if (Unit* pTarget = ((Creature*)pCaster)->SelectAttackingTarget(ATTACKING_TARGET_RANDOM, 0))
1428  target->CastSpell(pTarget, 28099, TRIGGERED_NONE);// Shock
1429  }
1430  else
1431  {
1432  // "Evade"
1433  target->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(auraId);
1434  target->CombatStop(true);
1435  // Recast chain (Stalagg Chain or Feugen Chain
1436  target->CastSpell(pCaster, auraId == 28097 ? 28096 : 28111, TRIGGERED_NONE);
1437  }
1438  }
1439  return;
1440  }
1441 // // Mark of Didier
1442 // case 28114: break;
1443 // // Communique Timer, camp
1444 // case 28346: break;
1445 // // Icebolt
1446 // case 28522: break;
1447 // // Silithyst
1448 // case 29519: break;
1449  case 29528: // Inoculate Nestlewood Owlkin
1450  // prevent error reports in case ignored player target
1451  if (triggerTarget->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_UNIT)
1452  return;
1453  break;
1454 // // Return Fire
1455 // case 29788: break;
1456 // // Return Fire
1457 // case 29793: break;
1458 // // Return Fire
1459 // case 29794: break;
1460 // // Guardian of Icecrown Passive
1461 // case 29897: break;
1462  case 29917: // Feed Captured Animal
1463  trigger_spell_id = 29916;
1464  break;
1465 // // Mind Exhaustion Passive
1466 // case 30025: break;
1467 // // Nether Beam - Serenity
1468 // case 30401: break;
1469  case 30427: // Extract Gas
1470  {
1471  Unit* caster = GetCaster();
1472  if (!caster)
1473  return;
1474  // move loot to player inventory and despawn target
1475  if (caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER &&
1476  triggerTarget->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT &&
1477  ((Creature*)triggerTarget)->GetCreatureInfo()->CreatureType == CREATURE_TYPE_GAS_CLOUD)
1478  {
1479  Player* player = (Player*)caster;
1480  Creature* creature = (Creature*)triggerTarget;
1481  // missing lootid has been reported on startup - just return
1482  if (!creature->GetCreatureInfo()->SkinningLootId)
1483  return;
1484 
1485  Loot loot(player, creature->GetCreatureInfo()->SkinningLootId, LOOT_SKINNING);
1486  loot.AutoStore(player);
1487 
1488  creature->ForcedDespawn();
1489  }
1490  return;
1491  }
1492  case 30576: // Quake
1493  trigger_spell_id = 30571;
1494  break;
1495 // // Burning Maul
1496 // case 30598: break;
1497 // // Regeneration
1498 // case 30799:
1499 // case 30800:
1500 // case 30801:
1501 // break;
1502 // // Despawn Self - Smoke cloud
1503 // case 31269: break;
1504 // // Time Rift Periodic
1505 // case 31320: break;
1506 // // Corrupt Medivh
1507 // case 31326: break;
1508  case 31373: // Spellcloth
1509  {
1510  // Summon Elemental after create item
1511  triggerTarget->SummonCreature(17870, 0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f, triggerTarget->GetOrientation(), TEMPSPAWN_DEAD_DESPAWN, 0);
1512  return;
1513  }
1514  case 31611: // Bloodmyst Tesla
1515  // no custom effect required; return to avoid spamming with errors
1516  return;
1517  case 31944: // Doomfire
1518  {
1519  int32 damage = m_modifier.m_amount * ((GetAuraDuration() + m_modifier.periodictime) / GetAuraMaxDuration());
1520  triggerTarget->CastCustomSpell(triggerTarget, 31969, &damage, nullptr, nullptr, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, nullptr, this, casterGUID);
1521  return;
1522  }
1523 // // Teleport Test
1524 // case 32236: break;
1525  case 32686: // Earthquake
1526  if (urand(0, 1)) // 50% chance to trigger
1527  triggerTarget->CastSpell(nullptr, 13360, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
1528  break;
1529 // // Possess
1530 // case 33401: break;
1531 // // Draw Shadows
1532 // case 33563: break;
1533 // // Murmur's Touch
1534 // case 33711: break;
1535  case 34229: // Flame Quills
1536  {
1537  // cast 24 spells 34269-34289, 34314-34316
1538  for (uint32 spell_id = 34269; spell_id != 34290; ++spell_id)
1539  triggerTarget->CastSpell(triggerTarget, spell_id, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, nullptr, this, casterGUID);
1540  for (uint32 spell_id = 34314; spell_id != 34317; ++spell_id)
1541  triggerTarget->CastSpell(triggerTarget, spell_id, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, nullptr, this, casterGUID);
1542  return;
1543  }
1544  case 35268: // Inferno (normal and heroic)
1545  case 39346:
1546  {
1547  int32 damage = auraSpellInfo->EffectBasePoints[0];
1548  triggerTarget->CastCustomSpell(triggerTarget, 35283, &damage, nullptr, nullptr, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, nullptr, this, casterGUID);
1549  return;
1550  }
1551 // // Tornado
1552 // case 34683: break;
1553 // // Frostbite Rotate
1554 // case 34748: break;
1555  case 34821: // Arcane Flurry (Melee Component)
1556  {
1557  trigger_spell_id = 34824; // (Range Component)
1558 
1559  if (GetTarget()->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_UNIT)
1560  return;
1561 
1562  triggerTarget = ((Creature*)GetTarget())->SelectAttackingTarget(ATTACKING_TARGET_RANDOM, 0, trigger_spell_id, SELECT_FLAG_PLAYER);
1563  if (!triggerTarget)
1564  return;
1565 
1566  break;
1567  }
1568 // // Interrupt Shutdown
1569 // case 35016: break;
1570 // // Interrupt Shutdown
1571 // case 35176: break;
1572 // // Salaadin's Tesla
1573  case 35515:
1574  return;
1575 // // Ethereal Channel (Red)
1576 // case 35518: break;
1577 // // Nether Vapor
1578 // case 35879: break;
1579 // // Dark Portal Storm
1580 // case 36018: break;
1581 // // Burning Maul
1582 // case 36056: break;
1583 // // Living Grove Defender Lifespan
1584 // case 36061: break;
1585 // // Professor Dabiri Talks
1586 // case 36064: break;
1587 // // Kael Gaining Power
1588  case 36091:
1589  {
1590  switch (GetAuraTicks())
1591  {
1592  case 1:
1593  target->CastSpell(target, 36364, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
1594  target->PlayDirectSound(27);
1595  target->PlayDirectSound(1136);
1596  break;
1597  case 2:
1598  target->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(36364);
1599  target->CastSpell(target, 36370, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
1600  target->PlayDirectSound(27);
1601  target->PlayDirectSound(1136);
1602  break;
1603  case 3:
1604  target->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(36370);
1605  target->CastSpell(target, 36371, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
1606  target->PlayDirectSound(27);
1607  target->PlayDirectSound(1136);
1608  break;
1609  case 4:
1610  if (target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT && target->AI())
1611  target->AI()->SendAIEvent(AI_EVENT_CUSTOM_A, target, static_cast<Creature*>(target));
1612  break;
1613  }
1614  break;
1615  }
1616 // // They Must Burn Bomb Aura
1617 // case 36344: break;
1618  case 36350: // They Must Burn Bomb Aura (self)
1619  trigger_spell_id = 36325; // They Must Burn Bomb Drop (DND)
1620  break;
1621 // // Stolen Ravenous Ravager Egg
1622 // case 36401: break;
1623 // // Activated Cannon
1624 // case 36410: break;
1625 // // Stolen Ravenous Ravager Egg
1626 // case 36418: break;
1627 // // Enchanted Weapons
1628 // case 36510: break;
1629 // // Cursed Scarab Periodic
1630 // case 36556: break;
1631 // // Cursed Scarab Despawn Periodic
1632 // case 36561: break;
1633 // // Vision Guide
1634  case 36573: return; // atm implemented in dbscripts
1635  // Cannon Charging (platform)
1636 // case 36785: break;
1637 // // Cannon Charging (self)
1638 // case 36860: break;
1639  case 37027: // Remote Toy
1640  if (urand(0, 4) == 0) // 20% chance to apply trigger spell
1641  trigger_spell_id = 37029;
1642  else
1643  return;
1644  break;
1645 // // Mark of Death
1646 // case 37125: break;
1647  case 37268: // Arcane Flurry (Melee Component)
1648  {
1649  trigger_spell_id = 37271; // (Range Component, parentspell 37269)
1650 
1651  if (GetTarget()->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_UNIT)
1652  return;
1653 
1654  triggerTarget = ((Creature*)GetTarget())->SelectAttackingTarget(ATTACKING_TARGET_RANDOM, 0, trigger_spell_id, SELECT_FLAG_PLAYER);
1655  if (!triggerTarget)
1656  return;
1657 
1658  break;
1659  }
1660 // // Karazhan - Chess NPC AI, Snapshot timer
1661 // case 37440: break;
1662 // // Karazhan - Chess NPC AI, action timer
1663 // case 37504: break;
1664 // // Banish
1665 // case 37546: break;
1666 // // Shriveling Gaze
1667 // case 37589: break;
1668 // // Fake Aggro Radius (2 yd)
1669 // case 37815: break;
1670 // // Corrupt Medivh
1671 // case 37853: break;
1672  case 38495: // Eye of Grillok
1673  {
1674  target->CastSpell(target, 38530, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
1675  return;
1676  }
1677  case 38554: // Absorb Eye of Grillok (Zezzak's Shard)
1678  {
1679  if (target->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_UNIT)
1680  return;
1681 
1682  if (Unit* caster = GetCaster())
1683  caster->CastSpell(caster, 38495, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, nullptr, this);
1684  else
1685  return;
1686 
1687  Creature* creatureTarget = (Creature*)target;
1688 
1689  creatureTarget->ForcedDespawn();
1690  return;
1691  }
1692 // // Magic Sucker Device timer
1693 // case 38672: break;
1694 // // Tomb Guarding Charging
1695 // case 38751: break;
1696  // Murmur's Touch
1697  case 33711:
1698  switch (GetAuraTicks())
1699  {
1700  case 7:
1701  case 10:
1702  case 12:
1703  case 13:
1704  case 14:
1705  target->CastSpell(target, 33760, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
1706  break;
1707  }
1708  return;
1709  // Murmur's Touch
1710  case 38794:
1711  switch (GetAuraTicks())
1712  {
1713  case 3:
1714  case 6:
1715  case 7:
1716  target->CastSpell(target, 33760, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
1717  break;
1718  }
1719  return;
1720  case 39105: // Activate Nether-wraith Beacon (31742 Nether-wraith Beacon item)
1721  {
1722  float fX, fY, fZ;
1723  triggerTarget->GetClosePoint(fX, fY, fZ, triggerTarget->GetObjectBoundingRadius(), 20.0f);
1724  Creature* wraith = triggerTarget->SummonCreature(22408, fX, fY, fZ, triggerTarget->GetOrientation(), TEMPSPAWN_DEAD_DESPAWN, 0);
1725  if (Unit* caster = GetCaster())
1726  wraith->AI()->AttackStart(caster);
1727  return;
1728  }
1729 // // Drain World Tree Visual
1730 // case 39140: break;
1731 // // Quest - Dustin's Undead Dragon Visual aura
1732 // case 39259: break;
1733 // // Hellfire - The Exorcism, Jules releases darkness, aura
1734 // case 39306: break;
1735 // // Enchanted Weapons
1736 // case 39489: break;
1737 // // Shadow Bolt Whirl
1738 // case 39630: break;
1739 // // Shadow Bolt Whirl
1740 // case 39634: break;
1741 // // Shadow Inferno
1742  case 39645:
1743  {
1744  int32 damageForTick[8] = { 1000, 1000, 2000, 2000, 3000, 3000, 4000, 5000 };
1745  triggerTarget->CastCustomSpell(triggerTarget, 39646, &damageForTick[GetAuraTicks() - 1], nullptr, nullptr, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, nullptr);
1746  return;
1747  }
1748  break;
1749  case 39857: // Tear of Azzinoth Summon Channel - it's not really supposed to do anything,and this only prevents the console spam
1750  trigger_spell_id = 39856;
1751  break;
1752 // // Soulgrinder Ritual Visual (Smashed)
1753 // case 39974: break;
1754 // // Simon Game Pre-game timer
1755 // case 40041: break;
1756 // // Knockdown Fel Cannon: The Aggro Check Aura
1757 // case 40113: break;
1758  case 40157: // Spirit Lance - Teron Gorefiend - Remove stack on tick
1759  target->RemoveAuraStack(40157);
1760  return;
1761  case 40398: // Demon Transform 2
1762  if (UnitAI* ai = target->AI())
1763  ai->SendAIEvent(AI_EVENT_CUSTOM_C, target, target, GetAuraTicks());
1764  break;
1765  case 40511: // Demon Transform 1
1766  if (UnitAI* ai = target->AI())
1767  ai->SendAIEvent(AI_EVENT_CUSTOM_B, target, target, GetAuraTicks());
1768  break;
1769 // // Ethereal Ring Cannon: Cannon Aura
1770 // case 40734: break;
1771  case 40760: // Cage Trap
1772  if (GetAuraTicks() == 1)
1773  target->AI()->SendAIEvent(AI_EVENT_CUSTOM_F, target, (Creature*)target);
1774  break;
1775  case 40867: // Random Periodic
1776  {
1777  // casts random beam
1778  static const uint32 beams[] = { 40827, 40859, 40860, 40861 };
1779  trigger_spell_id = beams[urand(0, 3)];
1780  if (target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT)
1781  triggerTarget = static_cast<Creature*>(target)->SelectAttackingTarget(ATTACKING_TARGET_RANDOM, 0, trigger_spell_id, SELECT_FLAG_PLAYER);
1782  return;
1783  }
1784 // // Prismatic Shield
1785 // case 40879: break;
1786  case 41404: // Dementia
1787  switch (urand(0, 1))
1788  {
1789  case 0:
1790  trigger_spell_id = 41406;
1791  break;
1792  case 1:
1793  trigger_spell_id = 41409;
1794  break;
1795  }
1796  break;
1797  case 41350: // Aura of Desire
1798  {
1799  if (Aura* aura = GetHolder()->m_auras[EFFECT_INDEX_1])
1800  {
1801  if (aura->m_modifier.m_amount > -100)
1802  {
1803  UnitMods unitMod = UnitMods(UNIT_MOD_POWER_START + m_modifier.m_miscvalue);
1804  GetTarget()->HandleStatModifier(unitMod, TOTAL_PCT, float(aura->m_modifier.m_amount), false);
1805  aura->m_modifier.m_amount -= 5;
1806  GetTarget()->HandleStatModifier(unitMod, TOTAL_PCT, float(aura->m_modifier.m_amount), true);
1807  }
1808  }
1809  return;
1810  }
1811 // // Chaos Form
1812 // case 41629: break;
1813  case 42177: // Alert Drums
1814  if (GetAuraTicks() < 3 || GetAuraTicks() > 8)
1815  {
1816  if (target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT && target->AI())
1817  target->AI()->SendAIEvent(AI_EVENT_CUSTOM_A, target, static_cast<Creature*>(target));
1818  }
1819  break;
1820  case 42581: // Spout (left)
1821  case 42582: // Spout (right)
1822  {
1823  float newAngle = target->GetOrientation();
1824 
1825  if (auraId == 42581)
1826  newAngle += 2 * M_PI_F / 100;
1827  else
1828  newAngle -= 2 * M_PI_F / 100;
1829 
1830  newAngle = MapManager::NormalizeOrientation(newAngle);
1831 
1832  target->SetFacingTo(newAngle);
1833 
1834  target->CastSpell(target, auraSpellInfo->CalculateSimpleValue(m_effIndex), TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
1835  return;
1836  }
1837  case 44035: // Return to the Spirit Realm
1838  trigger_spell_id = 44036;
1839  break;
1840 // // Curse of Boundless Agony
1841 // case 45050: break;
1842 // // Earthquake
1843 // case 46240: break;
1844  case 46736: // Personalized Weather
1845  switch (urand(0, 1))
1846  {
1847  case 0:
1848  return;
1849  case 1:
1850  trigger_spell_id = 46737;
1851  break;
1852  }
1853  break;
1854 // // Stay Submerged
1855 // case 46981: break;
1856 // // Dragonblight Ram
1857 // case 47015: break;
1858 // // Party G.R.E.N.A.D.E.
1859 // case 51510: break;
1860 // // Horseman Abilities
1861 // case 52347: break;
1862 // // GPS (Greater drake Positioning System)
1863 // case 53389: break;
1864 // // WotLK Prologue Frozen Shade Summon Aura
1865 // case 53459: break;
1866 // // WotLK Prologue Frozen Shade Speech
1867 // case 53460: break;
1868 // // WotLK Prologue Dual-plagued Brain Summon Aura
1869 // case 54295: break;
1870 // // WotLK Prologue Dual-plagued Brain Speech
1871 // case 54299: break;
1872 // // Rotate 360 (Fast)
1873 // case 55861: break;
1874 // // Shadow Sickle
1875 // case 56702: break;
1876 // // Draw Magic
1877 // case 58185: break;
1878  case 58886: // Food
1879  {
1880  if (GetAuraTicks() != 1)
1881  return;
1882 
1883  uint32 randomBuff[5] = {57288, 57139, 57111, 57286, 57291};
1884 
1885  trigger_spell_id = urand(0, 1) ? 58891 : randomBuff[urand(0, 4)];
1886 
1887  break;
1888  }
1889 // // Shadow Sickle
1890 // case 59103: break;
1891 // // Time Bomb
1892 // case 59376: break;
1893 // // Whirlwind Visual
1894 // case 59551: break;
1895 // // Hearstrike
1896 // case 59783: break;
1897 // // Z Check
1898 // case 61678: break;
1899 // // IsDead Check
1900 // case 61976: break;
1901 // // Start the Engine
1902 // case 62432: break;
1903 // // Enchanted Broom
1904 // case 62571: break;
1905 // // Mulgore Hatchling
1906 // case 62586: break;
1907  case 62679: // Durotar Scorpion
1908  trigger_spell_id = auraSpellInfo->CalculateSimpleValue(m_effIndex);
1909  break;
1910 // // Fighting Fish
1911 // case 62833: break;
1912 // // Shield Level 1
1913 // case 63130: break;
1914 // // Shield Level 2
1915 // case 63131: break;
1916 // // Shield Level 3
1917 // case 63132: break;
1918 // // Food
1919  case 64345: // Remove Player from Phase
1920  target->RemoveSpellsCausingAura(SPELL_AURA_PHASE);
1921  return;
1922 // case 64445: break;
1923 // // Food
1924 // case 65418: break;
1925 // // Food
1926 // case 65419: break;
1927 // // Food
1928 // case 65420: break;
1929 // // Food
1930 // case 65421: break;
1931 // // Food
1932 // case 65422: break;
1933 // // Rolling Throw
1934 // case 67546: break;
1935 // // Ice Tomb
1936 // case 70157: break;
1937 // // Mana Barrier // HANDLED IN SD2!
1938 // case 70842: break;
1939 // // Summon Timer: Suppresser
1940 // case 70912: break;
1941 // // Aura of Darkness
1942 // case 71110: break;
1943 // // Aura of Darkness
1944 // case 71111: break;
1945  case 71441: // Unstable Ooze Explosion Suicide Trigger
1946  target->Suicide();
1947  return;
1948 // // Ball of Flames Visual
1949 // case 71706: break;
1950 // // Summon Broken Frostmourne
1951 // case 74081: break;
1952  default:
1953  break;
1954  }
1955  break;
1956  }
1957  case SPELLFAMILY_MAGE:
1958  {
1959  /*switch (auraId)
1960  {
1961  default:
1962  break;
1963  }*/
1964  break;
1965  }
1966  case SPELLFAMILY_WARRIOR:
1967  {
1968  switch(auraId)
1969  {
1970  case 23410: // Wild Magic (Mage class call in Nefarian encounter)
1971  {
1972  trigger_spell_id = 23603;
1973  break;
1974  }
1975 // // Corrupted Totems
1976 // case 23425: break;
1977  default:
1978  break;
1979  }
1980  break;
1981  }
1982 // case SPELLFAMILY_PRIEST:
1983 // {
1984 // switch(auraId)
1985 // {
1986 // // Blue Beam
1987 // case 32930: break;
1988 // // Fury of the Dreghood Elders
1989 // case 35460: break;
1990 // default:
1991 // break;
1992 // }
1993 // break;
1994 // }
1995  case SPELLFAMILY_HUNTER:
1996  {
1997  switch (auraId)
1998  {
1999  case 53302: // Sniper training
2000  case 53303:
2001  case 53304:
2002  if (triggerTarget->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
2003  return;
2004 
2005  // Reset reapply counter at move
2006  if (triggerTarget->IsMoving())
2007  {
2008  m_modifier.m_amount = 6;
2009  return;
2010  }
2011 
2012  // We are standing at the moment
2013  if (m_modifier.m_amount > 0)
2014  {
2015  --m_modifier.m_amount;
2016  return;
2017  }
2018 
2019  // select rank of buff
2020  switch (auraId)
2021  {
2022  case 53302: trigger_spell_id = 64418; break;
2023  case 53303: trigger_spell_id = 64419; break;
2024  case 53304: trigger_spell_id = 64420; break;
2025  }
2026 
2027  // If aura is active - no need to continue
2028  if (triggerTarget->HasAura(trigger_spell_id))
2029  return;
2030 
2031  break;
2032  default:
2033  break;
2034  }
2035  break;
2036  }
2037  case SPELLFAMILY_DRUID:
2038  {
2039  switch (auraId)
2040  {
2041  case 768: // Cat Form
2042  // trigger_spell_id not set and unknown effect triggered in this case, ignoring for while
2043  return;
2044  case 22842: // Frenzied Regeneration
2045  case 22895:
2046  case 22896:
2047  case 26999:
2048  {
2049  int32 LifePerRage = GetModifier()->m_amount;
2050 
2051  int32 lRage = target->GetPower(POWER_RAGE);
2052  if (lRage > 100) // rage stored as rage*10
2053  lRage = 100;
2054  target->ModifyPower(POWER_RAGE, -lRage);
2055  int32 FRTriggerBasePoints = int32(lRage * LifePerRage / 10);
2056  target->CastCustomSpell(target, 22845, &FRTriggerBasePoints, nullptr, nullptr, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, nullptr, this);
2057  return;
2058  }
2059  default:
2060  break;
2061  }
2062  break;
2063  }
2064 
2065 // case SPELLFAMILY_HUNTER:
2066 // {
2067 // switch(auraId)
2068 // {
2069 // // Frost Trap Aura
2070 // case 13810:
2071 // return;
2072 // // Rizzle's Frost Trap
2073 // case 39900:
2074 // return;
2075 // // Tame spells
2076 // case 19597: // Tame Ice Claw Bear
2077 // case 19676: // Tame Snow Leopard
2078 // case 19677: // Tame Large Crag Boar
2079 // case 19678: // Tame Adult Plainstrider
2080 // case 19679: // Tame Prairie Stalker
2081 // case 19680: // Tame Swoop
2082 // case 19681: // Tame Dire Mottled Boar
2083 // case 19682: // Tame Surf Crawler
2084 // case 19683: // Tame Armored Scorpid
2085 // case 19684: // Tame Webwood Lurker
2086 // case 19685: // Tame Nightsaber Stalker
2087 // case 19686: // Tame Strigid Screecher
2088 // case 30100: // Tame Crazed Dragonhawk
2089 // case 30103: // Tame Elder Springpaw
2090 // case 30104: // Tame Mistbat
2091 // case 30647: // Tame Barbed Crawler
2092 // case 30648: // Tame Greater Timberstrider
2093 // case 30652: // Tame Nightstalker
2094 // return;
2095 // default:
2096 // break;
2097 // }
2098 // break;
2099 // }
2100  //case SPELLFAMILY_SHAMAN:
2101  //{
2102  // break;
2103  //}
2104  default:
2105  break;
2106  }
2107 
2108  // Reget trigger spell proto
2109  triggeredSpellInfo = sSpellTemplate.LookupEntry<SpellEntry>(trigger_spell_id);
2110  }
2111  else
2112  {
2113  // for channeled spell cast applied from aura owner to channel target (persistent aura affects already applied to true target)
2114  // come periodic casts applied to targets, so need select proper caster (ex. 15790)
2115  // interesting 2 cases: periodic aura at caster of channeled spell
2116  if (target->GetObjectGuid() == casterGUID)
2117  triggerCaster = target;
2118 
2119  PickTargetsForSpellTrigger(triggerCaster, triggerTarget, triggerTargetObject, triggeredSpellInfo);
2120 
2121  // Spell exist but require custom code
2122  switch (auraId)
2123  {
2124  case 9347: // Mortal Strike
2125  {
2126  if (target->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_UNIT)
2127  return;
2128  // expected selection current fight target
2129  triggerTarget = ((Creature*)target)->SelectAttackingTarget(ATTACKING_TARGET_TOPAGGRO, 0, triggeredSpellInfo);
2130  if (!triggerTarget)
2131  return;
2132 
2133  break;
2134  }
2135  case 1010: // Curse of Idiocy
2136  {
2137  // TODO: spell casted by result in correct way mostly
2138  // BUT:
2139  // 1) target show casting at each triggered cast: target don't must show casting animation for any triggered spell
2140  // but must show affect apply like item casting
2141  // 2) maybe aura must be replace by new with accumulative stat mods instead stacking
2142 
2143  // prevent cast by triggered auras
2144  if (casterGUID == triggerTarget->GetObjectGuid())
2145  return;
2146 
2147  // stop triggering after each affected stats lost > 90
2148  int32 intelectLoss = 0;
2149  int32 spiritLoss = 0;
2150 
2151  Unit::AuraList const& mModStat = triggerTarget->GetAurasByType(SPELL_AURA_MOD_STAT);
2152  for (auto i : mModStat)
2153  {
2154  if (i->GetId() == 1010)
2155  {
2156  switch (i->GetModifier()->m_miscvalue)
2157  {
2158  case STAT_INTELLECT: intelectLoss += i->GetModifier()->m_amount; break;
2159  case STAT_SPIRIT: spiritLoss += i->GetModifier()->m_amount; break;
2160  default: break;
2161  }
2162  }
2163  }
2164 
2165  if (intelectLoss <= -90 && spiritLoss <= -90)
2166  return;
2167 
2168  break;
2169  }
2170  case 16191: // Mana Tide
2171  {
2172  triggerCaster->CastCustomSpell(nullptr, trigger_spell_id, &m_modifier.m_amount, nullptr, nullptr, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, nullptr, this);
2173  return;
2174  }
2175  case 29768: // Overload
2176  {
2177  int32 damage = m_modifier.m_amount * (pow(2.0f, GetAuraTicks()));
2178  if (damage > 3200)
2179  damage = 3200;
2180  triggerCaster->CastCustomSpell(triggerTarget, triggeredSpellInfo, &damage, nullptr, nullptr, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, nullptr, this, casterGUID);
2181  return;
2182  }
2183  case 32930: // Blue beam
2184  return; // Never seems to go off in sniffs - hides errors
2185  /*case 30502: // Dark Spin - Only Effect0 s.30505 should be affect, else s.30508 doesnt work anymore
2186  {
2187  if (GetCaster()->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_UNIT)
2188  return;
2189 
2190  triggerTarget = ((Creature*)GetCaster())->SelectAttackingTarget(ATTACKING_TARGET_RANDOM, 0, trigger_spell_id, SELECT_FLAG_PLAYER);
2191  if (!triggerTarget)
2192  return;
2193 
2194  break;
2195  }*/
2196  case 36716: // Energy Discharge
2197  case 38828:
2198  {
2199  if (urand(0, 1) == 0) // 50% chance to proc
2200  break;
2201  return;
2202  }
2203  case 36720: // Kael'Thas - Phoenix - Burn
2204  case 44197: // MgT Kael'Thas - Phoenix - Burn
2205  {
2206  uint32 dmg = target->GetMaxHealth() * 0.05f; // 5% dmg every tick
2207  uint32 absorb = 0;
2208  Unit::DealDamageMods(target, target, dmg, &absorb, SELF_DAMAGE);
2209  Unit::DealDamage(target, target, dmg, nullptr, SELF_DAMAGE, SPELL_SCHOOL_MASK_FIRE, nullptr, false);
2210  break; // continue executing rest
2211  }
2212  case 37716: // Demon Link
2213  triggerTarget = static_cast<TemporarySpawn*>(target)->GetSpawner();
2214  break;
2215  case 37850: // Watery Grave
2216  case 38023:
2217  case 38024:
2218  case 38025:
2219  {
2220  casterGUID = target->GetObjectGuid();
2221  break;
2222  }
2223  case 38652: // Spore Cloud
2224  case 40106: // Merge
2225  {
2226  triggerCaster = GetCaster();
2227  break;
2228  }
2229  // dummy trigger 18350 family
2230  case 28820: // Lightning Shield
2231  case 38443: // Totemic Mastery
2232  {
2233  triggerTarget = target;
2234  break;
2235  }
2236  case 38736: // Rod of Purification - for quest 10839 (Veil Skith: Darkstone of Terokk)
2237  {
2238  if (Unit* caster = GetCaster())
2239  caster->CastSpell(triggerTarget, trigger_spell_id, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, nullptr, this);
2240  return;
2241  }
2242  case 28059: // Positive Charge
2243  case 28084: // Negative Charge
2244  case 39088: // Positive Charge
2245  case 39091: // Negative Charge
2246  {
2247  uint32 buffAuraId;
2248  float range;
2249  switch (auraId)
2250  {
2251  case 28059:
2252  buffAuraId = 29659;
2253  range = 13.f;
2254  break;
2255  case 28084:
2256  buffAuraId = 29660;
2257  range = 13.f;
2258  break;
2259  case 39088:
2260  buffAuraId = 39089;
2261  range = 10.f;
2262  break;
2263  default:
2264  case 39091:
2265  buffAuraId = 39092;
2266  range = 10.f;
2267  break;
2268  }
2269  uint32 curCount = 0;
2270  PlayerList playerList;
2271  GetPlayerListWithEntryInWorld(playerList, target, range); // official range
2272  for (Player* player : playerList)
2273  if (target != player && player->HasAura(auraId))
2274  curCount++;
2275 
2276  target->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(buffAuraId);
2277  if (curCount)
2278  for (uint32 i = 0; i < curCount; i++)
2279  target->CastSpell(target, buffAuraId, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
2280 
2281  break;
2282  }
2283  case 36657: // Death Count
2284  case 38818: // Death Count
2285  {
2286  Unit* caster = GetCaster(); // should only go off if caster is still alive
2287  if (!caster || !caster->IsAlive())
2288  return;
2289  break;
2290  }
2291  case 37098: // Rain of Bones - Nightbane
2292  {
2293  switch (GetAuraTicks()) // on some aura ticks also spawn skeletons
2294  {
2295  case 2:
2296  case 7:
2297  case 13:
2298  case 16:
2299  case 20:
2300  target->CastSpell(triggerTargetObject->GetPositionX(), triggerTargetObject->GetPositionY(), triggerTargetObject->GetPositionZ(), 30170, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
2301  break;
2302  }
2303  break;
2304  }
2305  case 39575: // Charge Frenzy
2306  {
2307  Unit* caster = GetCaster();
2308  triggerTarget = ((Creature*)caster)->SelectAttackingTarget(ATTACKING_TARGET_RANDOM, 0, triggeredSpellInfo);
2309  if (!triggerTarget)
2310  return;
2311  caster->FixateTarget(triggerTarget);
2312  break;
2313  }
2314  case 40862: // Sinful Periodic
2315  case 40863: // Sinister Periodic
2316  case 40865: // Vile Periodic
2317  case 40866: // Wicked Periodic
2318  {
2319  if (target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT)
2320  triggerTarget = static_cast<Creature*>(target)->SelectAttackingTarget(ATTACKING_TARGET_RANDOM, 0, trigger_spell_id, SELECT_FLAG_PLAYER);
2321  break;
2322  }
2323  case 43149: // Claw Rage
2324  {
2325  // Need to provide explicit target for trigger spell target combination
2326  target->CastSpell(target->GetVictim(), trigger_spell_id, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, nullptr, this);
2327  return;
2328  }
2329  case 47702: // Unholy Union
2330  case 47722: // Frost Draw
2331  case 50251: // Blood Draw
2332  {
2333  // TODO: Determine if we need to scan effect 1 and 2 for default prefill
2334  triggerCaster = GetCaster();
2335  triggerTarget = target;
2336  break;
2337  }
2338  case 53563: // Beacon of Light
2339  // original caster must be target (beacon)
2340  target->CastSpell(target, trigger_spell_id, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, nullptr, this, target->GetObjectGuid());
2341  return;
2342  }
2343  }
2344  int32 basePoints[] = { 0,0,0 };
2345  PeriodicTriggerData data(triggerCaster, triggerTarget, triggerTargetObject, triggeredSpellInfo, basePoints);
2346  OnPeriodicTrigger(data);
2347 
2348  // All ok cast by default case
2349  if (data.spellInfo)
2350  {
2351  CastTriggeredSpell(data);
2352  }
2353  else if (!GetAuraScript()) // if scripter scripted spell, it is handled somehow
2354  {
2355  if (Unit* caster = GetCaster())
2356  {
2357  if (triggerTarget->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_UNIT || !sScriptDevAIMgr.OnEffectDummy(caster, GetId(), GetEffIndex(), (Creature*)triggerTarget, ObjectGuid()))
2358  sLog.outError("Aura::TriggerSpell: Spell %u have 0 in EffectTriggered[%d], not handled custom case?", GetId(), GetEffIndex());
2359  }
2360  }
2361 }
2362 
2363 void Aura::TriggerSpellWithValue()
2364 {
2365  ObjectGuid casterGUID = GetCasterGuid();
2366  Unit* triggerTarget = GetTriggerTarget();
2367 
2368  if (!casterGUID || !triggerTarget)
2369  return;
2370 
2371  // generic casting code with custom spells and target/caster customs
2372  uint32 trigger_spell_id = GetSpellProto()->EffectTriggerSpell[m_effIndex];
2373  int32 calculatedAmount = GetModifier()->m_amount;
2374
