2375  SpellEntry const* triggeredSpellInfo = sSpellTemplate.LookupEntry<SpellEntry>(trigger_spell_id);
2376  int32 basePoints[3] = { 0,0,0 };
2377  // damage triggered from spell might not only be processed by first effect (but always EffectDieSides equal 1)
2378  if (triggeredSpellInfo)
2379  {
2380  uint8 j = 0;
2381  for (uint8 i = 0; i < 3; ++i)
2382  {
2383  if (triggeredSpellInfo->EffectDieSides[i] == 1)
2384  j = i;
2385  }
2386  basePoints[j] = calculatedAmount;
2387  }
2388  Unit* triggerCaster = triggerTarget;
2389  WorldObject* triggerTargetObject = nullptr;
2390  PickTargetsForSpellTrigger(triggerCaster, triggerTarget, triggerTargetObject, triggeredSpellInfo);
2391 
2392  PeriodicTriggerData data(triggerCaster, triggerTarget, triggerTargetObject, triggeredSpellInfo, basePoints);
2393  OnPeriodicTrigger(data);
2394 
2395  if (data.spellInfo)
2396  CastTriggeredSpell(data);
2397 }
2398 
2399 /*********************************************************/
2400 /*** AURA EFFECTS ***/
2401 /*********************************************************/
2402 
2403 void Aura::HandleAuraDummy(bool apply, bool Real)
2404 {
2405  // spells required only Real aura add/remove
2406  if (!Real)
2407  return;
2408 
2409  Unit* target = GetTarget();
2410 
2411  // AT APPLY
2412  if (apply)
2413  {
2414  switch (GetSpellProto()->SpellFamilyName)
2415  {
2416  case SPELLFAMILY_GENERIC:
2417  {
2418  switch (GetId())
2419  {
2420  case 11403: // Dream Vision
2421  {
2422  if (target->IsPlayer())
2423  {
2424  Unit* pet = static_cast<Player*>(target)->GetCharm();
2425  if (pet && pet->GetEntry() == 7863)
2426  pet->SetVisibility(VISIBILITY_OFF);
2427  }
2428  break;
2429  }
2430  case 1515: // Tame beast
2431  if (Unit* caster = GetCaster()) // Wotlk - sniff - adds 1000 threat
2432  target->AddThreat(caster, 1000.0f, false, GetSpellSchoolMask(GetSpellProto()), GetSpellProto());
2433  return;
2434  case 6946: // Curse of the Bleakheart
2435  case 41170:
2436  m_isPeriodic = true;
2437  m_modifier.periodictime = 5 * IN_MILLISECONDS;
2438  m_periodicTimer = m_modifier.periodictime;
2439  return;
2440  case 7057: // Haunting Spirits
2441  // expected to tick with 30 sec period (tick part see in Aura::PeriodicTick)
2442  m_isPeriodic = true;
2443  m_modifier.periodictime = 30 * IN_MILLISECONDS;
2444  m_periodicTimer = m_modifier.periodictime;
2445  return;
2446  case 7054: // Forsaken Skill
2447  m_isPeriodic = true;
2448  m_modifier.periodictime = 1 * IN_MILLISECONDS;
2449  m_periodicTimer = m_modifier.periodictime;
2450  break;
2451  case 13139: // net-o-matic
2452  // root to self part of (root_target->charge->root_self sequence
2453  if (Unit* caster = GetCaster())
2454  caster->CastSpell(caster, 13138, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, nullptr, this);
2455  return;
2456  case 21094: // Separation Anxiety (Majordomo Executus)
2457  case 23487: // Separation Anxiety (Garr)
2458  {
2459  // expected to tick with 5 sec period (tick part see in Aura::PeriodicTick)
2460  m_isPeriodic = true;
2461  m_modifier.periodictime = 5 * IN_MILLISECONDS;
2462  m_periodicTimer = m_modifier.periodictime;
2463  return;
2464  }
2465  case 23183: // Mark of Frost
2466  {
2467  if (target->HasAura(23182))
2468  target->CastSpell(target, 23186, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, nullptr, nullptr, GetCasterGuid());
2469  return;
2470  }
2471  case 25042: // Mark of Nature
2472  {

2474  target->CastSpell(target, 25043, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, nullptr, nullptr, GetCasterGuid());
2475  return;
2476  }

2481  }

2485  target->CastSpell(target, 37131, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, nullptr, nullptr, GetCasterGuid());
2486  return;
2487  }

2490  if (Unit* target = GetTarget())
2491  {
2492  if (target->HasAura(26682))
2493  target->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(26682);
2494  }
2495  return;
2496  }
2497  case 26682: // Perfume
2498  {
2499  if (Unit* target = GetTarget())
2500  {
2501  if (target->HasAura(26681))
2502  target->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(26681);
2503  }
2504  return;
2505  }
2506  case 28832: // Mark of Korth'azz
2507  case 28833: // Mark of Blaumeux
2508  case 28834: // Mark of Rivendare
2509  case 28835: // Mark of Zeliek
2510  {
2511  int32 damage;
2512  switch (GetStackAmount())
2513  {
2514  case 1:
2515  return;
2516  case 2: damage = 500; break;
2517  case 3: damage = 1500; break;
2518  case 4: damage = 4000; break;
2519  case 5: damage = 12500; break;
2520  default:
2521  damage = 14000 + 1000 * GetStackAmount();
2522  break;
2523  }
2524 
2525  if (Unit* caster = GetCaster())
2526  caster->CastCustomSpell(target, 28836, &damage, nullptr, nullptr, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, nullptr, this);
2527  return;
2528  }
2529  case 31736: // Ironvine Seeds
2530  {
2531  Unit* pCaster = GetCaster();
2532 
2533  Creature* SteamPumpOverseer = target->SummonCreature(18340, pCaster->GetPositionX()-20, pCaster->GetPositionY()+20, pCaster->GetPositionZ(), target->GetOrientation(), TEMPSPAWN_TIMED_OOC_DESPAWN, 10000);
2534 
2535  if (SteamPumpOverseer && pCaster)
2536  SteamPumpOverseer->GetMotionMaster()->MovePoint(0, pCaster->GetPositionX(), pCaster->GetPositionY(), pCaster->GetPositionZ());
2537 
2538  return;
2539  }
2540  case 32044: // Soul Charge - Archimonde - Battle For Mount Hyjal
2541  {
2542  if (target->IsAlive())
2543  return;
2544 
2545 
2546  Unit* pCaster = GetCaster();
2547  uint8 targetClass = target->getClass();
2548  switch (targetClass)
2549  {
2550  case 1:
2551  case 2:
2552  case 4:
2553  target->CastSpell(pCaster, 32045, TRIGGERED_NONE);
2554  break;
2555  case 3:
2556  case 7:
2557  case 11:
2558  target->CastSpell(pCaster, 32051, TRIGGERED_NONE);
2559  break;
2560  case 5:
2561  case 8:
2562  case 9:
2563  target->CastSpell(pCaster, 32052, TRIGGERED_NONE);
2564  break;
2565  }
2566 
2567  return;
2568  }
2569  case 32045: // Soul Charge
2570  case 32051:
2571  case 32052:
2572  {
2573  // TODO: Controls the random timer for the spell to be cast based on aura, they need to be split up.
2574  return;
2575  }
2576  case 32441: // Brittle Bones
2577  {

2580  m_periodicTimer = 0;

2602  case 36089:
2603  case 36090: // Netherbeam - Kaelthas
2604  {
2605  float speed = target->GetBaseRunSpeed(); // fetch current base speed
2606  target->ApplyModPositiveFloatValue(OBJECT_FIELD_SCALE_X, float(m_modifier.m_amount) / 100, apply);
2607  target->UpdateModelData(); // resets speed
2608  target->SetBaseRunSpeed(speed + (1.f / 7.f));
2609  target->UpdateSpeed(MOVE_RUN, true); // sends speed packet
2610  return;
2611  }
2612  case 36587: // Vision Guide
2613  {
2614  target->CastSpell(target, 36573, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, nullptr, this);
2615  return;
2616  }
2617  // Gender spells
2618  case 38224: // Illidari Agent Illusion
2619  case 37096: // Blood Elf Illusion
2620  case 46354: // Blood Elf Illusion
2621  {
2622  uint8 gender = target->getGender();
2623  uint32 spellId;
2624  switch (GetId())
2625  {
2626  case 38224: spellId = (gender == GENDER_MALE ? 38225 : 38227); break;
2627  case 37096: spellId = (gender == GENDER_MALE ? 37093 : 37095); break;
2628  case 46354: spellId = (gender == GENDER_MALE ? 46355 : 46356); break;
2629  default: return;
2630  }
2631  target->CastSpell(target, spellId, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, nullptr, this);
2632  return;
2633  }
2634  case 37408: // Oscillating field
2635  if (Player* player = dynamic_cast<Player*>(target))
2636  if (player->GetAuraCount(37408) >= 5 && player->GetQuestStatus(10594) == QUEST_STATUS_INCOMPLETE)
2637  player->AreaExploredOrEventHappens(10594);
2638  return;
2639  case 37750: // Clear Consuming Madness
2640  if (target->HasAura(37749))
2641  target->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(37749);
2642  return;
2643  case 39850: // Rocket Blast
2644  if (roll_chance_i(20)) // backfire stun
2645  target->CastSpell(target, 51581, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, nullptr, this);
2646  return;
2647  case 40607: // Fixate - Shade of Akama
2648  {
2649  if (target->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_UNIT)
2650  return;
2651 
2652  target->FixateTarget(GetCaster());
2653  return;
2654  }

2656  {

2658  return;
2659

2661  target->CastSpell(caster, 40917, TRIGGERED_NONE); // Wrangle Aether Rays: Character Force Cast
2662 
2663  static_cast<Creature*>(target)->ForcedDespawn();
2664 
2665  return;
2666  }

2670  return;

2674

2676  }

2687  else

2689  return;
2690  }

2701  }

2706  return;

2710  break;

2716  return;

2719  return;

2721  // See Death's Door

2723  return;

2726  // Pet will be following owner, this makes him stop
2727  target->addUnitState(UNIT_STAT_STUNNED);
2728  return;
2729  case 54729: // Winged Steed of the Ebon Blade
2730  Spell::SelectMountByAreaAndSkill(target, GetSpellProto(), 0, 0, 54726, 54727, 0);
2731  return;
2732  case 58600: // Restricted Flight Area (Dalaran)
2733  case 58730: // Restricted Flight Area (Wintergrasp)
2734  {
2735  if (!target || target->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
2736  return;
2737  const char* text = sObjectMgr.GetMangosString(LANG_NO_FLY_ZONE, ((Player*)target)->GetSession()->GetSessionDbLocaleIndex());
2738  target->MonsterWhisper(text, target, true);
2739  return;
2740  }

2967  if (!caster || !caster->IsAlive())
2968  return;
2969

2971  switch (GetId())
2972  {
2973  case 19548: finalSpellId = 19597; break;
2974  case 19674: finalSpellId = 19677; break;
2975  case 19687: finalSpellId = 19676; break;
2976  case 19688: finalSpellId = 19678; break;
2977  case 19689: finalSpellId = 19679; break;
2978  case 19692: finalSpellId = 19680; break;
2979  case 19693: finalSpellId = 19684; break;
2980  case 19694: finalSpellId = 19681; break;
2981  case 19696: finalSpellId = 19682; break;
2982  case 19697: finalSpellId = 19683; break;
2983  case 19699: finalSpellId = 19685; break;
2984  case 19700: finalSpellId = 19686; break;
2985  case 30646: finalSpellId = 30647; break;
2986  case 30653: finalSpellId = 30648; break;
2987  case 30654: finalSpellId = 30652; break;
2988  case 30099: finalSpellId = 30100; break;
2989  case 30102: finalSpellId = 30103; break;
2990  case 30105: finalSpellId = 30104; break;
2991  }
2992 
2993  if (finalSpellId)
2994  caster->CastSpell(target, finalSpellId, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, nullptr, this);
2995 
2996  return;
2997  }
2998 
2999  switch (GetId())
3000  {
3001  case 11129: // Combustion
3002  target->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(28682); // on Combustion removal remove crit % stacks
3003  return;
3004  case 11826: // Electromagnetic Gigaflux Reactivator
3005  if (m_removeMode != AURA_REMOVE_BY_EXPIRE)
3006  return;
3007 
3008  if (Unit* caster = GetCaster())
3009  {
3010  if (caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
3011  caster->CastSpell(target, 11828, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, ((Player*)caster)->GetItemByGuid(this->GetCastItemGuid()), this);
3012  }
3013  return;
3014  case 12774: // (DND) Belnistrasz Idol Shutdown Visual
3015  {
3016  if (m_removeMode == AURA_REMOVE_BY_DEATH)
3017  return;
3018 
3019  // Idom Rool Camera Shake <- wtf, don't drink while making spellnames?
3020  if (Unit* caster = GetCaster())
3021  caster->CastSpell(caster, 12816, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
3022 
3023  return;
3024  }
3025  case 17189: // Frostwhisper's Lifeblood
3026  // Ras Frostwhisper gets back to full health when turned to his human form
3027  if (Unit* caster = GetCaster())
3028  caster->ModifyHealth(caster->GetMaxHealth() - caster->GetHealth());
3029  return;
3030  case 25185: // Itch
3031  {
3032  GetCaster()->CastSpell(target, 25187, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
3033  return;
3034  }
3035  case 26077: // Itch
3036  {
3037  GetCaster()->CastSpell(target, 26078, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
3038  return;
3039  }

3044  // Poison Cloud
3045  target->CastSpell(target, 28240, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, nullptr, this);
3046  return;
3047  }

3076  target->CastSpell(target, 32053, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, nullptr, this);
3077 
3078  return;
3079  }
3080  case 35016: // Interrupt shutdown
3081  case 35176: // Interrupt shutdown (ara)
3082  {
3083  if (m_removeMode == AURA_REMOVE_BY_DEFAULT)
3084  {
3085  Unit* caster = GetCaster();
3086  if (caster && GetAuraDuration() <= 100) // only fail if finished cast (seems to finish with .1 seconds left)
3087  if (Creature* summoner = caster->GetMap()->GetCreature(caster->GetSpawnerGuid()))
3088  caster->AI()->SendAIEvent(AI_EVENT_CUSTOM_A, caster, summoner);
3089  }
3090  return;
3091  }
3092  case 35079: // Misdirection, triggered buff
3093  case 59628: // Tricks of the Trade, triggered buff
3094  {
3095  uint32 spellId = GetId() == 35079 ? 34477 : 57934;
3096  if (Unit* pCaster = GetCaster())
3097  pCaster->getHostileRefManager().ResetThreatRedirection(spellId);
3098  return;
3099  }
3100  case 36301: // On Fire
3101  {
3102  if (!target->IsCreature())
3103  return;
3104  float x, y, z;
3105  static_cast<Creature*>(target)->GetRespawnCoord(x, y, z);
3106  target->GetMotionMaster()->MovePoint(1, x, y, z);
3107  return;
3108  }
3109  case 36730: // Flame Strike
3110  {
3111  target->CastSpell(target, 36731, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, nullptr, this);
3112  return;
3113  }
3114  case 39088: // Positive Charge
3115  target->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(39089);
3116  return;
3117  case 39091: // Negative Charge
3118  target->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(39092);
3119  return;

3123  ai->SendAIEvent(AI_EVENT_CUSTOM_E, caster, caster);
3124  return;

3205  case 2: spellId = 46739; break;
3206  case 3: spellId = 46740; break;
3207  case 4: return;
3208  }

3289  ((Player*)target)->IsFreeFlying() && !((Player*)target)->IsGameMaster())
3290  {
3291  target->CastSpell(target, 58601, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED); // Remove Flight Auras (also triggered Parachute (45472))
3292  }
3293  return;
3294  }

3299 
3300  return;
3301  }
3302  case 70308: // Mutated Transformation
3303  {
3304  if (target->GetMap()->IsDungeon())
3305  {
3306  uint32 spellId;
3307 
3308  Difficulty diff = target->GetMap()->GetDifficulty();
3309  if (diff == RAID_DIFFICULTY_10MAN_NORMAL || diff == RAID_DIFFICULTY_10MAN_HEROIC)
3310  spellId = 70311;
3311  else
3312  spellId = 71503;
3313 
3314  target->CastSpell(target, spellId, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, nullptr, this);
3315  }
3316  return;
3317  }
3318  }
3319 
3320  // Living Bomb
3321  if (GetSpellProto()->SpellFamilyName == SPELLFAMILY_MAGE && (GetSpellProto()->SpellFamilyFlags & uint64(0x2000000000000)))
3322  {
3323  if (m_removeMode == AURA_REMOVE_BY_EXPIRE || m_removeMode == AURA_REMOVE_BY_DISPEL)
3324  target->CastSpell(target, m_modifier.m_amount, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, nullptr, this);
3325 
3326  return;
3327  }
3328  }
3329 
3330  // AT APPLY & REMOVE
3331 
3332  switch (GetSpellProto()->SpellFamilyName)
3333  {
3334  case SPELLFAMILY_GENERIC:
3335  {
3336  switch (GetId())
3337  {
3338  case 6606: // Self Visual - Sleep Until Cancelled (DND)
3339  {
3340  if (apply)
3341  {
3342  target->SetStandState(UNIT_STAND_STATE_SLEEP);
3343  target->addUnitState(UNIT_STAT_ROOT);
3344  }
3345  else
3346  {
3347  target->clearUnitState(UNIT_STAT_ROOT);
3348  target->SetStandState(UNIT_STAND_STATE_STAND);
3349  }
3350 
3351  return;
3352  }
3353  case 11196: // Recently Bandaged
3354  target->ApplySpellImmune(this, IMMUNITY_MECHANIC, GetMiscValue(), apply);
3355  return;
3356  case 16093: // Self Visual - Sleep Until Cancelled (DND)
3357  {
3358  if (apply)
3359  {
3360  target->SetStandState(UNIT_STAND_STATE_SLEEP);
3361  target->addUnitState(UNIT_STAT_ROOT);
3362  }
3363  else
3364  {
3365  target->clearUnitState(UNIT_STAT_ROOT);
3366  target->SetStandState(UNIT_STAND_STATE_STAND);
3367  }
3368 
3369  return;
3370  }
3371  case 24658: // Unstable Power
3372  {
3373  if (apply)
3374  {
3375  Unit* caster = GetCaster();
3376  if (!caster)
3377  return;
3378 
3379  caster->CastSpell(target, 24659, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, nullptr, nullptr, GetCasterGuid());
3380  }
3381  else
3382  target->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(24659);
3383  return;
3384  }
3385  case 24661: // Restless Strength
3386  {
3387  if (apply)
3388  {
3389  Unit* caster = GetCaster();
3390  if (!caster)
3391  return;
3392 
3393  caster->CastSpell(target, 24662, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, nullptr, nullptr, GetCasterGuid());
3394  }
3395  else
3396  target->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(24662);
3397  return;
3398  }
3399  case 28819: // Submerge Visual
3400  {
3401  if (apply)
3402  target->SetStandState(UNIT_STAND_STATE_CUSTOM);
3403  else
3404  target->SetStandState(UNIT_STAND_STATE_STAND);
3405  return;
3406  }
3407  case 29266: // Permanent Feign Death
3408  case 31261: // Permanent Feign Death (Root)
3409  case 37493: // Feign Death
3410  case 52593: // Bloated Abomination Feign Death
3411  case 55795: // Falling Dragon Feign Death
3412  case 57626: // Feign Death
3413  case 57685: // Permanent Feign Death
3414  case 58768: // Permanent Feign Death (Freeze Jumpend)
3415  case 58806: // Permanent Feign Death (Drowned Anim)
3416  case 58951: // Permanent Feign Death
3417  case 64461: // Permanent Feign Death (No Anim) (Root)
3418  case 65985: // Permanent Feign Death (Root Silence Pacify)
3419  case 70592: // Permanent Feign Death
3420  case 70628: // Permanent Feign Death
3421  case 70630: // Frozen Aftermath - Feign Death
3422  case 71598: // Feign Death
3423  {
3424  // Unclear what the difference really is between them.
3425  // Some has effect1 that makes the difference, however not all.
3426  // Some appear to be used depending on creature location, in water, at solid ground, in air/suspended, etc
3427  // For now, just handle all the same way
3428  //if (target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT)
3429  target->SetFeignDeath(apply, GetCasterGuid(), GetId());
3430 
3431  return;
3432  }
3433  case 32096: // Thrallmar's Favor
3434  case 32098: // Honor Hold's Favor
3435  if (target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
3436  {
3437  if (apply) // cast/remove Buffbot Buff Effect
3438  target->CastSpell(target, 32172, TRIGGERED_NONE);
3439  else
3440  target->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(32172);
3441  }
3442  return;
3443  case 32567: // Green Banish State
3444  {
3445  target->SetHover(apply);
3446  return;
3447  }
3448  case 35519: // White Beam
3449  {
3450  target->SetLevitate(apply);
3451  target->SetHover(apply);
3452  return;
3453  }
3454  case 35356: // Spawn Feign Death
3455  case 35357: // Spawn Feign Death
3456  case 42557: // Feign Death
3457  case 51329: // Feign Death
3458  {
3459  // UNIT_DYNFLAG_DEAD does not appear with these spells.
3460  // All of the spells appear to be present at spawn and not used to feign in combat or similar.
3461  if (target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT)
3462  target->SetFeignDeath(apply, GetCasterGuid(), GetId(), false);
3463 
3464  return;
3465  }
3466  case 37025: // Coilfang Water
3467  {
3468  if (apply)
3469  {
3470  if (InstanceData* pInst = target->GetInstanceData())
3471  {
3472  Player* playerTarget = (Player*)target;
3473  if (pInst->CheckConditionCriteriaMeet(playerTarget, INSTANCE_CONDITION_ID_LURKER, nullptr, CONDITION_FROM_HARDCODED))
3474  {
3475  if (pInst->CheckConditionCriteriaMeet(playerTarget, INSTANCE_CONDITION_ID_SCALDING_WATER, nullptr, CONDITION_FROM_HARDCODED))
3476  playerTarget->CastSpell(playerTarget, 37284, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
3477  else
3478  {
3479  m_isPeriodic = true;
3480  m_modifier.periodictime = 2 * IN_MILLISECONDS; // Summons Coilfang Frenzy
3481  m_periodicTimer = 0;
3482  }
3483  }
3484  }
3485  return;
3486  }
3487  else
3488  target->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(37284);
3489  }
3490  case 40133: // Summon Fire Elemental
3491  {
3492  Unit* caster = GetCaster();
3493  if (!caster)
3494  return;
3495 
3496  Unit* owner = caster->GetOwner();
3497  if (owner && owner->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
3498  {
3499  if (apply)
3500  owner->CastSpell(owner, 8985, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
3501  else
3502  ((Player*)owner)->RemovePet(PET_SAVE_REAGENTS);
3503  }
3504  return;
3505  }
3506  case 40132: // Summon Earth Elemental
3507  {
3508  Unit* caster = GetCaster();
3509  if (!caster)
3510  return;
3511 
3512  Unit* owner = caster->GetOwner();
3513  if (owner && owner->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
3514  {
3515  if (apply)
3516  owner->CastSpell(owner, 19704, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
3517  else
3518  ((Player*)owner)->RemovePet(PET_SAVE_REAGENTS);
3519  }
3520  return;
3521  }
3522  case 42515: // Jarl Beam
3523  {
3524  // aura animate dead (fainted) state for the duration, but we need to animate the death itself (correct way below?)
3525  if (Unit* pCaster = GetCaster())
3526  pCaster->ApplyModFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS_2, UNIT_FLAG2_FEIGN_DEATH, apply);
3527 
3528  // Beam to Zelfrax at remove
3529  if (!apply)
3530  target->CastSpell(target, 42517, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
3531  return;
3532  }
3533  case 42520: // Spirit Drained - Zul'Jin
3534  {
3535  target->SetFeignDeath(apply, GetCasterGuid(), GetId());
3536  return;
3537  }
3538  case 34719: // Fixate
3539  case 42583: // Claw Rage
3540  case 68987: // Pursuit
3541  {
3542  Unit* caster = GetCaster();
3543  if (!caster)
3544  return;
3545 
3546  if (apply)
3547  caster->FixateTarget(target);
3548  else
3549  caster->FixateTarget(nullptr);
3550 
3551  if (GetId() == 42583)
3552  {
3553  if (apply)
3554  caster->CastSpell(nullptr, 43149, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
3555  else
3556  caster->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(43149);
3557  }
3558  return;
3559  }
3560  case 43874: // Scourge Mur'gul Camp: Force Shield Arcane Purple x3
3561  target->ApplyModFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_IMMUNE_TO_PLAYER, apply);
3562  if (apply)
3563  target->addUnitState(UNIT_STAT_ROOT);
3564  return;
3565  case 47178: // Plague Effect Self
3566  target->SetFleeing(apply, GetCasterGuid(), GetId());
3567  return;
3568  case 50053: // Centrifuge Shield
3569  target->ApplyModFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_IMMUNE_TO_PLAYER, apply);
3570  target->ApplyModFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_IMMUNE_TO_NPC, apply);
3571  return;
3572  case 50241: // Evasive Charges
3573  target->ModifyAuraState(AURA_STATE_UNKNOWN22, apply);
3574  return;
3575  case 56422: // Nerubian Submerge
3576  case 70733: // Stoneform
3577  // not known if there are other things todo, only flag are confirmed valid
3578  target->ApplyModFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_UNINTERACTIBLE, apply);
3579  return;
3580  case 58204: // LK Intro VO (1)
3581  if (target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
3582  {
3583  // Play part 1
3584  if (apply)
3585  target->PlayDirectSound(14970, PlayPacketParameters(PLAY_TARGET, (Player*)target));
3586  // continue in 58205
3587  else
3588  target->CastSpell(target, 58205, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
3589  }
3590  return;
3591  case 58205: // LK Intro VO (2)
3592  if (target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
3593  {
3594  // Play part 2
3595  if (apply)
3596  target->PlayDirectSound(14971, PlayPacketParameters(PLAY_TARGET, (Player*)target));
3597  // Play part 3
3598  else
3599  target->PlayDirectSound(14972, PlayPacketParameters(PLAY_TARGET, (Player*)target));
3600  }
3601  return;
3602  case 27978:
3603  case 40131:
3604  if (apply)
3605  target->m_AuraFlags |= UNIT_AURAFLAG_ALIVE_INVISIBLE;
3606  else
3607  target->m_AuraFlags &= ~UNIT_AURAFLAG_ALIVE_INVISIBLE;
3608  return;
3609  case 66936: // Submerge
3610  case 66948: // Submerge
3611  if (apply)
3612  target->CastSpell(target, 66969, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
3613  else
3614  target->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(66969);
3615  return;
3616  }
3617  break;
3618  }
3619  case SPELLFAMILY_MAGE:
3620  break;
3621  case SPELLFAMILY_WARLOCK:
3622  {
3623  // Haunt
3624  if (GetSpellProto()->SpellIconID == 3172 && (GetSpellProto()->SpellFamilyFlags & uint64(0x0004000000000000)))
3625  {
3626  // NOTE: for avoid use additional field damage stored in dummy value (replace unused 100%
3627  if (apply)
3628  m_modifier.m_amount = 0; // use value as damage counter instead redundant 100% percent
3629  else
3630  {
3631  int32 bp0 = m_modifier.m_amount;
3632 
3633  if (Unit* caster = GetCaster())
3634  target->CastCustomSpell(caster, 48210, &bp0, nullptr, nullptr, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, nullptr, this);
3635  }
3636  }
3637  break;
3638  }
3639  case SPELLFAMILY_DRUID:
3640  {
3641  switch (GetId())
3642  {
3643  case 52610: // Savage Roar
3644  {
3645  if (apply)
3646  {
3647  if (target->GetShapeshiftForm() != FORM_CAT)
3648  return;
3649 
3650  target->CastSpell(target, 62071, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
3651  }
3652  else
3653  target->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(62071);
3654  return;
3655  }
3656  case 61336: // Survival Instincts
3657  {
3658  if (apply)
3659  {
3660  if (!target->IsNoWeaponShapeShift())
3661  return;
3662 
3663  int32 bp0 = int32(target->GetMaxHealth() * m_modifier.m_amount / 100);
3664  target->CastCustomSpell(target, 50322, &bp0, nullptr, nullptr, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
3665  }
3666  else
3667  target->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(50322);
3668  return;
3669  }
3670  }
3671  // Lifebloom
3672  if (GetSpellProto()->SpellFamilyFlags & uint64(0x1000000000))
3673  {
3674  if (apply)
3675  {
3676  if (Unit* caster = GetCaster())
3677  {
3678  // prevent double apply bonuses
3679  if (target->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER || !((Player*)target)->GetSession()->PlayerLoading())
3680  {
3681  m_modifier.m_amount = caster->SpellHealingBonusDone(target, GetSpellProto(), m_modifier.m_amount, SPELL_DIRECT_DAMAGE);
3682  m_modifier.m_amount = target->SpellHealingBonusTaken(caster, GetSpellProto(), m_modifier.m_amount, SPELL_DIRECT_DAMAGE);
3683  }
3684  }
3685  }
3686  else
3687  {
3688  // Final heal on duration end
3689  if (m_removeMode != AURA_REMOVE_BY_EXPIRE && m_removeMode != AURA_REMOVE_BY_DISPEL)
3690  return;
3691 
3692  // final heal
3693  if (target->IsInWorld())
3694  {
3695  int32 amount = m_modifier.m_amount;
3696  target->CastCustomSpell(nullptr, 33778, &amount, nullptr, nullptr, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, nullptr, this, GetCasterGuid());
3697 
3698  if (Unit* caster = GetCaster())
3699  {
3700  int32 returnmana = (GetSpellProto()->ManaCostPercentage * caster->GetCreateMana() / 100) * GetStackAmount() / 2;
3701  caster->CastCustomSpell(caster, 64372, &returnmana, nullptr, nullptr, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, nullptr, this, GetCasterGuid());
3702  }
3703  }
3704  }
3705  return;
3706  }
3707 
3708  // Improved Moonkin Form
3709  if (GetSpellProto()->SpellIconID == 2855)
3710  {
3711  uint32 spell_id;
3712  switch (GetId())
3713  {
3714  case 48384: spell_id = 50170; break; // Rank 1
3715  case 48395: spell_id = 50171; break; // Rank 2
3716  case 48396: spell_id = 50172; break; // Rank 3
3717  default:
3718  sLog.outError("HandleAuraDummy: Not handled rank of IMF (Spell: %u)", GetId());
3719  return;
3720  }
3721 
3722  if (apply)
3723  {
3724  if (target->GetShapeshiftForm() != FORM_MOONKIN)
3725  return;
3726 
3727  target->CastSpell(target, spell_id, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
3728  }
3729  else
3730  target->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(spell_id);
3731  return;
3732  }
3733  break;
3734  }
3735  case SPELLFAMILY_ROGUE:
3736  switch (GetId())
3737  {
3738  case 57934: // Tricks of the Trade, main spell
3739  {
3740  if (apply)
3741  GetHolder()->SetAuraCharges(1); // not have proper charges set in spell data
3742  else
3743  {
3744  // used for direct in code aura removes and spell proc event charges expire
3745  if (m_removeMode != AURA_REMOVE_BY_DEFAULT)
3746  target->getHostileRefManager().ResetThreatRedirection(57934);
3747  }
3748  return;
3749  }
3750  }
3751  break;
3752  case SPELLFAMILY_HUNTER:
3753  {
3754  switch (GetId())
3755  {
3756  case 34477: // Misdirection, main spell
3757  {
3758  if (apply)
3759  GetHolder()->SetAuraCharges(1); // not have proper charges set in spell data
3760  else
3761  {
3762  // used for direct in code aura removes and spell proc event charges expire
3763  if (m_removeMode != AURA_REMOVE_BY_DEFAULT)
3764  {
3765  if (Unit* misdirectTarget = target->getHostileRefManager().GetThreatRedirectionTarget(34477))
3766  misdirectTarget->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(35079);
3767  target->getHostileRefManager().ResetThreatRedirection(34477);
3768  }
3769  }
3770  return;
3771  }
3772  }
3773  break;
3774  }
3775  case SPELLFAMILY_PALADIN:
3776  switch (GetId())
3777  {
3778  case 20911: // Blessing of Sanctuary
3779  case 25899: // Greater Blessing of Sanctuary
3780  {
3781  if (apply)
3782  target->CastSpell(target, 67480, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, nullptr, this);
3783  else
3784  target->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(67480);
3785  return;
3786  }
3787  }
3788  break;
3789  case SPELLFAMILY_DEATHKNIGHT:
3790  switch (GetId())
3791  {
3792  // Raise ally
3793  case 46619:
3794  {
3795  // at this point the ghoul is already spawned
3796  Unit* caster = GetCaster();
3797  if (!caster || caster->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
3798  return;
3799 
3800  Player* player = static_cast<Player*>(caster);
3801 
3802  if (apply)
3803  {
3804  player->SetGhouled(true);
3805  }
3806  else
3807  {
3808  player->SetGhouled(false);
3809 
3810  // this will reset death timer in the client
3811  WorldPacket data(SMSG_FORCED_DEATH_UPDATE);
3812  player->GetSession()->SendPacket(data);
3813  player->ResetDeathTimer();
3814  }
3815  }
3816  }
3817  break;
3818  case SPELLFAMILY_PRIEST:
3819  {
3820  switch (GetId())
3821  {
3822  case 36414: // Focused Bursts
3823  case 38985:
3824  {
3825  if (apply)
3826  target->clearUnitState(UNIT_STAT_MELEE_ATTACKING);
3827  else
3828  target->addUnitState(UNIT_STAT_MELEE_ATTACKING);
3829  return;
3830  }
3831  }
3832  break;
3833  }
3834  }
3835 
3836  // pet auras
3837  if (PetAura const* petSpell = sSpellMgr.GetPetAura(GetId(), m_effIndex))
3838  {
3839  if (apply)
3840  target->AddPetAura(petSpell);
3841  else
3842  target->RemovePetAura(petSpell);
3843  return;
3844  }
3845 
3846  if (target->IsBoarded() && target->GetTransportInfo()->IsOnVehicle())
3847  {
3848  if (IsSpellHaveAura(GetSpellProto(), SPELL_AURA_CONTROL_VEHICLE))
3849  {
3850  // TODO maybe move GetVehicleInfo() to WorldObject class
3851  auto vehicle = static_cast<Unit*>(target->GetTransportInfo()->GetTransport());
3852  auto vehicleInfo = vehicle->GetVehicleInfo();
3853 
3854  if (!apply)
3855  {
3856  //sLog.outString("Unboarding %s %s from %s %s", target->GetName(), target->GetGuidStr().c_str(), vehicle->GetName(), vehicle->GetGuidStr().c_str());
3857  vehicleInfo->UnBoard(target, false);
3858  }
3859  }
3860  }
3861 
3862  if (target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
3863  {
3864  SpellAreaForAreaMapBounds saBounds = sSpellMgr.GetSpellAreaForAuraMapBounds(GetId());
3865  if (saBounds.first != saBounds.second)
3866  {
3867  uint32 zone, area;
3868  target->GetZoneAndAreaId(zone, area);
3869  std::set<uint32> appliedSpells;
3870  std::set<uint32> removedSpells;
3871 
3872  Player* player = static_cast<Player*>(target);
3873 
3874  // custom loop for evaluation reasons
3875  for (SpellAreaForAreaMap::const_iterator itr = saBounds.first; itr != saBounds.second; ++itr)
3876  {
3877  auto data = (*itr).second;
3878  uint32 spellId = data->spellId;
3879  // one success trumps multiple failures
3880  if (appliedSpells.find(spellId) != appliedSpells.end())
3881  continue;
3882 
3883  if (data->IsFitToRequirements(player, zone, area))
3884  {
3885  if (data->autocast && !player->HasAura(spellId))
3886  {
3887  appliedSpells.insert(spellId);
3888  removedSpells.erase(spellId);
3889  }
3890  }
3891  else if (player->HasAura(spellId))
3892  removedSpells.insert(spellId);
3893  }
3894 
3895  for (auto spellId : appliedSpells)
3896  player->CastSpell(player, spellId, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
3897 
3898  for (auto spellId : removedSpells)
3899  player->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(spellId);
3900  }
3901  }
3902 
3903  // script has to "handle with care", only use where data are not ok to use in the above code.
3904  if (target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT)
3905  sScriptDevAIMgr.OnAuraDummy(this, apply);
3906 }
3907 
3908 void Aura::HandleAuraMounted(bool apply, bool Real)
3909 {
3910  // only at real add/remove aura
3911  if (!Real)
3912  return;
3913 
3914  Unit* target = GetTarget();
3915 
3916  if (apply)
3917  {
3918  CreatureInfo const* ci = ObjectMgr::GetCreatureTemplate(m_modifier.m_miscvalue);
3919  if (!ci)
3920  {
3921  sLog.outErrorDb("AuraMounted: `creature_template`='%u' not found in database (only need it modelid)", m_modifier.m_miscvalue);
3922  return;
3923  }
3924 
3925  uint32 display_id = Creature::ChooseDisplayId(ci);
3926  CreatureModelInfo const* minfo = sObjectMgr.GetCreatureModelRandomGender(display_id);
3927  if (minfo)
3928  display_id = minfo->modelid;
3929 
3930  m_modifier.m_amount = display_id;
3931 
3932  target->Mount(display_id, this);
3933 
3934  if (ci->VehicleTemplateId)
3935  {
3936  target->SetVehicleId(ci->VehicleTemplateId, ci->Entry);
3937 
3938  if (target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
3939  target->SetFlag(UNIT_NPC_FLAGS, UNIT_NPC_FLAG_PLAYER_VEHICLE);
3940  }
3941  }
3942  else
3943  {
3944  target->Unmount(this);
3945 
3946  CreatureInfo const* ci = ObjectMgr::GetCreatureTemplate(m_modifier.m_miscvalue);
3947  if (ci && target->IsVehicle() && ci->VehicleTemplateId == target->GetVehicleInfo()->GetVehicleEntry()->m_ID)
3948  {
3949  if (target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
3950  target->RemoveFlag(UNIT_NPC_FLAGS, UNIT_NPC_FLAG_PLAYER_VEHICLE);
3951 
3952  target->SetVehicleId(0, 0);
3953  }
3954  }
3955 }
3956 
3957 void Aura::HandleAuraWaterWalk(bool apply, bool Real)
3958 {
3959  // only at real add/remove aura
3960  if (!Real)
3961  return;
3962 
3963  GetTarget()->SetWaterWalk(apply);
3964 }
3965 
3966 void Aura::HandleAuraFeatherFall(bool apply, bool Real)
3967 {
3968  // only at real add/remove aura
3969  if (!Real)
3970  return;
3971 
3972  GetTarget()->SetFeatherFall(apply);
3973 }
3974 
3975 void Aura::HandleAuraHover(bool apply, bool Real)
3976 {
3977  // only at real add/remove aura
3978  if (!Real)
3979  return;
3980 
3981  GetTarget()->SetHover(apply);
3982 }
3983 
3984 void Aura::HandleWaterBreathing(bool apply, bool /*Real*/)
3985 {
3986  Unit* target = GetTarget();
3987 
3988  if (target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
3989  {
3990  if (apply || target->HasAuraType(SPELL_AURA_WATER_BREATHING))
3991  static_cast<Player*>(target)->SetWaterBreathingIntervalMultiplier(0);
3992  else
3993  static_cast<Player*>(target)->SetWaterBreathingIntervalMultiplier(target->GetTotalAuraMultiplier(SPELL_AURA_MOD_WATER_BREATHING));
3994  }
3995 }
3996 
3997 void Aura::HandleModWaterBreathing(bool /*apply*/, bool /*Real*/)
3998 {
3999  Unit* target = GetTarget();
4000 
4001  if (target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
4002  static_cast<Player*>(target)->SetWaterBreathingIntervalMultiplier(target->GetTotalAuraMultiplier(SPELL_AURA_MOD_WATER_BREATHING));
4003 }
4004 
4005 void Aura::HandleAuraModShapeshift(bool apply, bool Real)
4006 {
4007  if (!Real)
4008  return;
4009 
4010  ShapeshiftForm form = ShapeshiftForm(m_modifier.m_miscvalue);
4011 
4012  SpellShapeshiftFormEntry const* ssEntry = sSpellShapeshiftFormStore.LookupEntry(form);
4013  if (!ssEntry)
4014  {
4015  sLog.outError("Unknown shapeshift form %u in spell %u", form, GetId());
4016  return;
4017  }
4018 
4019  Unit* target = GetTarget();
4020 
4021  uint32 displayId = 0;
4022  if (ssEntry->modelID_A)
4023  {
4024  // i will asume that creatures will always take the defined model from the dbc
4025  // since no field in creature_templates describes wether an alliance or
4026  // horde modelid should be used at shapeshifting
4027  if (target->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
4028  displayId = ssEntry->modelID_A;
4029  else
4030  {
4031  // players are a bit different since the dbc has seldomly an horde modelid
4032  if (Player::TeamForRace(target->getRace()) == HORDE)
4033  {
4034  if (ssEntry->modelID_H)
4035  displayId = ssEntry->modelID_H; // 3.2.3 only the moonkin form has this information
4036  else // get model for race
4037  displayId = sObjectMgr.GetModelForRace(ssEntry->modelID_A, target->getRaceMask());
4038  }
4039 
4040  // nothing found in above, so use default
4041  if (!displayId)
4042  displayId = ssEntry->modelID_A;
4043  }
4044  }
4045 
4046  if (uint32 overrideDisplayId = GetAuraScriptCustomizationValue()) // from script
4047  displayId = overrideDisplayId;
4048 
4049  switch (GetId())
4050  {
4051  case 35200: // Roc Form
4052  displayId = 4877;
4053  break;
4054  }
4055 
4056  // remove polymorph before changing display id to keep new display id
4057  switch (form)
4058  {
4059  case FORM_CAT:
4060  case FORM_TREE:
4061  case FORM_TRAVEL:
4062  case FORM_AQUA:
4063  case FORM_BEAR:
4064  case FORM_DIREBEAR:
4065  case FORM_FLIGHT_EPIC:
4066  case FORM_FLIGHT:
4067  case FORM_MOONKIN:
4068  {
4069  // remove movement affects
4070  target->RemoveSpellsCausingAura(SPELL_AURA_MOD_ROOT, GetHolder(), true);
4071  Unit::AuraList const& slowingAuras = target->GetAurasByType(SPELL_AURA_MOD_DECREASE_SPEED);
4072  for (Unit::AuraList::const_iterator iter = slowingAuras.begin(); iter != slowingAuras.end();)
4073  {
4074  SpellEntry const* aurSpellInfo = (*iter)->GetSpellProto();
4075 
4076  uint32 aurMechMask = GetAllSpellMechanicMask(aurSpellInfo);
4077 
4078  if (aurMechMask == 0) // all shapeshift removing spells have some mechanic mask. 33572 and 38132 confirmed not removed on poly
4079  {
4080  ++iter;
4081  continue;
4082  }
4083 
4084  // If spell that caused this aura has Croud Control or Daze effect
4085  if ((aurMechMask & MECHANIC_NOT_REMOVED_BY_SHAPESHIFT) ||
4086  // some Daze spells have these parameters instead of MECHANIC_DAZE (skip snare spells)
4087  (aurSpellInfo->SpellIconID == 15 && aurSpellInfo->Dispel == 0 &&
4088  (aurMechMask & (1 << (MECHANIC_SNARE - 1))) == 0))
4089  {
4090  ++iter;
4091  continue;
4092  }
4093 
4094  // All OK, remove aura now
4095  target->RemoveAurasDueToSpellByCancel(aurSpellInfo->Id);
4096  iter = slowingAuras.begin();
4097  }
4098 
4099  target->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(16591); // Patch 2.0.1 - Shapeshifting removes Noggenfogger elixir
4100  //no break here
4101  break;
4102  }
4103  case FORM_DEFENSIVESTANCE:
4104  {
4105  // disable threat aura of Defiance talent when not in defensive stance
4106  SpellAuraHolder* defianceHolder = target->GetSpellAuraHolder(12303);
4107  if (!defianceHolder)
4108  defianceHolder = target->GetSpellAuraHolder(12788);
4109  if (!defianceHolder)
4110  defianceHolder = target->GetSpellAuraHolder(12789);
4111  if (defianceHolder)
4112  {
4113  if (Aura* threatAura = defianceHolder->m_auras[0])
4114  {
4115  threatAura->GetModifier()->m_amount = apply ? threatAura->GetModifier()->m_baseAmount : 0;
4116  for (int8 x = 0; x < MAX_SPELL_SCHOOL; ++x)
4117  if (threatAura->GetModifier()->m_miscvalue & int32(1 << x))
4118  ApplyPercentModFloatVar(target->m_threatModifier[x], float(threatAura->GetModifier()->m_baseAmount), apply);
4119  }
4120  }
4121  break;
4122  }
4123  default:
4124  break;
4125  }
4126 
4127  if (apply)
4128  {
4129  Powers PowerType = POWER_MANA;
4130 
4131  // remove other shapeshift before applying a new one
4132  target->RemoveSpellsCausingAura(SPELL_AURA_MOD_SHAPESHIFT, GetHolder());
4133 
4134  if (displayId > 0)
4135  target->SetDisplayId(displayId);
4136 
4137  // now only powertype must be set
4138  switch (form)
4139  {
4140  case FORM_CAT:
4141  PowerType = POWER_ENERGY;
4142  break;
4143  case FORM_BEAR:
4144  case FORM_DIREBEAR:
4145  case FORM_BATTLESTANCE:
4146  case FORM_BERSERKERSTANCE:
4147  case FORM_DEFENSIVESTANCE:
4148  PowerType = POWER_RAGE;
4149  break;
4150  default:
4151  break;
4152  }
4153 
4154  if (PowerType != POWER_MANA)
4155  {
4156  // reset power to default values only at power change
4157  if (target->GetPowerType() != PowerType)
4158  target->SetPowerType(PowerType);
4159 
4160  switch (form)
4161  {
4162  case FORM_BATTLESTANCE:
4163  case FORM_DEFENSIVESTANCE:
4164  case FORM_BERSERKERSTANCE:
4165  {
4166  ShapeshiftForm previousForm = target->GetShapeshiftForm();
4167  uint32 remainingRage = 0;
4168  if (previousForm == FORM_DEFENSIVESTANCE)
4169  if (Aura* aura = target->GetOverrideScript(831))
4170  remainingRage += aura->GetModifier()->m_amount * 10;
4171  // Stance mastery + Tactical mastery (both passive, and last have aura only in defense stance, but need apply at any stance switch)
4172  if (target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
4173  {
4174  PlayerSpellMap const& sp_list = ((Player*)target)->GetSpellMap();
4175  for (const auto& itr : sp_list)
4176  {
4177  if (itr.second.state == PLAYERSPELL_REMOVED)
4178  continue;
4179 
4180  SpellEntry const* spellInfo = sSpellTemplate.LookupEntry<SpellEntry>(itr.first);
4181  if (spellInfo && spellInfo->SpellFamilyName == SPELLFAMILY_WARRIOR && spellInfo->SpellIconID == 139)
4182  remainingRage += target->CalculateSpellEffectValue(target, spellInfo, EFFECT_INDEX_0) * 10;
4183  }
4184  }
4185 
4186  if (target->GetPower(POWER_RAGE) > remainingRage)
4187  target->SetPower(POWER_RAGE, remainingRage);
4188  break;
4189  }
4190  default:
4191  break;
4192  }
4193  }
4194 
4195  target->SetShapeshiftForm(form);
4196 
4197  // a form can give the player a new castbar with some spells.. this is a clientside process..
4198  // serverside just needs to register the new spells so that player isn't kicked as cheater
4199  if (target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
4200  for (unsigned int i : ssEntry->spellId)
4201  if (i)
4202  ((Player*)target)->addSpell(i, true, false, false, false);
4203 
4204  target->RemoveAurasWithInterruptFlags(AURA_INTERRUPT_FLAG_SHAPESHIFTING);
4205  }
4206  else
4207  {
4208  target->RestoreDisplayId();
4209 
4210  if (target->getClass() == CLASS_DRUID)
4211  target->SetPowerType(POWER_MANA);
4212 
4213  target->SetShapeshiftForm(FORM_NONE);
4214 
4215  switch (form)
4216  {
4217  // Nordrassil Harness - bonus
4218  case FORM_BEAR:
4219  case FORM_DIREBEAR:
4220  case FORM_CAT:
4221  if (Aura* dummy = target->GetDummyAura(37315))
4222  target->CastSpell(target, 37316, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, nullptr, dummy);
4223  break;
4224  // Nordrassil Regalia - bonus
4225  case FORM_MOONKIN:
4226  if (Aura* dummy = target->GetDummyAura(37324))
4227  target->CastSpell(target, 37325, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, nullptr, dummy);
4228  break;
4229  default:
4230  break;
4231  }
4232 
4233  // look at the comment in apply-part
4234  if (target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
4235  for (unsigned int i : ssEntry->spellId)
4236  if (i)
4237  ((Player*)target)->removeSpell(i, false, false, false);
4238  }
4239 
4240  // adding/removing linked auras
4241  // add/remove the shapeshift aura's boosts
4242  HandleShapeshiftBoosts(apply);
4243 
4244  if (target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
4245  ((Player*)target)->InitDataForForm();
4246 
4247  if (apply)
4248  {
4249  switch (form)
4250  {
4251  case FORM_CAT: // need to cast Track Humanoids if no other tracking is on
4252  if (target->HasSpell(5225) && !target->HasAura(2383) && !target->HasAura(2580))
4253  target->CastSpell(nullptr, 5225, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
4254  // no break
4255  case FORM_BEAR:
4256  case FORM_DIREBEAR:
4257  {
4258  // get furor proc chance
4259  int32 furorChance = 0;
4260  Unit::AuraList const& mDummy = target->GetAurasByType(SPELL_AURA_DUMMY);
4261  for (auto i : mDummy)
4262  {
4263  if (i->GetSpellProto()->SpellIconID == 238)
4264  {
4265  furorChance = i->GetModifier()->m_amount;
4266  break;
4267  }
4268  }
4269 
4270  if (m_modifier.m_miscvalue == FORM_CAT)
4271  {
4272  // Furor chance is now amount allowed to save energy for cat form
4273  // without talent it reset to 0
4274  if ((int32)target->GetPower(POWER_ENERGY) > furorChance)
4275  {
4276  target->SetPower(POWER_ENERGY, 0);
4277  target->CastCustomSpell(target, 17099, &furorChance, nullptr, nullptr, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, nullptr, this);
4278  }
4279  }
4280  else if (furorChance) // only if talent known
4281  {
4282  target->SetPower(POWER_RAGE, 0);
4283  if (irand(1, 100) <= furorChance)
4284  target->CastSpell(target, 17057, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, nullptr, this);
4285  }
4286  break;
4287  }
4288  default:
4289  break;
4290  }
4291  }
4292 }
4293 
4294 void Aura::HandleAuraTransform(bool apply, bool Real)
4295 {
4296  Unit* target = GetTarget();
4297  bool skipDisplayUpdate = false;
4298  if (apply)
4299  {
4300  if (uint32 overrideDisplayId = GetAuraScriptCustomizationValue()) // from script
4301  m_modifier.m_amount = overrideDisplayId;
4302  // special case (spell specific functionality)
4303  else if (m_modifier.m_miscvalue == 0)
4304  {
4305  switch (GetId())
4306  {
4307  case 42365: // Murloc costume
4308  m_modifier.m_amount = 21723;
4309  break;
4310  // case 44186: // Gossip NPC Appearance - All, Brewfest
4311  // break;
4312  // case 48305: // Gossip NPC Appearance - All, Spirit of Competition
4313  // break;
4314  case 50517: // Dread Corsair
4315  case 51926: // Corsair Costume
4316  {
4317  // expected for players
4318  uint32 race = target->getRace();
4319 
4320  switch (race)
4321  {
4322  case RACE_HUMAN:
4323  m_modifier.m_amount = target->getGender() == GENDER_MALE ? 25037 : 25048;
4324  break;
4325  case RACE_ORC:
4326  m_modifier.m_amount = target->getGender() == GENDER_MALE ? 25039 : 25050;
4327  break;
4328  case RACE_DWARF:
4329  m_modifier.m_amount = target->getGender() == GENDER_MALE ? 25034 : 25045;
4330  break;
4331  case RACE_NIGHTELF:
4332  m_modifier.m_amount = target->getGender() == GENDER_MALE ? 25038 : 25049;
4333  break;
4334  case RACE_UNDEAD:
4335  m_modifier.m_amount = target->getGender() == GENDER_MALE ? 25042 : 25053;
4336  break;
4337  case RACE_TAUREN:
4338  m_modifier.m_amount = target->getGender() == GENDER_MALE ? 25040 : 25051;
4339  break;
4340  case RACE_GNOME:
4341  m_modifier.m_amount = target->getGender() == GENDER_MALE ? 25035 : 25046;
4342  break;
4343  case RACE_TROLL:
4344  m_modifier.m_amount = target->getGender() == GENDER_MALE ? 25041 : 25052;
4345  break;
4346  case RACE_GOBLIN: // not really player race (3.x), but model exist
4347  m_modifier.m_amount = target->getGender() == GENDER_MALE ? 25036 : 25047;
4348  break;
4349  case RACE_BLOODELF:
4350  m_modifier.m_amount = target->getGender() == GENDER_MALE ? 25032 : 25043;
4351  break;
4352  case RACE_DRAENEI:
4353  m_modifier.m_amount = target->getGender() == GENDER_MALE ? 25033 : 25044;
4354  break;
4355  }
4356  break;
4357  }
4358  // case 50531: // Gossip NPC Appearance - All, Pirate Day
4359  // break;
4360  // case 51010: // Dire Brew
4361  // break;
4362  // case 53806: // Pygmy Oil
4363  // break;
4364  // case 62847: // NPC Appearance - Valiant 02
4365  // break;
4366  // case 62852: // NPC Appearance - Champion 01
4367  // break;
4368  // case 63965: // NPC Appearance - Champion 02
4369  // break;
4370  // case 63966: // NPC Appearance - Valiant 03
4371  // break;
4372  case 65386: // Honor the Dead
4373  case 65495:
4374  {
4375  switch (target->getGender())
4376  {
4377  case GENDER_MALE:
4378  m_modifier.m_amount = 29203; // Chapman
4379  break;
4380  case GENDER_FEMALE:
4381  case GENDER_NONE:
4382  m_modifier.m_amount = 29204; // Catrina
4383  break;
4384  }
4385  }
4386  // case 65511: // Gossip NPC Appearance - Brewfest
4387  // break;
4388  // case 65522: // Gossip NPC Appearance - Winter Veil
4389  // break;
4390  // case 65523: // Gossip NPC Appearance - Default
4391  // break;
4392  // case 65524: // Gossip NPC Appearance - Lunar Festival
4393  // break;
4394  // case 65525: // Gossip NPC Appearance - Hallow's End
4395  // break;
4396  // case 65526: // Gossip NPC Appearance - Midsummer
4397  // break;
4398  // case 65527: // Gossip NPC Appearance - Spirit of Competition
4399  // break;
4400  case 65528: // Gossip NPC Appearance - Pirates' Day
4401  {
4402  // expecting npc's using this spell to have models with race info.
4403  // random gender, regardless of current gender
4404  switch (target->getRace())
4405  {
4406  case RACE_HUMAN:
4407  m_modifier.m_amount = roll_chance_i(50) ? 25037 : 25048;
4408  break;
4409  case RACE_ORC:
4410  m_modifier.m_amount = roll_chance_i(50) ? 25039 : 25050;
4411  break;
4412  case RACE_DWARF:
4413  m_modifier.m_amount = roll_chance_i(50) ? 25034 : 25045;
4414  break;
4415  case RACE_NIGHTELF:
4416  m_modifier.m_amount = roll_chance_i(50) ? 25038 : 25049;
4417  break;
4418  case RACE_UNDEAD:
4419  m_modifier.m_amount = roll_chance_i(50) ? 25042 : 25053;
4420  break;
4421  case RACE_TAUREN:
4422  m_modifier.m_amount = roll_chance_i(50) ? 25040 : 25051;
4423  break;
4424  case RACE_GNOME:
4425  m_modifier.m_amount = roll_chance_i(50) ? 25035 : 25046;
4426  break;
4427  case RACE_TROLL:
4428  m_modifier.m_amount = roll_chance_i(50) ? 25041 : 25052;
4429  break;
4430  case RACE_GOBLIN:
4431  m_modifier.m_amount = roll_chance_i(50) ? 25036 : 25047;
4432  break;
4433  case RACE_BLOODELF:
4434  m_modifier.m_amount = roll_chance_i(50) ? 25032 : 25043;
4435  break;
4436  case RACE_DRAENEI:
4437  m_modifier.m_amount = roll_chance_i(50) ? 25033 : 25044;
4438  break;
4439  }
4440 
4441  break;
4442  }
4443  case 65529: // Gossip NPC Appearance - Day of the Dead (DotD)
4444  // random, regardless of current gender
4445  m_modifier.m_amount = roll_chance_i(50) ? 29203 : 29204;
4446  break;
4447  // case 66236: // Incinerate Flesh
4448  // break;
4449  // case 69999: // [DND] Swap IDs
4450  // break;
4451  // case 70764: // Citizen Costume (note: many spells w/same name)
4452  // break;
4453  // case 71309: // [DND] Spawn Portal
4454  // break;
4455  case 71450: // Crown Parcel Service Uniform
4456  m_modifier.m_amount = target->getGender() == GENDER_MALE ? 31002 : 31003;
4457  break;
4458  // case 75531: // Gnomeregan Pride
4459  // break;
4460  // case 75532: // Darkspear Pride
4461  // break;
4462  default:
4463  if (!m_modifier.m_amount) // can be set through script
4464  sLog.outError("Aura::HandleAuraTransform, spell %u does not have creature entry defined, need custom defined model.", GetId());
4465  break;
4466  }
4467  }
4468  else // m_modifier.m_amount != 0
4469  {
4470  CreatureInfo const* cInfo = ObjectMgr::GetCreatureTemplate(m_modifier.m_miscvalue);
4471  if (!cInfo)
4472  {
4473  m_modifier.m_amount = 16358; // pig pink ^_^
4474  sLog.outError("Auras: unknown creature id = %d (only need its modelid) Form Spell Aura Transform in Spell ID = %d", m_modifier.m_amount, GetId());
4475  }
4476  else
4477  m_modifier.m_amount = Creature::ChooseDisplayId(cInfo); // Will use the default model here
4478 
4479  // creature case, need to update equipment if additional provided
4480  if (cInfo && target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT)
4481  {
4482  skipDisplayUpdate = ((Creature*)target)->IsTotem();
4483  ((Creature*)target)->LoadEquipment(cInfo->EquipmentTemplateId, false);
4484  }
4485  }
4486 
4487  if (!skipDisplayUpdate)
4488  target->SetDisplayId(m_modifier.m_amount);
4489 
4490  // polymorph case
4491  if (Real && GetSpellProto()->Mechanic == MECHANIC_POLYMORPH)
4492  {
4493  if (target->IsMounted())
4494  {
4495  if (target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
4496  target->RemoveSpellsCausingAura(SPELL_AURA_MOUNTED, GetHolder());
4497  else // dismount polymorphed creature target (after patch 2.4.2)
4498  target->Unmount();
4499  }
4500  }
4501  }
4502  else // !apply
4503  {
4504  // ApplyModifier(true) will reapply it if need
4505  target->RestoreDisplayId();
4506 
4507  // apply default equipment for creature case
4508  bool restoreEquip = true;
4509  switch (GetId())
4510  {
4511  case 42594: case 42606: case 42607: case 42608: restoreEquip = false; break;
4512  default: break;
4513  }
4514  if (target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT && restoreEquip)
4515  static_cast<Creature*>(target)->LoadEquipment(static_cast<Creature*>(target)->GetCreatureInfo()->EquipmentTemplateId, true);
4516  }
4517 }
4518 
4519 void Aura::HandleForceReaction(bool apply, bool Real)
4520 {
4521  if (GetTarget()->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
4522  return;
4523 
4524  if (!Real)
4525  return;
4526 
4527  Player* player = (Player*)GetTarget();
4528 
4529  uint32 faction_id = m_modifier.m_miscvalue;
4530  ReputationRank faction_rank = ReputationRank(m_modifier.m_amount);
4531 
4532  player->GetReputationMgr().ApplyForceReaction(faction_id, faction_rank, apply);
4533  player->GetReputationMgr().SendForceReactions();
4534 
4535  // stop fighting if at apply forced rank friendly or at remove real rank friendly
4536  if ((apply && faction_rank >= REP_FRIENDLY) || (!apply && player->GetReputationRank(faction_id) >= REP_FRIENDLY))
4537  player->StopAttackFaction(faction_id);
4538 }
4539 
4540 void Aura::HandleAuraModSkill(bool apply, bool /*Real*/)
4541 {
4542  if (GetTarget()->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
4543  return;
4544 
4545  Player* target = static_cast<Player*>(GetTarget());
4546 
4547  Modifier const* mod = GetModifier();
4548  const uint16 skillId = uint16(GetSpellProto()->EffectMiscValue[m_effIndex]);
4549  const int16 amount = int16(mod->m_amount);
4550  const bool permanent = (mod->m_auraname == SPELL_AURA_MOD_SKILL_TALENT);
4551 
4552  target->ModifySkillBonus(skillId, (apply ? amount : -amount), permanent);
4553 }
4554 
4555 void Aura::HandleChannelDeathItem(bool apply, bool Real)
4556 {
4557  if (Real && !apply)
4558  {
4559  if (m_removeMode != AURA_REMOVE_BY_DEATH)
4560  return;
4561  // Item amount
4562  if (m_modifier.m_amount <= 0)
4563  return;
4564 
4565  SpellEntry const* spellInfo = GetSpellProto();
4566  if (spellInfo->EffectItemType[m_effIndex] == 0)
4567  return;
4568 
4569  Unit* victim = GetTarget();
4570  Unit* caster = GetCaster();
4571  if (!caster || caster->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
4572  return;
4573 
4574  uint32 itemType = spellInfo->EffectItemType[m_effIndex];
4575 
4576  // Soul Shard (target req.)
4577  if (itemType == 6265)
4578  {
4579  // Only from non-grey units
4580  if (!((Player*)caster)->isHonorOrXPTarget(victim))
4581  return;
4582  // Only if the creature is tapped by the player or his group
4583  if (victim->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT && !((Creature*)victim)->IsTappedBy((Player*)caster))
4584  return;
4585  // Avoid awarding multiple souls on the same target
4586  // 1.11.0: If you cast Drain Soul while shadowburn is on the victim, you will no longer receive two soul shards upon the victim's death.
4587  for (auto const& aura : victim->GetAurasByType(SPELL_AURA_CHANNEL_DEATH_ITEM))
4588  if (aura != this && caster->GetObjectGuid() == aura->GetCasterGuid() && aura->GetSpellProto()->EffectItemType[aura->GetEffIndex()] == itemType)
4589  return;
4590  }
4591 
4592  // Adding items
4593  uint32 noSpaceForCount = 0;
4594  uint32 count = m_modifier.m_amount;
4595 
4596  ItemPosCountVec dest;
4597  InventoryResult msg = ((Player*)caster)->CanStoreNewItem(NULL_BAG, NULL_SLOT, dest, itemType, count, &noSpaceForCount);
4598  if (msg != EQUIP_ERR_OK)
4599  {
4600  count -= noSpaceForCount;
4601  ((Player*)caster)->SendEquipError(msg, nullptr, nullptr, itemType);
4602  if (count == 0)
4603  return;
4604  }
4605 
4606  Item* newitem = ((Player*)caster)->StoreNewItem(dest, itemType, true);
4607  ((Player*)caster)->SendNewItem(newitem, count, true, true);
4608 
4609  // Soul Shard (glyph bonus)
4610  if (spellInfo->EffectItemType[m_effIndex] == 6265)
4611  {
4612  // Glyph of Soul Shard
4613  if (caster->HasAura(58070) && roll_chance_i(40))
4614  caster->CastSpell(caster, 58068, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, nullptr, this);
4615  }
4616  }
4617 }
4618 
4619 void Aura::HandleBindSight(bool apply, bool /*Real*/)
4620 {
4621  Unit* caster = GetCaster();
4622  if (!caster || caster->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
4623  return;
4624 
4625  Camera& camera = ((Player*)caster)->GetCamera();
4626  if (apply)
4627  camera.SetView(GetTarget());
4628  else
4629  camera.ResetView();
4630 }
4631 
4632 void Aura::HandleFarSight(bool apply, bool /*Real*/)
4633 {
4634  Unit* caster = GetCaster();
4635  if (!caster || caster->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
4636  return;
4637 
4638  Camera& camera = ((Player*)caster)->GetCamera();
4639  if (apply)
4640  camera.SetView(GetTarget());
4641  else
4642  camera.ResetView();
4643 }
4644 
4645 void Aura::HandleAuraTrackCreatures(bool apply, bool /*Real*/)
4646 {
4647  if (GetTarget()->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
4648  return;
4649 
4650  if (apply)
4651  GetTarget()->SetFlag(PLAYER_TRACK_CREATURES, uint32(1) << (m_modifier.m_miscvalue - 1));
4652  else
4653  GetTarget()->RemoveFlag(PLAYER_TRACK_CREATURES, uint32(1) << (m_modifier.m_miscvalue - 1));
4654 }
4655 
4656 void Aura::HandleAuraTrackResources(bool apply, bool /*Real*/)
4657 {
4658  if (GetTarget()->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
4659  return;
4660 
4661  if (apply)
4662  GetTarget()->SetFlag(PLAYER_TRACK_RESOURCES, uint32(1) << (m_modifier.m_miscvalue - 1));
4663  else
4664  GetTarget()->RemoveFlag(PLAYER_TRACK_RESOURCES, uint32(1) << (m_modifier.m_miscvalue - 1));
4665 }
4666 
4667 void Aura::HandleAuraTrackStealthed(bool apply, bool /*Real*/)
4668 {
4669  if (GetTarget()->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
4670  return;
4671 
4672  GetTarget()->ApplyModByteFlag(PLAYER_FIELD_BYTES, 0, PLAYER_FIELD_BYTE_TRACK_STEALTHED, apply);
4673 }
4674 
4675 void Aura::HandleAuraModScale(bool /*apply*/, bool /*Real*/)
4676 {
4677  int32 value = GetTarget()->GetTotalAuraModifier(SPELL_AURA_MOD_SCALE);
4678  int32 otherValue = GetTarget()->GetTotalAuraModifier(SPELL_AURA_MOD_SCALE_2);
4679  float scale = std::max(0.1f, float(100 + value) / 100.f * float(100 + otherValue) / 100.f);
4680  GetTarget()->SetObjectScale(scale);
4681  GetTarget()->UpdateModelData();
4682 }
4683 
4684 void Aura::HandleModPossess(bool apply, bool Real)
4685 {
4686  if (!Real)
4687  return;
4688 
4689  Unit* target = GetTarget();
4690 
4691  // not possess yourself
4692  if (GetCasterGuid() == target->GetObjectGuid())
4693  return;
4694 
4695  Unit* caster = GetCaster();
4696  if (!caster || caster->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER) // TODO:: well i know some bosses can take control of player???
4697  return;
4698 
4699  if (apply)
4700  {
4701  if (const SpellEntry* spellInfo = GetSpellProto())
4702  {
4703  switch (spellInfo->Id)
4704  {
4705  case 24937: // Using Control Console
4706  {
4707  static const uint32 spells[] = { 25026, 25024, 27759, 25027 };
4708  if (target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT)
4709  static_cast<Creature*>(target)->UpdateSpell(5, spells[urand(0, 3)]);
4710  }
4711  break;
4712  }
4713  }
4714 
4715  // Possess: advertised type of charm (unique) - remove existing advertised charm
4716  caster->BreakCharmOutgoing(true);
4717 
4718  caster->TakePossessOf(target);
4719 
4720  if (Player* playerCaster = caster->IsPlayer() ? static_cast<Player*>(caster) : nullptr)
4721  {
4722  UpdateData newData;
4723  target->BuildValuesUpdateBlockForPlayerWithFlags(newData, playerCaster, UF_FLAG_OWNER_ONLY);
4724  if (newData.HasData())
4725  {
4726  WorldPacket newDataPacket = newData.BuildPacket(0);
4727  playerCaster->SendDirectMessage(newDataPacket);
4728  }
4729  }
4730  }
4731  else
4732  {
4733  caster->Uncharm(target);
4734 
4735  // clean dummy auras from caster : TODO check if its right in all case
4736  caster->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(GetId());
4737  }
4738 
4739  if (const SpellEntry* spellInfo = GetSpellProto())
4740  {
4741  switch (spellInfo->Id)
4742  {
4743  case 24937: // Using Control Console
4744  if (!apply)
4745  {
4746  caster->CastSpell(caster, 24938, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED); // Close Control Console
4747  caster->CastSpell(caster, 27880, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED); // Stun
4748  if (target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT)
4749  {
4750  target->CastSpell(target, 3617, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED); // Quiet Suicide
4751  static_cast<Creature*>(target)->ForcedDespawn(5000);
4752  }
4753  }
4754  break;
4755  // Need to teleport to spawn position on possess end
4756  case 37868: // Arcano-Scorp Control
4757  case 37893:
4758  case 37895:
4759  if (!apply)
4760  {
4761  float x, y, z, o;
4762  Creature* creatureTarget = (Creature*)target;
4763  creatureTarget->GetRespawnCoord(x, y, z, &o);
4764  creatureTarget->NearTeleportTo(x, y, z, o);
4765  caster->InterruptSpell(CURRENT_CHANNELED_SPELL);
4766  }
4767  break;
4768  case 37748: // Teron Gorefiend - remove aura from caster when posses is removed
4769  if (!apply)
4770  {
4771  static_cast<Creature*>(target)->ForcedDespawn();
4772  caster->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(37748);
4773  }
4774  break;
4775  case 40268: // Spiritual Vengeance - Teron Gorefiend - kill player and despawn spirit
4776  if (!apply)
4777  {
4778  caster->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(40268);
4779  caster->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(40282);
4780  caster->CastSpell(nullptr, 29878, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
4781  if (target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT)
4782  static_cast<Creature*>(target)->ForcedDespawn();
4783  }
4784  break;
4785  }
4786  }
4787 }
4788 
4789 void Aura::HandleModPossessPet(bool apply, bool Real)
4790 {
4791  if (!Real)
4792  return;
4793 
4794  Unit* caster = GetCaster();
4795  if (!caster || caster->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
4796  return;
4797 
4798  Unit* target = GetTarget();
4799  if (target->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_UNIT || !static_cast<Creature*>(target)->IsPet())
4800  return;
4801 
4802  if (apply)
4803  {
4804  // Possess pet: advertised type of charm (unique) - remove existing advertised charm
4805  caster->BreakCharmOutgoing(true);
4806 
4807  caster->TakePossessOf(target);
4808  }
4809  else
4810  caster->Uncharm(target);
4811 }
4812 
4813 void Aura::HandleAuraModPetTalentsPoints(bool /*Apply*/, bool Real)
4814 {
4815  if (!Real)
4816  return;
4817 
4818  // Recalculate pet talent points
4819  if (Pet* pet = GetTarget()->GetPet())
4820  pet->InitTalentForLevel();
4821 }
4822 
4823 void Aura::HandleModCharm(bool apply, bool Real)
4824 {
4825  if (!Real)
4826  return;
4827 
4828  Unit* target = GetTarget();
4829 
4830  // not charm yourself
4831  if (GetCasterGuid() == target->GetObjectGuid())
4832  return;
4833 
4834  Unit* caster = GetCaster();
4835  if (!caster)
4836  return;
4837 
4838  Player* playerCaster = caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER ? static_cast<Player*>(caster) : nullptr;
4839 
4840  if (apply)
4841  {
4842  // Charm: normally advertised type of charm (unique), but with notable exceptions:
4843  // * Seems to be non-unique for NPCs - allows overwriting advertised charm by offloading existing one (e.g. Chromatic Mutation)
4844  // * Seems to be always unique for players - remove player's existing advertised charm (no evidence against this found yet)
4845  if (playerCaster)
4846  caster->BreakCharmOutgoing(true);
4847 
4848  caster->TakeCharmOf(target, GetId());
4849 
4850  if (playerCaster)
4851  {
4852  UpdateMask updateMask;
4853  updateMask.SetCount(target->GetValuesCount());
4854  target->MarkUpdateFieldsWithFlagForUpdate(updateMask, UF_FLAG_OWNER_ONLY);
4855  if (updateMask.HasData())
4856  {
4857  UpdateData newData;
4858  target->BuildValuesUpdateBlockForPlayer(newData, updateMask, playerCaster);
4859 
4860  if (newData.HasData())
4861  {
4862  WorldPacket newDataPacket = newData.BuildPacket(0);
4863  playerCaster->SendDirectMessage(newDataPacket);
4864  }
4865  }
4866  }
4867  }
4868  else
4869  caster->Uncharm(target, GetId());
4870 
4871  if (apply)
4872  {
4873 
4874  }
4875  else
4876  {
4877  switch (GetId())
4878  {
4879  case 30019: // Control Piece
4880  caster->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(30019);
4881  break;
4882  case 33684:
4883  if (caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT)
4884  static_cast<Creature*>(caster)->ForcedDespawn();
4885  break;
4886  }
4887  }
4888 }
4889 
4890 
4891 void Aura::HandleAoECharm(bool apply, bool Real)
4892 {
4893  if (!Real)
4894  return;
4895 
4896  Unit* target = GetTarget();
4897 
4898  // not charm yourself
4899  if (GetCasterGuid() == target->GetObjectGuid())
4900  return;
4901 
4902  Unit* caster = GetCaster();
4903  if (!caster)
4904  return;
4905 
4906  if (apply)
4907  // AoE charm: non-advertised type of charm - co-exists with other charms
4908  caster->TakeCharmOf(target, GetId(), false);
4909  else
4910  caster->Uncharm(target, GetId());
4911 }
4912 
4913 void Aura::HandleModConfuse(bool apply, bool Real)
4914 {
4915  if (!Real)
4916  return;
4917 
4918  // Do not remove it yet if more effects are up, do it for the last effect
4919  if (!apply && GetTarget()->HasAuraType(SPELL_AURA_MOD_CONFUSE))
4920  return;
4921 
4922  GetTarget()->SetConfused(apply, GetCasterGuid(), GetId());
4923 
4924  GetTarget()->getHostileRefManager().HandleSuppressed(apply);
4925 }
4926 
4927 void Aura::HandleModFear(bool apply, bool Real)
4928 {
4929  if (!Real)
4930  return;
4931 
4932  // Do not remove it yet if more effects are up, do it for the last effect
4933  if (!apply && GetTarget()->HasAuraType(SPELL_AURA_MOD_FEAR))
4934  return;
4935 
4936  GetTarget()->SetFleeing(apply, GetCasterGuid(), GetId());
4937 
4938  // 2.3.0 - fear no longer applies suppression - in case of uncomment, need to adjust IsSuppressedTarget
4939 #ifdef PRENERF_2_1
4940  GetTarget()->getHostileRefManager().HandleSuppressed(apply);
4941 #endif
4942 }
4943 
4944 void Aura::HandleFeignDeath(bool apply, bool Real)
4945 {
4946  if (!Real)
4947  return;
4948 
4949  Unit* target = GetTarget();
4950 
4951  // Do not remove it yet if more effects are up, do it for the last effect
4952  if (!apply && target->HasAuraType(SPELL_AURA_FEIGN_DEATH))
4953  return;
4954 
4955  if (apply)
4956  {
4957  bool success = true;
4958 
4959  if (target->HasFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_PLAYER_CONTROLLED))
4960  {
4961  // Players and player-controlled units do an additional success roll for this aura on application
4962  const SpellEntry* entry = GetSpellProto();
4963  const SpellSchoolMask schoolMask = GetSpellSchoolMask(entry);
4964 
4965  float resist = 0;
4966 
4967  for (auto attacker : target->getAttackers())
4968  {
4969  if (attacker && !attacker->HasFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_PLAYER_CONTROLLED))
4970  {
4971  const float chance = target->CalculateSpellMissChance(attacker, schoolMask, entry);
4972  resist = ((chance > resist) ? chance : resist);
4973  }
4974  }
4975 
4976  success = !roll_chance_f(resist);
4977  }
4978 
4979  if (success)
4980  target->InterruptSpellsCastedOnMe();
4981 
4982  target->SetFeignDeath(apply, GetCasterGuid(), GetId(), true, success);
4983  }
4984  else
4985  target->SetFeignDeath(false);
4986 }
4987 
4988 void Aura::HandleAuraModDisarm(bool apply, bool Real)
4989 {
4990  if (!Real)
4991  return;
4992 
4993  Unit* target = GetTarget();
4994 
4995  if (!apply && target->HasAuraType(GetModifier()->m_auraname))
4996  return;
4997 
4998  uint32 flags;
4999  uint32 field;
5000  WeaponAttackType attack_type;
5001 
5002  switch (GetModifier()->m_auraname)
5003  {
5004  default:
5005  case SPELL_AURA_MOD_DISARM:
5006  {
5007  field = UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS;
5008  flags = UNIT_FLAG_DISARMED;
5009  attack_type = BASE_ATTACK;
5010  break;
5011  }
5012  case SPELL_AURA_MOD_DISARM_OFFHAND:
5013  {
5014  field = UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS_2;
5015  flags = UNIT_FLAG2_DISARM_OFFHAND;
5016  attack_type = OFF_ATTACK;
5017  break;
5018  }
5019  case SPELL_AURA_MOD_DISARM_RANGED:
5020  {
5021  field = UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS_2;
5022  flags = UNIT_FLAG2_DISARM_RANGED;
5023  attack_type = RANGED_ATTACK;
5024  break;
5025  }
5026  }
5027 
5028  target->ApplyModFlag(field, flags, apply);
5029 
5030  // main-hand attack speed already set to special value for feral form already and don't must change and reset at remove.
5031  if (target->IsNoWeaponShapeShift())
5032  return;
5033 
5034  if (target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
5035  {
5036  if (apply)
5037  target->SetAttackTime(attack_type, BASE_ATTACK_TIME);
5038  else
5039  ((Player*)target)->SetRegularAttackTime();
5040  }
5041 
5042  target->UpdateDamagePhysical(attack_type);
5043 }
5044 
5045 void Aura::HandleAuraModStun(bool apply, bool Real)
5046 {
5047  if (!Real)
5048  return;
5049 
5050  Unit* target = GetTarget();
5051 
5052  if (apply)
5053  {
5054  // Frost stun aura -> freeze/unfreeze target
5055  if (GetSpellSchoolMask(GetSpellProto()) & SPELL_SCHOOL_MASK_FROST)
5056  target->ModifyAuraState(AURA_STATE_FROZEN, apply);
5057 
5058  // Creature specific
5059  if (target->IsInWorld() && !target->IsPlayer() && !target->IsStunned())
5060  target->SetFacingTo(target->GetOrientation());
5061 
5062  Unit* caster = GetCaster();
5063  target->SetStunned(true, (caster ? caster->GetObjectGuid() : ObjectGuid()), GetSpellProto()->Id);
5064 
5065  if (caster)
5066  if (UnitAI* ai = caster->AI())
5067  ai->JustStunnedTarget(GetSpellProto(), target);
5068 
5069  if (GetSpellProto()->AuraInterruptFlags & AURA_INTERRUPT_FLAG_DAMAGE)
5070  target->getHostileRefManager().HandleSuppressed(apply);
5071 
5072  switch (GetId())
5073  {
5074  case 32890: // Knockout - OHF
5075  target->SetStandState(UNIT_STAND_STATE_DEAD);
5076  break;
5077  case 39837: // Summon the Naj'entus Spine GameObject on target if spell is Impaling Spine
5078  target->CastSpell(nullptr, 39929, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
5079  break;
5080  }
5081  }
5082  else
5083  {
5084  // Frost stun aura -> freeze/unfreeze target
5085  if (GetSpellSchoolMask(GetSpellProto()) & SPELL_SCHOOL_MASK_FROST)
5086  {
5087  bool found_another = false;
5088  for (AuraType const* itr = &frozenAuraTypes[0]; *itr != SPELL_AURA_NONE; ++itr)
5089  {
5090  Unit::AuraList const& auras = target->GetAurasByType(*itr);
5091  for (auto aura : auras)
5092  {
5093  if (GetSpellSchoolMask(aura->GetSpellProto()) & SPELL_SCHOOL_MASK_FROST)
5094  {
5095  found_another = true;
5096  break;
5097  }
5098  }
5099  if (found_another)
5100  break;
5101  }
5102 
5103  if (!found_another)
5104  target->ModifyAuraState(AURA_STATE_FROZEN, apply);
5105  }
5106 
5107  if (GetSpellProto()->AuraInterruptFlags & AURA_INTERRUPT_FLAG_DAMAGE)
5108  target->getHostileRefManager().HandleSuppressed(apply);
5109 
5110  // Real remove called after current aura remove from lists, check if other similar auras active
5111  if (!target->HasAuraType(SPELL_AURA_MOD_STUN))
5112  target->SetStunned(false);
5113 
5114  switch (GetId())
5115  {
5116  case 19386: // Wyvern Sting - Hunter
5117  case 24132:
5118  case 24133:
5119  case 27068:
5120  {
5121  Unit* caster = GetCaster();
5122  if (!caster || caster->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
5123  return;
5124 
5125  uint32 spell_id;
5126  switch (GetId())
5127  {
5128  case 19386: spell_id = 24131; break;
5129  case 24132: spell_id = 24134; break;
5130  case 24133: spell_id = 24135; break;
5131  case 27068: spell_id = 27069; break;
5132  case 49011: spell_id = 49009; break;
5133  case 49012: spell_id = 49010; break;
5134  default: sLog.outError("Spell selection called for unexpected original spell %u, new spell for this spell family?", GetId()); return;
5135  }
5136 
5137  SpellEntry const* spellInfo = sSpellTemplate.LookupEntry<SpellEntry>(spell_id);
5138 
5139  if (!spellInfo)
5140  return;
5141 
5142  caster->CastSpell(target, spellInfo, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, nullptr, this);
5143  return;
5144  }
5145  case 40510: // Demon Transform 3 - Illidan
5146  if (UnitAI * ai = target->AI())
5147  ai->SendAIEvent(AI_EVENT_CUSTOM_D, target, target);
5148  break;
5149  case 41083: // Paralyze
5150  if (Unit * caster = GetCaster())
5151  if (UnitAI * ai = caster->AI())
5152  ai->SendAIEvent(AI_EVENT_CUSTOM_A, caster, caster);
5153  break;
5154  }
5155  }
5156 }
5157 
5158 void Aura::HandleModStealth(bool apply, bool Real)
5159 {
5160  Unit* target = GetTarget();
5161  // TODO: add mask
5162  target->GetVisibilityData().AddStealthStrength(StealthType(m_modifier.m_miscvalue), apply ? m_modifier.m_amount : -m_modifier.m_amount);
5163 
5164  if (apply)
5165  {
5166  // drop flag at stealth in bg
5167  target->RemoveAurasWithInterruptFlags(AURA_INTERRUPT_FLAG_STEALTH_INVIS_CANCELS);
5168 
5169  // only at real aura add
5170  if (Real)
5171  {
5172  target->SetVisFlags(UNIT_VIS_FLAG_CREEP);
5173 
5174  if (target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
5175  target->SetByteFlag(PLAYER_FIELD_BYTES2, 3, PLAYER_FIELD_BYTE2_STEALTH);
5176 
5177  // apply only if not in GM invisibility (and overwrite invisibility state)
5178  if (target->GetVisibility() != VISIBILITY_OFF)
5179  {
5180  target->SetVisibility(VISIBILITY_GROUP_NO_DETECT);
5181  target->SetVisibility(VISIBILITY_GROUP_STEALTH);
5182  }
5183 
5184  // apply full stealth period bonuses only at first stealth aura in stack
5185  if (target->GetAurasByType(SPELL_AURA_MOD_STEALTH).size() <= 1)
5186  {
5187  Unit::AuraList const& mDummyAuras = target->GetAurasByType(SPELL_AURA_DUMMY);
5188  for (auto mDummyAura : mDummyAuras)
5189  {
5190  // Master of Subtlety
5191  if (mDummyAura->GetSpellProto()->SpellIconID == 2114)
5192  {
5193  target->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(31666);
5194  int32 bp = mDummyAura->GetModifier()->m_amount;
5195  target->CastCustomSpell(target, 31665, &bp, nullptr, nullptr, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
5196  }
5197  // Overkill
5198  else if (mDummyAura->GetId() == 58426 && GetSpellProto()->SpellFamilyFlags & uint64(0x0000000000400000))
5199  {
5200  target->CastSpell(target, 58427, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
5201  }
5202  }
5203  }
5204  }
5205  }
5206  else
5207  {
5208  // only at real aura remove of _last_ SPELL_AURA_MOD_STEALTH
5209  if (Real && !target->HasAuraType(SPELL_AURA_MOD_STEALTH))
5210  {
5211  // if no GM invisibility
5212  if (target->GetVisibility() != VISIBILITY_OFF)
5213  {
5214  target->RemoveVisFlags(UNIT_VIS_FLAG_CREEP);
5215 
5216  if (target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
5217  target->RemoveByteFlag(PLAYER_FIELD_BYTES2, 3, PLAYER_FIELD_BYTE2_STEALTH);
5218 
5219  // restore invisibility if any
5220  if (target->HasAuraType(SPELL_AURA_MOD_INVISIBILITY))
5221  {
5222  target->SetVisibility(VISIBILITY_GROUP_NO_DETECT);
5223  target->SetVisibility(VISIBILITY_GROUP_INVISIBILITY);
5224  }
5225  else
5226  target->SetVisibility(VISIBILITY_ON);
5227  }
5228 
5229  // apply delayed talent bonus remover at last stealth aura remove
5230  Unit::AuraList const& mDummyAuras = target->GetAurasByType(SPELL_AURA_DUMMY);
5231  for (auto mDummyAura : mDummyAuras)
5232  {
5233  // Master of Subtlety
5234  if (mDummyAura->GetSpellProto()->SpellIconID == 2114)
5235  target->CastSpell(target, 31666, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
5236  // Overkill
5237  else if (mDummyAura->GetId() == 58426 && GetSpellProto()->SpellFamilyFlags & uint64(0x0000000000400000))
5238  {
5239  if (SpellAuraHolder* holder = target->GetSpellAuraHolder(58427))
5240  {
5241  holder->SetAuraMaxDuration(20 * IN_MILLISECONDS);
5242  holder->RefreshHolder();
5243  }
5244  }
5245  }
5246  }
5247  }
5248 }
5249 
5250 void Aura::HandleModStealthDetect(bool apply, bool Real)
5251 {
5252  GetTarget()->GetVisibilityData().AddStealthDetectionStrength(StealthType(m_modifier.m_miscvalue), apply ? m_modifier.m_amount : -m_modifier.m_amount);
5253 }
5254 
5255 void Aura::HandleModStealthLevel(bool apply, bool Real)
5256 {
5257  GetTarget()->GetVisibilityData().AddStealthStrength(StealthType(m_modifier.m_miscvalue), apply ? m_modifier.m_amount : -m_modifier.m_amount);
5258 }
5259 
5260 void Aura::HandleInvisibility(bool apply, bool Real)
5261 {
5262  Unit* target = GetTarget();
5263 
5264  target->GetVisibilityData().AddInvisibilityValue(m_modifier.m_miscvalue, apply ? m_modifier.m_amount : -m_modifier.m_amount);
5265  int32 value = target->GetVisibilityData().GetInvisibilityValue(m_modifier.m_miscvalue);
5266  bool trueApply = value > 0;
5267  target->GetVisibilityData().SetInvisibilityMask(m_modifier.m_miscvalue, trueApply);
5268  if (trueApply)
5269  {
5270  target->RemoveAurasWithInterruptFlags(AURA_INTERRUPT_FLAG_STEALTH_INVIS_CANCELS);
5271 
5272  if (Real && target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER && GetId() != 32727) // avoid changing this for Arena Preparation spell - it seems this should not cause the glow vision
5273  {
5274  if (((Player*)target)->IsSelfMover()) // check if the player doesnt have a mover, when player is hidden during MC of creature
5275  {
5276  // apply glow vision
5277  target->SetByteFlag(PLAYER_FIELD_BYTES2, 3, PLAYER_FIELD_BYTE2_INVISIBILITY_GLOW);
5278  }
5279  }
5280 
5281  // apply only if not in GM invisibility and not stealth
5282  if (target->GetVisibility() == VISIBILITY_ON)
5283  target->SetVisibilityWithoutUpdate(VISIBILITY_GROUP_INVISIBILITY);
5284  }
5285  else
5286  {
5287  // only at real aura remove and if not have different invisibility auras.
5288  if (Real && target->GetVisibilityData().GetInvisibilityMask() == 0)
5289  {
5290  // remove glow vision
5291  if (target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
5292  target->RemoveByteFlag(PLAYER_FIELD_BYTES2, 3, PLAYER_FIELD_BYTE2_INVISIBILITY_GLOW);
5293 
5294  // apply only if not in GM invisibility & not stealthed while invisible
5295  if (target->GetVisibility() != VISIBILITY_OFF)
5296  {
5297  // if have stealth aura then already have stealth visibility
5298  if (!target->HasAuraType(SPELL_AURA_MOD_STEALTH))
5299  target->SetVisibilityWithoutUpdate(VISIBILITY_ON);
5300  }
5301  }
5302 
5303  if (GetId() == 48809) // Binding Life
5304  target->CastSpell(target, GetSpellProto()->CalculateSimpleValue(m_effIndex), TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
5305  }
5306 
5307  if (target->IsInWorld())
5308  target->UpdateVisibilityAndView();
5309 }
5310 
5311 void Aura::HandleInvisibilityDetect(bool apply, bool Real)
5312 {
5313  Unit* target = GetTarget();
5314 
5315  target->GetVisibilityData().SetInvisibilityDetectMask(m_modifier.m_miscvalue, apply);
5316  target->GetVisibilityData().AddInvisibilityDetectValue(m_modifier.m_miscvalue, apply ? m_modifier.m_amount : -m_modifier.m_amount);
5317  if (!apply)
5318  {
5319  Unit::AuraList const& auras = target->GetAurasByType(SPELL_AURA_MOD_INVISIBILITY_DETECTION);
5320  for (auto aura : auras)
5321  target->GetVisibilityData().SetInvisibilityDetectMask(aura->GetModifier()->m_miscvalue, true);
5322  }
5323  if (Real && target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
5324  ((Player*)target)->GetCamera().UpdateVisibilityForOwner();
5325 }
5326 
5327 void Aura::HandleDetectAmore(bool apply, bool /*real*/)
5328 {
5329  if (!GetTarget()->IsPlayer())
5330  return;
5331 
5332  GetTarget()->ApplyModByteFlag(PLAYER_FIELD_BYTES2, 3, 1 << (GetMiscValue() - 1), apply);
5333 }
5334 
5335 void Aura::HandleAuraModRoot(bool apply, bool Real)
5336 {
5337  // only at real add/remove aura
5338  if (!Real)
5339  return;
5340 
5341  Unit* target = GetTarget();
5342 
5343  if (apply)
5344  {
5345  // Frost root aura -> freeze/unfreeze target
5346  if (GetSpellSchoolMask(GetSpellProto()) & SPELL_SCHOOL_MASK_FROST)
5347  target->ModifyAuraState(AURA_STATE_FROZEN, apply);
5348 
5349  if (Unit* caster = GetCaster())
5350  if (UnitAI* ai = caster->AI())
5351  ai->JustRootedTarget(GetSpellProto(), target);
5352  }
5353  else
5354  {
5355  // Frost root aura -> freeze/unfreeze target
5356  if (GetSpellSchoolMask(GetSpellProto()) & SPELL_SCHOOL_MASK_FROST)
5357  {
5358  bool found_another = false;
5359  for (AuraType const* itr = &frozenAuraTypes[0]; *itr != SPELL_AURA_NONE; ++itr)
5360  {
5361  Unit::AuraList const& auras = target->GetAurasByType(*itr);
5362  for (auto aura : auras)
5363  {
5364  if (GetSpellSchoolMask(aura->GetSpellProto()) & SPELL_SCHOOL_MASK_FROST)
5365  {
5366  found_another = true;
5367  break;
5368  }
5369  }
5370  if (found_another)
5371  break;
5372  }
5373 
5374  if (!found_another)
5375  target->ModifyAuraState(AURA_STATE_FROZEN, apply);
5376  }
5377 
5378  // Real remove called after current aura remove from lists, check if other similar auras active
5379  if (target->HasAuraType(SPELL_AURA_MOD_ROOT))
5380  return;
5381  }
5382 
5383  target->SetImmobilizedState(apply);
5384 }
5385 
5386 void Aura::HandleAuraModSilence(bool apply, bool Real)
5387 {
5388  // only at real add/remove aura
5389  if (!Real)
5390  return;
5391 
5392  Unit* target = GetTarget();
5393 
5394  if (apply)
5395  {
5396  target->SetFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_SILENCED);
5397  // Stop cast only spells vs PreventionType == SPELL_PREVENTION_TYPE_SILENCE
5398  for (uint32 i = CURRENT_MELEE_SPELL; i < CURRENT_MAX_SPELL; ++i)
5399  if (Spell* spell = target->GetCurrentSpell(CurrentSpellTypes(i)))
5400  if (spell->m_spellInfo->PreventionType == SPELL_PREVENTION_TYPE_SILENCE)
5401  // Stop spells on prepare or casting state
5402  target->InterruptSpell(CurrentSpellTypes(i), false);
5403  }
5404  else
5405  {
