5406  // Real remove called after current aura remove from lists, check if other similar auras active
5407  if (target->HasAuraType(SPELL_AURA_MOD_SILENCE))
5408  return;
5409 
5410  target->RemoveFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_SILENCED);
5411  }
5412 }
5413 
5414 void Aura::HandleModThreat(bool apply, bool Real)
5415 {
5416  // only at real add/remove aura
5417  if (!Real)
5418  return;
5419 
5420  Unit* target = GetTarget();
5421 
5422  if (!target->IsAlive())
5423  return;
5424 
5425  int level_diff = 0;
5426  int multiplier = 0;
5427  switch (GetId())
5428  {
5429  // Arcane Shroud
5430  case 26400:
5431  level_diff = target->GetLevel() - 60;
5432  multiplier = 2;
5433  break;
5434  // The Eye of Diminution
5435  case 28862:
5436  level_diff = target->GetLevel() - 60;
5437  multiplier = 1;
5438  break;
5439  // Defiance talents
5440  case 12303:
5441  case 12788:
5442  case 12789:
5443  if (target->GetShapeshiftForm() != FORM_DEFENSIVESTANCE)
5444  m_modifier.m_amount = 0;
5445  break;
5446  }
5447 
5448  if (level_diff > 0)
5449  m_modifier.m_amount += multiplier * level_diff;
5450 
5451  for (int8 x = 0; x < MAX_SPELL_SCHOOL; ++x)
5452  if (m_modifier.m_miscvalue & int32(1 << x))
5453  ApplyPercentModFloatVar(target->m_threatModifier[x], float(m_modifier.m_amount), apply);
5454 }
5455 
5456 void Aura::HandleAuraModTotalThreat(bool apply, bool Real)
5457 {
5458  // only at real add/remove aura
5459  if (!Real)
5460  return;
5461 
5462  Unit* target = GetTarget();
5463 
5464  if (!target->IsAlive() || target->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
5465  return;
5466 
5467  Unit* caster = GetCaster();
5468 
5469  if (!caster || !caster->IsAlive())
5470  return;
5471 
5472  target->getHostileRefManager().threatTemporaryFade(caster, m_modifier.m_amount, apply);
5473 }
5474 
5475 void Aura::HandleModTaunt(bool /*apply*/, bool Real)
5476 {
5477  // only at real add/remove aura
5478  if (!Real)
5479  return;
5480 
5481  Unit* target = GetTarget();
5482 
5483  if (!target->IsAlive() || !target->CanHaveThreatList())
5484  return;
5485 
5486  target->TauntUpdate();
5487 
5488  if (target->AI())
5489  target->AI()->OnTaunt();
5490 }
5491 
5492 void Aura::HandleAuraFakeInebriation(bool apply, bool Real)
5493 {
5494  // all applied/removed only at real aura add/remove
5495  if (!Real)
5496  return;
5497 
5498  Unit* target = GetTarget();
5499 
5500  if (target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
5501  {
5502  int32 point = target->GetInt32Value(PLAYER_FAKE_INEBRIATION);
5503  point += (apply ? 1 : -1) * GetBasePoints();
5504 
5505  target->SetInt32Value(PLAYER_FAKE_INEBRIATION, point);
5506  }
5507 
5508  target->UpdateObjectVisibility();
5509 }
5510 
5511 /*********************************************************/
5512 /*** MODIFY SPEED ***/
5513 /*********************************************************/
5514 void Aura::HandleAuraModIncreaseSpeed(bool /*apply*/, bool Real)
5515 {
5516  // all applied/removed only at real aura add/remove
5517  if (!Real)
5518  return;
5519 
5520  GetTarget()->UpdateSpeed(MOVE_RUN, true);
5521 }
5522 
5523 void Aura::HandleAuraModIncreaseMountedSpeed(bool apply, bool Real)
5524 {
5525  // all applied/removed only at real aura add/remove
5526  if (!Real)
5527  return;
5528 
5529  Unit* target = GetTarget();
5530 
5531  target->UpdateSpeed(MOVE_RUN, true);
5532 
5533  // Festive Holiday Mount
5534  if (apply && GetSpellProto()->SpellIconID != 1794 && target->HasAura(62061))
5535  // Reindeer Transformation
5536  target->CastSpell(target, 25860, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, nullptr, this);
5537 }
5538 
5539 void Aura::HandleAuraModIncreaseFlightSpeed(bool apply, bool Real)
5540 {
5541  // all applied/removed only at real aura add/remove
5542  if (!Real)
5543  return;
5544 
5545  Unit* target = GetTarget();
5546 
5547  // Enable Fly mode for flying mounts
5548  if (m_modifier.m_auraname == SPELL_AURA_MOD_FLIGHT_SPEED_MOUNTED)
5549  {
5550  target->SetCanFly(apply);
5551 
5552  // Players on flying mounts must be immune to polymorph
5553  if (target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
5554  target->ApplySpellImmune(this, IMMUNITY_MECHANIC, MECHANIC_POLYMORPH, apply);
5555 
5556  // Festive Holiday Mount
5557  if (apply && GetSpellProto()->SpellIconID != 1794 && target->HasAura(62061))
5558  // Reindeer Transformation
5559  target->CastSpell(target, 25860, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, nullptr, this);
5560  }
5561 
5562  target->UpdateSpeed(MOVE_FLIGHT, true);
5563 }
5564 
5565 void Aura::HandleAuraModIncreaseSwimSpeed(bool /*apply*/, bool Real)
5566 {
5567  // all applied/removed only at real aura add/remove
5568  if (!Real)
5569  return;
5570 
5571  GetTarget()->UpdateSpeed(MOVE_SWIM, true);
5572 }
5573 
5574 void Aura::HandleAuraModDecreaseSpeed(bool /*apply*/, bool Real)
5575 {
5576  // all applied/removed only at real aura add/remove
5577  if (!Real)
5578  return;
5579 
5580  Unit* target = GetTarget();
5581 
5582  target->UpdateSpeed(MOVE_RUN, true);
5583  target->UpdateSpeed(MOVE_RUN_BACK, true);
5584  target->UpdateSpeed(MOVE_SWIM, true);
5585  target->UpdateSpeed(MOVE_FLIGHT, true);
5586 }
5587 
5588 void Aura::HandleAuraModUseNormalSpeed(bool /*apply*/, bool Real)
5589 {
5590  // all applied/removed only at real aura add/remove
5591  if (!Real)
5592  return;
5593 
5594  Unit* target = GetTarget();
5595 
5596  target->UpdateSpeed(MOVE_RUN, true);
5597  target->UpdateSpeed(MOVE_SWIM, true);
5598  target->UpdateSpeed(MOVE_FLIGHT, true);
5599 }
5600 
5601 /*********************************************************/
5602 /*** IMMUNITY ***/
5603 /*********************************************************/
5604 
5605 void Aura::HandleModMechanicImmunity(bool apply, bool /*Real*/)
5606 {
5607  uint32 misc = m_modifier.m_miscvalue;
5608  // Forbearance
5609  // in DBC wrong mechanic immune since 3.0.x
5610  if (GetId() == 25771)
5611  misc = MECHANIC_IMMUNE_SHIELD;
5612 
5613  Unit* target = GetTarget();
5614 
5615  if (apply && GetSpellProto()->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX_IMMUNITY_PURGES_EFFECT))
5616  {
5617  uint32 mechanic = 1 << (misc - 1);
5618 
5619  // immune movement impairment and loss of control (spell data have special structure for mark this case)
5620  if (IsSpellRemoveAllMovementAndControlLossEffects(GetSpellProto()))
5621  mechanic = IMMUNE_TO_MOVEMENT_IMPAIRMENT_AND_LOSS_CONTROL_MASK;
5622 
5623  target->RemoveAurasAtMechanicImmunity(mechanic, GetId());
5624  }
5625 
5626  target->ApplySpellImmune(this, IMMUNITY_MECHANIC, misc, apply);
5627 
5628  // Bestial Wrath
5629  if (GetSpellProto()->Id == 19574)
5630  {
5631  // The Beast Within cast on owner if talent present
5632  if (Unit* owner = target->GetOwner())
5633  {
5634  // Search talent The Beast Within
5635  Unit::AuraList const& dummyAuras = owner->GetAurasByType(SPELL_AURA_MOD_DAMAGE_PERCENT_DONE);
5636  for (auto dummyAura : dummyAuras)
5637  {
5638  if (dummyAura->GetSpellProto()->SpellIconID == 2229)
5639  {
5640  if (apply)
5641  owner->CastSpell(owner, 34471, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, nullptr, this);
5642  else
5643  owner->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(34471);
5644  break;
5645  }
5646  }
5647  }
5648  }
5649  // Heroic Fury (Intercept cooldown remove)
5650  else if (apply && GetSpellProto()->Id == 60970 && target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
5651  target->RemoveSpellCooldown(20252, true);
5652 
5653  switch (GetId())
5654  {
5655  case 18461: // Vanish Purge
5656  if (m_effIndex == EFFECT_INDEX_0)
5657  target->RemoveSpellsCausingAura(SPELL_AURA_MOD_STALKED);
5658  break;
5659  case 42292: // PvP trinket
5660  target->RemoveRankAurasDueToSpell(20184); // Judgement of justice - remove any rank
5661  break;
5662  }
5663 }
5664 
5665 void Aura::HandleModMechanicImmunityMask(bool apply, bool /*Real*/)
5666 {
5667  uint32 mechanic = m_modifier.m_miscvalue;
5668 
5669  if (apply && GetSpellProto()->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX_IMMUNITY_PURGES_EFFECT))
5670  GetTarget()->RemoveAurasAtMechanicImmunity(mechanic, GetId());
5671 
5672  // check implemented in Unit::IsImmuneToSpell and Unit::IsImmuneToSpellEffect
5673 }
5674 
5675 // this method is called whenever we add / remove aura which gives m_target some imunity to some spell effect
5676 void Aura::HandleAuraModEffectImmunity(bool apply, bool /*Real*/)
5677 {
5678  Unit* target = GetTarget();
5679 
5680  // when removing flag aura, handle flag drop
5681  if (target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER && (GetSpellProto()->AuraInterruptFlags & AURA_INTERRUPT_FLAG_INVULNERABILITY_BUFF_CANCELS))
5682  {
5683  Player* player = static_cast<Player*>(target);
5684 
5685  if (apply)
5686  player->pvpInfo.isPvPFlagCarrier = true;
5687  else
5688  {
5689  player->pvpInfo.isPvPFlagCarrier = false;
5690 
5691  if (BattleGround* bg = player->GetBattleGround())
5692  bg->HandlePlayerDroppedFlag(player);
5693  else if (OutdoorPvP* outdoorPvP = sOutdoorPvPMgr.GetScript(player->GetCachedZoneId()))
5694  outdoorPvP->HandleDropFlag(player, GetSpellProto()->Id);
5695  }
5696  }
5697 
5698  target->ApplySpellImmune(this, IMMUNITY_EFFECT, m_modifier.m_miscvalue, apply);
5699 
5700  if (apply && IsPositive())
5701  target->RemoveAurasWithInterruptFlags(AURA_INTERRUPT_FLAG_INVULNERABILITY_BUFF_CANCELS, GetHolder());
5702 
5703  switch (GetSpellProto()->Id)
5704  {
5705  case 32430: // Battle Standard (Alliance - ZM OPVP)
5706  case 32431: // Battle Standard (Horde - ZM OPVP)
5707  {
5708  // Handle OPVP script condition change on aura apply; Specific for Zangarmarsh outdoor pvp
5709  if (OutdoorPvP* outdoorPvP = sOutdoorPvPMgr.GetScript(3521))
5710  outdoorPvP->HandleConditionStateChange(uint32(GetSpellProto()->Id == 32431), apply);
5711  }
5712  }
5713 }
5714 
5715 void Aura::HandleAuraModStateImmunity(bool apply, bool Real)
5716 {
5717  if (apply && Real && GetSpellProto()->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX_IMMUNITY_PURGES_EFFECT))
5718  {
5719  Unit::AuraList const& auraList = GetTarget()->GetAurasByType(AuraType(m_modifier.m_miscvalue));
5720  for (Unit::AuraList::const_iterator itr = auraList.begin(); itr != auraList.end();)
5721  {
5722  if (auraList.front() != this) // skip itself aura (it already added)
5723  {
5724  GetTarget()->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(auraList.front()->GetId());
5725  itr = auraList.begin();
5726  }
5727  else
5728  ++itr;
5729  }
5730  }
5731 
5732  GetTarget()->ApplySpellImmune(this, IMMUNITY_STATE, m_modifier.m_miscvalue, apply);
5733 }
5734 
5735 void Aura::HandleAuraModSchoolImmunity(bool apply, bool Real)
5736 {
5737  Unit* target = GetTarget();
5738  target->ApplySpellImmune(this, IMMUNITY_SCHOOL, m_modifier.m_miscvalue, apply);
5739 
5740  // remove all flag auras (they are positive, but they must be removed when you are immune)
5741  if (GetSpellProto()->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX_IMMUNITY_PURGES_EFFECT))
5742  target->RemoveAurasWithInterruptFlags(AURA_INTERRUPT_FLAG_INVULNERABILITY_BUFF_CANCELS);
5743 
5744  // TODO: optimalize this cycle - use RemoveAurasWithInterruptFlags call or something else
5745  if (Real && apply
5746  && GetSpellProto()->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX_IMMUNITY_PURGES_EFFECT)
5747  && IsPositiveSpell(GetId(), GetCaster(), target)) // Only positive immunity removes auras
5748  {
5749  uint32 school_mask = m_modifier.m_miscvalue;
5750  Unit::SpellAuraHolderMap& Auras = target->GetSpellAuraHolderMap();
5751  for (Unit::SpellAuraHolderMap::iterator iter = Auras.begin(), next; iter != Auras.end(); iter = next)
5752  {
5753  next = iter;
5754  ++next;
5755  SpellEntry const* spell = iter->second->GetSpellProto();
5756  if ((GetSpellSchoolMask(spell) & school_mask) // Check for school mask
5757  && !spell->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_NO_IMMUNITIES) // Spells unaffected by invulnerability
5758  && !iter->second->IsPositive() // Don't remove positive spells
5759  && spell->Id != GetId()) // Don't remove self
5760  {
5761  target->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(spell->Id);
5762  if (Auras.empty())
5763  break;
5764  next = Auras.begin();
5765  }
5766  }
5767  }
5768 
5769  if (Real && GetSpellProto()->Mechanic == MECHANIC_BANISH)
5770  {
5771  if (apply)
5772  target->addUnitState(UNIT_STAT_ISOLATED);
5773  else
5774  target->clearUnitState(UNIT_STAT_ISOLATED);
5775  }
5776 
5777  GetTarget()->getHostileRefManager().HandleSuppressed(apply, true);
5778 
5779  if (apply)
5780  target->SetFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_IMMUNE);
5781  else
5782  {
5783  // do not remove unit flag if there are more than this auraEffect of that kind on unit
5784  if (target->HasAuraType(SPELL_AURA_SCHOOL_IMMUNITY))
5785  return;
5786  target->RemoveFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_IMMUNE);
5787  }
5788 }
5789 
5790 void Aura::HandleAuraModDmgImmunity(bool apply, bool /*Real*/)
5791 {
5792  Unit* target = GetTarget();
5793  target->ApplySpellImmune(this, IMMUNITY_DAMAGE, m_modifier.m_miscvalue, apply);
5794 
5795  target->getHostileRefManager().HandleSuppressed(apply, true);
5796 
5797  if (!apply && GetId() == 41376) // Spite - Essence of Anger
5798  if (Unit* caster = GetCaster())
5799  caster->CastSpell(target, 41377, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
5800 }
5801 
5802 void Aura::HandleAuraModDispelImmunity(bool apply, bool Real)
5803 {
5804  // all applied/removed only at real aura add/remove
5805  if (!Real)
5806  return;
5807 
5808  GetTarget()->ApplySpellDispelImmunity(this, DispelType(m_modifier.m_miscvalue), apply);
5809 }
5810 
5811 void Aura::HandleAuraProcTriggerSpell(bool apply, bool Real)
5812 {
5813  if (!Real)
5814  return;
5815 
5816  Unit* target = GetTarget();
5817 
5818  switch (GetId())
5819  {
5820  // some spell have charges by functionality not have its in spell data
5821  case 28200: // Ascendance (Talisman of Ascendance trinket)
5822  if (apply)
5823  GetHolder()->SetAuraCharges(6);
5824  break;
5825  case 39057: // Serpentshrine Parasite - always hit with melee
5826  GetTarget()->SetAlwaysHit(apply);
5827  break;
5828  case 40594: // Felrage - Gurtogg Bloodboil - remove Fury on removal of Felrage
5829  if (!apply)
5830  GetTarget()->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(40601);
5831  break;
5832  case 50720: // Vigilance (threat transfering)
5833  if (apply)
5834  {
5835  if (Unit* caster = GetCaster())
5836  target->CastSpell(caster, 59665, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
5837  }
5838  else
5839  target->getHostileRefManager().ResetThreatRedirection(59665);
5840  break;
5841  default:
5842  break;
5843  }
5844 }
5845 
5846 void Aura::HandleAuraModStalked(bool apply, bool /*Real*/)
5847 {
5848  // used by spells: Hunter's Mark, Mind Vision, Syndicate Tracker (MURP) DND
5849  if (apply)
5850  GetTarget()->SetFlag(UNIT_DYNAMIC_FLAGS, UNIT_DYNFLAG_TRACK_UNIT);
5851  else
5852  GetTarget()->RemoveFlag(UNIT_DYNAMIC_FLAGS, UNIT_DYNFLAG_TRACK_UNIT);
5853 }
5854 
5855 /*********************************************************/
5856 /*** PERIODIC ***/
5857 /*********************************************************/
5858 
5859 void Aura::HandlePeriodicTriggerSpell(bool apply, bool /*Real*/)
5860 {
5861  m_isPeriodic = apply;
5862 
5863  Unit* target = GetTarget();
5864 
5865  if (apply)
5866  {
5867  switch (GetId())
5868  {
5869  case 29946:
5870  if (target->HasAura(29947))
5871  target->RemoveAurasDueToSpellByCancel(29947);
5872  break;
5873  case 43648: // Electrical Storm - Akil'zon - cast teleport self
5874  target->CastSpell(nullptr, 44006, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED); // done here instead of script effect due to auras being applied after effects
5875  break;
5876  default:
5877  break;
5878  }
5879  }
5880  else
5881  {
5882  switch (GetId())
5883  {
5884  case 66: // Invisibility
5885  if (m_removeMode == AURA_REMOVE_BY_EXPIRE)
5886  target->CastSpell(target, 32612, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, nullptr, this);
5887 
5888  return;
5889  case 18173: // Burning Adrenaline (Main Target version)
5890  case 23620: // Burning Adrenaline (Caster version)
5891  // On aura removal, the target deals AoE damage to friendlies and kills himself/herself (prevent durability loss)
5892  target->CastSpell(target, 23478, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, nullptr, this);
5893  target->CastSpell(target, 23644, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, nullptr, this);
5894  return;
5895  case 29946:
5896  if (m_removeMode != AURA_REMOVE_BY_EXPIRE)
5897  // Cast "crossed flames debuff"
5898  target->CastSpell(target, 29947, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, nullptr, this);
5899  return;
5900  case 33401: // Possess
5901  if (Unit* caster = GetCaster())
5902  caster->CastSpell(target, 32830, TRIGGERED_NONE);
5903  return;
5904  case 34229: // Flame Quills
5905  if (UnitAI* ai = target->AI())
5906  ai->SendAIEvent(AI_EVENT_CUSTOM_A, target, target);
5907  return;
5908  case 33711: // Murmur's Touch normal and heroic
5909  case 38794:
5910  target->CastSpell(nullptr, 33686, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, nullptr, this); // cast Shockwave
5911  target->CastSpell(nullptr, 33673, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED); // cast Shockwave knockup serverside
5912  return;
5913  case 35515: // Salaadin's Tesla
5914  if ((m_removeMode != AURA_REMOVE_BY_STACK) && (!target->HasAura(35515)))
5915  if (UnitAI* ai = target->AI())
5916  ai->SendAIEvent(AI_EVENT_CUSTOM_A, target, target);
5917  return;
5918  case 37640: // Leotheras Whirlwind
5919  if (UnitAI* ai = target->AI())
5920  ai->DoResetThreat();
5921  return;
5922  case 39575: // Charge Frenzy
5923  if (Unit* pCaster = GetCaster())
5924  pCaster->FixateTarget(nullptr);
5925  return;
5926  case 39828: // Light of the Naaru
5927  target->CastSpell(nullptr, 39831, TRIGGERED_NONE);
5928  target->CastSpell(nullptr, 39832, TRIGGERED_NONE);
5929  break;
5930  case 41194: // Whirlwind - Bonechewer Blade Fury 23235
5931  case 41399: // Whirlwind - Image of Dementia 23436
5932  case 46270: // Whirlwind - Priestess of Torment 25509
5933  if (Unit* caster = GetCaster())
5934  {
5935  ThreatList const& threatList = caster->getThreatManager().getThreatList();
5936  for (auto i : threatList)
5937  if (Unit* Temp = caster->GetMap()->GetUnit(i->getUnitGuid()))
5938  caster->getThreatManager().modifyThreatPercent(Temp, -100);
5939  }
5940  return;
5941  case 42177: // Alert Drums
5942  if (m_removeMode == AURA_REMOVE_BY_EXPIRE)
5943  {
5944  if (UnitAI * ai = target->AI())
5945  ai->SendAIEvent(AI_EVENT_CUSTOM_B, target, target);
5946  }
5947  return;
5948  case 42783: // Wrath of the Astrom...
5949  if (m_removeMode == AURA_REMOVE_BY_EXPIRE && GetEffIndex() + 1 < MAX_EFFECT_INDEX)
5950  target->CastSpell(target, GetSpellProto()->CalculateSimpleValue(SpellEffectIndex(GetEffIndex() + 1)), TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, nullptr, nullptr, GetCasterGuid());
5951  return;
5952  case 43648: // Electrical Storm - Akil'zon - send event
5953  if (Unit * caster = GetCaster())
5954  if (UnitAI * ai = caster->AI())
5955  ai->SendAIEvent(AI_EVENT_CUSTOM_A, caster, caster);
5956  break;
5957  case 44251: // Gravity Lapse Beam Visual Periodic
5958  target->CastSpell(nullptr, 44232, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
5959  if (UnitAI * ai = target->AI())
5960  ai->SendAIEvent(AI_EVENT_CUSTOM_A, target, target, m_removeMode == AURA_REMOVE_BY_EXPIRE);
5961  return;
5962  case 46221: // Animal Blood
5963  if (target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER && m_removeMode == AURA_REMOVE_BY_DEFAULT && target->IsInWater())
5964  {
5965  float position_z = target->GetTerrain()->GetWaterLevel(target->GetPositionX(), target->GetPositionY(), target->GetPositionZ());
5966  // Spawn Blood Pool
5967  target->CastSpell(target->GetPositionX(), target->GetPositionY(), position_z, 63471, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
5968  }
5969 
5970  return;
5971  case 51912: // Ultra-Advanced Proto-Typical Shortening Blaster
5972  if (m_removeMode == AURA_REMOVE_BY_EXPIRE)
5973  {
5974  if (Unit* pCaster = GetCaster())
5975  pCaster->CastSpell(target, GetSpellProto()->EffectTriggerSpell[GetEffIndex()], TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, nullptr, this);
5976  }
5977  return;
5978  case 70405: // Mutated Transformation (10n)
5979  case 72508: // Mutated Transformation (25n)
5980  case 72509: // Mutated Transformation (10h)
5981  case 72510: // Mutated Transformation (25h)
5982  if (m_removeMode == AURA_REMOVE_BY_DEFAULT)
5983  {
5984  if (target->IsVehicle() && target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT)
5985  {
5986  target->RemoveSpellsCausingAura(SPELL_AURA_CONTROL_VEHICLE);
5987  ((Creature*)target)->ForcedDespawn();
5988  }
5989  }
5990  default:
5991  break;
5992  }
5993  }
5994 }
5995 
5996 void Aura::HandlePeriodicTriggerSpellWithValue(bool apply, bool /*Real*/)
5997 {
5998  m_isPeriodic = apply;
5999 }
6000 
6001 void Aura::HandlePeriodicEnergize(bool apply, bool Real)
6002 {
6003  if (!Real)
6004  return;
6005 
6006  Unit* target = GetTarget();
6007 
6008  // For prevent double apply bonuses
6009  bool loading = (target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER && ((Player*)target)->GetSession()->PlayerLoading());
6010 
6011  if (apply && !loading)
6012  {
6013  switch (GetId())
6014  {
6015  case 54833: // Glyph of Innervate (value%/2 of casters base mana)
6016  {
6017  if (Unit* caster = GetCaster())
6018  m_modifier.m_amount = int32(caster->GetCreateMana() * GetBasePoints() / (200 * GetAuraMaxTicks()));
6019  break;
6020  }
6021  case 29166: // Innervate (value% of casters base mana)
6022  {
6023  if (Unit* caster = GetCaster())
6024  {
6025  // Glyph of Innervate
6026  if (caster->HasAura(54832))
6027  caster->CastSpell(caster, 54833, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, nullptr, this);
6028 
6029  m_modifier.m_amount = int32(caster->GetCreateMana() * GetBasePoints() / (100 * GetAuraMaxTicks()));
6030  }
6031  break;
6032  }
6033  case 48391: // Owlkin Frenzy 2% base mana
6034  m_modifier.m_amount = target->GetCreateMana() * 2 / 100;
6035  break;
6036  case 57669: // Replenishment (0.2% from max)
6037  case 61782: // Infinite Replenishment
6038  m_modifier.m_amount = target->GetMaxPower(POWER_MANA) * 2 / 1000;
6039  break;
6040  default:
6041  break;
6042  }
6043  }
6044 
6045  m_isPeriodic = apply;
6046 }
6047 
6048 void Aura::HandleAuraPowerBurn(bool apply, bool /*Real*/)
6049 {
6050  m_isPeriodic = apply;
6051 }
6052 
6053 void Aura::HandlePrayerOfMending(bool /*apply*/, bool /*Real*/)
6054 {
6055 
6056 }
6057 
6058 void Aura::HandleAuraPeriodicDummy(bool apply, bool Real)
6059 {
6060  // spells required only Real aura add/remove
6061  if (!Real)
6062  return;
6063 
6064  Unit* target = GetTarget();
6065 
6066  // For prevent double apply bonuses
6067  bool loading = (target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER && ((Player*)target)->GetSession()->PlayerLoading());
6068 
6069  SpellEntry const* spell = GetSpellProto();
6070  switch (spell->SpellFamilyName)
6071  {
6072  case SPELLFAMILY_GENERIC:
6073  {
6074 
6075 
6076  switch (spell->Id)
6077  {
6078  case 36207: // Steal Weapon
6079  {
6080  if (target->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_UNIT)
6081  return;
6082 
6083  if (apply)
6084  {
6085  if (Player* playerCaster = GetCaster()->GetBeneficiaryPlayer())
6086  {
6087  if (Item* item = playerCaster->GetItemByPos(INVENTORY_SLOT_BAG_0, EQUIPMENT_SLOT_MAINHAND))
6088  {
6089  ((Creature*)target)->SetVirtualItem(VIRTUAL_ITEM_SLOT_0, item->GetEntry());
6090  }
6091  }
6092  }
6093  else
6094  {
6095  ((Creature*)target)->LoadEquipment(((Creature*)target)->GetCreatureInfo()->EquipmentTemplateId, true);
6096  }
6097  break;
6098  }
6099  case 30019: // Control Piece - Chess
6100  {
6101  if (apply || target->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
6102  return;
6103 
6104  target->CastSpell(target, 30529, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
6105  target->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(30019);
6106  target->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(30532);
6107 
6108  Unit* chessPiece = target->GetCharm();
6109  if (chessPiece)
6110  chessPiece->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(30019);
6111 
6112  return;
6113  }
6114  case 39993: // Simon Game START timer, (DND)
6115  {
6116  if (apply)
6117  target->AI()->SendAIEvent(AI_EVENT_CUSTOM_A, GetCaster(), target);
6118  break;
6119  }
6120  case 44328: // Energy Feedback - Vexallus
6121  {
6122  if (!apply)
6123  if (Unit * caster = GetCaster())
6124  caster->AI()->SendAIEvent(AI_EVENT_CUSTOM_A, caster, caster);
6125  break;
6126  }
6127  case 47214: // Burninate Effect
6128  {
6129  if (apply)
6130  {
6131  Unit* caster = GetCaster();
6132  if (!caster)
6133  return;
6134 
6135  target->CastSpell(caster, 47208, TRIGGERED_NONE);
6136  target->CastSpell(nullptr, 42726, TRIGGERED_NONE);
6137  }
6138  else // kill self on removal
6139  target->CastSpell(nullptr, 51744, TRIGGERED_NONE);
6140  break;
6141  }
6142  }
6143  }
6144  case SPELLFAMILY_ROGUE:
6145  {
6146  switch (spell->Id)
6147  {
6148  // Master of Subtlety
6149  case 31666:
6150  {
6151  if (apply)
6152  {
6153  // for make duration visible
6154  if (SpellAuraHolder* holder = target->GetSpellAuraHolder(31665))
6155  {
6156  holder->SetAuraMaxDuration(GetHolder()->GetAuraDuration());
6157  holder->RefreshHolder();
6158  }
6159  }
6160  else
6161  target->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(31665);
6162  break;
6163  }
6164  }
6165  break;
6166  }
6167  }
6168 
6169  m_isPeriodic = apply;
6170 }
6171 
6172 void Aura::HandlePeriodicHeal(bool apply, bool /*Real*/)
6173 {
6174  m_isPeriodic = apply;
6175 
6176  Unit* target = GetTarget();
6177 
6178  // For prevent double apply bonuses
6179  bool loading = (target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER && ((Player*)target)->GetSession()->PlayerLoading());
6180 
6181  // Custom damage calculation after
6182  if (apply)
6183  {
6184  if (loading)
6185  return;
6186 
6187  Unit* caster = GetCaster();
6188  if (!caster)
6189  return;
6190 
6191  // Gift of the Naaru (have diff spellfamilies)
6192  if (GetSpellProto()->SpellIconID == 329 && GetSpellProto()->SpellVisual[0] == 7625)
6193  {
6194  int32 ap = int32(0.22f * caster->GetTotalAttackPowerValue(BASE_ATTACK));
6195  int32 holy = caster->SpellBaseDamageBonusDone(GetSpellSchoolMask(GetSpellProto()));
6196  if (holy < 0)
6197  holy = 0;
6198  holy = int32(holy * 377 / 1000);
6199  m_modifier.m_amount += ap > holy ? ap : holy;
6200  }
6201  // Lifeblood
6202  else if (GetSpellProto()->SpellIconID == 3088 && GetSpellProto()->SpellVisual[0] == 8145)
6203  {
6204  int32 healthBonus = int32(0.0032f * caster->GetMaxHealth());
6205  m_modifier.m_amount += healthBonus;
6206  }
6207 
6208  switch (GetSpellProto()->Id)
6209  {
6210  case 12939: m_modifier.m_amount = target->GetMaxHealth() / 10; break; // Polymorph Heal Effect
6211  default: m_modifier.m_amount = caster->SpellHealingBonusDone(target, GetSpellProto(), m_modifier.m_amount, DOT, GetStackAmount()); break;
6212  }
6213 
6214  // Rejuvenation
6215  if (GetSpellProto()->IsFitToFamily(SPELLFAMILY_DRUID, uint64(0x0000000000000010)))
6216  if (caster->HasAura(64760)) // Item - Druid T8 Restoration 4P Bonus
6217  caster->CastCustomSpell(target, 64801, &m_modifier.m_amount, nullptr, nullptr, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, nullptr);
6218  }
6219 }
6220 
6221 void Aura::HandleDamagePercentTaken(bool apply, bool Real)
6222 {
6223  m_isPeriodic = apply;
6224 
6225  Unit* target = GetTarget();
6226 
6227  if (!Real)
6228  return;
6229 
6230  // For prevent double apply bonuses
6231  bool loading = (target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER && ((Player*)target)->GetSession()->PlayerLoading());
6232 
6233  if (apply)
6234  {
6235  if (loading)
6236  return;
6237 
6238  // Hand of Salvation (only it have this aura and mask)
6239  if (GetSpellProto()->IsFitToFamily(SPELLFAMILY_PALADIN, uint64(0x0000000000000100)))
6240  {
6241  // Glyph of Salvation
6242  if (target->GetObjectGuid() == GetCasterGuid())
6243  if (Aura* aur = target->GetAura(63225, EFFECT_INDEX_0))
6244  m_modifier.m_amount -= aur->GetModifier()->m_amount;
6245  }
6246  }
6247  else
6248  if (GetSpellProto()->Id == 43421) // Malacrass - Lifebloom
6249  target->CastSpell(nullptr, 43422, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
6250 }
6251 
6252 void Aura::HandleAuraDamageShield(bool apply, bool real)
6253 {
6254  if (!real)
6255  return;
6256 
6257  Unit* target = GetTarget();
6258  if (apply)
6259  {
6260  Unit* caster = GetCaster();
6261  if (!caster)
6262  return;
6263 
6264  m_modifier.m_amount = caster->SpellDamageBonusDone(target, SpellSchoolMask(GetSpellProto()->SchoolMask), GetSpellProto(), m_modifier.m_amount, SPELL_DIRECT_DAMAGE, GetStackAmount());
6265  }
6266 }
6267 
6268 void Aura::HandlePeriodicDamage(bool apply, bool Real)
6269 {
6270  // spells required only Real aura add/remove
6271  if (!Real)
6272  return;
6273 
6274  m_isPeriodic = apply;
6275 
6276  Unit* target = GetTarget();
6277  SpellEntry const* spellProto = GetSpellProto();
6278 
6279  // For prevent double apply bonuses
6280  bool loading = (target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER && ((Player*)target)->GetSession()->PlayerLoading());
6281 
6282  // Custom damage calculation after
6283  if (apply)
6284  {
6285  if (loading)
6286  return;
6287 
6288  Unit* caster = GetCaster();
6289  if (!caster)
6290  return;
6291 
6292  switch (spellProto->SpellFamilyName)
6293  {
6294  case SPELLFAMILY_WARRIOR:
6295  {
6296  // Rend
6297  if (spellProto->SpellFamilyFlags & uint64(0x0000000000000020))
6298  {
6299  // $0.2*(($MWB+$mwb)/2+$AP/14*$MWS) bonus per tick
6300  float ap = caster->GetTotalAttackPowerValue(BASE_ATTACK);
6301  int32 mws = caster->GetAttackTime(BASE_ATTACK);
6302  float mwb_min = caster->GetBaseWeaponDamage(BASE_ATTACK, MINDAMAGE);
6303  float mwb_max = caster->GetBaseWeaponDamage(BASE_ATTACK, MAXDAMAGE);
6304  m_modifier.m_amount += int32(((mwb_min + mwb_max) / 2 + ap * mws / 14000) * 0.2f);
6305  // If used while target is above 75% health, Rend does 35% more damage
6306  if (spellProto->CalculateSimpleValue(EFFECT_INDEX_1) != 0 &&
6307  target->GetHealth() > target->GetMaxHealth() * spellProto->CalculateSimpleValue(EFFECT_INDEX_1) / 100)
6308  m_modifier.m_amount += m_modifier.m_amount * spellProto->CalculateSimpleValue(EFFECT_INDEX_2) / 100;
6309  }
6310  break;
6311  }
6312  case SPELLFAMILY_DRUID:
6313  {
6314  // Rip
6315  if (spellProto->SpellFamilyFlags & uint64(0x000000000000800000))
6316  {
6317  if (caster->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
6318  break;
6319 
6320  // 0.01*$AP*cp
6321  uint8 cp = caster->GetComboPoints();
6322 
6323  // Idol of Feral Shadows. Cant be handled as SpellMod in SpellAura:Dummy due its dependency from CPs
6324  Unit::AuraList const& dummyAuras = caster->GetAurasByType(SPELL_AURA_DUMMY);
6325  for (auto dummyAura : dummyAuras)
6326  {
6327  if (dummyAura->GetId() == 34241)
6328  {
6329  m_modifier.m_amount += cp * dummyAura->GetModifier()->m_amount;
6330  break;
6331  }
6332  }
6333  m_modifier.m_amount += int32(caster->GetTotalAttackPowerValue(BASE_ATTACK) * cp / 100);
6334  }
6335  break;
6336  }
6337  case SPELLFAMILY_ROGUE:
6338  {
6339  // Rupture
6340  if (spellProto->SpellFamilyFlags & uint64(0x000000000000100000))
6341  {
6342  if (caster->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
6343  break;
6344  // 1 point : ${($m1+$b1*1+0.015*$AP)*4} damage over 8 secs
6345  // 2 points: ${($m1+$b1*2+0.024*$AP)*5} damage over 10 secs
6346  // 3 points: ${($m1+$b1*3+0.03*$AP)*6} damage over 12 secs
6347  // 4 points: ${($m1+$b1*4+0.03428571*$AP)*7} damage over 14 secs
6348  // 5 points: ${($m1+$b1*5+0.0375*$AP)*8} damage over 16 secs
6349  float AP_per_combo[6] = {0.0f, 0.015f, 0.024f, 0.03f, 0.03428571f, 0.0375f};
6350  uint8 cp = caster->GetComboPoints();
6351  if (cp > 5) cp = 5;
6352  m_modifier.m_amount += int32(caster->GetTotalAttackPowerValue(BASE_ATTACK) * AP_per_combo[cp]);
6353  }
6354  break;
6355  }
6356  case SPELLFAMILY_PALADIN:
6357  {
6358  // Holy Vengeance / Blood Corruption
6359  if (spellProto->SpellFamilyFlags & uint64(0x0000080000000000) && spellProto->SpellVisual[0] == 7902)
6360  {
6361  // AP * 0.025 + SPH * 0.013 bonus per tick
6362  float ap = caster->GetTotalAttackPowerValue(BASE_ATTACK);
6363  int32 holy = caster->SpellBaseDamageBonusDone(GetSpellSchoolMask(spellProto));
6364  if (holy < 0)
6365  holy = 0;
6366  m_modifier.m_amount += int32(GetStackAmount()) * (int32(ap * 0.025f) + int32(holy * 13 / 1000));
6367  }
6368  break;
6369  }
6370  default:
6371  break;
6372  }
6373 
6374  if (m_modifier.m_auraname == SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_DAMAGE)
6375  {
6376  // SpellDamageBonusDone for magic spells
6377  if (spellProto->DmgClass == SPELL_DAMAGE_CLASS_NONE || spellProto->DmgClass == SPELL_DAMAGE_CLASS_MAGIC)
6378  m_modifier.m_amount = caster->SpellDamageBonusDone(target, SpellSchoolMask(GetSpellProto()->SchoolMask), GetSpellProto(), m_modifier.m_amount, DOT, GetStackAmount());
6379  // MeleeDamagebonusDone for weapon based spells
6380  else
6381  {
6382  WeaponAttackType attackType = GetWeaponAttackType(GetSpellProto());
6383  m_modifier.m_amount = caster->MeleeDamageBonusDone(target, m_modifier.m_amount, attackType, SpellSchoolMask(spellProto->SchoolMask), spellProto, DOT, GetStackAmount());
6384  }
6385  }
6386  }
6387  // remove time effects
6388  else
6389  {
6390  switch (spellProto->Id)
6391  {
6392  case 23155: // Chromaggus - Brood Affliction: Red
6393  if (m_removeMode == AURA_REMOVE_BY_DEATH)
6394  target->CastSpell(nullptr, 23168, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED); // Heal Chromaggus
6395  break;
6396  case 43364: // Tranquilizing Poison
6397  if (m_removeMode == AURA_REMOVE_BY_EXPIRE)
6398  target->CastSpell(nullptr, 24004, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED); // Sleep
6399  break;
6400  case 35201: // Paralytic Poison
6401  if (m_removeMode == AURA_REMOVE_BY_DEFAULT)
6402  target->CastSpell(target, 35202, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED); // Paralysis
6403  break;
6404  case 39044: // Serpentshrine Parasite
6405  case 39053:
6406  if (m_removeMode == AURA_REMOVE_BY_DEATH && target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
6407  target->CastSpell(target, 39045, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED); // Summon Serpentshrine Parasite
6408  break;
6409  }
6410  }
6411 }
6412 
6413 void Aura::HandlePeriodicDamagePCT(bool apply, bool /*Real*/)
6414 {
6415  m_isPeriodic = apply;
6416 }
6417 
6418 void Aura::HandlePeriodicLeech(bool apply, bool /*Real*/)
6419 {
6420  m_isPeriodic = apply;
6421 
6422  // For prevent double apply bonuses
6423  bool loading = (GetTarget()->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER && ((Player*)GetTarget())->GetSession()->PlayerLoading());
6424 
6425  // Custom damage calculation after
6426  if (apply)
6427  {
6428  if (loading)
6429  return;
6430 
6431  Unit* caster = GetCaster();
6432  if (!caster)
6433  return;
6434 
6435  m_modifier.m_amount = caster->SpellDamageBonusDone(GetTarget(), SpellSchoolMask(GetSpellProto()->SchoolMask), GetSpellProto(), m_modifier.m_amount, DOT, GetStackAmount());
6436  }
6437 }
6438 
6439 void Aura::HandlePeriodicManaLeech(bool apply, bool /*Real*/)
6440 {
6441  m_isPeriodic = apply;
6442 
6443  if (!apply)
6444  {
6445  switch (GetId())
6446  {
6447  case 24002: // Tranquilizing Poison
6448  case 24003: // Tranquilizing Poison
6449  if (m_removeMode == AURA_REMOVE_BY_EXPIRE)
6450  GetTarget()->CastSpell(nullptr, 24004, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED); // Sleep
6451  break;
6452  }
6453  }
6454 }
6455 
6456 void Aura::HandlePeriodicHealthFunnel(bool apply, bool /*Real*/)
6457 {
6458  m_isPeriodic = apply;
6459 
6460  // For prevent double apply bonuses
6461  bool loading = (GetTarget()->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER && ((Player*)GetTarget())->GetSession()->PlayerLoading());
6462 
6463  // Custom damage calculation after
6464  if (apply)
6465  {
6466  if (loading)
6467  return;
6468 
6469  Unit* caster = GetCaster();
6470  if (!caster)
6471  return;
6472 
6473  m_modifier.m_amount = caster->SpellDamageBonusDone(GetTarget(), SpellSchoolMask(GetSpellProto()->SchoolMask), GetSpellProto(), m_modifier.m_amount, DOT, GetStackAmount());
6474  }
6475 }
6476 
6477 /*********************************************************/
6478 /*** MODIFY STATS ***/
6479 /*********************************************************/
6480 
6481 /********************************/
6482 /*** RESISTANCE ***/
6483 /********************************/
6484 
6485 void Aura::HandleAuraModResistanceExclusive(bool apply, bool /*Real*/)
6486 {
6487  if (!m_modifier.m_amount)
6488  return;
6489 
6490  Unit* target = GetTarget();
6491 
6492  for (uint32 i = SPELL_SCHOOL_NORMAL; i < MAX_SPELL_SCHOOL; ++i)
6493  {
6494  if (m_modifier.m_miscvalue & (1 << i))
6495  {
6496  // Apply the value exclusively for each school
6497  const int32 amount = m_modifier.m_amount;
6498  int32 bonusMax = 0;
6499  int32 malusMax = 0;
6500 
6501  for (Aura* aura : target->GetAurasByType(m_modifier.m_auraname))
6502  {
6503  if (aura == this || !(aura->GetMiscValue() & (1 << i)))
6504  continue;
6505 
6506  const int32 mod = aura->GetModifier()->m_amount;
6507 
6508  if (mod > bonusMax)
6509  bonusMax = mod;
6510  else if (mod < malusMax)
6511  malusMax = mod;
6512  }
6513 
6514  float oldResist = target->GetTotalResistanceValue(SpellSchools(i));
6515  if (amount > bonusMax)
6516  {
6517  target->HandleStatModifier(UnitMods(UNIT_MOD_RESISTANCE_START + i), TOTAL_VALUE, float(apply ? bonusMax : amount), false);
6518  target->HandleStatModifier(UnitMods(UNIT_MOD_RESISTANCE_START + i), TOTAL_VALUE, float(apply ? amount : bonusMax), true);
6519  }
6520  else if (amount < malusMax)
6521  {
6522  target->HandleStatModifier(UnitMods(UNIT_MOD_RESISTANCE_START + i), TOTAL_VALUE, float(apply ? malusMax : amount), false);
6523  target->HandleStatModifier(UnitMods(UNIT_MOD_RESISTANCE_START + i), TOTAL_VALUE, float(apply ? amount : malusMax), true);
6524  }
6525  float change = target->GetTotalResistanceValue(SpellSchools(i)) - oldResist;
6526  // UI malus info:
6527  target->ApplyResistanceBuffModsMod(SpellSchools(i), (m_modifier.m_amount > 0), apply ? change : -change, apply);
6528  }
6529  }
6530 }
6531 
6532 void Aura::HandleAuraModResistance(bool apply, bool /*Real*/)
6533 {
6534  if (!m_modifier.m_amount)
6535  return;
6536 
6537  Unit* target = GetTarget();
6538 
6539  for (uint32 i = SPELL_SCHOOL_NORMAL; i < MAX_SPELL_SCHOOL; ++i)
6540  {
6541  if (m_modifier.m_miscvalue & (1 << i))
6542  {
6543  float oldResist = target->GetTotalResistanceValue(SpellSchools(i));
6544  target->HandleStatModifier(UnitMods(UNIT_MOD_RESISTANCE_START + i), TOTAL_VALUE, float(m_modifier.m_amount), apply);
6545  float change = target->GetTotalResistanceValue(SpellSchools(i)) - oldResist;
6546  // UI bonus/malus info:
6547  target->ApplyResistanceBuffModsMod(SpellSchools(i), (m_modifier.m_amount > 0), apply ? change : -change, apply);
6548  }
6549  }
6550 }
6551 void Aura::HandleModResistancePercent(bool apply, bool /*Real*/)
6552 {
6553  if (!m_modifier.m_amount)
6554  return;
6555 
6556  Unit* target = GetTarget();
6557 
6558  for (uint32 i = SPELL_SCHOOL_NORMAL; i < MAX_SPELL_SCHOOL; ++i)
6559  {
6560  if (m_modifier.m_miscvalue & (1 << i))
6561  {
6562  float oldResist = target->GetTotalResistanceValue(SpellSchools(i));
6563  target->HandleStatModifier(UnitMods(UNIT_MOD_RESISTANCE_START + i), TOTAL_PCT, float(m_modifier.m_amount), apply);
6564  float change = target->GetTotalResistanceValue(SpellSchools(i)) - oldResist;
6565  // UI bonus/malus info:
6566  target->ApplyResistanceBuffModsMod(SpellSchools(i), (m_modifier.m_amount > 0), apply ? change : -change, apply);
6567  }
6568  }
6569 }
6570 
6571 void Aura::HandleModBaseResistance(bool apply, bool /*Real*/)
6572 {
6573  if (!m_modifier.m_amount)
6574  return;
6575 
6576  Unit* target = GetTarget();
6577 
6578  for (uint32 i = SPELL_SCHOOL_NORMAL; i < MAX_SPELL_SCHOOL; ++i)
6579  {
6580  if (m_modifier.m_miscvalue & (1 << i))
6581  target->HandleStatModifier(UnitMods(UNIT_MOD_RESISTANCE_START + i), BASE_VALUE, float(m_modifier.m_amount), apply);
6582  }
6583 }
6584 
6585 void Aura::HandleAuraModBaseResistancePercent(bool apply, bool /*Real*/)
6586 {
6587  if (!m_modifier.m_amount)
6588  return;
6589 
6590  Unit* target = GetTarget();
6591 
6592  for (uint32 i = SPELL_SCHOOL_NORMAL; i < MAX_SPELL_SCHOOL; ++i)
6593  {
6594  if (m_modifier.m_miscvalue & (1 << i))
6595  target->HandleStatModifier(UnitMods(UNIT_MOD_RESISTANCE_START + i), BASE_PCT, float(m_modifier.m_amount), apply);
6596  }
6597 }
6598 
6599 /********************************/
6600 /*** STAT ***/
6601 /********************************/
6602 
6603 void Aura::HandleAuraModStat(bool apply, bool /*Real*/)
6604 {
6605  if (m_modifier.m_miscvalue < -2 || m_modifier.m_miscvalue > 4)
6606  {
6607  sLog.outError("WARNING: Spell %u effect %u have unsupported misc value (%i) for SPELL_AURA_MOD_STAT ", GetId(), GetEffIndex(), m_modifier.m_miscvalue);
6608  return;
6609  }
6610 
6611  Unit* target = GetTarget();
6612 
6613  // Holy Strength amount decrease by 4% each level after 60 From Crusader Enchant
6614  if (apply && GetId() == 20007)
6615  if (GetCaster()->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER && GetCaster()->GetLevel() > 60)
6616  m_modifier.m_amount = int32(m_modifier.m_amount * (1 - (((float(GetCaster()->GetLevel()) - 60) * 4) / 100)));
6617 
6618  if (GetSpellProto()->IsFitToFamilyMask(0x0000000000008000)) // improved scorpid sting
6619  {
6620  if (apply)
6621  {
6622  int32 staminaToRemove = 0;
6623  Unit::AuraList const& auraClassScripts = target->GetAurasByType(SPELL_AURA_OVERRIDE_CLASS_SCRIPTS);
6624  for (Unit::AuraList::const_iterator itr = auraClassScripts.begin(); itr != auraClassScripts.end(); ++itr)
6625  {
6626  switch ((*itr)->GetModifier()->m_miscvalue)
6627  {
6628  case 2388: staminaToRemove = m_modifier.m_amount * 10 / 100; break;
6629  case 2389: staminaToRemove = m_modifier.m_amount * 20 / 100; break;
6630  case 2390: staminaToRemove = m_modifier.m_amount * 30 / 100; break;
6631  }
6632  }
6633  if (staminaToRemove)
6634  GetCaster()->CastCustomSpell(target, 19486, &staminaToRemove, nullptr, nullptr, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
6635  }
6636  else
6637  target->RemoveAurasTriggeredBySpell(GetId(), GetCasterGuid()); // just do it every time, lookup is too time consuming
6638  }
6639 
6640  for (int32 i = STAT_STRENGTH; i < MAX_STATS; ++i)
6641  {
6642  // -1 or -2 is all stats ( misc < -2 checked in function beginning )
6643  if (m_modifier.m_miscvalue < 0 || m_modifier.m_miscvalue == i)
6644  {
6645  float amount = m_removeMode == AURA_REMOVE_BY_GAINED_STACK ? float(m_modifier.m_recentAmount) : float(m_modifier.m_amount);
6646  // m_target->ApplyStatMod(Stats(i), m_modifier.m_amount,apply);
6647  target->HandleStatModifier(UnitMods(UNIT_MOD_STAT_START + i), TOTAL_VALUE, amount, apply);
6648  if (target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER || ((Creature*)target)->IsPet())
6649  target->ApplyStatBuffMod(Stats(i), amount, apply);
6650  }
6651  }
6652 }
6653 
6654 void Aura::HandleModPercentStat(bool apply, bool /*Real*/)
6655 {
6656  if (m_modifier.m_miscvalue < -1 || m_modifier.m_miscvalue > 4)
6657  {
6658  sLog.outError("WARNING: Misc Value for SPELL_AURA_MOD_PERCENT_STAT not valid");
6659  return;
6660  }
6661 
6662  // only players have base stats
6663  if (GetTarget()->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
6664  return;
6665 
6666  for (int32 i = STAT_STRENGTH; i < MAX_STATS; ++i)
6667  {
6668  if (m_modifier.m_miscvalue == i || m_modifier.m_miscvalue == -1)
6669  GetTarget()->HandleStatModifier(UnitMods(UNIT_MOD_STAT_START + i), BASE_PCT, float(m_modifier.m_amount), apply);
6670  }
6671 }
6672 
6673 void Aura::HandleModSpellDamagePercentFromStat(bool /*apply*/, bool /*Real*/)
6674 {
6675  if (GetTarget()->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
6676  return;
6677 
6678  // Magic damage modifiers implemented in Unit::SpellDamageBonusDone
6679  // This information for client side use only
6680  // Recalculate bonus
6681  ((Player*)GetTarget())->UpdateSpellDamageBonus();
6682 }
6683 
6684 void Aura::HandleModSpellHealingPercentFromStat(bool /*apply*/, bool /*Real*/)
6685 {
6686  if (GetTarget()->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
6687  return;
6688 
6689  // Recalculate bonus
6690  ((Player*)GetTarget())->UpdateSpellHealingBonus();
6691 }
6692 
6693 void Aura::HandleAuraModDispelResist(bool apply, bool Real)
6694 {
6695  if (!Real || !apply)
6696  return;
6697 }
6698 
6699 void Aura::HandleModSpellDamagePercentFromAttackPower(bool /*apply*/, bool /*Real*/)
6700 {
6701  if (GetTarget()->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
6702  return;
6703 
6704  // Magic damage modifiers implemented in Unit::SpellDamageBonusDone
6705  // This information for client side use only
6706  // Recalculate bonus
6707  ((Player*)GetTarget())->UpdateSpellDamageBonus();
6708 }
6709 
6710 void Aura::HandleModSpellHealingPercentFromAttackPower(bool /*apply*/, bool /*Real*/)
6711 {
6712  if (GetTarget()->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
6713  return;
6714 
6715  // Recalculate bonus
6716  ((Player*)GetTarget())->UpdateSpellHealingBonus();
6717 }
6718 
6719 void Aura::HandleModHealingDone(bool /*apply*/, bool /*Real*/)
6720 {
6721  if (GetTarget()->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
6722  return;
6723  // implemented in Unit::SpellHealingBonusDone
6724  // this information is for client side only
6725  ((Player*)GetTarget())->UpdateSpellHealingBonus();
6726 }
6727 
6728 void Aura::HandleModTotalPercentStat(bool apply, bool /*Real*/)
6729 {
6730  if (m_modifier.m_miscvalue < -1 || m_modifier.m_miscvalue > 4)
6731  {
6732  sLog.outError("WARNING: Misc Value for SPELL_AURA_MOD_PERCENT_STAT not valid");
6733  return;
6734  }
6735 
6736  Unit* target = GetTarget();
6737 
6738  // save current and max HP before applying aura
6739  uint32 curHPValue = target->GetHealth();
6740  uint32 maxHPValue = target->GetMaxHealth();
6741 
6742  for (int32 i = STAT_STRENGTH; i < MAX_STATS; ++i)
6743  {
6744  if (m_modifier.m_miscvalue == i || m_modifier.m_miscvalue == -1)
6745  {
6746  target->HandleStatModifier(UnitMods(UNIT_MOD_STAT_START + i), TOTAL_PCT, float(m_modifier.m_amount), apply);
6747  if (target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER || ((Creature*)target)->IsPet())
6748  target->ApplyStatPercentBuffMod(Stats(i), float(m_modifier.m_amount), apply);
6749  }
6750  }
6751 
6752  // recalculate current HP/MP after applying aura modifications (only for spells with 0x10 flag)
6753  if (m_modifier.m_miscvalue == STAT_STAMINA && maxHPValue > 0 && GetSpellProto()->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_IS_ABILITY) && target->GetHealth() > 0)
6754  {
6755  // newHP = (curHP / maxHP) * newMaxHP = (newMaxHP * curHP) / maxHP -> which is better because no int -> double -> int conversion is needed
6756  uint32 newHPValue = std::max(1u, (target->GetMaxHealth() * curHPValue) / maxHPValue);
6757  target->SetHealth(newHPValue);
6758  }
6759 }
6760 
6761 void Aura::HandleAuraModResistenceOfStatPercent(bool /*apply*/, bool /*Real*/)
6762 {
6763  if (GetTarget()->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
6764  return;
6765 
6766  if (m_modifier.m_miscvalue != SPELL_SCHOOL_MASK_NORMAL)
6767  {
6768  // support required adding replace UpdateArmor by loop by UpdateResistence at intellect update
6769  // and include in UpdateResistence same code as in UpdateArmor for aura mod apply.
6770  sLog.outError("Aura SPELL_AURA_MOD_RESISTANCE_OF_STAT_PERCENT(182) need adding support for non-armor resistances!");
6771  return;
6772  }
6773 
6774  // Recalculate Armor
6775  GetTarget()->UpdateArmor();
6776 }
6777 
6778 /********************************/
6779 /*** HEAL & ENERGIZE ***/
6780 /********************************/
6781 void Aura::HandleAuraModTotalHealthPercentRegen(bool apply, bool /*Real*/)
6782 {
6783  m_isPeriodic = apply;
6784  if (GetId() == 40409)
6785  {
6786  if (apply)
6787  GetTarget()->SetFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_UNINTERACTIBLE);
6788  else
6789  GetTarget()->RemoveFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_UNINTERACTIBLE);
6790  }
6791 }
6792 
6793 void Aura::HandleAuraModTotalManaPercentRegen(bool apply, bool /*Real*/)
6794 {
6795  if (m_modifier.periodictime == 0)
6796  m_modifier.periodictime = 1000;
6797 
6798  m_periodicTimer = m_modifier.periodictime;
6799  m_isPeriodic = apply;
6800 
6801  if (GetId() == 30024 && !apply && m_removeMode == AURA_REMOVE_BY_DEFAULT) // Shade of Aran drink on interrupt
6802  {
6803  Unit* target = GetTarget();
6804  UnitAI* ai = GetTarget()->AI();
6805  if (ai && target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT)
6806  ai->SendAIEvent(AI_EVENT_CUSTOM_A, target, static_cast<Creature*>(target));
6807  }
6808 }
6809 
6810 void Aura::HandleModRegen(bool apply, bool /*Real*/) // eating
6811 {
6812  if (m_modifier.periodictime == 0)
6813  m_modifier.periodictime = 5000;
6814 
6815  m_periodicTimer = 5000;
6816  m_isPeriodic = apply;
6817 }
6818 
6819 void Aura::HandleModPowerRegen(bool apply, bool Real) // drinking
6820 {
6821  if (!Real)
6822  return;
6823 
6824  Powers powerType = GetTarget()->GetPowerType();
6825  if (m_modifier.periodictime == 0)
6826  {
6827  // Anger Management (only spell use this aura for rage)
6828  if (powerType == POWER_RAGE)
6829  m_modifier.periodictime = 3000;
6830  else
6831  m_modifier.periodictime = 2000;
6832  }
6833 
6834  m_periodicTimer = 5000;
6835 
6836  if (GetTarget()->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER && m_modifier.m_miscvalue == POWER_MANA)
6837  static_cast<Player*>(GetTarget())->UpdateManaRegen();
6838 
6839  m_isPeriodic = apply;
6840 }
6841 
6842 void Aura::HandleModPowerRegenPCT(bool /*apply*/, bool Real)
6843 {
6844  // spells required only Real aura add/remove
6845  if (!Real)
6846  return;
6847 
6848  if (GetTarget()->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
6849  return;
6850 
6851  // Update manaregen value
6852  if (m_modifier.m_miscvalue == POWER_MANA)
6853  static_cast<Player*>(GetTarget())->UpdateManaRegen();
6854  else if (m_modifier.m_miscvalue == POWER_ENERGY)
6855  static_cast<Player*>(GetTarget())->UpdateEnergyRegen();
6856 }
6857 
6858 void Aura::HandleModHealingPCT(bool apply, bool real)
6859 {
6860  switch (GetId())
6861  {
6862  case 41292: // Aura of Suffering - Reliquary of Souls
6863  {
6864  if (apply)
6865  GetTarget()->CastSpell(nullptr, 42017, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
6866  else
6867  GetTarget()->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(42017);
6868  break;
6869  }
6870  }
6871 }
6872 
6873 void Aura::HandleModManaRegen(bool /*apply*/, bool Real)
6874 {
6875  // spells required only Real aura add/remove
6876  if (!Real)
6877  return;
6878 
6879  if (GetTarget()->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
6880  return;
6881 
6882  // Note: an increase in regen does NOT cause threat.
6883  ((Player*)GetTarget())->UpdateManaRegen();
6884 }
6885 
6886 void Aura::HandleComprehendLanguage(bool apply, bool /*Real*/)
6887 {
6888  if (apply)
6889  GetTarget()->SetFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS_2, UNIT_FLAG2_COMPREHEND_LANG);
6890  else
6891  GetTarget()->RemoveFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS_2, UNIT_FLAG2_COMPREHEND_LANG);
6892 }
6893 
6894 void Aura::HandleAuraModIncreaseHealth(bool apply, bool Real)
6895 {
6896  Unit* target = GetTarget();
6897 
6898  switch (GetId())
6899  {
6900  // Special case with temporary increase max/current health
6901  // Cases where we need to manually calculate the amount for the spell (by percentage)
6902  // recalculate to full amount at apply for proper remove
6903  case 54443: // Demonic Empowerment (Voidwalker)
6904  case 55233: // Vampiric Blood
6905  case 61254: // Will of Sartharion (Obsidian Sanctum)
6906  if (Real && apply)
6907  m_modifier.m_amount = target->GetMaxHealth() * m_modifier.m_amount / 100;
6908  // no break here
6909 
6910  // Cases where m_amount already has the correct value (spells cast with CastCustomSpell or absolute values)
6911  case 4148: // Growl of Fortitude
6912  case 12976: // Warrior Last Stand triggered spell (Cast with percentage-value by CastCustomSpell)
6913  case 16609: // Warchief's Blessing
6914  case 28506: // Potion of Heroes (i.22837 - Heroic Potion)
6915  case 28726: // Nightmare Seed
6916  case 31616: // Nature's Guardian (Cast with percentage-value by CastCustomSpell)
6917  case 33053: // Mr Pinchy's Blessing (s.33060 - Make a Wish)
6918  case 33668: // Tenacity (i.28042 - Regal Protectorate)
6919  case 39625: // Elixir of Major Fortitude (i.32062 - Elixir of Major Fortitude)
6920  case 34410: // Hellscream's Warsong (Thrall Nagrand)
6921  case 34511: // Valor (Bulwark of Kings, Bulwark of the Ancient Kings)
6922  case 40464: // Protector's Vigor (i.32501 - Shadowmoon Insignia)
6923  case 40538: // Tenacity (i.32534 - Brooch of the Immortal King)
6924  case 44055: case 55915: case 55917: case 67596: // Tremendous Fortitude (Battlemaster's Alacrity)
6925  case 45049: // Tenacity (i.34428 - Steely Naaru Sliver)
6926  case 46302: // K'iru's Song of Victory (Isle of Quel'Danas Zone Aura)
6927  case 50322: // Survival Instincts (Cast with percentage-value by CastCustomSpell)
6928  case 53479: // Hunter pet - Last Stand (Cast with percentage-value by CastCustomSpell)
6929  case 59465: // Brood Rage (Ahn'Kahet)
6930  {
6931  if (Real)
6932  {
6933  if (apply) // code confirmed for last stand
6934  {
6935  target->HandleStatModifier(UNIT_MOD_HEALTH, TOTAL_VALUE, float(m_modifier.m_amount), apply);
6936  target->ModifyHealth(m_modifier.m_amount);
6937  }
6938  else
6939  {
6940  if (m_removeMode != AURA_REMOVE_BY_DEATH)
6941  {
6942  if (int32(target->GetHealth()) > m_modifier.m_amount)
6943  target->ModifyHealth(-m_modifier.m_amount);
6944  else
6945  target->SetHealth(1);
6946  }
6947 
6948  target->HandleStatModifier(UNIT_MOD_HEALTH, TOTAL_VALUE, float(m_modifier.m_amount), apply);
6949  }
6950  }
6951  return;
6952  }
6953  // confirmed to keep percentage on unapply
6954  case 40604: // Fel Rage - Gurtogg Bloodboil
6955  {
6956  float percentage = target->GetHealthPercent();
6957  target->HandleStatModifier(UNIT_MOD_HEALTH, TOTAL_VALUE, float(m_modifier.m_amount), apply);
6958  if (apply)
6959  target->ModifyHealth(m_modifier.m_amount);
6960  else
6961  target->SetHealthPercent(percentage);
6962  return;
6963  }
6964  case 30421:
6965  {
6966  if (m_removeMode != AURA_REMOVE_BY_GAINED_STACK)
6967  target->HandleStatModifier(UNIT_MOD_HEALTH, TOTAL_VALUE, float(30000 + m_modifier.m_amount), apply);
6968  else
6969  target->HandleStatModifier(UNIT_MOD_HEALTH, TOTAL_VALUE, float(m_modifier.m_recentAmount), apply);
6970  if (apply)
6971  target->SetHealth(target->GetMaxHealth());
6972  else if (m_removeMode == AURA_REMOVE_BY_EXPIRE)
6973  target->CastSpell(target, 38637, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
6974  return;
6975  }
6976  // generic case
6977  default:
6978  if (m_removeMode != AURA_REMOVE_BY_GAINED_STACK)
6979  target->HandleStatModifier(UNIT_MOD_HEALTH, TOTAL_VALUE, float(m_modifier.m_amount), apply);
6980  else
6981  target->HandleStatModifier(UNIT_MOD_HEALTH, TOTAL_VALUE, float(m_modifier.m_recentAmount), apply);
6982  break;
6983  }
6984 }
6985 
6986 void Aura::HandleAuraModIncreaseMaxHealth(bool apply, bool /*Real*/)
6987 {
6988  Unit* target = GetTarget();
6989  uint32 oldhealth = target->GetHealth();
6990  double healthPercentage = (double)oldhealth / (double)target->GetMaxHealth();
6991 
6992  target->HandleStatModifier(UNIT_MOD_HEALTH, TOTAL_VALUE, float(m_modifier.m_amount), apply);
6993 
6994  // refresh percentage
6995  if (oldhealth > 0)
6996  {
6997  uint32 newhealth = std::max(1u, uint32(ceil((double)target->GetMaxHealth() * healthPercentage)));
6998  target->SetHealth(newhealth);
6999  }
7000 }
7001 
7002 void Aura::HandleAuraModIncreaseEnergy(bool apply, bool Real)
7003 {
7004  Unit* target = GetTarget();
7005  Powers powerType = Powers(m_modifier.m_miscvalue);
7006 
7007  UnitMods unitMod = UnitMods(UNIT_MOD_POWER_START + powerType);
7008 
7009  // Special case with temporary increase max/current power (percent)
7010  if (GetId() == 64904) // Hymn of Hope
7011  {
7012  if (Real)
7013  {
7014  uint32 val = target->GetPower(powerType);
7015  target->HandleStatModifier(unitMod, TOTAL_PCT, float(m_modifier.m_amount), apply);
7016  target->SetPower(powerType, apply ? val * (100 + m_modifier.m_amount) / 100 : val * 100 / (100 + m_modifier.m_amount));
7017  }
7018  return;
7019  }
7020 
7021  // generic flat case
7022  target->HandleStatModifier(unitMod, TOTAL_VALUE, float(m_removeMode == AURA_REMOVE_BY_GAINED_STACK ? m_modifier.m_recentAmount : m_modifier.m_amount), apply);
7023 }
7024 
7025 void Aura::HandleAuraModIncreaseEnergyPercent(bool apply, bool /*Real*/)
7026 {
7027  Unit* target = GetTarget();
7028  Powers powerType = Powers(m_modifier.m_miscvalue);
7029 
7030  UnitMods unitMod = UnitMods(UNIT_MOD_POWER_START + powerType);
7031 
7032  target->HandleStatModifier(unitMod, TOTAL_PCT, float(m_modifier.m_amount), apply);
7033  target->ModifyPower(powerType, apply ? m_modifier.m_amount : -m_modifier.m_amount);
7034 }
7035 
7036 void Aura::HandleAuraModIncreaseHealthPercent(bool apply, bool /*Real*/)
7037 {
7038  Unit* target = GetTarget();
7039 
7040  uint32 oldMaxHealth = target->GetMaxHealth();
7041  target->HandleStatModifier(UNIT_MOD_HEALTH, TOTAL_PCT, float(m_modifier.m_amount), apply);
7042 
7043  // spell special cases when current health set to max value at apply
7044  switch (GetId())
7045  {
7046  case 802: // Mutate Bug
7047  case 40851: // Disgruntled
7048  if (apply)
7049  target->ModifyHealth(target->GetMaxHealth() - oldMaxHealth);
7050  break;
7051  case 60430: // Molten Fury
7052  case 64193: // Heartbreak
7053  case 65737: // Heartbreak
7054  target->SetHealth(target->GetMaxHealth());
7055  break;
7056  default:
7057  break;
7058  }
7059 }
7060 
7061 void Aura::HandleAuraIncreaseBaseHealthPercent(bool apply, bool /*Real*/)
7062 {
7063  GetTarget()->HandleStatModifier(UNIT_MOD_HEALTH, BASE_PCT, float(m_modifier.m_amount), apply);
7064 }
7065 
7066 /********************************/
7067 /*** FIGHT ***/
7068 /********************************/
7069 
7070 void Aura::HandleAuraModParryPercent(bool apply, bool /*Real*/)
7071 {
7072  Unit* target = GetTarget();
7073 
7074  if (target->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
7075  {
7076  target->m_modParryChance += (apply ? m_modifier.m_amount : -m_modifier.m_amount);
7077  return;
7078  }
7079 
7080  ((Player*)target)->UpdateParryPercentage();
7081 }
7082 
7083 void Aura::HandleAuraModDodgePercent(bool apply, bool /*Real*/)
7084 {
7085  Unit* target = GetTarget();
7086 
7087  if (target->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
7088  {
7089  target->m_modDodgeChance += (apply ? m_modifier.m_amount : -m_modifier.m_amount);
7090  return;
7091  }
7092 
7093  ((Player*)target)->UpdateDodgePercentage();
7094  // sLog.outError("BONUS DODGE CHANCE: + %f", float(m_modifier.m_amount));
7095 }
7096 
7097 void Aura::HandleAuraModBlockPercent(bool apply, bool /*Real*/)
7098 {
7099  Unit* target = GetTarget();
7100 
7101  if (target->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
7102  {
7103  target->m_modBlockChance += (apply ? m_modifier.m_amount : -m_modifier.m_amount);
7104  return;
7105  }
7106 
7107  ((Player*)target)->UpdateBlockPercentage();
7108  // sLog.outError("BONUS BLOCK CHANCE: + %f", float(m_modifier.m_amount));
7109 }
7110 
7111 void Aura::HandleAuraModRegenInterrupt(bool /*apply*/, bool Real)
7112 {
7113  // spells required only Real aura add/remove
7114  if (!Real)
7115  return;
7116 
7117  if (GetTarget()->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
7118  return;
7119 
7120  ((Player*)GetTarget())->UpdateManaRegen();
7121 }
7122 
7123 void Aura::HandleAuraModCritPercent(bool apply, bool Real)
7124 {
7125  Unit* target = GetTarget();
7126 
7127  if (target->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
7128  {
7129  for (float& i : target->m_modCritChance)
7130  i += (apply ? m_modifier.m_amount : -m_modifier.m_amount);
7131  return;
7132  }
7133 
7134  // apply item specific bonuses for already equipped weapon
7135  if (Real)
7136  {
7137  for (int i = 0; i < MAX_ATTACK; ++i)
7138  if (Item* pItem = ((Player*)target)->GetWeaponForAttack(WeaponAttackType(i), true, false))
7139  ((Player*)target)->_ApplyWeaponDependentAuraCritMod(pItem, WeaponAttackType(i), this, apply);
7140  }
7141 
7142  // mods must be applied base at equipped weapon class and subclass comparison
7143  // with spell->EquippedItemClass and EquippedItemSubClassMask and EquippedItemInventoryTypeMask
7144  // m_modifier.m_miscvalue comparison with item generated damage types
7145 
7146  if (GetSpellProto()->EquippedItemClass == -1)
7147  {
7148  ((Player*)target)->HandleBaseModValue(CRIT_PERCENTAGE, FLAT_MOD, float(m_modifier.m_amount), apply);
7149  ((Player*)target)->HandleBaseModValue(OFFHAND_CRIT_PERCENTAGE, FLAT_MOD, float(m_modifier.m_amount), apply);
7150  ((Player*)target)->HandleBaseModValue(RANGED_CRIT_PERCENTAGE, FLAT_MOD, float(m_modifier.m_amount), apply);
7151  }
7152  else
7153  {
7154  // done in Player::_ApplyWeaponDependentAuraMods
7155  }
7156 }
7157 
7158 void Aura::HandleModHitChance(bool apply, bool /*Real*/)
7159 {
7160  Unit* target = GetTarget();
7161 
7162  if (target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
7163  {
7164  ((Player*)target)->UpdateMeleeHitChances();
7165  ((Player*)target)->UpdateRangedHitChances();
7166  }
7167  else
7168  {
7169  target->m_modMeleeHitChance += (apply ? m_modifier.m_amount : -m_modifier.m_amount);
7170  target->m_modRangedHitChance += (apply ? m_modifier.m_amount : -m_modifier.m_amount);
7171  }
7172 }
7173 
7174 void Aura::HandleModSpellHitChance(bool apply, bool /*Real*/)
7175 {
7176  if (GetTarget()->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
7177  {
7178  ((Player*)GetTarget())->UpdateSpellHitChances();
7179  }
7180  else
7181  {
7182  GetTarget()->m_modSpellHitChance += (apply ? m_modifier.m_amount : -m_modifier.m_amount);
7183  }
7184 }
7185 
7186 void Aura::HandleModSpellCritChance(bool apply, bool Real)
7187 {
7188  // spells required only Real aura add/remove
7189  if (!Real)
7190  return;
7191 
7192  Unit* target = GetTarget();
7193 
7194  if (target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT)
7195  {
7196  for (uint8 school = SPELL_SCHOOL_NORMAL; school < MAX_SPELL_SCHOOL; ++school)
7197  target->m_modSpellCritChance[school] += (apply ? m_modifier.m_amount : -m_modifier.m_amount);
7198  return;
7199  }
7200 
7201  ((Player*)target)->UpdateAllSpellCritChances();
7202 }
7203 
7204 void Aura::HandleModSpellCritChanceShool(bool apply, bool Real)
7205 {
7206  // spells required only Real aura add/remove
7207  if (!Real)
7208  return;
7209 
7210  Unit* target = GetTarget();
7211 
7212  for (uint8 school = SPELL_SCHOOL_NORMAL; school < MAX_SPELL_SCHOOL; ++school)
7213  {
7214  if (m_modifier.m_miscvalue & (1 << school))
7215  {
7216  if (target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT)
7217  target->m_modSpellCritChance[school] += (apply ? m_modifier.m_amount : -m_modifier.m_amount);
7218  else
7219  ((Player*)target)->UpdateSpellCritChance(school);
7220  }
7221  }
7222 }
7223 
7224 /********************************/
7225 /*** ATTACK SPEED ***/
7226 /********************************/
7227 
7228 void Aura::HandleModCastingSpeed(bool apply, bool /*Real*/)
7229 {
7230  Unit* target = GetTarget();
7231  std::set<uint32> exclusiveAuras = { 32182, 2825, 49725 };
7232  if (exclusiveAuras.find(GetId()) != exclusiveAuras.end())
7233  {
7234  auto& auras = target->GetAurasByType(m_modifier.m_auraname);
7235  int32 max = 0;
7236  for (auto& data : auras)
7237  {
7238  if (this != data && exclusiveAuras.find(data->GetId()) != exclusiveAuras.end() && max < data->GetAmount())
7239  max = data->GetAmount();
7240  }
7241  if (m_modifier.m_amount < max)
7242  return;
7243  target->ApplyCastTimePercentMod(float(max), !apply);
7244  }
7245  target->ApplyCastTimePercentMod(float(m_modifier.m_amount), apply);
7246 }
7247 
7248 void Aura::HandleModMeleeRangedSpeedPct(bool apply, bool /*Real*/)
7249 {
7250  Unit* target = GetTarget();
7251  std::set<uint32> exclusiveAuras = { 32182, 2825, 45856 };
7252  if (exclusiveAuras.find(GetId()) != exclusiveAuras.end())
7253  {
7254  auto& auras = target->GetAurasByType(m_modifier.m_auraname);
7255  int32 max = 0;
7256  for (auto& data : auras)
7257  {
7258  if (this != data && exclusiveAuras.find(data->GetId()) != exclusiveAuras.end() && max < data->GetAmount())
7259  max = data->GetAmount();
7260  }
7261  if (m_modifier.m_amount < max)
7262  return;
7263  target->ApplyAttackTimePercentMod(BASE_ATTACK, float(max), !apply);
7264  target->ApplyAttackTimePercentMod(OFF_ATTACK, float(max), !apply);
7265  target->ApplyAttackTimePercentMod(RANGED_ATTACK, float(max), !apply);
7266  }
7267  target->ApplyAttackTimePercentMod(BASE_ATTACK, float(m_modifier.m_amount), apply);
7268  target->ApplyAttackTimePercentMod(OFF_ATTACK, float(m_modifier.m_amount), apply);
7269  target->ApplyAttackTimePercentMod(RANGED_ATTACK, float(m_modifier.m_amount), apply);
7270 }
7271 
7272 void Aura::HandleModCombatSpeedPct(bool apply, bool /*Real*/)
7273 {
7274  Unit* target = GetTarget();
7275  target->ApplyCastTimePercentMod(float(m_modifier.m_amount), apply);
7276  target->ApplyAttackTimePercentMod(BASE_ATTACK, float(m_modifier.m_amount), apply);
7277  target->ApplyAttackTimePercentMod(OFF_ATTACK, float(m_modifier.m_amount), apply);
7278  target->ApplyAttackTimePercentMod(RANGED_ATTACK, float(m_modifier.m_amount), apply);
7279 }
7280 
7281 void Aura::HandleModAttackSpeed(bool apply, bool /*Real*/)
7282 {
7283  GetTarget()->ApplyAttackTimePercentMod(BASE_ATTACK, float(m_modifier.m_amount), apply);
7284 }
7285 
7286 void Aura::HandleModMeleeSpeedPct(bool apply, bool /*Real*/)
7287 {
7288  Unit* target = GetTarget();
7289  target->ApplyAttackTimePercentMod(BASE_ATTACK, float(m_modifier.m_amount), apply);
7290  target->ApplyAttackTimePercentMod(OFF_ATTACK, float(m_modifier.m_amount), apply);
7291 
7292  if (GetId() == 42583)
7293  target->AI()->SendAIEvent(AI_EVENT_CUSTOM_C, target, target, apply);
7294 }
7295 
7296 void Aura::HandleAuraModRangedHaste(bool apply, bool /*Real*/)
7297 {
7298  GetTarget()->ApplyAttackTimePercentMod(RANGED_ATTACK, float(m_modifier.m_amount), apply);
7299 }
7300 
7301 void Aura::HandleRangedAmmoHaste(bool apply, bool /*Real*/)
7302 {
7303  if (GetTarget()->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
7304  return;
7305  GetTarget()->ApplyAttackTimePercentMod(RANGED_ATTACK, float(m_modifier.m_amount), apply);
7306 }
7307 
7308 /********************************/
7309 /*** ATTACK POWER ***/
7310 /********************************/
7311 
7312 void Aura::HandleAuraModAttackPower(bool apply, bool /*Real*/)
7313 {
7314  GetTarget()->HandleStatModifier(UNIT_MOD_ATTACK_POWER, TOTAL_VALUE, float(m_modifier.m_amount), apply);
7315 }
7316 
7317 void Aura::HandleAuraModRangedAttackPower(bool apply, bool /*Real*/)
7318 {
7319  if ((GetTarget()->getClassMask() & CLASSMASK_WAND_USERS) != 0)
7320  return;
7321 
7322  GetTarget()->HandleStatModifier(UNIT_MOD_ATTACK_POWER_RANGED, TOTAL_VALUE, float(m_modifier.m_amount), apply);
7323 }
7324 
7325 void Aura::HandleAuraModAttackPowerPercent(bool apply, bool /*Real*/)
7326 {
7327  // UNIT_FIELD_ATTACK_POWER_MULTIPLIER = multiplier - 1
7328  GetTarget()->HandleStatModifier(UNIT_MOD_ATTACK_POWER, TOTAL_PCT, float(m_modifier.m_amount), apply);
7329 }
7330 
7331 void Aura::HandleAuraModRangedAttackPowerPercent(bool apply, bool /*Real*/)
7332 {
7333  if ((GetTarget()->getClassMask() & CLASSMASK_WAND_USERS) != 0)
7334  return;
7335 
7336  // UNIT_FIELD_RANGED_ATTACK_POWER_MULTIPLIER = multiplier - 1
7337  GetTarget()->HandleStatModifier(UNIT_MOD_ATTACK_POWER_RANGED, TOTAL_PCT, float(m_modifier.m_amount), apply);
7338 }
7339 
7340 void Aura::HandleAuraModRangedAttackPowerOfStatPercent(bool /*apply*/, bool Real)
7341 {
7342  // spells required only Real aura add/remove
7343  if (!Real)
7344  return;
7345 
7346  // Recalculate bonus
7347  if (GetTarget()->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER && !(GetTarget()->getClassMask() & CLASSMASK_WAND_USERS))
7348  ((Player*)GetTarget())->UpdateAttackPowerAndDamage(true);
7349 }
7350 
7351 void Aura::HandleAuraModAttackPowerOfStatPercent(bool /*apply*/, bool Real)
7352 {
7353  // spells required only Real aura add/remove
7354  if (!Real)
7355  return;
7356 
7357  // Recalculate bonus
7358  if (GetTarget()->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
7359  ((Player*)GetTarget())->UpdateAttackPowerAndDamage(false);
7360 }
7361 
7362 void Aura::HandleAuraModAttackPowerOfArmor(bool /*apply*/, bool Real)
7363 {
7364  // spells required only Real aura add/remove
7365  if (!Real)
7366  return;
7367 
7368  // Recalculate bonus
7369  if (GetTarget()->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
7370  ((Player*)GetTarget())->UpdateAttackPowerAndDamage(false);
7371 }
7372 /********************************/
7373 /*** DAMAGE BONUS ***/
7374 /********************************/
7375 void Aura::HandleModDamageDone(bool apply, bool Real)
7376 {
7377  Unit* target = GetTarget();
7378 
7379  // apply item specific bonuses for already equipped weapon
7380  if (Real && target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
7381  {
7382  for (int i = 0; i < MAX_ATTACK; ++i)
7383  if (Item* pItem = ((Player*)target)->GetWeaponForAttack(WeaponAttackType(i), true, false))
7384  ((Player*)target)->_ApplyWeaponDependentAuraDamageMod(pItem, WeaponAttackType(i), this, apply);
7385  }
7386 
7387  // m_modifier.m_miscvalue is bitmask of spell schools
7388  // 1 ( 0-bit ) - normal school damage (SPELL_SCHOOL_MASK_NORMAL)
7389  // 126 - full bitmask all magic damages (SPELL_SCHOOL_MASK_MAGIC) including wands
7390  // 127 - full bitmask any damages
7391  //
7392  // mods must be applied base at equipped weapon class and subclass comparison
7393  // with spell->EquippedItemClass and EquippedItemSubClassMask and EquippedItemInventoryTypeMask
7394  // m_modifier.m_miscvalue comparison with item generated damage types
7395 
7396  if ((m_modifier.m_miscvalue & SPELL_SCHOOL_MASK_NORMAL) != 0)
7397  {
7398  // apply generic physical damage bonuses including wand case
7399  if (GetSpellProto()->EquippedItemClass == -1 || !target->IsPlayer())
7400  {
7401  target->HandleStatModifier(UNIT_MOD_DAMAGE_MAINHAND, TOTAL_VALUE, float(m_modifier.m_amount), apply);
7402  target->HandleStatModifier(UNIT_MOD_DAMAGE_OFFHAND, TOTAL_VALUE, float(m_modifier.m_amount), apply);
7403  target->HandleStatModifier(UNIT_MOD_DAMAGE_RANGED, TOTAL_VALUE, float(m_modifier.m_amount), apply);
7404  }
7405  else
7406  {
7407  // done in Player::_ApplyWeaponDependentAuraMods
7408  }
7409  }
7410 
7411  // Magic damage modifiers implemented in Unit::SpellDamageBonusDone
7412  // This information for client side use only
7413  if (target->IsPlayer())
7414  {
7415  // This information for client side use only
7416  // Recalculate bonus
7417  static_cast<Player*>(GetTarget())->UpdateSpellDamageBonus();
7418  if (Pet* pet = target->GetPet())
7419  pet->UpdateScalingAuras();
7420  }
7421 }
7422 
7423 void Aura::HandleModDamagePercentDone(bool apply, bool Real)
7424 {
7425  DEBUG_FILTER_LOG(LOG_FILTER_SPELL_CAST, "AURA MOD DAMAGE type:%u negative:%u", m_modifier.m_miscvalue, m_positive ? 0 : 1);
7426  Unit* target = GetTarget();
7427 
7428  // apply item specific bonuses for already equipped weapon
7429  if (Real && target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
7430  {
7431  for (int i = 0; i < MAX_ATTACK; ++i)
7432  if (Item* pItem = ((Player*)target)->GetWeaponForAttack(WeaponAttackType(i), true, false))
7433  ((Player*)target)->_ApplyWeaponDependentAuraDamageMod(pItem, WeaponAttackType(i), this, apply);
7434  }
7435 
7436  // m_modifier.m_miscvalue is bitmask of spell schools
7437  // 1 ( 0-bit ) - normal school damage (SPELL_SCHOOL_MASK_NORMAL)
7438  // 126 - full bitmask all magic damages (SPELL_SCHOOL_MASK_MAGIC) including wand
7439  // 127 - full bitmask any damages
7440  //
7441  // mods must be applied base at equipped weapon class and subclass comparison
7442  // with spell->EquippedItemClass and EquippedItemSubClassMask and EquippedItemInventoryTypeMask
7443  // m_modifier.m_miscvalue comparison with item generated damage types
7444 
7445  if ((m_modifier.m_miscvalue & SPELL_SCHOOL_MASK_NORMAL) != 0)
7446  {
7447  // apply generic physical damage bonuses including wand case
7448  if (GetSpellProto()->EquippedItemClass == -1 || target->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
7449  {
7450  target->HandleStatModifier(UNIT_MOD_DAMAGE_MAINHAND, TOTAL_PCT, float(m_modifier.m_amount), apply);
7451  target->HandleStatModifier(UNIT_MOD_DAMAGE_OFFHAND, TOTAL_PCT, float(m_modifier.m_amount), apply);
7452  target->HandleStatModifier(UNIT_MOD_DAMAGE_RANGED, TOTAL_PCT, float(m_modifier.m_amount), apply);
7453 
7454  // For show in client
7455  if (target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
7456  target->ApplyModSignedFloatValue(PLAYER_FIELD_MOD_DAMAGE_DONE_PCT, m_modifier.m_amount / 100.0f, apply);
7457  }
7458  else
7459  {
7460  // done in Player::_ApplyWeaponDependentAuraMods
7461  }
7462  }
7463 
7464  // Skip non magic case for speedup
7465  if ((m_modifier.m_miscvalue & SPELL_SCHOOL_MASK_MAGIC) == 0)
7466  return;
7467 
7468  if (GetSpellProto()->EquippedItemClass != -1 || GetSpellProto()->EquippedItemInventoryTypeMask != 0)
7469  {
7470  // wand magic case (skip generic to all item spell bonuses)
7471  // done in Player::_ApplyWeaponDependentAuraMods
7472 
7473  // Skip item specific requirements for not wand magic damage
7474  return;
7475  }
7476 
7477  // Magic damage percent modifiers implemented in Unit::SpellDamageBonusDone
7478  // Send info to client
7479  if (target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
7480  for (int i = SPELL_SCHOOL_HOLY; i < MAX_SPELL_SCHOOL; ++i)
7481  if (m_modifier.m_miscvalue & (1 << i))
7482  target->ApplyModSignedFloatValue(PLAYER_FIELD_MOD_DAMAGE_DONE_PCT + i, m_modifier.m_amount / 100.0f, apply);
7483 
7484  if (!apply && m_removeMode == AURA_REMOVE_BY_EXPIRE)
7485  if (GetId() == 30423)
7486  target->CastSpell(target, 38639, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
7487 }
7488 
7489 void Aura::HandleModOffhandDamagePercent(bool apply, bool Real)
7490 {
7491  // spells required only Real aura add/remove
7492  if (!Real)
7493  return;
7494 
7495  DEBUG_FILTER_LOG(LOG_FILTER_SPELL_CAST, "AURA MOD OFFHAND DAMAGE");
7496 
7497  GetTarget()->HandleStatModifier(UNIT_MOD_DAMAGE_OFFHAND, TOTAL_PCT, float(m_modifier.m_amount), apply);
7498 }
7499 
7500 /********************************/
7501 /*** POWER COST ***/
7502 /********************************/
7503 
7504 void Aura::HandleModPowerCostPCT(bool apply, bool Real)
7505 {
7506  // spells required only Real aura add/remove
7507  if (!Real)
7508  return;
7509 
7510  Unit* target = GetTarget();
7511 
7512  float amount = (m_removeMode == AURA_REMOVE_BY_GAINED_STACK ? m_modifier.m_recentAmount : m_modifier.m_amount) / 100.0f;
7513  for (int i = 0; i < MAX_SPELL_SCHOOL; ++i)
7514  if (m_modifier.m_miscvalue & (1 << i))
7515  target->ApplyModSignedFloatValue(UNIT_FIELD_POWER_COST_MULTIPLIER + i, amount, apply);
7516 
7517  if (!apply && m_removeMode == AURA_REMOVE_BY_EXPIRE)
7518  if (GetId() == 30422)
7519  target->CastSpell(target, 38638, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
7520 }
7521 
7522 void Aura::HandleModPowerCost(bool apply, bool Real)
7523 {
7524  // spells required only Real aura add/remove
7525  if (!Real)
7526  return;
7527 
7528  for (int i = 0; i < MAX_SPELL_SCHOOL; ++i)
7529  if (m_modifier.m_miscvalue & (1 << i))
7530  GetTarget()->ApplyModInt32Value(UNIT_FIELD_POWER_COST_MODIFIER + i, m_modifier.m_amount, apply);
7531 }
7532 
7533 void Aura::HandleNoReagentUseAura(bool /*Apply*/, bool Real)
7534 {
7535  // spells required only Real aura add/remove
7536  if (!Real)
7537  return;
7538  Unit* target = GetTarget();
7539  if (target->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
7540  return;
7541 
7542  ClassFamilyMask mask;
7543  Unit::AuraList const& noReagent = target->GetAurasByType(SPELL_AURA_NO_REAGENT_USE);
7544  for (auto i : noReagent)
7545  mask |= i->GetAuraSpellClassMask();
7546 
7547  target->SetUInt64Value(PLAYER_NO_REAGENT_COST_1 + 0, mask.Flags);
7548  target->SetUInt32Value(PLAYER_NO_REAGENT_COST_1 + 2, mask.Flags2);
7549 }
7550 
7551 /*********************************************************/
7552 /*** OTHERS ***/
7553 /*********************************************************/
7554 
7555 void Aura::HandleShapeshiftBoosts(bool apply)
7556 {
7557  uint32 spellId1 = 0;
7558  uint32 spellId2 = 0;
7559  uint32 HotWSpellId = 0;
7560  uint32 MasterShaperSpellId = 0;
7561 
7562  ShapeshiftForm form = ShapeshiftForm(GetModifier()->m_miscvalue);
7563 
7564  Unit* target = GetTarget();
7565 
7566  switch (form)
7567  {
7568  case FORM_CAT:
7569  spellId1 = 3025;
7570  HotWSpellId = 24900;
7571  MasterShaperSpellId = 48420;
7572  break;
7573  case FORM_TREE:
7574  spellId1 = 5420;
7575  spellId2 = 34123;
7576  MasterShaperSpellId = 48422;
7577  break;
7578  case FORM_TRAVEL:
7579  spellId1 = 5419;
7580  break;
7581  case FORM_AQUA:
7582  spellId1 = 5421;
7583  break;
7584  case FORM_BEAR:
7585  spellId1 = 1178;
7586  spellId2 = 21178;
7587  HotWSpellId = 24899;
7588  MasterShaperSpellId = 48418;
7589  break;
7590  case FORM_DIREBEAR:
7591  spellId1 = 9635;
7592  spellId2 = 21178;
7593  HotWSpellId = 24899;
7594  MasterShaperSpellId = 48418;
7595  break;
7596  case FORM_BATTLESTANCE:
7597  spellId1 = 21156;
7598  break;
7599  case FORM_DEFENSIVESTANCE:
7600  spellId1 = 7376;
7601  break;
7602  case FORM_BERSERKERSTANCE:
7603  spellId1 = 7381;
7604  break;
7605  case FORM_MOONKIN:
7606  spellId1 = 24905;
7607  spellId2 = 69366;
7608  MasterShaperSpellId = 48421;
7609  break;
7610  case FORM_FLIGHT:
7611  spellId1 = 33948;
7612  spellId2 = 34764;
7613  break;
7614  case FORM_FLIGHT_EPIC:
7615  spellId1 = 40122;
7616  spellId2 = 40121;
7617  break;
7618  case FORM_METAMORPHOSIS:
7619  spellId1 = 54817;
7620  spellId2 = 54879;
7621  break;
7622  case FORM_SPIRITOFREDEMPTION:
7623  spellId1 = 27792;
7624  spellId2 = 27795; // must be second, this important at aura remove to prevent to early iterator invalidation.
7625  break;
7626  case FORM_SHADOW:
7627  spellId1 = 49868;
7628  spellId2 = 71167;
7629 
7630  if (target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER) // Spell 49868 have same category as main form spell and share cooldown
7631  target->RemoveSpellCooldown(49868);
7632  break;
7633  case FORM_GHOSTWOLF:
7634  spellId1 = 67116;
7635  break;
7636  case FORM_AMBIENT:
7637  case FORM_GHOUL:
7638  case FORM_STEALTH:
7639  case FORM_CREATURECAT:
7640  case FORM_CREATUREBEAR:
7641  case FORM_STEVES_GHOUL:
7642  case FORM_THARONJA_SKELETON:
7643  case FORM_TEST_OF_STRENGTH:
7644  case FORM_BLB_PLAYER:
7645  case FORM_SHADOW_DANCE:
7646  case FORM_TEST:
7647  case FORM_ZOMBIE:
7648  case FORM_UNDEAD:
7649  case FORM_FRENZY:
7650  case FORM_NONE:
7651  break;
7652  default:
7653  break;
7654  }
7655 
7656  if (apply)
7657  {
7658  if (spellId1)
7659  target->CastSpell(nullptr, spellId1, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, nullptr, this);
7660  if (spellId2)
7661  target->CastSpell(nullptr, spellId2, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, nullptr, this);
7662 
7663  if (target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
7664  {
7665  const PlayerSpellMap& sp_list = ((Player*)target)->GetSpellMap();
7666  for (const auto& itr : sp_list)
7667  {
7668  if (itr.second.state == PLAYERSPELL_REMOVED) continue;
7669  if (itr.first == spellId1 || itr.first == spellId2) continue;
7670  SpellEntry const* spellInfo = sSpellTemplate.LookupEntry<SpellEntry>(itr.first);
7671  if (!spellInfo || !IsNeedCastSpellAtFormApply(spellInfo, form))
7672  continue;
7673  target->CastSpell(nullptr, itr.first, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, nullptr, this);
7674  }
7675  // remove auras that do not require shapeshift, but are not active in this specific form (like Improved Barkskin)
7676  Unit::SpellAuraHolderMap& tAuras = target->GetSpellAuraHolderMap();
7677  for (Unit::SpellAuraHolderMap::iterator itr = tAuras.begin(); itr != tAuras.end();)
7678  {
7679  SpellEntry const* spellInfo = itr->second->GetSpellProto();
7680  if (itr->second->IsPassive() && spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX2_ALLOW_WHILE_NOT_SHAPESHIFTED)
7681  && (spellInfo->StancesNot[0] & (1 << (form - 1))))
7682  {
7683  target->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(itr->second->GetId());
7684  itr = tAuras.begin();
7685  }
7686  else
7687  ++itr;
7688  }
7689 
7690  // Master Shapeshifter
7691  if (MasterShaperSpellId)
7692  {
7693  Unit::AuraList const& ShapeShifterAuras = target->GetAurasByType(SPELL_AURA_DUMMY);
7694  for (auto ShapeShifterAura : ShapeShifterAuras)
7695  {
7696  if (ShapeShifterAura->GetSpellProto()->SpellIconID == 2851)
7697  {
7698  int32 ShiftMod = ShapeShifterAura->GetModifier()->m_amount;
7699  target->CastCustomSpell(nullptr, MasterShaperSpellId, &ShiftMod, nullptr, nullptr, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
7700  break;
7701  }
7702  }
7703  }
7704 
7705  // Leader of the Pack
7706  if (((Player*)target)->HasSpell(17007))
7707  {
7708  SpellEntry const* spellInfo = sSpellTemplate.LookupEntry<SpellEntry>(24932);
7709  if (spellInfo && spellInfo->Stances[0] & (1 << (form - 1)))
