7710  target->CastSpell(nullptr, 24932, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, nullptr, this);
7711  }
7712 
7713  // Savage Roar
7714  if (form == FORM_CAT && ((Player*)target)->HasAura(52610))
7715  target->CastSpell(nullptr, 62071, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
7716 
7717  // Survival of the Fittest (Armor part)
7718  if (form == FORM_BEAR || form == FORM_DIREBEAR)
7719  {
7720  Unit::AuraList const& modAuras = target->GetAurasByType(SPELL_AURA_MOD_TOTAL_STAT_PERCENTAGE);
7721  for (auto modAura : modAuras)
7722  {
7723  if (modAura->GetSpellProto()->SpellFamilyName == SPELLFAMILY_DRUID &&
7724  modAura->GetSpellProto()->SpellIconID == 961)
7725  {
7726  int32 bp = modAura->GetSpellProto()->CalculateSimpleValue(EFFECT_INDEX_2);
7727  if (bp)
7728  target->CastCustomSpell(nullptr, 62069, &bp, nullptr, nullptr, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, nullptr, this);
7729  break;
7730  }
7731  }
7732  }
7733 
7734  // Improved Moonkin Form
7735  if (form == FORM_MOONKIN)
7736  {
7737  Unit::AuraList const& dummyAuras = target->GetAurasByType(SPELL_AURA_DUMMY);
7738  for (auto dummyAura : dummyAuras)
7739  {
7740  if (dummyAura->GetSpellProto()->SpellFamilyName == SPELLFAMILY_DRUID &&
7741  dummyAura->GetSpellProto()->SpellIconID == 2855)
7742  {
7743  uint32 spell_id = 0;
7744  switch (dummyAura->GetId())
7745  {
7746  case 48384: spell_id = 50170; break; // Rank 1
7747  case 48395: spell_id = 50171; break; // Rank 2
7748  case 48396: spell_id = 50172; break; // Rank 3
7749  default:
7750  sLog.outError("Aura::HandleShapeshiftBoosts: Not handled rank of IMF (Spell: %u)", dummyAura->GetId());
7751  break;
7752  }
7753 
7754  if (spell_id)
7755  target->CastSpell(nullptr, spell_id, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, nullptr, this);
7756  break;
7757  }
7758  }
7759  }
7760 
7761  // Heart of the Wild
7762  if (HotWSpellId)
7763  {
7764  Unit::AuraList const& mModTotalStatPct = target->GetAurasByType(SPELL_AURA_MOD_TOTAL_STAT_PERCENTAGE);
7765  for (auto i : mModTotalStatPct)
7766  {
7767  if (i->GetSpellProto()->SpellIconID == 240 && i->GetModifier()->m_miscvalue == 3)
7768  {
7769  int32 HotWMod = i->GetModifier()->m_amount / 2;
7770  target->CastCustomSpell(nullptr, HotWSpellId, &HotWMod, nullptr, nullptr, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, nullptr, this);
7771  break;
7772  }
7773  }
7774  }
7775  }
7776  }
7777  else
7778  {
7779  if (spellId1)
7780  target->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(spellId1);
7781  if (spellId2)
7782  target->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(spellId2);
7783  if (MasterShaperSpellId)
7784  target->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(MasterShaperSpellId);
7785 
7786  if (target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
7787  {
7788  // re-apply passive spells that don't need shapeshift but were inactive in current form:
7789  const PlayerSpellMap& sp_list = ((Player*)target)->GetSpellMap();
7790  for (const auto& itr : sp_list)
7791  {
7792  if (itr.second.state == PLAYERSPELL_REMOVED) continue;
7793  if (itr.first == spellId1 || itr.first == spellId2) continue;
7794  SpellEntry const* spellInfo = sSpellTemplate.LookupEntry<SpellEntry>(itr.first);
7795  if (!spellInfo || !IsPassiveSpell(spellInfo))
7796  continue;
7797  if (spellInfo->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX2_ALLOW_WHILE_NOT_SHAPESHIFTED) && (spellInfo->StancesNot[0] & (1 << (form - 1))))
7798  target->CastSpell(nullptr, itr.first, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, nullptr, this);
7799  }
7800  }
7801 
7802  Unit::SpellAuraHolderMap& tAuras = target->GetSpellAuraHolderMap();
7803  for (Unit::SpellAuraHolderMap::iterator itr = tAuras.begin(); itr != tAuras.end();)
7804  {
7805  if (itr->second->IsRemovedOnShapeLost())
7806  {
7807  target->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(itr->second->GetId());
7808  itr = tAuras.begin();
7809  }
7810  else
7811  ++itr;
7812  }
7813  }
7814 }
7815 
7816 void Aura::HandleAuraEmpathy(bool apply, bool /*Real*/)
7817 {
7818  Unit* target = GetTarget();
7819 
7820  // This aura is expected to only work with CREATURE_TYPE_BEAST or players
7821  CreatureInfo const* ci = ObjectMgr::GetCreatureTemplate(target->GetEntry());
7822  if (target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER || (target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT && ci && ci->CreatureType == CREATURE_TYPE_BEAST))
7823  target->ApplyModUInt32Value(UNIT_DYNAMIC_FLAGS, UNIT_DYNFLAG_SPECIALINFO, apply);
7824 
7825  if (apply)
7826  {
7827  if (Unit* caster = GetCaster())
7828  {
7829  if (Player* playerCaster = caster->IsPlayer() ? static_cast<Player*>(caster) : nullptr)
7830  {
7831  UpdateData updateData;
7832  target->BuildValuesUpdateBlockForPlayerWithFlags(updateData, playerCaster, UpdateFieldFlags(UF_FLAG_SPECIAL_INFO | UF_FLAG_DYNAMIC));
7833  updateData.SendData(*playerCaster->GetSession());
7834  }
7835  }
7836  }
7837 }
7838 
7839 void Aura::HandleAuraUntrackable(bool apply, bool /*Real*/)
7840 {
7841  if (apply)
7842  GetTarget()->SetVisFlags(UNIT_VIS_FLAG_UNTRACKABLE);
7843  else
7844  GetTarget()->RemoveVisFlags(UNIT_VIS_FLAG_UNTRACKABLE);
7845 }
7846 
7847 void Aura::HandleAuraModPacify(bool apply, bool /*Real*/)
7848 {
7849  if (apply)
7850  GetTarget()->SetFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_PACIFIED);
7851  else
7852  GetTarget()->RemoveFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_PACIFIED);
7853 }
7854 
7855 void Aura::HandleAuraModPacifyAndSilence(bool apply, bool Real)
7856 {
7857  HandleAuraModPacify(apply, Real);
7858  HandleAuraModSilence(apply, Real);
7859  if (!apply && GetId() == 42354) // Anzu - Banish
7860  if (UnitAI* ai = GetTarget()->AI())
7861  ai->SendAIEvent(AI_EVENT_CUSTOM_A, GetTarget(), GetTarget());
7862 }
7863 
7864 void Aura::HandleAuraGhost(bool apply, bool /*Real*/)
7865 {
7866  Unit* target = GetTarget();
7867  Player* player = target->IsPlayer() ? (Player*)target : nullptr;
7868 
7869  if (apply)
7870  {
7871  target->SetVisFlags(UNIT_VIS_FLAG_GHOST);
7872  if (player)
7873  {
7874  player->SetFlag(PLAYER_FLAGS, PLAYER_FLAGS_GHOST);
7875  if (!player->HasAuraType(SPELL_AURA_WATER_WALK))
7876  player->SetWaterWalk(true);
7877  }
7878  }
7879  else
7880  {
7881  target->RemoveVisFlags(UNIT_VIS_FLAG_GHOST);
7882  if (player)
7883  {
7884  player->RemoveFlag(PLAYER_FLAGS, PLAYER_FLAGS_GHOST);
7885  if (!player->HasAuraType(SPELL_AURA_WATER_WALK))
7886  player->SetWaterWalk(false);
7887  }
7888  }
7889 
7890  if (player && player->GetGroup())
7891  player->SetGroupUpdateFlag(GROUP_UPDATE_FLAG_STATUS);
7892 }
7893 
7894 void Aura::HandleAuraAllowFlight(bool apply, bool Real)
7895 {
7896  // all applied/removed only at real aura add/remove
7897  if (!Real)
7898  return;
7899 
7900  GetTarget()->SetCanFly(apply);
7901 }
7902 
7903 void Aura::HandleModRating(bool apply, bool Real)
7904 {
7905  // spells required only Real aura add/remove
7906  if (!Real)
7907  return;
7908 
7909  if (GetTarget()->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
7910  return;
7911 
7912  for (uint32 rating = 0; rating < MAX_COMBAT_RATING; ++rating)
7913  if (m_modifier.m_miscvalue & (1 << rating))
7914  ((Player*)GetTarget())->ApplyRatingMod(CombatRating(rating), m_modifier.m_amount, apply);
7915 }
7916 
7917 void Aura::HandleModRatingFromStat(bool apply, bool Real)
7918 {
7919  // spells required only Real aura add/remove
7920  if (!Real)
7921  return;
7922 
7923  if (GetTarget()->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
7924  return;
7925  // Just recalculate ratings
7926  for (uint32 rating = 0; rating < MAX_COMBAT_RATING; ++rating)
7927  if (m_modifier.m_miscvalue & (1 << rating))
7928  ((Player*)GetTarget())->ApplyRatingMod(CombatRating(rating), 0, apply);
7929 }
7930 
7931 void Aura::HandleForceMoveForward(bool apply, bool Real)
7932 {
7933  if (!Real)
7934  return;
7935 
7936  if (apply)
7937  GetTarget()->SetFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS_2, UNIT_FLAG2_FORCE_MOVE);
7938  else
7939  GetTarget()->RemoveFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS_2, UNIT_FLAG2_FORCE_MOVE);
7940 }
7941 
7942 void Aura::HandleAuraModExpertise(bool /*apply*/, bool /*Real*/)
7943 {
7944  if (GetTarget()->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
7945  return;
7946 
7947  ((Player*)GetTarget())->UpdateExpertise(BASE_ATTACK);
7948  ((Player*)GetTarget())->UpdateExpertise(OFF_ATTACK);
7949 }
7950 
7951 void Aura::HandleModTargetResistance(bool apply, bool Real)
7952 {
7953  // spells required only Real aura add/remove
7954  if (!Real)
7955  return;
7956  Unit* target = GetTarget();
7957  // applied to damage as HandleNoImmediateEffect in Unit::CalculateAbsorbAndResist and Unit::CalcArmorReducedDamage
7958  // show armor penetration
7959  if (target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER && (m_modifier.m_miscvalue & SPELL_SCHOOL_MASK_NORMAL))
7960  target->ApplyModInt32Value(PLAYER_FIELD_MOD_TARGET_PHYSICAL_RESISTANCE, m_modifier.m_amount, apply);
7961 
7962  // show as spell penetration only full spell penetration bonuses (all resistances except armor and holy
7963  if (target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER && (m_modifier.m_miscvalue & SPELL_SCHOOL_MASK_SPELL) == SPELL_SCHOOL_MASK_SPELL)
7964  target->ApplyModInt32Value(PLAYER_FIELD_MOD_TARGET_RESISTANCE, m_modifier.m_amount, apply);
7965 }
7966 
7967 void Aura::HandleShieldBlockValue(bool apply, bool /*Real*/)
7968 {
7969  BaseModType modType = FLAT_MOD;
7970  if (m_modifier.m_auraname == SPELL_AURA_MOD_SHIELD_BLOCKVALUE_PCT)
7971  modType = PCT_MOD;
7972 
7973  if (GetTarget()->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
7974  ((Player*)GetTarget())->HandleBaseModValue(SHIELD_BLOCK_VALUE, modType, float(m_modifier.m_amount), apply);
7975 }
7976 
7977 void Aura::HandleAuraRetainComboPoints(bool apply, bool Real)
7978 {
7979  // spells required only Real aura add/remove
7980  if (!Real)
7981  return;
7982 
7983  if (GetTarget()->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
7984  return;
7985 
7986  Player* target = (Player*)GetTarget();
7987 
7988  // combo points was added in SPELL_EFFECT_ADD_COMBO_POINTS handler
7989  // remove only if aura expire by time (in case combo points amount change aura removed without combo points lost)
7990  if (!apply && m_removeMode == AURA_REMOVE_BY_EXPIRE && target->GetComboTargetGuid())
7991  if (Unit* unit = ObjectAccessor::GetUnit(*GetTarget(), target->GetComboTargetGuid()))
7992  target->AddComboPoints(unit, -m_modifier.m_amount);
7993 }
7994 
7995 void Aura::HandleModUnattackable(bool apply, bool Real)
7996 {
7997  Unit* target = GetTarget();
7998 
7999  target->ApplyModFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_UNTARGETABLE, apply);
8000 
8001  if (Real && apply)
8002  {
8003  if (target->HasFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_PLAYER_CONTROLLED))
8004  {
8005  InstanceData* instance = target->GetInstanceData();
8006  if (instance && sWorld.getConfig(CONFIG_BOOL_INSTANCE_STRICT_COMBAT_LOCKDOWN) && instance->IsEncounterInProgress())
8007  target->AttackStop(true, false, true);
8008  else
8009  target->CombatStop();
8010  }
8011  else
8012  target->AttackStop(true, false, true);
8013  }
8014 }
8015 
8016 void Aura::HandleSpiritOfRedemption(bool apply, bool Real)
8017 {
8018  // spells required only Real aura add/remove
8019  if (!Real)
8020  return;
8021 
8022  Unit* target = GetTarget();
8023 
8024  target->ApplySpellImmune(this, IMMUNITY_DAMAGE, 255, apply); // wotlk style hack - immunity against all damage
8025 
8026  // prepare spirit state
8027  if (apply)
8028  {
8029  if (target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
8030  {
8031  // set stand state (expected in this form)
8032  if (!target->IsStandState())
8033  target->SetStandState(UNIT_STAND_STATE_STAND);
8034  }
8035 
8036  // interrupt casting when entering Spirit of Redemption
8037  if (target->IsNonMeleeSpellCasted(false))
8038  target->InterruptNonMeleeSpells(false);
8039 
8040  // set health and mana to maximum
8041  target->SetPower(POWER_MANA, target->GetMaxPower(POWER_MANA));
8042  }
8043  // die at aura end
8044  else
8045  target->CastSpell(nullptr, 27965, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED); // Suicide
8046 }
8047 
8048 void Aura::HandleSchoolAbsorb(bool apply, bool Real)
8049 {
8050  if (!Real)
8051  return;
8052 
8053  Unit* caster = GetCaster();
8054  if (!caster)
8055  return;
8056 
8057  Unit* target = GetTarget();
8058  SpellEntry const* spellProto = GetSpellProto();
8059  if (!apply)
8060  {
8061  switch (spellProto->Id)
8062  {
8063  case 33810: // Rock Shell
8064  if (m_removeMode == AURA_REMOVE_BY_SHIELD_BREAK)
8065  caster->CastSpell(caster, 33811, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, nullptr, this);
8066  break;
8067  }
8068  if (caster &&
8069  // Power Word: Shield
8070  spellProto->SpellFamilyName == SPELLFAMILY_PRIEST && spellProto->Mechanic == MECHANIC_SHIELD &&
8071  (spellProto->SpellFamilyFlags & uint64(0x0000000000000001)) &&
8072  // completely absorbed or dispelled
8073  (m_removeMode == AURA_REMOVE_BY_SHIELD_BREAK || m_removeMode == AURA_REMOVE_BY_DISPEL))
8074  {
8075  Unit::AuraList const& vDummyAuras = caster->GetAurasByType(SPELL_AURA_DUMMY);
8076  for (auto vDummyAura : vDummyAuras)
8077  {
8078  SpellEntry const* vSpell = vDummyAura->GetSpellProto();
8079 
8080  // Rapture (main spell)
8081  if (vSpell->SpellFamilyName == SPELLFAMILY_PRIEST && vSpell->SpellIconID == 2894 && vSpell->Effect[EFFECT_INDEX_1])
8082  {
8083  switch (vDummyAura->GetEffIndex())
8084  {
8085  case EFFECT_INDEX_0:
8086  {
8087  // energize caster
8088  int32 manapct1000 = 5 * (vDummyAura->GetModifier()->m_amount + sSpellMgr.GetSpellRank(vSpell->Id));
8089  int32 basepoints0 = caster->GetMaxPower(POWER_MANA) * manapct1000 / 1000;
8090  caster->CastCustomSpell(caster, 47755, &basepoints0, nullptr, nullptr, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
8091  break;
8092  }
8093  case EFFECT_INDEX_1:
8094  {
8095  // energize target
8096  if (!roll_chance_i(vDummyAura->GetModifier()->m_amount) || caster->HasAura(63853))
8097  break;
8098 
8099  switch (target->GetPowerType())
8100  {
8101  case POWER_RUNIC_POWER:
8102  target->CastSpell(target, 63652, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, nullptr, nullptr, GetCasterGuid());
8103  break;
8104  case POWER_RAGE:
8105  target->CastSpell(target, 63653, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, nullptr, nullptr, GetCasterGuid());
8106  break;
8107  case POWER_MANA:
8108  {
8109  int32 basepoints0 = target->GetMaxPower(POWER_MANA) * 2 / 100;
8110  target->CastCustomSpell(target, 63654, &basepoints0, nullptr, nullptr, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
8111  break;
8112  }
8113  case POWER_ENERGY:
8114  target->CastSpell(target, 63655, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, nullptr, nullptr, GetCasterGuid());
8115  break;
8116  default:
8117  break;
8118  }
8119 
8120  // cooldown aura
8121  caster->CastSpell(caster, 63853, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
8122  break;
8123  }
8124  default:
8125  sLog.outError("Changes in R-dummy spell???: effect 3");
8126  break;
8127  }
8128  }
8129  }
8130  }
8131  }
8132 }
8133 
8134 void Aura::PeriodicTick()
8135 {
8136  Unit* target = GetTarget();
8137  // passive periodic trigger spells should not be updated when dead, only death persistent should
8138  if (!target->IsAlive() && GetHolder()->IsPassive())
8139  return;
8140 
8141  SpellEntry const* spellProto = GetSpellProto();
8142 
8143  switch (m_modifier.m_auraname)
8144  {
8145  case SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_DAMAGE:
8146  case SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_DAMAGE_PERCENT:
8147  {
8148  // don't damage target if not alive, possible death persistent effects
8149  if (!target->IsAlive())
8150  break;
8151 
8152  Unit* caster = GetCaster();
8153 
8154  // ignore non positive values (can be result apply spellmods to aura damage
8155  uint32 amount = m_modifier.m_amount > 0 ? m_modifier.m_amount : 0;
8156 
8157  uint32 pdamage;
8158  if (m_modifier.m_auraname == SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_DAMAGE)
8159  pdamage = amount;
8160  else
8161  pdamage = uint32(target->GetMaxHealth() * amount / 100);
8162 
8163  // some auras remove at specific health level or more or have damage interactions
8164  bool breakSwitch = false;
8165  bool overrideImmune = false;
8166  switch (GetId())
8167  {
8168  case 43093: case 31956: case 38801:
8169  case 35321: case 38363: case 39215:
8170  case 48920:
8171  {
8172  if (target->GetHealth() == target->GetMaxHealth())
8173  {
8174  target->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(GetId());
8175  breakSwitch = true;
8176  }
8177  break;
8178  }
8179  case 38772:
8180  {
8181  uint32 percent =
8182  GetEffIndex() < EFFECT_INDEX_2 && spellProto->Effect[GetEffIndex()] == SPELL_EFFECT_DUMMY ?
8183  caster->CalculateSpellEffectValue(target, spellProto, SpellEffectIndex(GetEffIndex() + 1)) :
8184  100;
8185  if (target->GetHealth() * 100 >= target->GetMaxHealth() * percent)
8186  {
8187  target->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(GetId());
8188  breakSwitch = true;
8189  }
8190  break;
8191  }
8192  case 29964: // Dragons Breath
8193  {
8194  target->CastSpell(nullptr, 29965, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
8195  break;
8196  }
8197  case 40932: // Agonizing Flames - Illidan
8198  {
8199  if (GetAuraTicks() % 3 == 0) // increased damage after every 3rd tick
8200  m_modifier.m_amount += m_modifier.m_baseAmount;
8201  break;
8202  }
8203  case 41337: // Aura of Anger
8204  {
8205  m_modifier.m_amount += m_modifier.m_baseAmount;
8206  if (Aura* aura = GetHolder()->m_auras[EFFECT_INDEX_1])
8207  {
8208  aura->ApplyModifier(false, true);
8209  aura->m_modifier.m_amount += aura->m_modifier.m_baseAmount;
8210  aura->ApplyModifier(true, true);
8211  }
8212  // during normal immunities - ticks, only doesnt tick during spite
8213  overrideImmune = (target->HasAura(41376) || target->HasAura(41377));
8214  break;
8215  }
8216  default:
8217  break;
8218  }
8219  if (breakSwitch)
8220  break;
8221 
8222  OnPeriodicCalculateAmount(pdamage);
8223 
8224  if (spellProto->Effect[GetEffIndex()] == SPELL_EFFECT_PERSISTENT_AREA_AURA) // safe case - caster always will exist
8225  {
8226  if (!caster)
8227  {
8228  sLog.outCustomLog("Spell ID: %u Caster guid %lu", spellProto->Id, GetCasterGuid().GetRawValue());
8229  MANGOS_ASSERT(caster);
8230  }
8231  if (Unit::SpellHitResult(caster, target, spellProto, (1 << GetEffIndex()), false) != SPELL_MISS_NONE)
8232  break;
8233  }
8234 
8235  // Check for immune (not use charges)
8236  // Aura of anger - video evidence confirms this, but attribute is legit because aura is still applied during
8237  if (!spellProto->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_NO_IMMUNITIES) || overrideImmune) // confirmed Impaling spine goes through immunity
8238  {
8239  if (target->IsImmuneToDamage(GetSpellSchoolMask(spellProto)))
8240  {
8241  Unit::SendSpellOrDamageImmune(GetCasterGuid(), target, spellProto->Id);
8242  break;
8243  }
8244  }
8245 
8246  uint32 absorb = 0;
8247  int32 resist = 0;
8248 
8249  bool isNotBleed = GetEffectMechanic(spellProto, m_effIndex) != MECHANIC_BLEED;
8250 
8251  // SpellDamageBonus for magic spells
8252  if ((spellProto->DmgClass == SPELL_DAMAGE_CLASS_NONE && isNotBleed) || spellProto->DmgClass == SPELL_DAMAGE_CLASS_MAGIC)
8253  pdamage = target->SpellDamageBonusTaken(caster, SpellSchoolMask(spellProto->SchoolMask), spellProto, pdamage, DOT, GetStackAmount());
8254  // MeleeDamagebonus for weapon based spells
8255  else
8256  {
8257  WeaponAttackType attackType = GetWeaponAttackType(spellProto);
8258  pdamage = target->MeleeDamageBonusTaken(caster, pdamage, attackType, SpellSchoolMask(spellProto->SchoolMask), spellProto, DOT, GetStackAmount());
8259  }
8260 
8261  // This method can modify pdamage
8262  bool isCrit = false;
8263  if (caster)
8264  {
8265  isCrit = IsCritFromAbilityAura(caster, pdamage);
8266  // only from players
8267  // FIXME: need use SpellDamageBonus instead?
8268  if (caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
8269  pdamage -= target->GetResilienceRatingDamageReduction(pdamage, SpellDmgClass(spellProto->DmgClass), true);
8270  }
8271 
8272  target->CalculateDamageAbsorbAndResist(caster, GetSpellSchoolMask(spellProto), DOT, pdamage, &absorb, &resist, IsReflectableSpell(spellProto), IsResistableSpell(spellProto) && !spellProto->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX5_NO_PARTIAL_RESISTS));
8273 
8274  DETAIL_FILTER_LOG(LOG_FILTER_PERIODIC_AFFECTS, "PeriodicTick: %s attacked %s for %u dmg inflicted by %u abs is %u",
8275  GetCasterGuid().GetString().c_str(), target->GetGuidStr().c_str(), pdamage, GetId(), absorb);
8276 
8277  Unit::DealDamageMods(caster, target, pdamage, &absorb, DOT, spellProto);
8278 
8279  // Set trigger flag
8280  uint32 procAttacker = PROC_FLAG_DEAL_HARMFUL_PERIODIC; // | PROC_FLAG_SUCCESSFUL_HARMFUL_SPELL_HIT;
8281  uint32 procVictim = PROC_FLAG_TAKE_HARMFUL_PERIODIC;// | PROC_FLAG_TAKEN_HARMFUL_SPELL_HIT;
8282  uint32 procEx = isCrit ? PROC_EX_CRITICAL_HIT : PROC_EX_NORMAL_HIT;
8283 
8284  const uint32 bonus = (resist < 0 ? uint32(std::abs(resist)) : 0);
8285  pdamage += bonus;
8286  const uint32 malus = (resist > 0 ? (absorb + uint32(resist)) : absorb);
8287  pdamage = (pdamage <= malus ? 0 : (pdamage - malus));
8288 
8289  uint32 overkill = pdamage > target->GetHealth() ? pdamage - target->GetHealth() : 0;
8290  SpellPeriodicAuraLogInfo pInfo(this, pdamage, overkill, absorb, resist, 0.0f, isCrit);
8291  target->SendPeriodicAuraLog(&pInfo);
8292 
8293  if (pdamage)
8294  procVictim |= PROC_FLAG_TAKE_ANY_DAMAGE;
8295 
8296  CleanDamage cleanDamage(pdamage, BASE_ATTACK, MELEE_HIT_NORMAL, pdamage || absorb);
8297  // send critical in hit info for threat calculation
8298  if (isCrit)
8299  cleanDamage.hitOutCome = MELEE_HIT_CRIT;
8300  Unit::DealDamage(caster, target, pdamage, &cleanDamage, DOT, GetSpellSchoolMask(spellProto), spellProto, true);
8301 
8302  Unit::ProcDamageAndSpell(ProcSystemArguments(caster, target, procAttacker, procVictim, PROC_EX_NORMAL_HIT, pdamage, BASE_ATTACK, spellProto));
8303 
8304  // Drain Soul (chance soul shard)
8305  if (caster && caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER && spellProto->SpellFamilyName == SPELLFAMILY_WARLOCK && spellProto->SpellFamilyFlags & uint64(0x0000000000004000))
8306  {
8307  // Only from non-grey units
8308  if (roll_chance_i(10) && // 1-2 from drain with final and without glyph, 0-1 from damage
8309  ((Player*)caster)->isHonorOrXPTarget(target) && // Gain XP or Honor requirement
8310  (target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT && !((Creature*)target)->IsTappedBy((Player*)caster))) // Tapped by player requirement
8311  {
8312  caster->CastSpell(nullptr, 43836, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, nullptr, this);
8313  }
8314  }
8315 
8316  if (GetId() == 13493)
8317  m_scriptValue += pdamage;
8318  break;
8319  }
8320  case SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_LEECH:
8321  case SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_HEALTH_FUNNEL:
8322  {
8323  // don't damage target if not alive, possible death persistent effects
8324  if (!target->IsAlive())
8325  break;
8326 
8327  Unit* pCaster = GetCaster();
8328  if (!pCaster)
8329  break;
8330 
8331  if (!pCaster->IsAlive())
8332  break;
8333 
8334  uint32 pdamage = (m_modifier.m_amount > 0 ? uint32(m_modifier.m_amount) : 0);
8335  OnPeriodicCalculateAmount(pdamage);
8336 
8337  if (spellProto->Effect[GetEffIndex()] == SPELL_EFFECT_PERSISTENT_AREA_AURA &&
8338  Unit::SpellHitResult(pCaster, target, spellProto, (1 << GetEffIndex()), false) != SPELL_MISS_NONE)
8339  break;
8340 
8341  // Check for immune
8342  if (!spellProto->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_NO_IMMUNITIES))
8343  {
8344  if (target->IsImmuneToDamage(GetSpellSchoolMask(spellProto)))
8345  {
8346  Unit::SendSpellOrDamageImmune(GetCasterGuid(), target, spellProto->Id);
8347  break;
8348  }
8349  }
8350 
8351  uint32 absorb = 0;
8352  int32 resist = 0;
8353 
8354  pdamage = target->SpellDamageBonusTaken(pCaster, SpellSchoolMask(spellProto->SchoolMask), spellProto, pdamage, DOT, GetStackAmount());
8355 
8356  bool isCrit = IsCritFromAbilityAura(pCaster, pdamage);
8357 
8358  // only from players
8359  // FIXME: need use SpellDamageBonus instead?
8360  if (GetCasterGuid().IsPlayer())
8361  pdamage -= target->GetResilienceRatingDamageReduction(pdamage, SpellDmgClass(spellProto->DmgClass), true);
8362 
8363  DETAIL_FILTER_LOG(LOG_FILTER_PERIODIC_AFFECTS, "PeriodicTick: %s health leech of %s for %u dmg inflicted by %u abs is %u",
8364  GetCasterGuid().GetString().c_str(), target->GetGuidStr().c_str(), pdamage, GetId(), absorb);
8365 
8366  Unit::DealDamageMods(pCaster, target, pdamage, &absorb, DOT, spellProto);
8367 
8368  Unit::SendSpellNonMeleeDamageLog(pCaster, target, GetId(), pdamage, GetSpellSchoolMask(spellProto), absorb, resist, true, 0, isCrit);
8369 
8370  float multiplier = spellProto->EffectMultipleValue[GetEffIndex()] > 0 ? spellProto->EffectMultipleValue[GetEffIndex()] : 1;
8371 
8372  // Set trigger flag
8373  uint32 procAttacker = PROC_FLAG_DEAL_HARMFUL_PERIODIC; // | PROC_FLAG_SUCCESSFUL_HARMFUL_SPELL_HIT;
8374  uint32 procVictim = PROC_FLAG_TAKE_HARMFUL_PERIODIC;// | PROC_FLAG_TAKEN_HARMFUL_SPELL_HIT;
8375  uint32 procEx = isCrit ? PROC_EX_CRITICAL_HIT : PROC_EX_NORMAL_HIT;
8376 
8377  const uint32 bonus = (resist < 0 ? uint32(std::abs(resist)) : 0);
8378  pdamage += bonus;
8379  const uint32 malus = (resist > 0 ? (absorb + uint32(resist)) : absorb);
8380  pdamage = (pdamage <= malus ? 0 : (pdamage - malus));
8381 
8382  pdamage = std::min(pdamage, target->GetHealth());
8383 
8384  if (pdamage)
8385  procVictim |= PROC_FLAG_TAKE_ANY_DAMAGE;
8386 
8387  CleanDamage cleanDamage(pdamage, BASE_ATTACK, MELEE_HIT_NORMAL, pdamage || absorb);
8388  // send critical in hit info for threat calculation
8389  if (isCrit)
8390  cleanDamage.hitOutCome = MELEE_HIT_CRIT;
8391  int32 new_damage = Unit::DealDamage(pCaster, target, pdamage, &cleanDamage, DOT, GetSpellSchoolMask(spellProto), spellProto, false);
8392  Unit::ProcDamageAndSpell(ProcSystemArguments(pCaster, target, procAttacker, procVictim, PROC_EX_NORMAL_HIT, pdamage, BASE_ATTACK, spellProto));
8393 
8394  if (!target->IsAlive() && pCaster->IsNonMeleeSpellCasted(false))
8395  for (uint32 i = CURRENT_FIRST_NON_MELEE_SPELL; i < CURRENT_MAX_SPELL; ++i)
8396  if (Spell* spell = pCaster->GetCurrentSpell(CurrentSpellTypes(i)))
8397  if (spell->m_spellInfo->Id == GetId())
8398  spell->cancel();
8399 
8400  if (Player* modOwner = pCaster->GetSpellModOwner())
8401  {
8402  modOwner->ApplySpellMod(GetId(), SPELLMOD_ALL_EFFECTS, new_damage);
8403  modOwner->ApplySpellMod(GetId(), SPELLMOD_MULTIPLE_VALUE, multiplier);
8404  }
8405 
8406  int32 heal = pCaster->SpellHealingBonusTaken(pCaster, spellProto, int32(new_damage * multiplier), DOT, GetStackAmount());
8407 
8408  uint32 absorbHeal = 0;
8409  pCaster->CalculateHealAbsorb(heal, &absorbHeal);
8410 
8411  int32 gain = pCaster->DealHeal(pCaster, heal - absorbHeal, spellProto, false, absorbHeal);
8412  // Health Leech effects do not generate healing aggro
8413  if (m_modifier.m_auraname == SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_LEECH)
8414  break;
8415  pCaster->getHostileRefManager().threatAssist(pCaster, gain * 0.5f * sSpellMgr.GetSpellThreatMultiplier(spellProto), spellProto, false, true);
8416  break;
8417  }
8418  case SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_HEAL:
8419  case SPELL_AURA_OBS_MOD_HEALTH:
8420  {
8421  Unit* pCaster = GetCaster();
8422  if (!pCaster)
8423  break;
8424 
8425  // don't heal target if max health or if not alive, mostly death persistent effects from items
8426  if (!target->IsAlive() || (target->GetHealth() == target->GetMaxHealth()))
8427  break;
8428 
8429  // heal for caster damage (must be alive)
8430  if (target != pCaster && spellProto->SpellVisual[0] == 163 && !pCaster->IsAlive())
8431  break;
8432 
8433  // ignore non positive values (can be result apply spellmods to aura damage
8434  uint32 amount = m_modifier.m_amount > 0 ? m_modifier.m_amount : 0;
8435 
8436  uint32 pdamage;
8437 
8438  if (m_modifier.m_auraname == SPELL_AURA_OBS_MOD_HEALTH)
8439  pdamage = uint32(target->GetMaxHealth() * amount / 100);
8440  else
8441  {
8442  pdamage = amount;
8443  // Wild Growth (1/7 - 6 + 2*ramainTicks) %
8444  if (spellProto->SpellFamilyName == SPELLFAMILY_DRUID && spellProto->SpellIconID == 2864)
8445  {
8446  int32 ticks = GetAuraMaxTicks();
8447  int32 remainingTicks = ticks - GetAuraTicks();
8448  int32 addition = int32(amount) * ticks * (-6 + 2 * remainingTicks) / 100;
8449 
8450  if (GetAuraTicks() != 1)
8451  // Item - Druid T10 Restoration 2P Bonus
8452  if (Aura* aura = pCaster->GetAura(70658, EFFECT_INDEX_0))
8453  addition += abs(int32((addition * aura->GetModifier()->m_amount) / ((ticks - 1) * 100)));
8454 
8455  pdamage = int32(pdamage) + addition;
8456  }
8457  }
8458 
8459  OnPeriodicCalculateAmount(pdamage);
8460 
8461  // first aid confirmed to work through immune when selfcast
8462  if (pCaster != target && target->IsImmuneToSchool(spellProto, (1 << GetEffIndex()))) // TODO: Check if we need to check for avoiding immune
8463  {
8464  Unit::SendSpellOrDamageImmune(GetCasterGuid(), target, spellProto->Id);
8465  break;
8466  }
8467 
8468  pdamage = target->SpellHealingBonusTaken(pCaster, spellProto, pdamage, DOT, GetStackAmount());
8469 
8470  // This method can modify pdamage
8471  bool isCrit = IsCritFromAbilityAura(pCaster, pdamage);
8472 
8473  uint32 absorbHeal = 0;
8474  pCaster->CalculateHealAbsorb(pdamage, &absorbHeal);
8475  pdamage -= absorbHeal;
8476 
8477  DETAIL_FILTER_LOG(LOG_FILTER_PERIODIC_AFFECTS, "PeriodicTick: %s heal of %s for %u health (absorbed %u) inflicted by %u",
8478  GetCasterGuid().GetString().c_str(), target->GetGuidStr().c_str(), pdamage, absorbHeal, GetId());
8479 
8480  int32 gain = target->ModifyHealth(pdamage);
8481  SpellPeriodicAuraLogInfo pInfo(this, pdamage, (pdamage - uint32(gain)), absorbHeal, 0, 0.0f, isCrit);
8482  target->SendPeriodicAuraLog(&pInfo);
8483 
8484  // Set trigger flag
8485  uint32 procAttacker = PROC_FLAG_DEAL_HARMFUL_PERIODIC;
8486  uint32 procVictim = PROC_FLAG_TAKE_HARMFUL_PERIODIC;
8487  uint32 procEx = PROC_EX_INTERNAL_HOT | (isCrit ? PROC_EX_CRITICAL_HIT : PROC_EX_NORMAL_HIT);
8488 
8489  // add HoTs to amount healed in bgs
8490  if (pCaster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
8491  if (BattleGround* bg = ((Player*)pCaster)->GetBattleGround())
8492  bg->UpdatePlayerScore(((Player*)pCaster), SCORE_HEALING_DONE, gain);
8493 
8494  if (pCaster->IsInCombat() && !pCaster->IsCrowdControlled())
8495  target->getHostileRefManager().threatAssist(pCaster, float(gain) * 0.5f * sSpellMgr.GetSpellThreatMultiplier(spellProto), spellProto, false, true);
8496 
8497  Unit::ProcDamageAndSpell(ProcSystemArguments(pCaster, target, procAttacker, procVictim, procEx, gain, BASE_ATTACK, spellProto, nullptr, gain, true));
8498  break;
8499  }
8500  case SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_MANA_LEECH:
8501  {
8502  // don't damage target if not alive, possible death persistent effects
8503  if (!target->IsAlive())
8504  break;
8505 
8506  if (m_modifier.m_miscvalue < 0 || m_modifier.m_miscvalue >= MAX_POWERS)
8507  break;
8508 
8509  Powers power = Powers(m_modifier.m_miscvalue);
8510 
8511  // power type might have changed between aura applying and tick (druid's shapeshift)
8512  if (target->GetPowerType() != power)
8513  break;
8514 
8515  Unit* pCaster = GetCaster();
8516  if (!pCaster)
8517  break;
8518 
8519  if (!pCaster->IsAlive())
8520  break;
8521 
8522  // ignore non positive values (can be result apply spellmods to aura damage
8523  uint32 pdamage = m_modifier.m_amount > 0 ? m_modifier.m_amount : 0;
8524 
8525  // Special case: draining x% of mana (up to a maximum of 2*x% of the caster's maximum mana)
8526  // It's mana percent cost spells, m_modifier.m_amount is percent drain from target
8527  if (spellProto->ManaCostPercentage)
8528  {
8529  // max value
8530  uint32 maxmana = pCaster->GetMaxPower(power) * pdamage * 2 / 100;
8531  pdamage = target->GetMaxPower(power) * pdamage / 100;
8532  if (pdamage > maxmana)
8533  pdamage = maxmana;
8534  }
8535 
8536  OnPeriodicCalculateAmount(pdamage);
8537 
8538  if (GetSpellProto()->Effect[GetEffIndex()] == SPELL_EFFECT_PERSISTENT_AREA_AURA &&
8539  Unit::SpellHitResult(pCaster, target, spellProto, (1 << GetEffIndex()), false) != SPELL_MISS_NONE)
8540  break;
8541 
8542  // Check for immune (not use charges)
8543  if (!spellProto->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_NO_IMMUNITIES)) // confirmed Impaling spine goes through immunity
8544  {
8545  if (target->IsImmuneToDamage(GetSpellSchoolMask(spellProto)))
8546  {
8547  Unit::SendSpellOrDamageImmune(GetCasterGuid(), target, spellProto->Id);
8548  break;
8549  }
8550  }
8551 
8552  DETAIL_FILTER_LOG(LOG_FILTER_PERIODIC_AFFECTS, "PeriodicTick: %s power leech of %s for %u dmg inflicted by %u",
8553  GetCasterGuid().GetString().c_str(), target->GetGuidStr().c_str(), pdamage, GetId());
8554 
8555  switch (GetId())
8556  {
8557  case 32960: // Mark of Kazzak
8558  {
8559  if (target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER && target->GetPowerType() == POWER_MANA)
8560  {
8561  // Drain 5% of target's mana
8562  pdamage = target->GetMaxPower(POWER_MANA) * 5 / 100;
8563  }
8564  break;
8565  }
8566  }
8567 
8568  int32 drain_amount = target->GetPower(power) > pdamage ? pdamage : target->GetPower(power);
8569 
8570  drain_amount -= target->GetResilienceRatingDamageReduction(uint32(drain_amount), SpellDmgClass(spellProto->DmgClass), false, power);
8571 
8572  target->ModifyPower(power, -drain_amount);
8573 
8574  float gain_multiplier = 0.0f;
8575 
8576  if (pCaster->GetMaxPower(power) > 0)
8577  {
8578  gain_multiplier = spellProto->EffectMultipleValue[GetEffIndex()];
8579 
8580  if (Player* modOwner = pCaster->GetSpellModOwner())
8581  modOwner->ApplySpellMod(GetId(), SPELLMOD_MULTIPLE_VALUE, gain_multiplier);
8582  }
8583 
8584  SpellPeriodicAuraLogInfo pInfo(this, drain_amount, 0, 0, 0, gain_multiplier);
8585  target->SendPeriodicAuraLog(&pInfo);
8586 
8587  int32 gainCalculated = int32(drain_amount * gain_multiplier);
8588  int32 gain = gainCalculated;
8589  if (gainCalculated)
8590  {
8591  gain = pCaster->ModifyPower(power, gainCalculated);
8592 
8593  if (GetSpellProto()->IsFitToFamily(SPELLFAMILY_WARLOCK, 0x0000000000000010)) // Drain Mana
8594  if (Aura* petPart = GetHolder()->GetAuraByEffectIndex(EFFECT_INDEX_1))
8595  if (int32 pet_gain = gainCalculated * petPart->GetModifier()->m_amount / 100)
8596  pCaster->CastCustomSpell(pCaster, 32554, &pet_gain, nullptr, nullptr, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
8597 
8598  target->AddThreat(pCaster, float(gain) * 0.5f, pInfo.critical, GetSpellSchoolMask(spellProto), spellProto);
8599  }
8600 
8601  // Some special cases
8602  switch (GetId())
8603  {
8604  case 21056: // Mark of Kazzak
8605  case 32960: // Mark of Kazzak
8606  {
8607  uint32 triggerSpell = 0;
8608  switch (GetId())
8609  {
8610  case 21056: triggerSpell = 21058; break;
8611  case 32960: triggerSpell = 32961; break;
8612  }
8613  if (target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER && target->GetPower(power) == 0)
8614  {
8615  target->CastSpell(target, triggerSpell, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, nullptr, this);
8616  target->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(GetId());
8617  }
8618  break;
8619  }
8620  }
8621  break;
8622  }
8623  case SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_ENERGIZE:
8624  {
8625  // don't energize target if not alive, possible death persistent effects
8626  if (!target->IsAlive())
8627  break;
8628 
8629  Unit* pCaster = GetCaster();
8630 
8631  // ignore non positive values (can be result apply spellmods to aura damage
8632  uint32 pdamage = m_modifier.m_amount > 0 ? m_modifier.m_amount : 0;
8633  OnPeriodicCalculateAmount(pdamage);
8634 
8635  if (pCaster)
8636  {
8637  if (target->IsImmuneToSchool(spellProto, (1 << GetEffIndex())))
8638  {
8639  // likely need to ignore all of them but the only case is periodic energize
8640  if (!spellProto->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_DO_NOT_LOG_IMMUNE_MISSES))
8641  Unit::SendSpellOrDamageImmune(GetCasterGuid(), target, spellProto->Id);
8642  break;
8643  }
8644  }
8645 
8646  DETAIL_FILTER_LOG(LOG_FILTER_PERIODIC_AFFECTS, "PeriodicTick: %s energize %s for %u dmg inflicted by %u",
8647  GetCasterGuid().GetString().c_str(), target->GetGuidStr().c_str(), pdamage, GetId());
8648 
8649  if (m_modifier.m_miscvalue < 0 || m_modifier.m_miscvalue >= MAX_POWERS)
8650  break;
8651 
8652  Powers power = Powers(m_modifier.m_miscvalue);
8653 
8654  if (target->GetMaxPower(power) == 0)
8655  break;
8656 
8657  SpellPeriodicAuraLogInfo pInfo(this, pdamage, 0, 0, 0, 0.0f);
8658  target->SendPeriodicAuraLog(&pInfo);
8659 
8660  int32 gain = target->ModifyPower(power, pdamage);
8661 
8662  if (pCaster)
8663  target->getHostileRefManager().threatAssist(pCaster, float(gain) * 0.5f * sSpellMgr.GetSpellThreatMultiplier(spellProto), spellProto, false, true);
8664 
8665  if (GetId() == 25685) // Moam - Energize
8666  if (target->GetPower(POWER_MANA) > 24000)
8667  target->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(GetId());
8668  break;
8669  }
8670  case SPELL_AURA_OBS_MOD_MANA:
8671  {
8672  // don't energize target if not alive, possible death persistent effects
8673  if (!target->IsAlive())
8674  break;
8675 
8676  Unit* pCaster = GetCaster();
8677 
8678  // ignore non positive values (can be result apply spellmods to aura damage
8679  uint32 amount = m_modifier.m_amount > 0 ? m_modifier.m_amount : 0;
8680 
8681  uint32 pdamage = uint32(target->GetMaxPower(POWER_MANA) * amount / 100);
8682  OnPeriodicCalculateAmount(pdamage);
8683 
8684  if (pCaster)
8685  {
8686  if (target->IsImmuneToSchool(spellProto, (1 << GetEffIndex())))
8687  {
8688  Unit::SendSpellOrDamageImmune(GetCasterGuid(), target, spellProto->Id);
8689  break;
8690  }
8691  }
8692 
8693  DETAIL_FILTER_LOG(LOG_FILTER_PERIODIC_AFFECTS, "PeriodicTick: %s energize %s for %u mana inflicted by %u",
8694  GetCasterGuid().GetString().c_str(), target->GetGuidStr().c_str(), pdamage, GetId());
8695 
8696  if (target->GetMaxPower(POWER_MANA) == 0)
8697  break;
8698 
8699  SpellPeriodicAuraLogInfo pInfo(this, pdamage, 0, 0, 0, 0.0f);
8700  target->SendPeriodicAuraLog(&pInfo);
8701 
8702  int32 gain = target->ModifyPower(POWER_MANA, pdamage);
8703 
8704  if (pCaster)
8705  target->getHostileRefManager().threatAssist(pCaster, float(gain) * 0.5f * sSpellMgr.GetSpellThreatMultiplier(spellProto), spellProto, false, true);
8706  break;
8707  }
8708  case SPELL_AURA_POWER_BURN_MANA:
8709  {
8710  // don't mana burn target if not alive, possible death persistent effects
8711  if (!target->IsAlive())
8712  break;
8713 
8714  Unit* pCaster = GetCaster();
8715  if (!pCaster)
8716  break;
8717 
8718  uint32 pdamage = m_modifier.m_amount > 0 ? m_modifier.m_amount : 0;
8719  OnPeriodicCalculateAmount(pdamage);
8720 
8721  // Check for immune (not use charges)
8722  if (!spellProto->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_NO_IMMUNITIES)) // confirmed Impaling spine goes through immunity
8723  {
8724  if (target->IsImmuneToDamage(GetSpellSchoolMask(spellProto)))
8725  {
8726  Unit::SendSpellOrDamageImmune(GetCasterGuid(), target, spellProto->Id);
8727  break;
8728  }
8729  }
8730 
8731  Powers powerType = Powers(m_modifier.m_miscvalue);
8732 
8733  if (!target->IsAlive() || target->GetPowerType() != powerType)
8734  break;
8735 
8736  pdamage -= target->GetResilienceRatingDamageReduction(pdamage, SpellDmgClass(spellProto->DmgClass), false, powerType);
8737 
8738  uint32 gain = uint32(-target->ModifyPower(powerType, -int32(pdamage)));
8739 
8740  gain = uint32(gain * spellProto->EffectMultipleValue[GetEffIndex()]);
8741 
8742  // maybe has to be sent different to client, but not by SMSG_PERIODICAURALOG
8743  SpellNonMeleeDamage spellDamageInfo(pCaster, target, spellProto->Id, SpellSchoolMask(spellProto->SchoolMask));
8744  spellDamageInfo.periodicLog = true;
8745 
8746  pCaster->CalculateSpellDamage(&spellDamageInfo, gain, spellProto);
8747 
8748  spellDamageInfo.target->CalculateAbsorbResistBlock(pCaster, &spellDamageInfo, spellProto);
8749 
8750  Unit::DealDamageMods(pCaster, spellDamageInfo.target, spellDamageInfo.damage, &spellDamageInfo.absorb, SPELL_DIRECT_DAMAGE, spellProto);
8751 
8752  pCaster->SendSpellNonMeleeDamageLog(&spellDamageInfo);
8753 
8754  // Set trigger flag
8755  uint32 procAttacker = PROC_FLAG_DEAL_HARMFUL_PERIODIC; // | PROC_FLAG_SUCCESSFUL_HARMFUL_SPELL_HIT;
8756  uint32 procVictim = PROC_FLAG_TAKE_HARMFUL_PERIODIC;// | PROC_FLAG_TAKEN_HARMFUL_SPELL_HIT;
8757  uint32 procEx = createProcExtendMask(&spellDamageInfo, SPELL_MISS_NONE);
8758  if (spellDamageInfo.damage)
8759  procVictim |= PROC_FLAG_TAKE_ANY_DAMAGE;
8760 
8761  Unit::DealSpellDamage(pCaster, &spellDamageInfo, true, false);
8762 
8763  Unit::ProcDamageAndSpell(ProcSystemArguments(pCaster, spellDamageInfo.target, procAttacker, procVictim, procEx, spellDamageInfo.damage, BASE_ATTACK, spellProto));
8764  break;
8765  }
8766  case SPELL_AURA_MOD_REGEN:
8767  {
8768  // don't heal target if not alive, possible death persistent effects
8769  if (!target->IsAlive())
8770  break;
8771 
8772  int32 gain = target->ModifyHealth(m_modifier.m_amount);
8773  if (Unit* caster = GetCaster())
8774  target->getHostileRefManager().threatAssist(caster, float(gain) * 0.5f * sSpellMgr.GetSpellThreatMultiplier(spellProto), spellProto, false, true);
8775  break;
8776  }
8777  case SPELL_AURA_MOD_POWER_REGEN:
8778  {
8779  // don't energize target if not alive, possible death persistent effects
8780  if (!target->IsAlive())
8781  break;
8782 
8783  Powers powerType = target->GetPowerType();
8784  if (int32(powerType) != m_modifier.m_miscvalue)
8785  break;
8786 
8787  if (spellProto->AuraInterruptFlags & AURA_INTERRUPT_FLAG_STANDING_CANCELS)
8788  {
8789  // eating anim
8790  target->HandleEmoteCommand(EMOTE_ONESHOT_EAT);
8791  }
8792  else if (GetId() == 20577)
8793  {
8794  // cannibalize anim
8795  target->HandleEmoteCommand(EMOTE_STATE_CANNIBALIZE);
8796  }
8797 
8798  // Anger Management
8799  // amount = 1+ 16 = 17 = 3,4*5 = 10,2*5/3
8800  // so 17 is rounded amount for 5 sec tick grow ~ 1 range grow in 3 sec
8801  if (powerType == POWER_RAGE && target->IsInCombat())
8802  target->ModifyPower(powerType, m_modifier.m_amount * 3 / 5);
8803  // Butchery
8804  else if (powerType == POWER_RUNIC_POWER && target->IsInCombat())
8805  target->ModifyPower(powerType, m_modifier.m_amount);
8806  break;
8807  }
8808  // Here tick dummy auras
8809  case SPELL_AURA_DUMMY: // some spells have dummy aura
8810  case SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_DUMMY:
8811  {
8812  PeriodicDummyTick();
8813  break;
8814  }
8815  case SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_TRIGGER_SPELL:
8816  {
8817  TriggerSpell();
8818  break;
8819  }
8820  case SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_TRIGGER_SPELL_WITH_VALUE:
8821  {
8822  TriggerSpellWithValue();
8823  break;
8824  }
8825  default:
8826  break;
8827  }
8828  OnPeriodicTickEnd();
8829 }
8830 
8831 void Aura::PeriodicDummyTick()
8832 {
8833  SpellEntry const* spell = GetSpellProto();
8834  Unit* target = GetTarget();
8835  switch (spell->SpellFamilyName)
8836  {
8837  case SPELLFAMILY_GENERIC:
8838  {
8839  switch (spell->Id)
8840  {
8841  case 6946: // Curse of the Bleakheart
8842  case 41170:
8843  {
8844  if (roll_chance_i(5))
8845  {
8846  int32 damageValue = target->CalculateSpellEffectValue(target, spell, EFFECT_INDEX_1);
8847  target->CastCustomSpell(nullptr, spell->Id == 6946 ? 6945 : 41356, nullptr, &damageValue, nullptr, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
8848  }
8849  return;
8850  }
8851  case 7057: // Haunting Spirits
8852  if (roll_chance_i(33))
8853  target->CastSpell(target, m_modifier.m_amount, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, nullptr, this);
8854  return;
8855 // // Panda
8856 // case 19230: break;
8857  case 21094: // Separation Anxiety (Majordomo Executus)
8858  case 23487: // Separation Anxiety (Garr)
8859  if (Unit* caster = GetCaster())
8860  {
8861  float m_radius = GetSpellRadius(sSpellRadiusStore.LookupEntry(spell->EffectRadiusIndex[m_effIndex]));
8862  if (caster->IsAlive() && !caster->IsWithinDistInMap(target, m_radius))
8863  target->CastSpell(target, (spell->Id == 21094 ? 21095 : 23492), TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, nullptr); // Spell 21095: Separation Anxiety for Majordomo Executus' adds, 23492: Separation Anxiety for Garr's adds
8864  }
8865  return;
8866  case 27769: // Whisper Gulch: Yogg-Saron Whisper
8867  {
8868  if (roll_chance_i(20))
8869  target->CastSpell(nullptr, 29072, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
8870  return;
8871  }
8872 // // Gossip NPC Periodic - Talk
8873  case 32441: // Brittle Bones
8874  if (roll_chance_i(33))
8875  target->CastSpell(target, 32437, true, nullptr, this); // Rattled
8876  return;
8877 // case 33208: break;
8878 // // Gossip NPC Periodic - Despawn
8879 // case 33209: break;
8880 // // Steal Weapon
8881 // case 36207: break;
8882  case 37025: // Coilfang Water
8883  if (target->IsInSwimmableWater())
8884  target->CastSpell(target, 37026, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, nullptr, this);
8885  return;
8886  case 39993: // Simon Game START timer, (DND)
8887  target->AI()->SendAIEvent(AI_EVENT_CUSTOM_A, target, target);
8888  return;
8889 // case 40084: break;
8890 // // Knockdown Fel Cannon: break; The Aggro Burst
8891 // case 40119: break;
8892 // // Old Mount Spell
8893 // case 40154: break;
8894 // // Magnetic Pull
8895 // case 40581: break;
8896 // // Ethereal Ring: break; The Bolt Burst
8897  case 40801:
8898  {
8899  target->CastSpell(GetCaster(), 40758, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
8900  break;
8901  }
8902 // // Crystal Prison
8903 // case 40846: break;
8904 // // Copy Weapon
8905 // case 41054: break;
8906 // // Dementia
8907 // case 41404: break;
8908 // // Ethereal Ring Visual, Lightning Aura
8909 // case 41477: break;
8910 // // Ethereal Ring Visual, Lightning Aura (Fork)
8911 // case 41525: break;
8912 // // Ethereal Ring Visual, Lightning Jumper Aura
8913 // case 41567: break;
8914 // // No Man's Land
8915 // case 41955: break;
8916 // // Headless Horseman - Fire
8917 // case 42074: break;
8918 // // Headless Horseman - Visual - Large Fire
8919 // case 42075: break;
8920 // // Headless Horseman - Start Fire, Periodic Aura
8921 // case 42140: break;
8922 // // Ram Speed Boost
8923 // case 42152: break;
8924 // // Headless Horseman - Fires Out Victory Aura
8925 // case 42235: break;
8926 // // Pumpkin Life Cycle
8927 // case 42280: break;
8928 // // Brewfest Request Chick Chuck Mug Aura
8929 // case 42537: break;
8930 // // Squashling
8931 // case 42596: break;
8932 // // Headless Horseman Climax, Head: Periodic
8933 // case 42603: break;
8934  case 42621: // Fire Bomb
8935  {
8936  // Cast the summon spells (42622 to 42627) with increasing chance
8937  uint32 rand = urand(0, 99);
8938  for (uint32 i = 1; i <= 6; ++i)
8939  {
8940  if (rand < i * (i + 1) / 2 * 5)
8941  {
8942  target->CastSpell(target, spell->Id + i, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
8943  break;
8944  }
8945  }
8946  if (GetAuraTicks() == 50)
8947  target->AI()->SendAIEvent(AI_EVENT_CUSTOM_A, target, target);
8948  break;
8949  }
8950 // // Headless Horseman - Conflagrate, Periodic Aura
8951 // case 42637: break;
8952 // // Headless Horseman - Create Pumpkin Treats Aura
8953 // case 42774: break;
8954 // // Headless Horseman Climax - Summoning Rhyme Aura
8955 // case 42879: break;
8956 // // Giddyup!
8957 // case 42924: break;
8958 // // Ram - Trot
8959 // case 42992: break;
8960 // // Ram - Canter
8961 // case 42993: break;
8962 // // Ram - Gallop
8963 // case 42994: break;
8964 // // Ram Level - Neutral
8965 // case 43310: break;
8966 // // Headless Horseman - Maniacal Laugh, Maniacal, Delayed 17
8967 // case 43884: break;
8968 // // Wretched!
8969 // case 43963: break;
8970 // // Headless Horseman - Maniacal Laugh, Maniacal, other, Delayed 17
8971 // case 44000: break;
8972  case 44328: // Energy Feedback
8973  {
8974  if (Unit* caster = GetCaster())
8975  caster->CastSpell(nullptr, 44339, TRIGGERED_NONE);
8976  break;
8977  }
8978 // // Romantic Picnic
8979 // case 45102: break;
8980 // // Romantic Picnic
8981 // case 45123: break;
8982 // // Looking for Love
8983 // case 45124: break;
8984 // // Kite - Lightning Strike Kite Aura
8985 // case 45197: break;
8986 // // Rocket Chicken
8987 // case 45202: break;
8988 // // Copy Offhand Weapon
8989 // case 45205: break;
8990 // // Upper Deck - Kite - Lightning Periodic Aura
8991 // case 45207: break;
8992 // // Kite -Sky Lightning Strike Kite Aura
8993 // case 45251: break;
8994 // // Ribbon Pole Dancer Check Aura
8995 // case 45390: break;
8996 // // Holiday - Midsummer, Ribbon Pole Periodic Visual
8997 // case 45406: break;
8998 // // Parachute
8999 // case 45472: break;
9000 // // Alliance Flag, Extra Damage Debuff
9001 // case 45898: break;
9002 // // Horde Flag, Extra Damage Debuff
9003 // case 45899: break;
9004 // // Ahune - Summoning Rhyme Aura
9005 // case 45926: break;
9006 // // Ahune - Slippery Floor
9007 // case 45945: break;
9008 // // Ahune's Shield
9009 // case 45954: break;
9010 // // Nether Vapor Lightning
9011 // case 45960: break;
9012 // // Darkness
9013 // case 45996: break;
9014 // // Transform Visual Missile Periodic
9015 // case 46205: break;
9016 // // Find Opening Beam End
9017 // case 46333: break;
9018  case 46371: // Ice Spear Control Aura
9019  target->CastSpell(target, 46372, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, nullptr, this);
9020  return;
9021 // // Hailstone Chill
9022 // case 46458: break;
9023 // // Hailstone Chill, Internal
9024 // case 46465: break;
9025 // // Chill, Internal Shifter
9026 // case 46549: break;
9027 // // Summon Ice Spear Knockback Delayer
9028 // case 46878: break;
9029 // // Burninate Effect
9030 // case 47214: break;
9031 // // Fizzcrank Practice Parachute
9032 // case 47228: break;
9033 // // Send Mug Control Aura
9034 // case 47369: break;
9035 // // Direbrew's Disarm (precast)
9036 // case 47407: break;
9037 // // Mole Machine Port Schedule
9038 // case 47489: break;
9039 // case 47941: break; // Crystal Spike
9040 // case 48200: break; // Healer Aura
9041 // case 49313: break; // Proximity Mine Area Aura
9042 // // Mole Machine Portal Schedule
9043 // case 49466: break;
9044  case 49555: // Corpse Explode (Drak'tharon Keep - Trollgore)
9045  case 59807: // Corpse Explode (heroic)
9046  {
9047  if (GetAuraTicks() == 3 && target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT)
9048  ((Creature*)target)->ForcedDespawn();
9049  if (GetAuraTicks() != 2)
9050  return;
9051 
9052  if (Unit* pCaster = GetCaster())
9053  pCaster->CastSpell(target, spell->Id == 49555 ? 49618 : 59809, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
9054 
9055  return;
9056  }
9057 // case 49592: break; // Temporal Rift
9058 // case 49957: break; // Cutting Laser
9059 // case 50085: break; // Slow Fall
9060 // // Listening to Music
9061 // case 50493: break; // TODO: Implement
9062 // // Love Rocket Barrage
9063 // case 50530: break;
9064  case 52441: // Cool Down
9065  target->CastSpell(target, 52443, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
9066  return;
9067  case 53520: // Carrion Beetles
9068  target->CastSpell(target, 53521, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, nullptr, this);
9069  target->CastSpell(target, 53521, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, nullptr, this);
9070  return;
9071  case 55592: // Clean
9072  switch (urand(0, 2))
9073  {
9074  case 0: target->CastSpell(target, 55731, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED); break;
9075  case 1: target->CastSpell(target, 55738, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED); break;
9076  case 2: target->CastSpell(target, 55739, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED); break;
9077  }
9078  return;
9079  case 61968: // Flash Freeze
9080  {
9081  if (GetAuraTicks() == 1 && !target->HasAura(62464))
9082  target->CastSpell(target, 61970, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, nullptr, this);
9083  return;
9084  }
9085  case 62018: // Collapse
9086  {
9087  // lose 1% of health every second
9088  Unit::DealDamage(target, target, target->GetMaxHealth() * .01, nullptr, DIRECT_DAMAGE, SPELL_SCHOOL_MASK_NONE, nullptr, false);
9089  return;
9090  }
9091  case 62019: // Rune of Summoning
9092  {
9093  target->CastSpell(target, 62020, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, nullptr, this);
9094  return;
9095  }
9096  case 62038: // Biting Cold
9097  {
9098  if (target->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
9099  return;
9100 
9101  // if player is moving remove one aura stack
9102  if (target->IsMoving())
9103  target->RemoveAuraHolderFromStack(62039);
9104  // otherwise add one aura stack each 3 seconds
9105  else if (GetAuraTicks() % 3 && !target->HasAura(62821))
9106  target->CastSpell(target, 62039, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, nullptr, this);
9107  return;
9108  }
9109  case 62039: // Biting Cold
9110  {
9111  target->CastSpell(target, 62188, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
9112  return;
9113  }
9114  case 62566: // Healthy Spore Summon Periodic
9115  {
9116  target->CastSpell(target, 62582, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
9117  target->CastSpell(target, 62591, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
9118  target->CastSpell(target, 62592, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
9119  target->CastSpell(target, 62593, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
9120  return;
9121  }
9122  case 62717: // Slag Pot
9123  {
9124  target->CastSpell(target, target->GetMap()->IsRegularDifficulty() ? 65722 : 65723, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, nullptr, this);
9125 
9126  // cast Slag Imbued if the target survives up to the last tick
9127  if (GetAuraTicks() == 10)
9128  target->CastSpell(target, 63536, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, nullptr, this);
9129  return;
9130  }
9131  case 63050: // Sanity
9132  {
9133  if (GetHolder()->GetStackAmount() <= 25 && !target->HasAura(63752))
9134  target->CastSpell(target, 63752, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
9135  else if (GetHolder()->GetStackAmount() > 25 && target->HasAura(63752))
9136  target->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(63752);
9137  return;
9138  }
9139  case 63382: // Rapid Burst
9140  {
9141  if (GetAuraTicks() % 2)
9142  target->CastSpell(target, target->GetMap()->IsRegularDifficulty() ? 64019 : 64532, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
9143  else
9144  target->CastSpell(target, target->GetMap()->IsRegularDifficulty() ? 63387 : 64531, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
9145  return;
9146  }
9147  case 64101: // Defend
9148  {
9149  target->CastSpell(target, 62719, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
9150  target->CastSpell(target, 64192, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
9151  return;
9152  }
9153  case 64217: // Overcharged
9154  {
9155  if (GetHolder()->GetStackAmount() >= 10)
9156  {
9157  target->CastSpell(target, 64219, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
9158  target->Suicide();
9159  }
9160  return;
9161  }
9162  case 64412: // Phase Punch
9163  {
9164  if (SpellAuraHolder* phaseAura = target->GetSpellAuraHolder(64412))
9165  {
9166  uint32 uiAuraId = 0;
9167  switch (phaseAura->GetStackAmount())
9168  {
9169  case 1: uiAuraId = 64435; break;
9170  case 2: uiAuraId = 64434; break;
9171  case 3: uiAuraId = 64428; break;
9172  case 4: uiAuraId = 64421; break;
9173  case 5: uiAuraId = 64417; break;
9174  }
9175 
9176  if (uiAuraId && !target->HasAura(uiAuraId))
9177  {
9178  target->CastSpell(target, uiAuraId, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, nullptr, this);
9179 
9180  // remove original aura if phased
9181  if (uiAuraId == 64417)
9182  {
9183  target->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(64412);
9184  target->CastSpell(target, 62169, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, nullptr, this);
9185  }
9186  }
9187  }
9188  return;
9189  }
9190  case 65272: // Shatter Chest
9191  {
9192  target->CastSpell(target, 62501, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, nullptr, this);
9193  return;
9194  }
9195  case 66798: // Death's Respite
9196  {
9197  Unit* caster = GetCaster();
9198  if (!caster)
9199  return;
9200 
9201  caster->CastSpell(target, 66797, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, nullptr, this);
9202  target->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(GetId());
9203  return;
9204  }
9205  case 70069: // Ooze Flood Periodic Trigger
9206  {
9207  target->CastSpell(target, GetSpellProto()->CalculateSimpleValue(m_effIndex), TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
9208  return;
9209  }
9210 // Exist more after, need add later
9211  default:
9212  break;
9213  }
9214 
9215  break;
9216  }
9217  case SPELLFAMILY_MAGE:
9218  {
9219  switch (spell->Id)
9220  {
9221  case 55342: // Mirror Image
9222  {
9223  if (GetAuraTicks() != 1)
9224  return;
9225  if (Unit* pCaster = GetCaster())
9226  pCaster->CastSpell(pCaster, spell->EffectTriggerSpell[GetEffIndex()], TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, nullptr, this);
9227  return;
9228  }
9229  default:
9230  break;
9231  }
9232  break;
9233  }
9234  case SPELLFAMILY_DRUID:
9235  {
9236  switch (spell->Id)
9237  {
9238  // Frenzied Regeneration
9239  case 22842:
9240  {
9241  // Converts up to 10 rage per second into health for $d. Each point of rage is converted into ${$m2/10}.1% of max health.
9242  // Should be manauser
9243  if (target->GetPowerType() != POWER_RAGE)
9244  return;
9245  uint32 rage = target->GetPower(POWER_RAGE);
9246  // Nothing todo
9247  if (rage == 0)
9248  return;
9249  int32 mod = (rage < 100) ? rage : 100;
9250  int32 points = target->CalculateSpellEffectValue(target, spell, EFFECT_INDEX_1);
9251  int32 regen = target->GetMaxHealth() * (mod * points / 10) / 1000;
9252  target->CastCustomSpell(target, 22845, &regen, nullptr, nullptr, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, nullptr, this);
9253  target->SetPower(POWER_RAGE, rage - mod);
9254  return;
9255  }
9256  // Force of Nature
9257  case 33831:
9258  return;
9259  default:
9260  break;
9261  }
9262  break;
9263  }
9264  case SPELLFAMILY_HUNTER:
9265  {
9266  switch (spell->Id)
9267  {
9268  // Harpooner's Mark
9269  // case 40084:
9270  // return;
9271  // Feeding Frenzy Rank 1 & 2
9272  case 53511:
9273  case 53512:
9274  {
9275  Unit* victim = target->GetVictim();
9276  if (victim && victim->GetHealth() * 100 < victim->GetMaxHealth() * 35)
9277  target->CastSpell(target, spell->Id == 53511 ? 60096 : 60097, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, nullptr, this);
9278  return;
9279  }
9280  default:
9281  break;
9282  }
9283  break;
9284  }
9285  case SPELLFAMILY_SHAMAN:
9286  {
9287  // Astral Shift
9288  if (spell->Id == 52179)
9289  {
9290  // Periodic need for remove visual on stun/fear/silence lost
9291  if (!target->HasFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_STUNNED | UNIT_FLAG_FLEEING | UNIT_FLAG_SILENCED))
9292  target->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(52179);
9293  return;
9294  }
9295  break;
9296  }
9297  case SPELLFAMILY_DEATHKNIGHT:
9298  {
9299  // Death and Decay
9300  if (spell->SpellFamilyFlags & uint64(0x0000000000000020))
9301  {
9302  if (Unit* caster = GetCaster())
9303  caster->CastCustomSpell(target, 52212, &m_modifier.m_amount, nullptr, nullptr, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, nullptr, this);
9304  return;
9305  }
9306  // Raise Dead
9307 // if (spell->SpellFamilyFlags & uint64(0x0000000000001000))
9308 // return;
9309  // Chains of Ice
9310  if (spell->SpellFamilyFlags & uint64(0x0000400000000000))
9311  {
9312  // Get 0 effect aura
9313  Aura* slow = target->GetAura(GetId(), EFFECT_INDEX_0);
9314  if (slow)
9315  {
9316  slow->ApplyModifier(false, true);
9317  Modifier* mod = slow->GetModifier();
9318  mod->m_amount += m_modifier.m_amount;
9319  if (mod->m_amount > 0) mod->m_amount = 0;
9320  slow->ApplyModifier(true, true);
9321  }
9322  return;
9323  }
9324  // Summon Gargoyle
9325 // if (spell->SpellFamilyFlags & uint64(0x0000008000000000))
9326 // return;
9327  // Death Rune Mastery
9328 // if (spell->SpellFamilyFlags & uint64(0x0000000000004000))
9329 // return;
9330  // Bladed Armor
9331  if (spell->SpellIconID == 2653)
9332  {
9333  // Increases your attack power by $s1 for every $s2 armor value you have.
9334  // Calculate AP bonus (from 1 efect of this spell)
9335  int32 apBonus = m_modifier.m_amount * target->GetArmor() / target->CalculateSpellEffectValue(target, spell, EFFECT_INDEX_1);
9336  target->CastCustomSpell(target, 61217, &apBonus, &apBonus, nullptr, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, nullptr, this);
9337  return;
9338  }
9339  // Reaping
9340 // if (spell->SpellIconID == 22)
9341 // return;
9342  // Blood of the North
9343 // if (spell->SpellIconID == 30412)
9344 // return;
9345  // Hysteria
9346  if (spell->SpellFamilyFlags & uint64(0x0000000020000000))
9347  {
9348  // damage not expected to be show in logs, not any damage spell related to damage apply
9349  uint32 deal = m_modifier.m_amount * target->GetMaxHealth() / 100;
9350  Unit::DealDamage(target, target, deal, nullptr, DIRECT_DAMAGE, SPELL_SCHOOL_MASK_NORMAL, nullptr, false);
9351  return;
9352  }
9353  break;
9354  }
9355  default:
9356  break;
9357  }
9358 
9359  OnPeriodicDummy();
9360 
9361  if (Unit* caster = GetCaster())
9362  {
9363  if (target && target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT)
9364  sScriptDevAIMgr.OnEffectDummy(caster, GetId(), GetEffIndex(), (Creature*)target, ObjectGuid());
9365  }
9366 }
9367 
9368 void Aura::HandlePreventFleeing(bool apply, bool Real)
9369 {
9370  if (!Real)
9371  return;
9372 
9373  Unit::AuraList const& fearAuras = GetTarget()->GetAurasByType(SPELL_AURA_MOD_FEAR);
9374  if (!fearAuras.empty())
9375  {
9376  const Aura* first = fearAuras.front();
9377  if (apply)
9378  GetTarget()->SetFleeing(false);
9379  else
9380  GetTarget()->SetFleeing(true, first->GetCasterGuid(), first->GetId());
9381  }
9382 }
9383 
9384 void Aura::HandleManaShield(bool apply, bool Real)
9385 {
9386  if (!Real)
9387  return;
9388 
9389  // prevent double apply bonuses
9390  if (apply && (GetTarget()->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER || !((Player*)GetTarget())->GetSession()->PlayerLoading()))
9391  {
9392  if (Unit* caster = GetCaster())
9393  {
9394  float DoneActualBenefit = 0.0f;
9395  switch (GetSpellProto()->SpellFamilyName)
9396  {
9397  case SPELLFAMILY_MAGE:
9398  if (GetSpellProto()->SpellFamilyFlags & uint64(0x0000000000008000))
9399  {
9400  // Mana Shield
9401  // +50% from +spd bonus
9402  DoneActualBenefit = caster->SpellBaseDamageBonusDone(GetSpellSchoolMask(GetSpellProto())) * 0.5f;
9403  break;
9404  }
9405  break;
9406  default:
9407  break;
9408  }
9409 
9410  DoneActualBenefit *= caster->CalculateLevelPenalty(GetSpellProto());
9411 
9412  m_modifier.m_amount += (int32)DoneActualBenefit;
9413  }
9414  }
9415 }
9416 
9417 void Aura::HandleArenaPreparation(bool apply, bool Real)
9418 {
9419  if (!Real)
9420  return;
9421 
9422  Unit* target = GetTarget();
9423 
9424  target->ApplyModFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_PREPARATION, apply);
9425 
9426  if (apply)
9427  {
9428  // max regen powers at start preparation
9429  target->SetHealth(target->GetMaxHealth());
9430  target->SetPower(POWER_MANA, target->GetMaxPower(POWER_MANA));
9431  target->SetPower(POWER_ENERGY, target->GetMaxPower(POWER_ENERGY));
9432  }
9433  else
9434  {
9435  // reset originally 0 powers at start/leave
9436  target->SetPower(POWER_RAGE, 0);
9437  target->SetPower(POWER_RUNIC_POWER, 0);
9438  }
9439 }
9440 
9445 void Aura::HandleAuraControlVehicle(bool apply, bool Real)
9446 {
9447  if (!Real)
9448  return;
9449 
9450  Unit* target = GetTarget();
9451  if (!target->IsVehicle())
9452  return;
9453 
9454  Unit* caster = GetCaster();
9455  if (!caster)
9456  return;
9457 
9458  if (apply)
9459  {
9460  //sLog.outString("Boarding %s %s on %s %s", caster->GetName(), caster->GetGuidStr().c_str(), target->GetName(), target->GetGuidStr().c_str());
9461  target->GetVehicleInfo()->Board(caster, GetBasePoints() - 1);
9462 
9463  if (Player* playerCaster = dynamic_cast<Player*>(caster))
9464  {
9465  UpdateMask updateMask;
9466  updateMask.SetCount(target->GetValuesCount());
9467  target->MarkUpdateFieldsWithFlagForUpdate(updateMask, UF_FLAG_OWNER_ONLY);
9468  if (updateMask.HasData())
9469  {
9470  UpdateData newData;
9471  target->BuildValuesUpdateBlockForPlayer(newData, updateMask, playerCaster);
9472 
9473  if (newData.HasData())
9474  {
9475  WorldPacket newDataPacket = newData.BuildPacket(0);
9476  playerCaster->SendDirectMessage(newDataPacket);
9477  }
9478  }
9479  }
9480  }
9481  else
9482  {
9483  //sLog.outString("Unboarding %s %s from %s %s", caster->GetName(), caster->GetGuidStr().c_str(), target->GetName(), target->GetGuidStr().c_str());
9484  target->GetVehicleInfo()->UnBoard(caster, m_removeMode == AURA_REMOVE_BY_TRACKING);
9485  }
9486 }
9487 
9488 void Aura::HandleAuraAddMechanicAbilities(bool apply, bool Real)
9489 {
9490  if (!Real)
9491  return;
9492 
9493  Unit* target = GetTarget();
9494 
9495  if (!target || target->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER) // only players should be affected by this aura
9496  return;
9497 
9498  uint16 i_OverrideSetId = GetMiscValue();
9499 
9500  const OverrideSpellDataEntry* spellSet = sOverrideSpellDataStore.LookupEntry(i_OverrideSetId);
9501  if (!spellSet)
9502  return;
9503 
9504  if (apply)
9505  {
9506  // spell give the player a new castbar with some spells.. this is a clientside process..
9507  // serverside just needs to register the new spells so that player isn't kicked as cheater
9508  for (unsigned int spellId : spellSet->Spells)
9509  if (spellId)
9510  static_cast<Player*>(target)->addSpell(spellId, true, false, false, false);
9511 
9512  target->SetUInt16Value(PLAYER_FIELD_BYTES2, 0, i_OverrideSetId);
9513  }
9514  else
9515  {
9516  target->SetUInt16Value(PLAYER_FIELD_BYTES2, 0, 0);
9517  for (unsigned int spellId : spellSet->Spells)
9518  if (spellId)
9519  static_cast<Player*>(target)->removeSpell(spellId, false, false, false);
9520  }
9521 }
9522 
9523 void Aura::HandleAuraOpenStable(bool apply, bool Real)
9524 {
9525  if (!Real || GetTarget()->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER || !GetTarget()->IsInWorld())
9526  return;
9527 
9528  Player* player = (Player*)GetTarget();
9529 
9530  if (apply)
9531  player->GetSession()->SendStablePet(player->GetObjectGuid());
9532 
9533  // client auto close stable dialog at !apply aura
9534 }
9535 
9536 void Aura::HandleAuraMirrorImage(bool apply, bool Real)
9537 {
9538  if (!Real)
9539  return;
9540 
9541  Unit* target = GetTarget();
9542  if (!target->IsCreature())
9543  return;
9544 
9545  // Target of aura should always be creature (ref Spell::CheckCast)
9546 
9547  if (apply)
9548  {
9549  // Caster can be player or creature, the unit who pCreature will become an clone of.
9550  Unit* caster = GetCaster();
9551 
9552  target->SetByteValue(UNIT_FIELD_BYTES_0, UNIT_BYTES_0_OFFSET_RACE, caster->getRace());
9553  target->SetByteValue(UNIT_FIELD_BYTES_0, UNIT_BYTES_0_OFFSET_CLASS, caster->getClass());
9554  target->SetByteValue(UNIT_FIELD_BYTES_0, UNIT_BYTES_0_OFFSET_GENDER, caster->getGender());
9555  target->SetByteValue(UNIT_FIELD_BYTES_0, UNIT_BYTES_0_OFFSET_POWER_TYPE, caster->GetPowerType());
9556 
9557  target->SetFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS_2, UNIT_FLAG2_CLONED);
9558 
9559  target->SetDisplayId(caster->GetNativeDisplayId());
9560  }
9561  else
9562  {
9563  const CreatureInfo* cinfo = static_cast<Creature*>(target)->GetCreatureInfo();
9564  const CreatureModelInfo* minfo = sObjectMgr.GetCreatureModelInfo(target->GetNativeDisplayId());
9565 
9566  target->SetByteValue(UNIT_FIELD_BYTES_0, UNIT_BYTES_0_OFFSET_RACE, 0);
9567  target->SetByteValue(UNIT_FIELD_BYTES_0, UNIT_BYTES_0_OFFSET_CLASS, cinfo->UnitClass);
9568  target->SetByteValue(UNIT_FIELD_BYTES_0, UNIT_BYTES_0_OFFSET_GENDER, minfo->gender);
9569  target->SetByteValue(UNIT_FIELD_BYTES_0, UNIT_BYTES_0_OFFSET_POWER_TYPE, 0);
9570 
9571  target->RemoveFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS_2, UNIT_FLAG2_CLONED);
9572 
9573  target->SetDisplayId(target->GetNativeDisplayId());
9574  }
9575 }
9576 
9577 void Aura::HandleMirrorName(bool apply, bool Real)
9578 {
9579  if (!Real)
9580  return;
9581 
9582  Unit* caster = GetCaster();
9583  Unit* target = GetTarget();
9584 
9585  if (!target || !caster || target->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_UNIT)
9586  return;
9587 
9588  if (apply)
9589  target->SetName(caster->GetName());
9590  else
9591  {
9592  CreatureInfo const* cinfo = ((Creature*)target)->GetCreatureInfo();
9593  if (!cinfo)
9594  return;
9595 
9596  target->SetName(cinfo->Name);
9597  }
9598 }
9599 
9600 void Aura::HandleAuraConvertRune(bool apply, bool Real)
9601 {
9602  if (!Real)
9603  return;
9604 
9605  if (GetTarget()->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
9606  return;
9607 
9608  Player* plr = (Player*)GetTarget();
9609 
9610  if (plr->getClass() != CLASS_DEATH_KNIGHT)
9611  return;
9612 
9613  RuneType runeFrom = RuneType(GetSpellProto()->EffectMiscValue[m_effIndex]);
9614  RuneType runeTo = RuneType(GetSpellProto()->EffectMiscValueB[m_effIndex]);
9615 
9616  if (apply)
9617  {
9618  for (uint32 i = 0; i < MAX_RUNES; ++i)
9619  {
9620  if (plr->GetCurrentRune(i) == runeFrom && !plr->GetRuneCooldown(i))
9621  {
9622  plr->AddRuneByAuraEffect(i, runeTo, this);
9623  break;
9624  }
9625  }
9626  }
9627  else
9628  plr->RemoveRunesByAura(this);
9629 }
9630 
9631 void Aura::HandlePhase(bool apply, bool Real)
9632 {
9633  if (!Real)
9634  return;
9635 
9636  Unit* target = GetTarget();
9637 
9638  // always non stackable
9639  if (apply)
9640  {
9641  Unit::AuraList const& phases = target->GetAurasByType(SPELL_AURA_PHASE);
9642  if (!phases.empty())
9643  target->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(phases.front()->GetId(), GetHolder());
9644  }
9645 
9646  target->SetPhaseMask(apply ? GetMiscValue() : uint32(PHASEMASK_NORMAL), true);
9647  // no-phase is also phase state so same code for apply and remove
9648  if (target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
9649  {
9650  SpellAreaForAreaMapBounds saBounds = sSpellMgr.GetSpellAreaForAuraMapBounds(GetId());
9651  if (saBounds.first != saBounds.second)
9652  {
9653  uint32 zone, area;
9654  target->GetZoneAndAreaId(zone, area);
9655 
9656  for (SpellAreaForAreaMap::const_iterator itr = saBounds.first; itr != saBounds.second; ++itr)
9657  itr->second->ApplyOrRemoveSpellIfCan((Player*)target, zone, area, false);
9658  }
9659  }
9660 }
9661 
9662 void Aura::HandleAuraDetaunt(bool /*Apply*/, bool Real)
9663 {
9664  // only at real add/remove aura
9665  if (!Real)
9666  return;
9667 
9668  Unit* caster = GetCaster();
9669 
9670  if (!caster || !caster->IsAlive() || !caster->CanHaveThreatList())
9671  return;
9672 
9673  caster->TauntUpdate();
9674 }
9675 
9676 void Aura::HandleAuraSafeFall(bool Apply, bool Real)
9677 {
9678  // implemented in WorldSession::HandleMovementOpcodes
9679 
9680  // only special case
9681  if (Apply && Real && GetId() == 32474 && GetTarget()->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER && GetHolder()->GetState() != SPELLAURAHOLDER_STATE_DB_LOAD)
9682  ((Player*)GetTarget())->ActivateTaxiPathTo(506, GetId()); // on DB load flight path is initiated on its own after its safe to do so
9683 }
9684 
9685 bool Aura::IsCritFromAbilityAura(Unit* caster, uint32& damage) const
9686 {
9687  if (!GetSpellProto()->IsFitToFamily(SPELLFAMILY_ROGUE, uint64(0x100000)) && // Rupture
9688  !caster->HasAffectedAura(SPELL_AURA_ABILITY_PERIODIC_CRIT, GetSpellProto()))
9689  return false;
9690 
9691  if (Unit::RollSpellCritOutcome(caster, GetTarget(), GetSpellSchoolMask(GetSpellProto()), GetSpellProto()))
9692  {
9693  damage = caster->CalculateCritAmount(GetTarget(), damage, GetSpellProto());
9694  return true;
9695  }
9696 
9697  return false;
9698 }
9699 
9700 void Aura::HandleModTargetArmorPct(bool /*apply*/, bool /*Real*/)
9701 {
9702  if (GetTarget()->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
9703  return;
9704 
9705  ((Player*)GetTarget())->UpdateArmorPenetration();
9706 }
9707 
9708 void Aura::HandleAuraModAllCritChance(bool apply, bool Real)
9709 {
9710  // spells required only Real aura add/remove
9711  if (!Real)
9712  return;
9713 
9714  Unit* target = GetTarget();
9715 
9716  if (target->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
9717  return;
9718 
9719  ((Player*)target)->HandleBaseModValue(CRIT_PERCENTAGE, FLAT_MOD, float(m_modifier.m_amount), apply);
9720  ((Player*)target)->HandleBaseModValue(OFFHAND_CRIT_PERCENTAGE, FLAT_MOD, float(m_modifier.m_amount), apply);
9721  ((Player*)target)->HandleBaseModValue(RANGED_CRIT_PERCENTAGE, FLAT_MOD, float(m_modifier.m_amount), apply);
9722 
9723  // included in Player::UpdateSpellCritChance calculation
9724  ((Player*)target)->UpdateAllSpellCritChances();
9725 }
9726 
9727 void Aura::HandleAuraStopNaturalManaRegen(bool apply, bool Real)
9728 {
9729  if (!Real)
9730  return;
9731 
9732  GetTarget()->ApplyModFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS_2, UNIT_FLAG2_REGENERATE_POWER, !apply && !GetTarget()->IsUnderLastManaUseEffect());
9733 }
9734 
9735 void Aura::HandleAuraSetVehicleId(bool apply, bool Real)
9736 {
9737  if (!Real)
9738  return;
9739 
9740  GetTarget()->SetVehicleId(apply ? GetMiscValue() : 0, 0);
9741 }
9742 
9743 void Aura::HandlePreventResurrection(bool apply, bool Real)
9744 {
9745  if (!Real)
9746  return;
9747 
9748  Unit* target = GetTarget();
9749  if (!target || target->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER)
9750  return;
9751 
9752  if (apply)
9753  target->RemoveByteFlag(PLAYER_FIELD_BYTES, 0, PLAYER_FIELD_BYTE_RELEASE_TIMER);
9754  else if (!target->GetMap()->Instanceable())
9755  target->SetByteFlag(PLAYER_FIELD_BYTES, 0, PLAYER_FIELD_BYTE_RELEASE_TIMER);
9756 }
9757 
9758 void Aura::HandleFactionOverride(bool apply, bool Real)
9759 {
9760  if (!Real)
9761  return;
9762 
9763  Unit* target = GetTarget();
9764  if (!target || !sFactionTemplateStore.LookupEntry(GetMiscValue()))
9765  return;
9766 
9767  if (apply)
9768  target->setFaction(GetMiscValue());
9769  else
9770  target->RestoreOriginalFaction();
9771 
9772  target->RemoveUnattackableTargets();
9773 }
9774 
9775 void Aura::HandleTriggerLinkedAura(bool apply, bool Real)
9776 {
9777  if (!Real)
9778  return;
9779 
9780  uint32 linkedSpell = GetSpellProto()->EffectTriggerSpell[m_effIndex];
9781  SpellEntry const* spellInfo = sSpellTemplate.LookupEntry<SpellEntry>(linkedSpell);
9782  if (!spellInfo)
9783  {
9784  sLog.outError("Aura::HandleTriggerLinkedAura for spell %u effect %u triggering unknown spell id %u", GetSpellProto()->Id, m_effIndex, linkedSpell);
9785  return;
9786  }
9787 
9788  Unit* target = GetTarget();
9789  Unit* caster = GetCaster();
9790 
9791  if (apply)
9792  {
9793  SpellCastArgs args;
9794  if (int32 points = GetAmount())
9795  args.SetBasePoints(&points, nullptr, nullptr);
9796  args.SetTarget(target);
9797  caster->CastSpell(args, spellInfo, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, nullptr, this);
9798  }
9799  else
9800  target->RemoveAurasByCasterSpell(linkedSpell, GetCasterGuid());
9801 }
9802 
9803 void Aura::HandleOverrideClassScript(bool apply, bool real)
9804 {
9805  GetTarget()->RegisterOverrideScriptAura(this, m_modifier.m_miscvalue, apply);
9806 }
9807 
9808 void Aura::HandleAuraAllowOnlyAbility(bool apply, bool Real)
9809 {
9810  Unit* target = GetTarget();
9811 
9812  if (target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
9813  {
9814  if (apply)
9815  target->SetFlag(PLAYER_FLAGS, PLAYER_ALLOW_ONLY_ABILITY);
9816  else
9817  {
9818  // do not remove unit flag if there are more than this auraEffect of that kind on unit on unit
9819  if (target->HasAuraType(SPELL_AURA_ALLOW_ONLY_ABILITY))
9820  return;
9821  target->RemoveFlag(PLAYER_FLAGS, PLAYER_ALLOW_ONLY_ABILITY);
9822  }
9823  }
9824 }
9825 
9826 bool Aura::IsLastAuraOnHolder()
9827 {
9828  for (int32 i = 0; i < MAX_EFFECT_INDEX; ++i)
9829  if (i != GetEffIndex() && GetHolder()->m_auras[i])
9830  return false;
9831  return true;
9832 }
9833 
9834 bool Aura::HasMechanic(uint32 mechanic) const
9835 {
9836  return GetSpellProto()->Mechanic == mechanic ||
9837  GetSpellProto()->EffectMechanic[m_effIndex] == mechanic;
9838 }
9839 
9840 inline bool IsRemovedOnShapeshiftLost(SpellEntry const* spellproto, ObjectGuid const& casterGuid, ObjectGuid const& targetGuid)
9841 {
9842  if (casterGuid == targetGuid)
9843  {
9844  if (spellproto->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_AURA_IS_DEBUFF))
9845  return false;
9846 
9847  if (spellproto->Stances[0])
9848  {
9849  switch (spellproto->Id)
9850  {
9851  case 11327: // vanish stealth aura improvements are removed on stealth removal
9852  case 11329: // but they have attribute SPELL_ATTR_NOT_SHAPESHIFT
9853  case 26888: // maybe relic from when they had Effect1?
9854  return true;
9855  default:
9856  break;
9857  }
9858 
9859  if (!spellproto->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX2_ALLOW_WHILE_NOT_SHAPESHIFTED) && !spellproto->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_NOT_SHAPESHIFT))
9860  return true;
9861  }
9862  else if (spellproto->SpellFamilyName == SPELLFAMILY_DRUID && spellproto->EffectApplyAuraName[0] == SPELL_AURA_MOD_DODGE_PERCENT)
9863  return true;
9864  }
9865 
9866  return false;
9867  /*TODO: investigate spellid 24864 or (SpellFamilyName = 7 and EffectApplyAuraName_1 = 49 and stances = 0)*/
9868 }
9869 
9870 SpellAuraHolder::SpellAuraHolder(SpellEntry const* spellproto, Unit* target, WorldObject* caster, Item* castItem, SpellEntry const* triggeredBy) :
9871  m_spellProto(spellproto), m_target(target),
9872  m_castItemGuid(castItem ? castItem->GetObjectGuid() : ObjectGuid()), m_triggeredBy(triggeredBy),
9873  m_spellAuraHolderState(SPELLAURAHOLDER_STATE_CREATED), m_auraSlot(MAX_AURAS), m_auraFlags(AFLAG_NONE),
9874  m_auraLevel(1), m_procCharges(0),
9875  m_stackAmount(1), m_timeCla(1000), m_removeMode(AURA_REMOVE_BY_DEFAULT),
9876  m_AuraDRGroup(DIMINISHING_NONE), m_permanent(false), m_isRemovedOnShapeLost(true),
9877  m_heartbeatResistChance(0), m_heartbeatResistTimer(0), m_heartbeatResistInterval(0),
9878  m_deleted(false), m_skipUpdate(false), m_reducedProcChancePast60(false),
9879  m_auraScript(SpellScriptMgr::GetAuraScript(spellproto->Id))
9880 {
9881  MANGOS_ASSERT(target);
9882  MANGOS_ASSERT(spellproto && spellproto == sSpellTemplate.LookupEntry<SpellEntry>(spellproto->Id) && "`info` must be pointer to sSpellTemplate element");
9883 
9884  if (!caster)
9885  m_casterGuid = target->GetObjectGuid();
9886  else
9887  m_casterGuid = caster->GetObjectGuid();
9888 
9889  m_applyTime = time(nullptr);
9890  m_applyMSTime = target->GetMap()->GetCurrentMSTime();
9891  m_isPassive = IsPassiveSpell(spellproto);
9892  m_isDeathPersist = IsDeathPersistentSpell(spellproto);
9893  m_trackedAuraType = sSpellMgr.IsSingleTargetSpell(spellproto) ? TRACK_AURA_TYPE_SINGLE_TARGET : IsSpellHaveAura(spellproto, SPELL_AURA_CONTROL_VEHICLE) ? TRACK_AURA_TYPE_CONTROL_VEHICLE : TRACK_AURA_TYPE_NOT_TRACKED;
9894  m_procCharges = spellproto->procCharges;
9895 
9896  m_isRemovedOnShapeLost = IsRemovedOnShapeshiftLost(m_spellProto, GetCasterGuid(), target->GetObjectGuid());
9897 
9898  Unit* unitCaster = caster && caster->isType(TYPEMASK_UNIT) ? (Unit*)caster : nullptr;
9899 
9900  m_duration = m_maxDuration = CalculateSpellDuration(spellproto, unitCaster, target, m_auraScript);
9901 
9902  if (m_maxDuration == -1 || (m_isPassive && spellproto->DurationIndex == 0))
9903  m_permanent = true;
9904 
9905  if (unitCaster)
9906  {
9907  if (Player* modOwner = unitCaster->GetSpellModOwner())
9908  modOwner->ApplySpellMod(GetId(), SPELLMOD_CHARGES, m_procCharges);
9909  }
9910 
9911  // some custom stack values at aura holder create
9912  switch (m_spellProto->Id)
9913  {
9914  // some auras applied with max stack
9915  case 24575: // Brittle Armor
9916  case 24659: // Unstable Power
9917  case 24662: // Restless Strength
9918  case 26464: // Mercurial Shield
9919  case 32065: // Fungal Decay
9920  case 34027: // Kill Command
9921  case 36659: // Tail Sting
9922  case 37589: // Shriveling Gaze
9923  case 40157: // Spirit Lance
9924  case 55166: // Tidal Force
9925  case 58914: // Kill Command (pet part)
9926  case 62519: // Attuned to Nature
9927  case 63050: // Sanity
9928  case 64455: // Feral Essence
9929  case 65294: // Empowered
9930  case 70672: // Gaseous Bloat
9931  case 71564: // Deadly Precision
9932  m_stackAmount = m_spellProto->StackAmount;
9933  break;
9934  }
9935 
9936  for (auto& m_aura : m_auras)
9937  m_aura = nullptr;
9938 
9939  OnHolderInit(caster);
9940 }
9941 
9942 void SpellAuraHolder::AddAura(Aura* aura, SpellEffectIndex index)
9943 {
9944  m_auras[index] = aura;
9945  m_auraFlags |= (1 << index);
9946 }
9947 
9948 void SpellAuraHolder::RemoveAura(SpellEffectIndex index)
9949 {
9950  m_auras[index] = nullptr;
9951  m_auraFlags &= ~(1 << index);
9952 }
9953 
9954 void SpellAuraHolder::ApplyAuraModifiers(bool apply, bool real)
9955 {
9956  for (int32 i = 0; i < MAX_EFFECT_INDEX && !IsDeleted(); ++i)
9957  if (Aura* aur = GetAuraByEffectIndex(SpellEffectIndex(i)))
9958  aur->ApplyModifier(apply, real);
9959 }
9960 
9961 void SpellAuraHolder::_AddSpellAuraHolder()
9962 {
9963  if (!GetId())
9964  return;
9965  if (!m_target)
9966  return;
9967 
9968  // Try find slot for aura
9969  uint8 slot = NULL_AURA_SLOT;
9970 
9971  // Lookup free slot
9972  if (m_target->GetVisibleAurasCount() < MAX_AURAS)
9973  {
9974  Unit::VisibleAuraMap const& visibleAuras = m_target->GetVisibleAuras();
9975  for (uint8 i = 0; i < MAX_AURAS; ++i)
9976  {
9977  Unit::VisibleAuraMap::const_iterator itr = visibleAuras.find(i);
9978  if (itr == visibleAuras.end())
9979  {
9980  slot = i;
9981  // update for out of range group members (on 1 slot use)
9982  m_target->UpdateAuraForGroup(slot);
9983  break;
9984  }
9985  }
9986  }
9987 
9988  Unit* caster = GetCaster();
9989 
9990  uint8 flags = 0;
9991  for (int32 i = 0; i < MAX_EFFECT_INDEX; ++i)
9992  {
9993  if (m_auras[i])
