9994  flags |= (1 << i);
9995  }
9996  flags |= ((GetCasterGuid() == GetTarget()->GetObjectGuid()) ? AFLAG_NOT_CASTER : AFLAG_NONE) | ((GetSpellMaxDuration(m_spellProto) > 0) ? AFLAG_DURATION : AFLAG_NONE) | (IsPositive() ? AFLAG_POSITIVE : AFLAG_NEGATIVE);
9997  SetAuraFlags(flags);
9998 
9999  SetAuraLevel(caster ? caster->GetLevel() : sWorld.getConfig(CONFIG_UINT32_MAX_PLAYER_LEVEL));
10000 
10001  if (IsNeedVisibleSlot(caster))
10002  {
10003  SetAuraSlot(slot);
10004  if (slot < MAX_AURAS) // slot found send data to client
10005  {
10006  SetVisibleAura(false);
10007  SendAuraUpdate(false);
10008  }
10009 
10010  //*****************************************************
10011  // Update target aura state flag on holder apply
10012  // TODO: Make it easer
10013  //*****************************************************
10014 
10015  // Sitdown on apply aura req seated
10016  if (m_spellProto->AuraInterruptFlags & AURA_INTERRUPT_FLAG_STANDING_CANCELS && !m_target->IsSitState())
10017  m_target->SetStandState(UNIT_STAND_STATE_SIT);
10018 
10019  // register aura diminishing on apply
10020  if (getDiminishGroup() != DIMINISHING_NONE)
10021  m_target->ApplyDiminishingAura(getDiminishGroup(), true);
10022 
10023  // Update Seals information
10024  if (IsSealSpell(m_spellProto))
10025  m_target->ModifyAuraState(AURA_STATE_JUDGEMENT, true);
10026 
10027  if (m_spellProto->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX_PREVENTS_ANIM))
10028  m_target->SetFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_PREVENT_ANIM);
10029 
10030  // Conflagrate aura state on Immolate and Shadowflame
10031  if (m_spellProto->IsFitToFamily(SPELLFAMILY_WARLOCK, uint64(0x0000000000000004), 0x00000002))
10032  m_target->ModifyAuraState(AURA_STATE_CONFLAGRATE, true);
10033 
10034  // Faerie Fire (druid versions)
10035  if (m_spellProto->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_SS_PREVENT_INVIS))
10036  m_target->ModifyAuraState(AURA_STATE_FAERIE_FIRE, true);
10037 
10038  // Victorious
10039  if (m_spellProto->IsFitToFamily(SPELLFAMILY_WARRIOR, uint64(0x0004000000000000)))
10040  m_target->ModifyAuraState(AURA_STATE_WARRIOR_VICTORY_RUSH, true);
10041 
10042  // Swiftmend state on Regrowth & Rejuvenation
10043  if (m_spellProto->IsFitToFamily(SPELLFAMILY_DRUID, uint64(0x0000000000000050)))
10044  m_target->ModifyAuraState(AURA_STATE_SWIFTMEND, true);
10045 
10046  // Deadly poison aura state
10047  if (m_spellProto->IsFitToFamily(SPELLFAMILY_ROGUE, uint64(0x0000000000010000)))
10048  m_target->ModifyAuraState(AURA_STATE_DEADLY_POISON, true);
10049 
10050  // Enrage aura state
10051  if (m_spellProto->Dispel == DISPEL_ENRAGE)
10052  m_target->ModifyAuraState(AURA_STATE_ENRAGE, true);
10053 
10054  // Bleeding aura state
10055  if (GetAllSpellMechanicMask(m_spellProto) & (1 << (MECHANIC_BLEED - 1)))
10056  m_target->ModifyAuraState(AURA_STATE_BLEEDING, true);
10057  }
10058 }
10059 
10060 void SpellAuraHolder::_RemoveSpellAuraHolder()
10061 {
10062  // Remove all triggered by aura spells vs unlimited duration
10063  // except same aura replace case
10064  if (m_removeMode != AURA_REMOVE_BY_STACK)
10065  CleanupTriggeredSpells();
10066 
10067  Unit* caster = GetCaster();
10068 
10069  if (caster && IsPersistent())
10070  if (DynamicObject* dynObj = caster->GetDynObject(GetId()))
10071  dynObj->RemoveAffected(m_target);
10072 
10073  // remove at-store spell cast items (for all remove modes?)
10074  if (m_target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER && m_removeMode != AURA_REMOVE_BY_DEFAULT && m_removeMode != AURA_REMOVE_BY_DELETE)
10075  if (ObjectGuid castItemGuid = GetCastItemGuid())
10076  if (Item* castItem = ((Player*)m_target)->GetItemByGuid(castItemGuid))
10077  ((Player*)m_target)->DestroyItemWithOnStoreSpell(castItem, GetId());
10078 
10079  // passive auras do not get put in slots - said who? ;)
10080  // Note: but totem can be not accessible for aura target in time remove (to far for find in grid)
10081  // if (m_isPassive && !(caster && caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT && ((Creature*)caster)->IsTotem()))
10082  // return;
10083 
10084  uint8 slot = GetAuraSlot();
10085 
10086  if (slot >= MAX_AURAS) // slot not set
10087  return;
10088 
10089  if (m_target->GetVisibleAura(slot) == 0)
10090  return;
10091 
10092  // unregister aura diminishing (and store last time)
10093  if (getDiminishGroup() != DIMINISHING_NONE)
10094  m_target->ApplyDiminishingAura(getDiminishGroup(), false);
10095 
10096  SetAuraFlags(AFLAG_NONE);
10097  SetAuraLevel(0);
10098  SetVisibleAura(true);
10099 
10100  if (m_removeMode != AURA_REMOVE_BY_DELETE)
10101  {
10102  SendAuraUpdate(true);
10103 
10104  // update for out of range group members
10105  m_target->UpdateAuraForGroup(slot);
10106 
10107  //*****************************************************
10108  // Update target aura state flag (at last aura remove)
10109  //*****************************************************
10110  // Enrage aura state
10111  if (m_spellProto->Dispel == DISPEL_ENRAGE)
10112  m_target->ModifyAuraState(AURA_STATE_ENRAGE, false);
10113 
10114  // Bleeding aura state
10115  if (GetAllSpellMechanicMask(m_spellProto) & (1 << (MECHANIC_BLEED - 1)))
10116  {
10117  bool found = false;
10118 
10119  Unit::SpellAuraHolderMap const& holders = m_target->GetSpellAuraHolderMap();
10120  for (const auto& holder : holders)
10121  {
10122  if (GetAllSpellMechanicMask(holder.second->GetSpellProto()) & (1 << (MECHANIC_BLEED - 1)))
10123  {
10124  found = true;
10125  break;
10126  }
10127  }
10128 
10129  if (!found)
10130  m_target->ModifyAuraState(AURA_STATE_BLEEDING, false);
10131  }
10132 
10133  uint32 removeState = 0;
10134  ClassFamilyMask removeFamilyFlag = m_spellProto->SpellFamilyFlags;
10135  switch (m_spellProto->SpellFamilyName)
10136  {
10137  case SPELLFAMILY_PALADIN:
10138  if (IsSealSpell(m_spellProto))
10139  removeState = AURA_STATE_JUDGEMENT; // Update Seals information
10140  break;
10141  case SPELLFAMILY_WARLOCK:
10142  // Conflagrate aura state on Immolate and Shadowflame,
10143  if (m_spellProto->IsFitToFamilyMask(uint64(0x0000000000000004), 0x00000002))
10144  {
10145  removeFamilyFlag = ClassFamilyMask(uint64(0x0000000000000004), 0x00000002);
10146  removeState = AURA_STATE_CONFLAGRATE;
10147  }
10148  break;
10149  case SPELLFAMILY_DRUID:
10150  if (m_spellProto->IsFitToFamilyMask(uint64(0x0000000000000050)))
10151  {
10152  removeFamilyFlag = ClassFamilyMask(uint64(0x00000000000050));
10153  removeState = AURA_STATE_SWIFTMEND; // Swiftmend aura state
10154  }
10155  break;
10156  case SPELLFAMILY_WARRIOR:
10157  if (m_spellProto->IsFitToFamilyMask(uint64(0x0004000000000000)))
10158  removeState = AURA_STATE_WARRIOR_VICTORY_RUSH; // Victorious
10159  break;
10160  case SPELLFAMILY_ROGUE:
10161  if (m_spellProto->IsFitToFamilyMask(uint64(0x0000000000010000)))
10162  removeState = AURA_STATE_DEADLY_POISON; // Deadly poison aura state
10163  break;
10164  case SPELLFAMILY_HUNTER:
10165  if (m_spellProto->IsFitToFamilyMask(uint64(0x1000000000000000)))
10166  removeState = AURA_STATE_FAERIE_FIRE; // Sting (hunter versions)
10167  }
10168 
10169  if (m_spellProto->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_SS_PREVENT_INVIS))
10170  removeState = AURA_STATE_FAERIE_FIRE; // Faerie Fire
10171 
10172  // Remove state (but need check other auras for it)
10173  if (removeState)
10174  // this has been last aura
10175  if (!m_target->HasAuraWithCondition([spellProto = m_spellProto, removeFamilyFlag](SpellAuraHolder* holder)
10176  {
10177  SpellEntry const* auraSpellInfo = holder->GetSpellProto();
10178  if (auraSpellInfo->IsFitToFamily(SpellFamily(spellProto->SpellFamilyName), removeFamilyFlag))
10179  return true;
10180  return false;
10181  }))
10182  m_target->ModifyAuraState(AuraState(removeState), false);
10183 
10184  if (m_spellProto->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX_PREVENTS_ANIM))
10185  if (!m_target->HasAuraWithCondition([](SpellAuraHolder* holder)
10186  {
10187  if (holder->GetSpellProto()->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX_PREVENTS_ANIM))
10188  return true;
10189  return false;
10190  }))
10191  m_target->RemoveFlag(UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, UNIT_FLAG_PREVENT_ANIM);
10192 
10193  // reset cooldown state for spells
10194  if (caster && GetSpellProto()->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_COOLDOWN_ON_EVENT))
10195  {
10196  // some spells need to start cooldown at aura fade (like stealth)
10197  caster->AddCooldown(*GetSpellProto());
10198  }
10199  }
10200 }
10201 
10202 void SpellAuraHolder::CleanupTriggeredSpells()
10203 {
10204  for (int32 i = 0; i < MAX_EFFECT_INDEX; ++i)
10205  {
10206  if (!m_spellProto->EffectApplyAuraName[i])
10207  continue;
10208 
10209  uint32 tSpellId = m_spellProto->EffectTriggerSpell[i];
10210  if (!tSpellId)
10211  continue;
10212 
10213  SpellEntry const* tProto = sSpellTemplate.LookupEntry<SpellEntry>(tSpellId);
10214  if (!tProto)
10215  continue;
10216 
10217  if (GetSpellDuration(tProto) != -1)
10218  continue;
10219 
10220  // needed for spell 43680, maybe others
10221  // TODO: is there a spell flag, which can solve this in a more sophisticated way?
10222  if (m_spellProto->EffectApplyAuraName[i] == SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_TRIGGER_SPELL &&
10223  GetSpellDuration(m_spellProto) == int32(m_spellProto->EffectAmplitude[i]))
10224  continue;
10225 
10226  m_target->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(tSpellId);
10227  }
10228 }
10229 
10230 bool SpellAuraHolder::ModStackAmount(int32 num, Unit* newCaster)
10231 {
10232  uint32 protoStackAmount = m_spellProto->StackAmount;
10233 
10234  // Can`t mod
10235  if (!protoStackAmount)
10236  return true;
10237 
10238  // Modify stack but limit it
10239  int32 stackAmount = m_stackAmount + num;
10240  if (stackAmount > (int32)protoStackAmount)
10241  stackAmount = protoStackAmount;
10242  else if (stackAmount <= 0) // Last aura from stack removed
10243  {
10244  m_stackAmount = 0;
10245  return true; // need remove aura
10246  }
10247 
10248  // Update stack amount
10249  SetStackAmount(stackAmount, newCaster);
10250  return false;
10251 }
10252 
10253 void SpellAuraHolder::SetStackAmount(uint32 stackAmount, Unit* newCaster)
10254 {
10255  Unit* target = GetTarget();
10256  if (!target)
10257  return;
10258 
10259  bool refresh = false;
10260  if (stackAmount >= m_stackAmount)
10261  {
10262  // Change caster
10263  Unit* oldCaster = GetCaster();
10264  if (newCaster && oldCaster != newCaster)
10265  {
10266  m_casterGuid = newCaster->GetObjectGuid();
10267  // New caster duration sent for owner in RefreshHolder
10268  }
10269 
10270  refresh = true;
10271  }
10272 
10273  int32 oldStackAmount = m_stackAmount;
10274  if (m_spellProto->Id == 32264) // temporary hack for Inhibit Magic
10275  {
10276  OnHolderInit(newCaster);
10277  stackAmount = m_stackAmount;
10278  m_stackAmount = oldStackAmount;
10279  }
10280  m_stackAmount = stackAmount;
10281 
10282  for (auto aur : m_auras)
10283  {
10284  if (aur)
10285  {
10286  int32 baseAmount = aur->GetModifier()->m_baseAmount;
10287  int32 amount = m_stackAmount * baseAmount;
10288  amount = aur->OnAuraValueCalculate(newCaster, amount);
10289  // Reapply if amount change
10290  if (!baseAmount || amount != aur->GetModifier()->m_amount)
10291  {
10292  aur->SetRemoveMode(AURA_REMOVE_BY_GAINED_STACK);
10293  if (IsAuraRemoveOnStacking(this->GetSpellProto(), aur->GetEffIndex()))
10294  aur->ApplyModifier(false, true);
10295  aur->GetModifier()->m_amount = amount;
10296  aur->GetModifier()->m_recentAmount = baseAmount * (stackAmount - oldStackAmount);
10297  aur->ApplyModifier(true, true);
10298  }
10299  }
10300  }
10301 
10302  if (refresh) // Stack increased refresh duration
10303  RefreshHolder();
10304  else // Stack decreased only send update
10305  SendAuraUpdate(false);
10306 }
10307 
10308 Unit* SpellAuraHolder::GetCaster() const
10309 {
10310  if (m_casterGuid == m_target->GetObjectGuid())
10311  return m_target;
10312 
10313  if (m_casterGuid.IsGameObject())
10314  return nullptr;
10315 
10316  if (!m_target->IsInWorld())
10317  return nullptr;
10318 
10319  return m_target->GetMap()->GetUnit(m_casterGuid);
10320 }
10321 
10322 bool SpellAuraHolder::IsWeaponBuffCoexistableWith(SpellAuraHolder const* ref) const
10323 {
10324  // only item casted spells
10325  if (!GetCastItemGuid())
10326  return false;
10327 
10328  // Exclude Debuffs
10329  if (!IsPositive())
10330  return false;
10331 
10332  // Exclude Non-generic Buffs [ie: Runeforging] and Executioner-Enchant
10333  if (GetSpellProto()->SpellFamilyName != SPELLFAMILY_GENERIC || GetId() == 42976)
10334  return false;
10335 
10336  // Exclude Stackable Buffs [ie: Blood Reserve]
10337  if (GetSpellProto()->StackAmount)
10338  return false;
10339 
10340  // only self applied player buffs
10341  if (m_target->GetTypeId() != TYPEID_PLAYER || m_target->GetObjectGuid() != GetCasterGuid())
10342  return false;
10343 
10344  Item* castItem = ((Player*)m_target)->GetItemByGuid(GetCastItemGuid());
10345  if (!castItem)
10346  return false;
10347 
10348  // Limit to Weapon-Slots
10349  if (!castItem->IsEquipped() ||
10350  (castItem->GetSlot() != EQUIPMENT_SLOT_MAINHAND && castItem->GetSlot() != EQUIPMENT_SLOT_OFFHAND))
10351  return false;
10352 
10353  // from different weapons
10354  return ref->GetCastItemGuid() && ref->GetCastItemGuid() != GetCastItemGuid();
10355 }
10356 
10357 bool SpellAuraHolder::IsNeedVisibleSlot(Unit const* caster) const
10358 {
10359  bool totemAura = caster && caster->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT && ((Creature*)caster)->IsTotem();
10360 
10361  if (m_spellProto->procFlags)
10362  return true;
10363  if (IsSpellTriggerSpellByAura(m_spellProto))
10364  return true;
10365  if (IsSpellHaveAura(m_spellProto, SPELL_AURA_MOD_IGNORE_SHAPESHIFT))
10366  return true;
10367  if (IsSpellHaveAura(m_spellProto, SPELL_AURA_IGNORE_UNIT_STATE))
10368  return true;
10369 
10370  // passive auras (except totem auras) do not get placed in the slots
10371  return !m_isPassive || totemAura || HasAreaAuraEffect(m_spellProto);
10372 }
10373 
10374 void SpellAuraHolder::BuildUpdatePacket(WorldPacket& data) const
10375 {
10376  data << uint8(GetAuraSlot());
10377  data << uint32(GetId());
10378 
10379  uint8 auraFlags = GetAuraFlags();
10380  data << uint8(auraFlags);
10381  data << uint8(GetAuraLevel());
10382 
10383  uint32 stackCount = m_spellProto->StackAmount ? m_stackAmount : m_procCharges;
10384  data << uint8(stackCount <= 255 ? stackCount : 255);
10385 
10386  if (!(auraFlags & AFLAG_NOT_CASTER))
10387  {
10388  data << GetCasterGuid().WriteAsPacked();
10389  }
10390 
10391  if (auraFlags & AFLAG_DURATION)
10392  {
10393  data << uint32(GetAuraMaxDuration());
10394  data << uint32(GetAuraDuration());
10395  }
10396 }
10397 
10398 void SpellAuraHolder::SendAuraUpdate(bool remove) const
10399 {
10400  WorldPacket data(SMSG_AURA_UPDATE);
10401  data << m_target->GetPackGUID();
10402 
10403  if (remove)
10404  {
10405  data << uint8(GetAuraSlot());
10406  data << uint32(0);
10407  }
10408  else
10409  BuildUpdatePacket(data);
10410 
10411  m_target->SendMessageToSet(data, true);
10412 }
10413 
10414 void SpellAuraHolder::HandleSpellSpecificBoosts(bool apply)
10415 {
10416  bool cast_at_remove = false; // if spell must be casted at last aura from stack remove
10417  std::vector<uint32> boostSpells;
10418 
10419  switch (GetSpellProto()->SpellFamilyName)
10420  {
10421  case SPELLFAMILY_GENERIC:
10422  {
10423  switch (GetId())
10424  {
10425  case 29865: // Deathbloom (10 man)
10426  {
10427  if (!apply && m_removeMode == AURA_REMOVE_BY_EXPIRE)
10428  {
10429  cast_at_remove = true;
10430  boostSpells.push_back(55594);
10431  }
10432  else
10433  return;
10434  break;
10435  }
10436  case 33896: // Desperate Defense
10437  boostSpells.push_back(33897);
10438  break;
10439  case 36797: // Mind Control - Kaelthas
10440  boostSpells.push_back(36798);
10441  break;
10442  case 55053: // Deathbloom (25 man)
10443  {
10444  if (!apply && m_removeMode == AURA_REMOVE_BY_EXPIRE)
10445  {
10446  cast_at_remove = true;
10447  boostSpells.push_back(55601);
10448  }
10449  else
10450  return;
10451  break;
10452  }
10453  case 50720: // Vigilance (warrior spell but not have warrior family)
10454  boostSpells.push_back(68066); // Damage Reduction
10455  break;
10456  case 57350: // Illusionary Barrier
10457  {
10458  if (!apply && m_target->GetPowerType() == POWER_MANA)
10459  {
10460  cast_at_remove = true;
10461  boostSpells.push_back(60242); // Darkmoon Card: Illusion
10462  }
10463  else
10464  return;
10465  break;
10466  }
10467  case 58914: // Kill Command, pet aura
10468  {
10469  // Removal is needed here because the dummy aura handler is applied / removed at stacks change
10470  if (!apply)
10471  if (Unit* caster = GetCaster())
10472  caster->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(34027);
10473  return;
10474  }
10475  case 62692: // Aura of Despair
10476  boostSpells.push_back(64848);
10477  break;
10478  case 71905: // Soul Fragment
10479  {
10480  if (!apply)
10481  {
10482  boostSpells.push_back(72521); // Shadowmourne Visual Low
10483  boostSpells.push_back(72523); // Shadowmourne Visual High
10484  }
10485  else
10486  return;
10487  break;
10488  }
10489  default:
10490  return;
10491  }
10492  break;
10493  }
10494  case SPELLFAMILY_MAGE:
10495  {
10496  // Ice Barrier (non stacking from one caster)
10497  if (m_spellProto->SpellIconID == 32)
10498  {
10499  if ((!apply && m_removeMode == AURA_REMOVE_BY_DISPEL) || m_removeMode == AURA_REMOVE_BY_SHIELD_BREAK)
10500  {
10501  Unit::AuraList const& dummyAuras = m_target->GetAurasByType(SPELL_AURA_DUMMY);
10502  for (auto dummyAura : dummyAuras)
10503  {
10504  // Shattered Barrier
10505  if (dummyAura->GetSpellProto()->SpellIconID == 2945)
10506  {
10507  cast_at_remove = true;
10508  // first rank have 50% chance
10509  if (dummyAura->GetId() != 44745 || roll_chance_i(50))
10510  boostSpells.push_back(55080);
10511  break;
10512  }
10513  }
10514  }
10515  else
10516  return;
10517  break;
10518  }
10519 
10520  switch (GetId())
10521  {
10522  case 11129: // Combustion (remove triggered aura stack)
10523  {
10524  if (!apply)
10525  boostSpells.push_back(28682);
10526  else
10527  return;
10528  break;
10529  }
10530  case 28682: // Combustion (remove main aura)
10531  {
10532  if (!apply)
10533  boostSpells.push_back(11129);
10534  else
10535  return;
10536  break;
10537  }
10538  case 44401: // Missile Barrage (triggered)
10539  case 48108: // Hot Streak (triggered)
10540  case 57761: // Fireball! (Brain Freeze triggered)
10541  {
10542  // consumed aura (at proc charges 0)
10543  if (!apply && m_removeMode == AURA_REMOVE_BY_DEFAULT)
10544  {
10545  Unit* caster = GetCaster();
10546  // Item - Mage T10 2P Bonus
10547  if (!caster || !caster->HasAura(70752))
10548  return;
10549 
10550  cast_at_remove = true;
10551  boostSpells.push_back(70753); // Pushing the Limit
10552  }
10553  else
10554  return;
10555  break;
10556  }
10557  default:
10558  break; // Break here for poly below - 2.4.2+ only player poly regens
10559  }
10560  break;
10561  }
10562  case SPELLFAMILY_WARRIOR:
10563  {
10564  if (!apply)
10565  {
10566  // Remove Blood Frenzy only if target no longer has any Deep Wound or Rend (applying is handled by procs)
10567  if (GetSpellProto()->Mechanic != MECHANIC_BLEED)
10568  return;
10569 
10570  // If target still has one of Warrior's bleeds, do nothing
10571  Unit::AuraList const& PeriodicDamage = m_target->GetAurasByType(SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_DAMAGE);
10572  for (auto i : PeriodicDamage)
10573  if (i->GetCasterGuid() == GetCasterGuid() &&
10574  i->GetSpellProto()->SpellFamilyName == SPELLFAMILY_WARRIOR &&
10575  i->GetSpellProto()->Mechanic == MECHANIC_BLEED)
10576  return;
10577 
10578  boostSpells.push_back(30069); // Blood Frenzy (Rank 1)
10579  boostSpells.push_back(30070); // Blood Frenzy (Rank 2)
10580  }
10581  break;
10582  }
10583  case SPELLFAMILY_WARLOCK:
10584  {
10585  // Fear (non stacking)
10586  if (m_spellProto->SpellFamilyFlags & uint64(0x0000040000000000))
10587  {
10588  if (!apply)
10589  {
10590  Unit* caster = GetCaster();
10591  if (!caster)
10592  return;
10593 
10594  Unit::AuraList const& dummyAuras = caster->GetAurasByType(SPELL_AURA_DUMMY);
10595  for (auto dummyAura : dummyAuras)
10596  {
10597  SpellEntry const* dummyEntry = dummyAura->GetSpellProto();
10598  // Improved Fear
10599  if (dummyEntry->SpellFamilyName == SPELLFAMILY_WARLOCK && dummyEntry->SpellIconID == 98)
10600  {
10601  cast_at_remove = true;
10602  switch (dummyAura->GetModifier()->m_amount)
10603  {
10604  // Rank 1
10605  case 0: boostSpells.push_back(60946); break;
10606  // Rank 1
10607  case 1: boostSpells.push_back(60947); break;
10608  }
10609  break;
10610  }
10611  }
10612  }
10613  else
10614  return;
10615  }
10616  // Shadowflame (DoT)
10617  else if (m_spellProto->IsFitToFamilyMask(uint64(0x0000000000000000), 0x00000002))
10618  {
10619  // Glyph of Shadowflame
10620  if (!apply)
10621  boostSpells.push_back(63311);
10622  else
10623  {
10624  Unit* caster = GetCaster();
10625  if (caster && caster->HasAura(63310))
10626  boostSpells.push_back(63311);
10627  else
10628  return;
10629  }
10630  }
10631  else
10632  return;
10633  break;
10634  }
10635  case SPELLFAMILY_PRIEST:
10636  {
10637  // Power Word: Shield
10638  if (apply && m_spellProto->SpellFamilyFlags & uint64(0x0000000000000001) && m_spellProto->Mechanic == MECHANIC_SHIELD)
10639  {
10640  Unit* caster = GetCaster();
10641  if (!caster)
10642  return;
10643 
10644  // Glyph of Power Word: Shield
10645  if (Aura* glyph = caster->GetAura(55672, EFFECT_INDEX_0))
10646  {
10647  Aura* shield = GetAuraByEffectIndex(EFFECT_INDEX_0);
10648  int32 heal = (glyph->GetModifier()->m_amount * shield->GetModifier()->m_amount) / 100;
10649  caster->CastCustomSpell(m_target, 56160, &heal, nullptr, nullptr, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, nullptr, shield);
10650  }
10651  return;
10652  }
10653  switch (GetId())
10654  {
10655  // Abolish Disease (remove 1 more poison effect with Body and Soul)
10656  case 552:
10657  {
10658  if (apply)
10659  {
10660  int chance = 0;
10661  Unit::AuraList const& dummyAuras = m_target->GetAurasByType(SPELL_AURA_DUMMY);
10662  for (auto dummyAura : dummyAuras)
10663  {
10664  SpellEntry const* dummyEntry = dummyAura->GetSpellProto();
10665  // Body and Soul (talent ranks)
10666  if (dummyEntry->SpellFamilyName == SPELLFAMILY_PRIEST && dummyEntry->SpellIconID == 2218 &&
10667  dummyEntry->SpellVisual[0] == 0)
10668  {
10669  chance = dummyAura->GetSpellProto()->CalculateSimpleValue(EFFECT_INDEX_1);
10670  break;
10671  }
10672  }
10673 
10674  if (roll_chance_i(chance))
10675  boostSpells.push_back(64134); // Body and Soul (periodic dispel effect)
10676  }
10677  else
10678  boostSpells.push_back(64134); // Body and Soul (periodic dispel effect)
10679  break;
10680  }
10681  // Dispersion mana reg and immunity
10682  case 47585:
10683  boostSpells.push_back(60069); // Dispersion
10684  boostSpells.push_back(63230); // Dispersion
10685  break;
10686  default:
10687  break;
10688  }
10689  break;
10690  }
10691  case SPELLFAMILY_DRUID:
10692  {
10693  // Barkskin
10694  if (GetId() == 22812 && m_target->HasAura(63057)) // Glyph of Barkskin
10695  boostSpells.push_back(63058); // Glyph - Barkskin 01
10696  else if (!apply && GetId() == 5229) // Enrage (Druid Bear)
10697  boostSpells.push_back(51185); // King of the Jungle (Enrage damage aura)
10698  else
10699  return;
10700  break;
10701  }
10702  case SPELLFAMILY_ROGUE:
10703  // Sprint (skip non player casted spells by category)
10704  if (GetSpellProto()->SpellFamilyFlags & uint64(0x0000000000000040) && GetSpellProto()->Category == 44)
10705  {
10706  if (!apply || m_target->HasAura(58039)) // Glyph of Blurred Speed
10707  boostSpells.push_back(61922); // Sprint (waterwalk)
10708  else
10709  return;
10710  }
10711  else
10712  return;
10713  break;
10714  case SPELLFAMILY_HUNTER:
10715  {
10716  switch (GetId())
10717  {
10718  case 34074: // Aspect of the Viper
10719  {
10720  if (!apply || m_target->HasAura(60144)) // Viper Attack Speed
10721  boostSpells.push_back(61609); // Vicious Viper
10722  else
10723  return;
10724  break;
10725  }
10726  case 19574: // Bestial Wrath - immunity
10727  case 34471: // The Beast Within - immunity
10728  {
10729  boostSpells.push_back(24395);
10730  boostSpells.push_back(24396);
10731  boostSpells.push_back(24397);
10732  boostSpells.push_back(26592);
10733  break;
10734  }
10735  case 34027: // Kill Command, owner aura (spellmods)
10736  {
10737  if (apply)
10738  {
10739  if (m_target->HasAura(35029)) // Focused Fire, rank 1
10740  boostSpells.push_back(60110); // Kill Command, Focused Fire rank 1 bonus
10741  else if (m_target->HasAura(35030)) // Focused Fire, rank 2
10742  boostSpells.push_back(60113); // Kill Command, Focused Fire rank 2 bonus
10743  else
10744  return;
10745  }
10746  else
10747  {
10748  boostSpells.push_back(34026); // Kill Command, owner casting aura
10749  boostSpells.push_back(60110); // Kill Command, Focused Fire rank 1 bonus
10750  boostSpells.push_back(60113); // Kill Command, Focused Fire rank 2 bonus
10751  if (Unit* pet = m_target->GetPet())
10752  pet->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(58914); // Kill Command, pet aura
10753  }
10754  break;
10755  }
10756  case 35029: // Focused Fire, rank 1
10757  {
10758  if (apply && !m_target->HasAura(34027)) // Kill Command, owner casting aura
10759  return;
10760 
10761  boostSpells.push_back(60110); // Kill Command, Focused Fire rank 1 bonus
10762  break;
10763  }
10764  case 35030: // Focused Fire, rank 2
10765  {
10766  if (apply && !m_target->HasAura(34027)) // Kill Command, owner casting aura
10767  return;
10768 
10769  boostSpells.push_back(60113); // Kill Command, Focused Fire rank 2 bonus
10770  break;
10771  }
10772  default:
10773  // Freezing Trap Effect
10774  if (m_spellProto->SpellFamilyFlags & uint64(0x0000000000000008))
10775  {
10776  if (!apply)
10777  {
10778  Unit* caster = GetCaster();
10779  // Glyph of Freezing Trap
10780  if (caster && caster->HasAura(56845))
10781  {
10782  cast_at_remove = true;
10783  boostSpells.push_back(61394);
10784  }
10785  else
10786  return;
10787  }
10788  else
10789  return;
10790  }
10791  // Aspect of the Dragonhawk dodge
10792  else if (GetSpellProto()->IsFitToFamilyMask(uint64(0x0000000000000000), 0x00001000))
10793  {
10794  boostSpells.push_back(61848);
10795 
10796  // triggered spell have same category as main spell and cooldown
10797  if (apply && m_target->GetTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
10798  m_target->RemoveSpellCooldown(61848);
10799  }
10800  else
10801  return;
10802  break;
10803  }
10804  break;
10805  }
10806  case SPELLFAMILY_PALADIN:
10807  {
10808  if (m_spellProto->Id == 31884) // Avenging Wrath
10809  {
10810  if (!apply)
10811  boostSpells.push_back(57318); // Sanctified Wrath (triggered)
10812  else
10813  {
10814  int32 percent = 0;
10815  Unit::AuraList const& dummyAuras = m_target->GetAurasByType(SPELL_AURA_DUMMY);
10816  for (auto dummyAura : dummyAuras)
10817  {
10818  if (dummyAura->GetSpellProto()->SpellIconID == 3029)
10819  {
10820  percent = dummyAura->GetModifier()->m_amount;
10821  break;
10822  }
10823  }
10824 
10825  // apply in special way
10826  if (percent)
10827  {
10828  // Sanctified Wrath (triggered)
10829  // prevent aura deletion, specially in multi-boost case
10830  m_target->CastCustomSpell(m_target, 57318, &percent, &percent, nullptr, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, nullptr);
10831  }
10832  return;
10833  }
10834  break;
10835  }
10836 
10837  // Only process on player casting paladin aura
10838  // all aura bonuses applied also in aura area effect way to caster
10839  if (GetCasterGuid() != m_target->GetObjectGuid() || !GetCasterGuid().IsPlayer())
10840  return;
10841 
10842  if (GetSpellSpecific(m_spellProto->Id) != SPELL_AURA)
10843  return;
10844 
10845  // Sanctified Retribution and Swift Retribution (they share one aura), but not Retribution Aura (already gets modded)
10846  if ((GetSpellProto()->SpellFamilyFlags & uint64(0x0000000000000008)) == 0)
10847  boostSpells.push_back(63531); // placeholder for talent spell mods
10848  // Improved Concentration Aura (auras bonus)
10849  boostSpells.push_back(63510); // placeholder for talent spell mods
10850  // Improved Devotion Aura (auras bonus)
10851  boostSpells.push_back(63514); // placeholder for talent spell mods
10852  break;
10853  }
10854  case SPELLFAMILY_DEATHKNIGHT:
10855  {
10856  // second part of spell apply
10857  switch (GetId())
10858  {
10859  case 49039: boostSpells.push_back(50397); break; // Lichborne
10860 
10861  case 48263: // Frost Presence
10862  case 48265: // Unholy Presence
10863  case 48266: // Blood Presence
10864  {
10865  // else part one per 3 pair
10866  if (GetId() == 48263 || GetId() == 48265) // Frost Presence or Unholy Presence
10867  {
10868  // Improved Blood Presence
10869  int32 heal_pct = 0;
10870  if (apply)
10871  {
10872  Unit::AuraList const& bloodAuras = m_target->GetAurasByType(SPELL_AURA_DUMMY);
10873  for (auto bloodAura : bloodAuras)
10874  {
10875  // skip same icon
10876  if (bloodAura->GetSpellProto()->SpellFamilyName == SPELLFAMILY_DEATHKNIGHT &&
10877  bloodAura->GetSpellProto()->SpellIconID == 2636)
10878  {
10879  heal_pct = bloodAura->GetModifier()->m_amount;
10880  break;
10881  }
10882  }
10883  }
10884 
10885  if (heal_pct)
10886  m_target->CastCustomSpell(m_target, 63611, &heal_pct, nullptr, nullptr, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, nullptr, nullptr, GetCasterGuid());
10887  else
10888  m_target->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(63611);
10889  }
10890  else
10891  boostSpells.push_back(63611); // Improved Blood Presence, trigger for heal
10892 
10893  if (GetId() == 48263 || GetId() == 48266) // Frost Presence or Blood Presence
10894  {
10895  // Improved Unholy Presence
10896  int32 power_pct = 0;
10897  if (apply)
10898  {
10899  Unit::AuraList const& unholyAuras = m_target->GetAurasByType(SPELL_AURA_DUMMY);
10900  for (auto unholyAura : unholyAuras)
10901  {
10902  // skip same icon
10903  if (unholyAura->GetSpellProto()->SpellFamilyName == SPELLFAMILY_DEATHKNIGHT &&
10904  unholyAura->GetSpellProto()->SpellIconID == 2633)
10905  {
10906  power_pct = unholyAura->GetModifier()->m_amount;
10907  break;
10908  }
10909  }
10910  }
10911  if (power_pct || !apply)
10912  boostSpells.push_back(49772); // Unholy Presence, speed part, spell1 used for Improvement presence fit to own presence
10913  }
10914  else
10915  boostSpells.push_back(49772); // Unholy Presence move speed
10916 
10917  if (GetId() == 48265 || GetId() == 48266) // Unholy Presence or Blood Presence
10918  {
10919  // Improved Frost Presence
10920  int32 stamina_pct = 0;
10921  if (apply)
10922  {
10923  Unit::AuraList const& frostAuras = m_target->GetAurasByType(SPELL_AURA_DUMMY);
10924  for (auto frostAura : frostAuras)
10925  {
10926  // skip same icon
10927  if (frostAura->GetSpellProto()->SpellFamilyName == SPELLFAMILY_DEATHKNIGHT &&
10928  frostAura->GetSpellProto()->SpellIconID == 2632)
10929  {
10930  stamina_pct = frostAura->GetModifier()->m_amount;
10931  break;
10932  }
10933  }
10934  }
10935 
10936  if (stamina_pct)
10937  m_target->CastCustomSpell(m_target, 61261, &stamina_pct, nullptr, nullptr, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, nullptr, nullptr, GetCasterGuid());
10938  else
10939  m_target->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(61261);
10940  }
10941  else
10942  boostSpells.push_back(61261); // Frost Presence, stamina
10943 
10944  if (GetId() == 48265) // Unholy Presence
10945  {
10946  // Improved Unholy Presence, special case for own presence
10947  int32 power_pct = 0;
10948  if (apply)
10949  {
10950  Unit::AuraList const& unholyAuras = m_target->GetAurasByType(SPELL_AURA_DUMMY);
10951  for (auto unholyAura : unholyAuras)
10952  {
10953  // skip same icon
10954  if (unholyAura->GetSpellProto()->SpellFamilyName == SPELLFAMILY_DEATHKNIGHT &&
10955  unholyAura->GetSpellProto()->SpellIconID == 2633)
10956  {
10957  power_pct = unholyAura->GetModifier()->m_amount;
10958  break;
10959  }
10960  }
10961  }
10962 
10963  if (power_pct)
10964  {
10965  int32 bp = 5;
10966  m_target->CastCustomSpell(m_target, 63622, &bp, &bp, &bp, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, nullptr, nullptr, GetCasterGuid());
10967  m_target->CastCustomSpell(m_target, 65095, &bp, nullptr, nullptr, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, nullptr, nullptr, GetCasterGuid());
10968  }
10969  else
10970  {
10971  m_target->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(63622);
10972  m_target->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(65095);
10973  }
10974  }
10975  break;
10976  }
10977  }
10978 
10979  // Improved Blood Presence
10980  if (GetSpellProto()->SpellIconID == 2636 && m_isPassive)
10981  {
10982  // if presence active: Frost Presence or Unholy Presence
10983  if (apply && (m_target->HasAura(48263) || m_target->HasAura(48265)))
10984  {
10985  Aura* aura = GetAuraByEffectIndex(EFFECT_INDEX_0);
10986  if (!aura)
10987  return;
10988 
10989  int32 bp = aura->GetModifier()->m_amount;
10990  m_target->CastCustomSpell(m_target, 63611, &bp, nullptr, nullptr, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, nullptr, nullptr, GetCasterGuid());
10991  }
10992  else
10993  m_target->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(63611);
10994  return;
10995  }
10996 
10997  // Improved Frost Presence
10998  if (GetSpellProto()->SpellIconID == 2632 && m_isPassive)
10999  {
11000  // if presence active: Unholy Presence or Blood Presence
11001  if (apply && (m_target->HasAura(48265) || m_target->HasAura(48266)))
11002  {
11003  Aura* aura = GetAuraByEffectIndex(EFFECT_INDEX_0);
11004  if (!aura)
11005  return;
11006 
11007  int32 bp0 = aura->GetModifier()->m_amount;
11008  int32 bp1 = 0; // disable threat mod part for not Frost Presence case
11009  m_target->CastCustomSpell(m_target, 61261, &bp0, &bp1, nullptr, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, nullptr, nullptr, GetCasterGuid());
11010  }
11011  else
11012  m_target->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(61261);
11013  return;
11014  }
11015 
11016  // Improved Unholy Presence
11017  if (GetSpellProto()->SpellIconID == 2633 && m_isPassive)
11018  {
11019  // if presence active: Unholy Presence
11020  if (apply && m_target->HasAura(48265))
11021  {
11022  int32 bp = 5;
11023  m_target->CastCustomSpell(m_target, 63622, &bp, &bp, &bp, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, nullptr, nullptr, GetCasterGuid());
11024  m_target->CastCustomSpell(m_target, 65095, &bp, nullptr, nullptr, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED, nullptr, nullptr, GetCasterGuid());
11025  }
11026  else
11027  {
11028  m_target->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(63622);
11029  m_target->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(65095);
11030  }
11031 
11032  // if presence active: Frost Presence or Blood Presence
11033  if (!apply || m_target->HasAura(48263) || m_target->HasAura(48266))
11034  boostSpells.push_back(49772);
11035  else
11036  return;
11037  break;
11038  }
11039  break;
11040  }
11041  default:
11042  return;
11043  }
11044 
11045  if (GetSpellProto()->Mechanic == MECHANIC_POLYMORPH)
11046  boostSpells.push_back(12939); // Just so that this doesnt conflict with others
11047 
11048  if (boostSpells.empty())
11049  return;
11050 
11051  for (uint32 spellId : boostSpells)
11052  {
11053  Unit* boostCaster = m_target;
11054  Unit* boostTarget = nullptr;
11055  ObjectGuid casterGuid = m_target->GetObjectGuid(); // caster can be nullptr, but guid is still valid for removal
11056  SpellEntry const* boostEntry = sSpellTemplate.LookupEntry<SpellEntry>(spellId);
11057  for (uint32 target : boostEntry->EffectImplicitTargetA)
11058  {
11059  switch (target)
11060  {
11061  case TARGET_UNIT_ENEMY:
11062  case TARGET_UNIT:
11063  if (apply) // optimization
11064  boostCaster = GetCaster();
11065  else
11066  casterGuid = GetCasterGuid();
11067  boostTarget = m_target;
11068  break;
11069  }
11070  }
11071  if (apply || cast_at_remove)
11072  boostCaster->CastSpell(boostTarget, boostEntry, TRIGGERED_OLD_TRIGGERED);
11073  else
11074  m_target->RemoveAurasByCasterSpell(spellId, casterGuid);
11075  }
11076 }
11077 
11078 SpellAuraHolder::~SpellAuraHolder()
11079 {
11080  // note: auras in delete list won't be affected since they clear themselves from holder when adding to deletedAuraslist
11081  for (int32 i = 0; i < MAX_EFFECT_INDEX; ++i)
11082  delete m_auras[i];
11083 }
11084 
11085 void SpellAuraHolder::Update(uint32 diff)
11086 {
11087  if (m_skipUpdate)
11088  {
11089  m_skipUpdate = false;
11090  if (m_applyMSTime == GetTarget()->GetMap()->GetCurrentMSTime()) // do not tick in same tick as created
11091  return;
11092  }
11093 
11094  for (auto aura : m_auras)
11095  if (aura)
11096  aura->UpdateAura(diff);
11097 
11098  if (m_duration > 0)
11099  {
11100  m_duration -= diff;
11101  if (m_duration < 0)
11102  m_duration = 0;
11103 
11104  m_timeCla -= diff;
11105 
11106  if (m_timeCla <= 0)
11107  {
11108  if (!GetSpellProto()->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX2_NO_TARGET_PER_SECOND_COSTS) || GetCasterGuid() == GetTarget()->GetObjectGuid())
11109  {
11110  Powers powertype = Powers(GetSpellProto()->powerType);
11111  int32 manaPerSecond = GetSpellProto()->manaPerSecond + GetSpellProto()->manaPerSecondPerLevel * GetTarget()->GetLevel();
11112  m_timeCla = 1 * IN_MILLISECONDS;
11113 
11114  if (manaPerSecond)
11115  {
11116  if (powertype == POWER_HEALTH)
11117  {
11118  if (GetTarget()->GetHealth() <= (uint32)manaPerSecond)
11119  {
11120  // cannot apply damage part so we have to cancel responsible aura
11121  GetTarget()->RemoveAurasDueToSpell(GetId());
11122 
11123  // finish current generic/channeling spells, don't affect autorepeat
11124  GetTarget()->FinishSpell(CURRENT_GENERIC_SPELL);
11125  GetTarget()->FinishSpell(CURRENT_CHANNELED_SPELL);
11126  }
11127  else
11128  GetTarget()->ModifyHealth(-manaPerSecond);
11129  }
11130  else
11131  GetTarget()->ModifyPower(powertype, -manaPerSecond);
11132  }
11133  }
11134  }
11135 
11136  if (m_duration && !IsDeleted())
11137  UpdateHeartbeatResist(diff);
11138  }
11139 }
11140 
11141 void SpellAuraHolder::RefreshHolder()
11142 {
11143  SetAuraDuration(GetAuraMaxDuration());
11144  SendAuraUpdate(false);
11145 }
11146 
11147 void SpellAuraHolder::SetAuraMaxDuration(int32 duration)
11148 {
11149  m_maxDuration = duration;
11150 
11151  // possible overwrite persistent state
11152  if (!GetSpellProto()->HasAttribute(SPELL_ATTR_EX5_DO_NOT_DISPLAY_DURATION) && duration > 0)
11153  {
11154  if (!(IsPassive() && GetSpellProto()->DurationIndex == 0))
11155  SetPermanent(false);
11156 
11157  SetAuraFlags(GetAuraFlags() | AFLAG_DURATION);
11158  }
11159  else
11160  SetAuraFlags(GetAuraFlags() & ~AFLAG_DURATION);
11161 }
11162 
11163 bool SpellAuraHolder::DropAuraCharge()
11164 {
11165  if (m_procCharges == 0)
11166  return false;
11167 
11168  --m_procCharges;
11169 
11170  SendAuraUpdate(false);
11171 
11172  if (GetCasterGuid() != m_target->GetObjectGuid() && IsAreaAura())
11173  if (Unit* caster = GetCaster())
11174  caster->RemoveAuraCharge(m_spellProto->Id);
11175 
11176  return m_procCharges == 0;
11177 }
11178 
11179 void SpellAuraHolder::ResetSpellModCharges()
11180 {
11181  for (uint8 i = 0; i < MAX_EFFECT_INDEX; i++)
11182  if (m_auras[i])
11183  if (SpellModifier* spellMod = m_auras[i]->GetSpellModifier())
11184  spellMod->charges = m_procCharges;
11185 }
11186 
11187 bool SpellAuraHolder::HasModifier(const uint64& modId) const
11188 {
11189  for (uint8 i = 0; i < MAX_EFFECT_INDEX; i++)
11190  if (m_auras[i] && m_auras[i]->GetSpellModifier())
11191  if (m_auras[i]->GetSpellModifier()->modId == modId)
11192  return true;
11193  return false;
11194 }
11195 
11196 bool SpellAuraHolder::HasMechanic(uint32 mechanic) const
11197 {
11198  if (mechanic == m_spellProto->Mechanic)
11199  return true;
11200 
11201  for (int32 i = 0; i < MAX_EFFECT_INDEX; ++i)
11202  if (m_auras[i] && m_spellProto->EffectMechanic[i] == mechanic)
11203  return true;
11204  return false;
11205 }
11206 
11207 bool SpellAuraHolder::HasMechanicMask(uint32 mechanicMask) const
11208 {
11209  if (mechanicMask & (1 << (m_spellProto->Mechanic - 1)))
11210  return true;
11211 
11212  for (int32 i = 0; i < MAX_EFFECT_INDEX; ++i)
11213  if (m_auras[i] && m_spellProto->EffectMechanic[i] && ((1 << (m_spellProto->EffectMechanic[i] - 1)) & mechanicMask))
11214  return true;
11215  return false;
11216 }
11217 
11218 bool SpellAuraHolder::IsDispellableByMask(uint32 dispelMask, Unit const* caster, SpellEntry const* spellInfo) const
11219 {
11220  if ((1 << GetSpellProto()->Dispel) & dispelMask)
11221  {
11222  if (GetSpellProto()->Dispel == DISPEL_MAGIC)
11223  {
11224  // do not remove positive auras if friendly target
11225  // negative auras if non-friendly target
11226  bool positive = IsPositive();
11227  if (positive == caster->CanAssistSpell(GetTarget(), spellInfo))
11228  if (positive || !IsCharm())
11229  return false;
11230 
11231  // Unholy Blight prevents dispel of diseases from target
11232  if (GetSpellProto()->Dispel == DISPEL_DISEASE)
11233  if (GetTarget()->HasAura(50536))
11234  return false;
11235  }
11236  return true;
11237  }
11238  return false;
11239 }
11240 
11241 bool SpellAuraHolder::IsPersistent() const
11242 {
11243  for (auto aur : m_auras)
11244  if (aur)
11245  if (aur->IsPersistent())
11246  return true;
11247  return false;
11248 }
11249 
11250 bool SpellAuraHolder::IsAreaAura() const
11251 {
11252  for (auto aur : m_auras)
11253  if (aur)
11254  if (aur->IsAreaAura())
11255  return true;
11256  return false;
11257 }
11258 
11259 bool SpellAuraHolder::IsPositive() const
11260 {
11261  for (auto aur : m_auras)
11262  if (aur)
11263  if (!aur->IsPositive())
11264  return false;
11265  return true;
11266 }
11267 
11268 bool SpellAuraHolder::IsEmptyHolder() const
11269 {
11270  for (auto m_aura : m_auras)
11271  if (m_aura)
11272  return false;
11273  return true;
11274 }
11275 
11276 bool SpellAuraHolder::IsSaveToDbHolder() const
11277 {
11278  if (IsPassive() || IsChanneledSpell(GetSpellProto()) || IsItemAura(GetSpellProto()))
11279  return false;
11280 
11281  if (GetTrackedAuraType() == TRACK_AURA_TYPE_SINGLE_TARGET)
11282  return false;
11283 
11284  if (m_spellProto->AuraInterruptFlags & AURA_INTERRUPT_FLAG_LEAVE_WORLD)
11285  return false;
11286 
11287  if (IsPermanent())
11288  {
11289  // world buff auras should not be saved
11290  switch (m_spellProto->Id)
11291  {
11292  case 11413: // echoes of lordaeron
11293  case 11414: // echoes of lordaeron
11294  case 11415: // echoes of lordaeron
11295  case 1386: // echoes of lordaeron
11296  case 30880: // echoes of lordaeron
11297  case 30683: // echoes of lordaeron
11298  case 30682: // echoes of lordaeron
11299  case 29520: // echoes of lordaeron
11300  case 30754: // cenarion favor
11301  case 32071: // hellfire superiority
11302  case 32049: // hellfire superiority
11303  case 33377: // blessing of auchindoun
11304  case 33779: // twin spire blessing
11305  case 33795: // halaani strength
11306  case 39911: // nazgrels command
11307  case 39913: // trollbanes command
11308  case 39953: // adals song of battle
11309  case 45444: // bonfires blessing
11310  case 46302: // kirus song of victory
11311  case 47521: // Mole Machine Player Hide and Root
11312  return false;
11313  }
11314  }
11315  return true;
11316 }
11317 
11318 bool SpellAuraHolder::IsCharm() const
11319 {
11320  for (auto m_aura : m_auras)
11321  if (m_aura && IsCharmAura(m_spellProto, m_aura->GetEffIndex()))
11322  return true;
11323  return false;
11324 }
11325 
11326 void SpellAuraHolder::UnregisterAndCleanupTrackedAuras(uint32 auraFlags)
11327 {
11328  TrackedAuraType trackedType = GetTrackedAuraType();
11329  if (trackedType == TRACK_AURA_TYPE_NOT_TRACKED)
11330  return;
11331 
11332  if (trackedType == TRACK_AURA_TYPE_SINGLE_TARGET)
11333  {
11334  if (Unit* caster = GetCaster())
11335  caster->GetTrackedAuraTargets(trackedType).erase(GetSpellProto());
11336  }
11337  else if (trackedType == TRACK_AURA_TYPE_CONTROL_VEHICLE)
11338  {
11339  Unit* caster = GetCaster();
11340  if (caster && IsSpellHaveAura(GetSpellProto(), SPELL_AURA_CONTROL_VEHICLE, auraFlags))
11341  {
11342  caster->GetTrackedAuraTargets(trackedType).erase(GetSpellProto());
11343 
11344  if (SpellAuraHolder* holder = caster->GetSpellAuraHolder(GetSpellProto()->Id))
11345  {
11346  // remove the tracked aura type(TRACK_AURA_TYPE_CONTROL_VEHICLE) to avoid getting back here
11347  holder->SetTrackedAuraType(TRACK_AURA_TYPE_NOT_TRACKED);
11348  caster->RemoveSpellAuraHolder(holder);
11349  }
11350  }
11351  else if (caster)
11352  {
11353  Unit::TrackedAuraTargetMap scTarget = caster->GetTrackedAuraTargets(trackedType);
11354  Unit::TrackedAuraTargetMap::iterator find = scTarget.find(GetSpellProto());
11355  if (find != scTarget.end())
11356  {
11357  ObjectGuid vehicleGuid = find->second;
11358  scTarget.erase(find);
11359  if (Unit* vehicle = caster->GetMap()->GetUnit(vehicleGuid))
11360  {
11361  vehicle->RemoveAurasByCasterSpell(GetSpellProto()->Id, caster->GetObjectGuid());
11362  ObjectGuid const& casterGuid = caster->GetObjectGuid();
11363  Unit::SpellAuraHolderBounds spair = vehicle->GetSpellAuraHolderBounds(GetSpellProto()->Id);
11364  for (Unit::SpellAuraHolderMap::iterator iter = spair.first; iter != spair.second;)
11365  {
11366  if (iter->second->GetCasterGuid() == casterGuid)
11367  {
11368  // remove the tracked aura type(TRACK_AURA_TYPE_CONTROL_VEHICLE) to avoid getting back here
11369  iter->second->SetTrackedAuraType(TRACK_AURA_TYPE_NOT_TRACKED);
11370  vehicle->RemoveSpellAuraHolder(iter->second);
11371  break;
11372  }
11373  else
11374  ++iter;
11375  }
11376  }
11377  }
11378  }
11379  }
11380 
11381  m_trackedAuraType = TRACK_AURA_TYPE_NOT_TRACKED;
11382 }
11383 
11384 void SpellAuraHolder::SetCreationDelayFlag()
11385 {
11386  m_skipUpdate = true;
11387 }
11388 
11389 bool SpellAuraHolder::IsProcReady(TimePoint const& now) const
11390 {
11391  return m_procCooldown < now;
11392 }
11393 
11394 void SpellAuraHolder::SetProcCooldown(std::chrono::milliseconds cooldown, TimePoint const& now)
11395 {
11396  m_procCooldown = now + cooldown;
11397 }
11398 
11399 void SpellAuraHolder::SetHeartbeatResist(uint32 chance, int32 originalDuration, uint32 drLevel)
11400 {
11401  // NOTE: This is an experimental approximation of heartbeat resist mechanics, more research is required
11402  // Main points in common cited by independent sources:
11403  // * Break attempts become more frequent as hit count rises
11404  // * Break chance becomes higher as hit count rises
11405  m_heartbeatResistChance = (0.01f * chance * (1 + drLevel));
11406  m_heartbeatResistInterval = std::max(1000, int32(uint32(originalDuration) / (2 + drLevel)));
11407  m_heartbeatResistTimer = m_heartbeatResistInterval;
11408 }
11409 
11410 void SpellAuraHolder::UpdateHeartbeatResist(uint32 diff)
11411 {
11412  if (m_heartbeatResistChance == 0.0f || !m_heartbeatResistInterval || m_heartbeatResistTimer <= 0)
11413  return;
11414 
11415  m_heartbeatResistTimer -= diff;
11416 
11417  while (m_heartbeatResistTimer < 0)
11418  {
11419  m_heartbeatResistTimer += m_heartbeatResistInterval;
11420 
11421  DEBUG_FILTER_LOG(LOG_FILTER_COMBAT, "UpdateHeartbeatResist: Update tick for spell %u with %i ms interval", m_spellProto->Id, m_heartbeatResistInterval);
11422 
11423  const bool resist = roll_chance_f(m_heartbeatResistChance);
11424 
11425  DEBUG_FILTER_LOG(LOG_FILTER_COMBAT, "UpdateHeartbeatResist: Result: %s (chance %.2f)", (resist ? "RESIST" : "HIT"), double(m_heartbeatResistChance));
11426 
11427  if (resist)
11428  {
11429  if (Unit* target = GetTarget())
11430  {
11431  target->RemoveSpellAuraHolder(this, AURA_REMOVE_BY_CANCEL);
11432  return;
11433  }
11434  }
11435  }
11436 }
11437 
11438 GameObjectAura::GameObjectAura(SpellEntry const* spellproto, SpellEffectIndex eff, int32 const* currentDamage, int32 const* currentBasePoints, SpellAuraHolder* holder, Unit* target, GameObject* /*caster*/)
11439  : Aura(spellproto, eff, currentDamage, currentBasePoints, holder, target, nullptr)
11440 {
11441  m_isAreaAura = true;
11442 }
11443 
11444 GameObjectAura::~GameObjectAura()
11445 {
11446 }
11447 
11448 void GameObjectAura::Update(uint32 diff)
11449 {
11450  Aura::Update(diff);
11451  Unit* target = GetTarget();
11452  GameObject* goCaster = target->GetMap()->GetGameObject(GetHolder()->GetCasterGuid());
11453  if (!goCaster)
11454  target->RemoveSpellAuraHolder(GetHolder());
11455 }
11456 
11457 void SpellAuraHolder::OnHolderInit(WorldObject* caster)
11458 {
11459  if (AuraScript* script = GetAuraScript())
11460  script->OnHolderInit(this, caster);
11461 }
11462 
11463 void SpellAuraHolder::OnDispel(Unit* dispeller, uint32 dispellingSpellId, uint32 originalStacks)
11464 {
11465  if (AuraScript* script = GetAuraScript())
11466  script->OnDispel(this, dispeller, dispellingSpellId, originalStacks);
11467 }
11468 
11469 uint32 Aura::CalculateAuraEffectValue(Unit* caster, Unit* /*target*/, SpellEntry const* spellProto, SpellEffectIndex effIdx, uint32 value)
11470 {
11471  switch (spellProto->EffectApplyAuraName[effIdx])
11472  {
11473  case SPELL_AURA_SCHOOL_ABSORB:
11474  {
11475  float DoneActualBenefit = 0.0f;
11476  if (SpellBonusEntry const* bonus = sSpellMgr.GetSpellBonusData(spellProto->Id))
11477  {
11478  DoneActualBenefit = caster->SpellBaseHealingBonusDone(GetSpellSchoolMask(spellProto)) * bonus->direct_damage;
11479  DoneActualBenefit *= caster->CalculateLevelPenalty(spellProto);
11480 
11481  value += (int32)DoneActualBenefit;
11482  }
11483  return value;
11484  }
11485  }
11486  return value;
11487 }
11488 
11489 void Aura::OnAuraInit()
11490 {
11491  if (AuraScript* script = GetAuraScript())
11492  script->OnAuraInit(this);
11493 }
11494 
11495 int32 Aura::OnAuraValueCalculate(Unit* caster, int32 currentValue)
11496 {
11497  if (AuraScript* script = GetAuraScript())
11498  {
11499  AuraCalcData data(this, caster, GetTarget(), GetSpellProto(), GetEffIndex());
11500  return script->OnAuraValueCalculate(data, currentValue);
11501  }
11502  return currentValue;
11503 }
11504
